1b1: bam pa nya shu ShA rba de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba'i 'a ma ga na 'khor zhi b
1b2: a dgra bcom pa lnga brgya dang thabs gcig tu slo ma lta bur gshegs so/ / de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha des
1b3: bku la'i yal ga zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la grib ma byed cing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
1b4: de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa ba'i rtogs par 'gyur/
1b5: ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do// zos nas lha des 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu
1b6: zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par gyur to/ / ji tsam na phyogs gzhan zhig na yugs mo lnga brgya tsam gnas pa de dag gis
1b7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad
1b8: bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od mnga' ba/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta gyur
2a1: kun nas bzang bar mthong ngo / / mthong ma thag tu yang de rnams bcom ldan 'das la sems dad pa chen po skyes so// 'di nyid chos nyid yin te/ ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu can gyi sems can gyis dang por sangs
2a2: rgyas mthong ba ltar lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems goms par byas pa dang / bu med pas bu rnyed pa dang / dbul pos gter mthong ba dang / rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba ni de ltar nyams dga' ba skyed pa ma yin
2a3: no/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dus la gzigs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig
2a4: du 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas shes bya ba nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rnams kyis bdan pa/
2a5: mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa bdag cag la 'di lta bu ni mas ma bgyis te phas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lhas ma lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyis tshogs kyis ma lags
2a6: sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ dge sbyong dang / bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo ni bkum/ thar pa dang mtho ris kyi sgo
2a7: ni phye nas bdag cag lha dang mi rnams su ni bkod de/ btsun pa bdag cag 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang // chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/
2a8: de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la cung zad cig stsol cig dang / de la bdag cag ba gyi bdag bgyi'o// bcom
2b1: ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis dbu skra dang sen mo bregs te byin no/ / de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu skra dang sen mo mchod rten zhig brtsigs so// de nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na gnas pa'i lha ga yin pa des mchod rten de'i 'khor sa rab kur
2b2: yal ga de bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni mchod rten 'di la bgyi ba bgyid cing mchis so zhes de nyid na gnas so// de la kha cig gis ni yugs mo'i mchod rten no zhes bya bar shes so// kha cig gis ni bku pa'i
2b3: 'khor sa zhes bya bar shes te/ mchod rten la phyag rgyad pa'i dge slong dag da dung yang phyag byed do// bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na bsti gnas gzhan zhig na drang srong lnga brgya gnas te/ de dag gi bstig nas de ni me tog dang 'bras bu dang rwa
2b4: phun sum tshogs pas de dag des rgyags nas ci yang mi sems so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus la gzigs nas bsti gnas der gshegs te byon pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis bsti gnas de'i me tog dang 'bras bu ni brlag/ chu ni bskams
2b5: ne'u gsir rnams ni grogs/ 'dug gnas dag ni brtib po// de nas drang srong de dag lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud cing 'dug/ de rnams kyis
2b6: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi zhing rkang gnyis khyod 'dir gshegs nas bdag cag ni gnas skabs 'di 'dra bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong dag bsti gnas me tog dang 'bras bu dang phun sum tshogs pa ci ste
2b7: ma rung / ji sngon gyi ji lta ba de bzhin du bya 'am/ bcom ldan 'das mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul brtul ba dang sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to// de nas de dag mchog tu ya mtshan du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par
2b8: dad pa bskyed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas de dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas
3a1: sa mngan par bstangs nas/ den brtsam ldan 'das gan pa dgas su tha mo byung ba da / bcom ldan 'das pa 'di sa sa gso // brgya pa bdag cagasags par gsungs sa rgyas 'a nga / byung ba dang / bam
3a2: rdzogs pa da ga slong ga po 'bab bstan/ bcom ldan da kyi na sngang bdag cagatshas par spyod pa spyad par bcoM/ denasabacom ldan 'das kyis de slong dru gi sa yangs rgya gis ThA ma par byad rjod cigaces bcol/
3a3: mas pa/ 'thas pa yang pa / maHnapa / gan dang / b+h+yas bum thags pa dang / b+ha nag gan sa pa ma dang / de slo rnyed pa rdzog pa pa me la zu gnas /
3a4: shi/ gshegs papatshur shag ga dul pas// kyirnam thang pa ldanan // maud pa dang po ba gan pa g+h+nA ha~M/ sa ma dag sa sangs ga gas ga par rdzung// dgags pa dang sil pa na
3a5: brtsams pas 'khor ba 'khor la cha sa pa gso ba da migs pa 'di nyid gaste/ ba byed/ rnam pa thams cad ces bya ba nas/ mngon du b+ha ba grar tanas bya ba bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de dge' 'dams par byed pa'i nga grang ga yin pa gas pa/
3a6: com ldan 'das bdag gis cha bad 'das skye ba'i tshogs chen po bskas pa dag da pa smras par bgyis la snad kyis rab tu 'byung bar btsog// denas bcom ldan 'das dang pong lnga bcwa dang ldan gyi dge slong rnams kyis tha ba kham pa ka zung ban na /
3a7: nyid na rdzu 'phrul gyis steng gnam mkha' las gshegs/ rim gyis gartan ma byed te/ dab chegatan nga breng shing gos can nas bya bzhig ga sa te/ drang gra das btsam pan 'das snyas bu tshan pa'i mi can sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi kunam btsun pa/
3a8: zhes bya ba nas/ kun nas mdzes pa rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// mthong ma thag tu de bcom ldan 'das la sams mngon par dad par gyur te/ de dad pa skyes nas bsams pa/ ma la bdag rilas babs te/ bcom ldan/
3b1: 'das blta zhing 'gror ni bcom ldan 'das gdul ba la gzigs pas 'das par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag nyid mchod par bya'o snyam nas/ des ri las bdag nyid mchongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i
3b2: chos can yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis blangs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas
3b3: shing gos can gyis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba/
3b4: dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkapa ra gyur ces bya
3b5: ba'i bar kong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i dge slong dad pas rnam par grol ba rnams kyi mchog ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste dge slong shing gos can no// de nas
3b6: bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis yongasu bskor te/ chos 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad cing grong khyer slom lta bur gshegs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te sgo gcig nas zhugs na gzhan dang gzhan du
3b7: sems par 'gyur bas ma la rdza 'bral kho nas 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas rdzu 'bul gyis steng gi nam mkha' las grong khyer blo ma smra bu'i dbus su gshegs so// de nas slob ma lta bu'i bdag po rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan
3b8: bgang po dang / shing gan ca can dang / rgya sngags kyi rna ca can dang / zha nye'i rna ca can dang / rgyal po'i sras bcu bdun po de dag kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ngo // de
4a1: nas bcom ldan 'das srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas zham ring byas shing tsan dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzangs ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs
4a2: chen po res bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / / tsan dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzangs zhig la thug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te can dan gyi phreng ba'i khang bzangs zhig par gyur na sbyin bdag rnams kyi bsod nams kyi bar chad du 'gyur gyis/
4a3: mal ngas 'di shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul par bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ji ltar skye bo'i tshogs des sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong bar 'gyur bar shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul to// de nas 'khor de dag gi bsam pa dang / bag
4a4: lanyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po dag rtogs te/ kha cig gis ni thar pa'i cha dang 'thun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ kha
4a5: tshig gis ni ngas par 'byed pa'i cha dang 'thun pa/ kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas
4a6: nyan dongs pa thams cad spangs kyang gra bcom pa mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byeng chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni nga sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu/ kha cig gis ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'o/
4a7: 'a' ba char sangs rgyas la gzhos pa dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab ba ga da// da nas shing gnan can dang / rgya chags kyin na can dang // nye'i nan can kyis gcad shing bsad pa'i 'a ba na'abadag ste gan byas
4a8: nas gdan bshams te/ nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs chod lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol
4b1: de'i tshe bu'i rgyal po nag po dang / go ta ma zhes bya ba rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de gnyis kyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sbom lta bun chos 'chad kyis dong la mnyan par bya'o snyam mo// de nas de gnyis klu lnga brgya'i 'khor dang grong
4b2: khyer sbo ma lta bur chu bo lnga brgya pa pa nas chas so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos can yin pas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / gau ta ma 'di gnyis gal te grong khyer sngo
4b3: ma ma bur 'ongs par zlar na/ yal bung bar byed par 'gyur rosnyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal ba/ maud gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rings pa'i bsod snyoms longs shig/ maung
4b4: gal gyi bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rings pa'i bsod snyoms ni lnga ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ glo bur pa dang / 'gro bar chas pa dang / nang pa dang / nang g.yog dang / dge skos so// skabs 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das dge skos su dgongs te/ bcom
4b5: ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis de nyid nas steng gnam mkha' las gshegs so/ / bcom ldan 'das dang maud gal gyi bu gnyis klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / gau ta ma gal ba der gshegs te byon nas bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang ba grong khyer sbom
4b6: lta bu la soms la yul phung bar ma byed shig/ de gnyis kyis gsol pa/ btsun pa bdag cag gang srog chags grog sbur la yang gnod pa mi bgyid pa de lta bu'i dang bas mchis na/ sbo ma lta bu na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs pa lta smos kyang ci
4b7: 'tshal/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / gau ta ma la de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de zos nas sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song zhing bslab pa'i gzhi rnams gzung ngo // bcom ldan 'das
4b8: kyis zhal zas gsol ba'i mdzad pa brtsams pa dang / klu re re nas bsams pa/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das la bdag gi chu'i btung ba gsol lo snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te gcig gi chu gsol na ni des na gzhan
5a1: dag gzhan du sems par 'gyur bas thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsam pa/ maud gal gyi bu bong la gdan chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de las chu ldang
5a2: bzed khong la byer te shog shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo gal gyi bu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas gung du chu bo lnga brgya 'dres pa de nas chus lhung bzed bkang nas khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
5a3: song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed bkang ba'i chu phul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes te gsol lo// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi las bka' stsal yang ga
5a4: slong dag pa dang mas ni bu gsos bsrings bskyed nu mas bsnun/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin pas shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/ bus phrag pa gcig la ni ma bzhag/ gcig shos la ni pha bzhag nas lo brgya tshad par khur
5a5: du thogs sam/ sa chen po 'di'i nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / spug dang / pad ma ra ga dang / dud g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/ de lta bu'i dbang phyug la bdag por
5a6: bcug kyang / bus pha ma la de tsam gyis phan thogs pa'am lan lon par mi 'gyur gyi/ gang gis pa ma dad pa med pa dad pa phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud de so sor 'gong na byed pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal
5a7: pa tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa dang / ser gA can gtong ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / shes rab 'chal ba/ shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug la 'dul zhing 'dzud de so sor 'god par byed na/ de tsam gyis/
5a8: bus pa dang mal phan thogs pa dang lan lon pa yin no zhes gsungs na bdag gis ni ma la lan cig yang ma lon gyis/ ma la bdag gis bdag gi ma gang du skyes pa bsam mo snyam nas bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams/
5b1: 'od zer can du skyes par mthong ngo // des de su'i gdul bya yin pa brtags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yin par mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag lam ring po nas 'dir 'ongs pas ci nas kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la don
5b2: 'di gsol lo snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong dag pa dang ma ni bul shin tu dga' ba byed pa yin no zhes gsungs na/ bdag gi ma 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer
5b3: can du skyes te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul bar 'gyur lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar b.rung ste gdul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi busu rdzu 'phrul gyis dong /
5b4: bcom ldan 'das bdag gi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po ri rab kyi rtse mo la gos par por shing gshegs pa dang / zhag bdun gyis 'jig rten gyi 'ams 'od zer can du byin te// bu ma bzang mo des
5b5: tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu rgyang ring gig nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang bcas pas de'i drung du song ste zhus pa/ kye malo phran ring zhig lon nas bu mthong ngo // kye ma'o yun ring mo nig len nas bu mthong ngo // de nas skye bo'i
5b6: tshogs chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag rab tu zung ba 'di ni rgan na ji ltar bu mo 'di de'i ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i lus 'dis bskyed de/ des na kho'i ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan
5b7: 'das kyi yu ma bzang mo de'i bsam pa dang / bgal nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas bu mo bzang mdos 'jigs tshogs la lta
5b8: ba' ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rkun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi rnams rab tu gzhag ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// yang /
6a1: smras pa/ nyes pa mang por ldan pas mi bzang ba'i// ngan song lam ni khyod kyis mthus bcad de// mtho ris 'gro ba bsod nams bzang ldan phye// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam yang bdag gis thob// khyed la brten nas shin tu rnam dag mig/
6a2: nyes dang bral bas dag pa der 'dir thob// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi thob nas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol bdag gis nal// 'gro bar lha min lha dang mis mchod pa// skyen 'chi dang nang dang rnam bral ba// sring pa stong du mthong ba rnyed
6a3: dka' ba/ / thub pa khyod mthong der 'dir 'bras bur bcas// btsun pa bdag ni 'phags shing mngon par 'phags te/ bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge 'dun la skabs su mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji sring
6a4: 'tsho'i bar du bsam pa thag pas skyabs su mchi bar mngon par sgrolags so/ / bcom ldan 'das maud gal gyi bu chen po dang thabs gcig tu dang bsod snyoms sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo bzang mo de la cang
6a5: mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas bu mo bzang mos bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar rig ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po gdan la bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag
6a6: nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ nam grangs du mar gtsang ning bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag gnyis bcabs te/ lhung bzed gru bar rig nas snyan
6a7: dma' ba zhag blangs te/ bcob ldan 'das kyi spyan sdang bting nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad do// bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos blangs te lhung bzad 'khru bar byed pa/
6a8: na bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs so// su'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi'o// gal te de ltar na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal sems shig/ bcom ldan 'das skol byen 'dra/
6b1: sam/ mod gal gyi bu yub byin zin no// de nas ngo mtshar du dad pa'i yid kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul 'di'i ming ci lags/ maudagal gyi bu yid mgyogs yin no// btsun pa sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo de lta bu ni bdag gis glob ma
6b2: chud do/ / gal te bdag gis glo bar gyur na/ bdag gis lus til gyi phye ma ltar bgyis kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las mi ldog par 'gyur ba zhig na/ da ni shing tshig pa bzhin ci bgyir yang ma mchis so// dge
6b3: slong rnams the tshom skyes te/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa che dang ldan ga yos las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes lags/ las kyi
6b4: zhig bgyis na des bran mo'i mngal du skyes shing rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gang po nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/
6b5: rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas gang pos las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing
6b6: bsags bdag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams/
6b7: dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chung mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ rnyed nas lus can rnams la ni// 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye
6b8: dgu'i tshe lo nya khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
7a1: rnams kyi stod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de grong khyer bA rA Na sIr nye bar rten cing bzhugs so// de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sde snod gsum par gyur te/ chos bzhin gyis dge 'dun gyi zhal
7a2: ta ba byed do/ / re shig cig na dgra bcom pa zhig la dge bskos bab ste/ des gtsug lag khang phyag dar bya bar brtsams pa dang / rlung langs pas phyag dar phan tshun du khyer bar gyur to// des bsams pa re shig rlung zhi bar gyur gyi bar gzhag go snyam
7a3: pa las/ ji tsam na gtsug lag khang de ma phyags pa zhal ta ba des mthong nas de kun nas dkris pa drag pos rtsub po'i ngag phyung ba/ bran mo'i bu gang zhig dge skos byed/ dgra bcom pa des thos nas/ des bsams pa/ 'di kun nas dkris pa
7a4: yin pas re shig bzhag la phyis go bar bya'o snyam nas/ gang gi tshe de kun nas dkris pa dang bral ba de'i tshe/ de'i drung du song ste smras pa/ khyod kyi kho bo su yin shes sam/ des smras pa/ shes te khyod dang kho bo yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
7a5: sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin no/ / des smras pa/ gal te de lta yin mod kyi kho bos ni rab tu byung ba'i bya ba byas te/ kho bo ni 'ching ba mtha' dag las grol ba yin la/ khyod ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa
7a6: yin pas khyod kyis ngag rtsub bo las phyung gis/ nyes pa la nyes par shog shig dang / des na las de bsrabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par 'gyur ro// des nyes pa la nyes par bshags pas sems can dmyal
7a7: bar skye zhing bran mo'i bur 'gyur ba las/ de sems can dmyal bar ma skyes pas/ tshe rabs lnga brgyar bran mo'i mngal du skyes te da ltar gyi bar du srid pa tha ma la yang bran mo'i mngal du skyes par gyur to// gang yang dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur
7a8: byas pa des na phyug po dang nor mang ba dang / longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes so// gang yang de na thags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkha
7b1: bar byas pa des na nga'i bstan pa la rabagazung sa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dag bcom pa mngon sum du byas so// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin/ gcig tung/
7b2: ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/ 'dren pa rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tuganag pa rnams dang 'dren ma ni spangs la las gcig tu dkar bal brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par
7b3: bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis ded / ces bka' sus nas dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi gsungs pa la mngon par bdod do// / gleng gni ni rgyal po'i khabanade// de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na klu'i rgyal po thog
7b4: mkhar dang ri bo gnas so/ / de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang rtag tu 'bab la/ chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang skam par mi 'gyur/ lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lo tog rnams kyang lhag par legs par
7b5: 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis btul ba na de gnyis ri rab kyi bar rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed du 'ong ngo // de nas klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo 'di snyam du sems/
7b6: te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo 'di gnyis ri rab kyi bang rim nas nyi ma re re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing 'ong na/ bdag cag 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen gung ma byed pa ni bzang po ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag cag
7b7: gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das
7b8: kyis de gnyis la de 'dra ba'i chos bshad pa badzad de/ de thos nas de gnyis sangs rgyas la skyabs su dongar zhing / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su dong nas bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs so// gang gi cha bcom ldan 'das las skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
8a1: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs pa de'i tshe/ lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur to// de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
8a2: nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis tshe bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis shing / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos pa de'i tshe lus dang longs spyod lhag par 'phel bar gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bcom ldan//
8a3: 'das kyis rjes su gnang na bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i dbang po dag khyed rgyal po'i yul na gnas pa yin gyis rgyal po la rtogs shig/ de gnyis kyis bsams pa dang / don bdag/
8a4: cag bcom ldan 'das kyis rjes su ma gnang ngo zhes smras nas de nyid na gnas so// klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bo'i kun tu spyod pa ni/ gal te nub mo bcom ldan 'das ltar 'gro na ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis so// 'on te nyin par na ni khyim
8a5: bdag gi cha byad kyis so/ / de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas shing nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed do// rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal rigs kyi mngon pa'i nga rgyal can gyi kun du spyod pa ni de gang gi tshe bcom ldan pad/
8a6: lta bar 'gro ba de'i tshe 'ga' zhig bdag mthong na ldang bar mi byed pa med grang zhes mi gnang chen gtong bar byed do// des mi gnang chen zhig mngags te/ kye nang rje song la bcom ldan 'das la su dag bsnyen bkur byed ltos shig/ de song ba
8a7: las ji tsam na khyim bdag gnyis zhig mthong nas des bsams pa/ 'di gnyis ni lha'i yul na gnas pas/ ci'i phyir ldang bar mi byed snyam nas des rgyal po la smras pa/ lha khyim bdag gnyis shig mchis pa ni lha'i yul nyid na gnas pa
8a8: lags so/ / rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bsams pa/ de gnyis kyis bdag mthong na co'i phyir ldang bar mi byed kyis 'gro'o snyam nas de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang / klu'i rgyal po grog mkhar dang ri bos rgyal po gzugs can
8b1: snying po mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gzugs can snying po mchin ni re shig rgyal po la sti star bgyi 'am/ 'on te chos la bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
8b2: klu'i dbang po dag chos la sti stang byos shig/ dam pa'i chos la ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang bla mar byed do// chos la ni dgra bcom pa rnams kyang bla mar byed do// tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// 'das pa'i/
8b3: sangs rgyas gang yin dang // ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin dang // da ltar sangs rgyas gang yin pa// mang po'i mya ngan 'joms mdzad pa// bzhud dang gzhugs dngabyon 'gyur ba// thams cad dam chos bla mar byed/ 'di ni sangs rgyas
8b4: chos nyid yin/ / de bas 'dir bdag phan 'dod pa// bdag nyid chen por 'dod pa yis// sangs rgyas bstan pa dran byas te// dam pa'i chos la bkur sti bya// de gnyis kyis ldang ba ma byas so// de nas rgyal po mi bzod pa skyes te/ des
8b5: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa// zhe sdang dang ni 'khrugs pa dang // ma dad pa yi sems kyis ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi// dam chos//
8b6: shes par mi nus so// gang gis khro dang bag med pa'i// sems ni dul bar byas pa dang // 'di la mnar sems spangs pa des// legs par gsungs pa shes par nus// rgyal pos bsams pa/ khyim bdag 'di gnyis 'ongs
8b7: pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi chos nyan pa'i bar yang chad par gyur to snyam nas/ de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo // de song nas blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ khyim bdag 'di
8b8: gnyis ga shems maldan 'das kyi kun ldanas da da / da nyis gras nas 'du gsas na shig/ da gnyisas ma ldan 'das thagapa gnyis la mnapas kyag tshal nas yang dang / tsun po gagis bsgo/
9a1: lha'i zhal nas khyed cag gnyis nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces gsung ngo // de gnyis kyis smras pa/ bka' bzhin 'tshal mchi'o// bsams pa/ bdag cag gnyis kyis yun ring po zhig nas bsams pa gang yin pa de ni
9a2: tshegs chung ngus grub bo snyam mo/ / de nas 'ong ba'i chu chen po byung nas grog po chung ngu'i nung du zhugs so// grog po chung ngu nas grog pa chen por ro// grog po chen po nas chu bran du'o// chu bran nas chu chen por ro// chu chen po nas rgya mtsho
9a3: chen por te/ gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa de'i tshe de gnyis phyir zhing lus dang longs spyod 'phel bar gyur to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po'i khab kyi dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang
9a4: chung ba dang / yongs su zad pa dang / btugs par gyur la thug/ lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ge nyam ra ba dgon pa'i slongs mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur to// rgyal pos bsams
9a5: pa/ rgyal po'i khab 'di na klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / grog mkhar gnas te/ de gnyis kyi mthus dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya yang 'bab/ chu mig dang / mtsho dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang chu che lhas kyang dus dus char gyi rgyan legs par phab pa nyid kyi lo tog legs par
9a6: gyur na/ da ni dka' thub kyi chu lnga brgya dang / chu mig dang / mtshe dang / mtshe'u rnams kyang chung ba dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur la thug/ lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par ma phab pas lo nyes par gyur te/ mu ge nyam
9a7: rab dgon pa'i slongs mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung bar gyur na/ klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / grog mkhar shi 'am/ bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gis khyer ba'am/ sbrul khas sdigs kyis bzung ba 'am/ des 'jigs nas bros par ma gyur grang
9a8: delha mod kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin gyis/ mal bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab
9b1: gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de gnyis ni shi ba yang ma yin/ bya'i rgyal po nam
9b2: mkha' lding gis kyang mkhyer/ sbrul khas sngags kyis kyang ma bzung / des 'jigs pas byung ma bros mod kyi/ rgyal po khyod nyid kyis yul nas bslang ngo do// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de gnyis mthong bar yang mi dran na de gnyis yul
9b3: nas bskrad pa lta spos kyang ci 'tshal/ rgyal po chen po ngas khyod dran par bya'o// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis khyim bdag gnyis shig yul nas skrad pa dran nam/ bcom ldan 'das dran lags so// de gnyis ni klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / grog mkhar
9b4: yin no/ / btsun pa de gnyis gang du mchi/ rgya mtsho chen por dong ngo // bdag gi yul ma rung bar gyur lags so// rgyal po chen po de gnyis la bzod pa byin cig dang ma rung bar mi 'gyur ro// de gnyis rgya mtsho chen po na mchis na ji ltar
9b5: bzod pa stsal/ de gnyis tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas/ nga'i zhabasal phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa dang ngas rtags bstan gyis khyod kyis bzod pa byin cig/ bcom ldan 'das ci bdag gis rkang pa gnyis
9b6: la gtug par bgyi 'am/ rkang pa gnyis la gtug par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang lag pa rkyong la klu'i dbang po bzod par gsol lo zhes smros shig dang bzod par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos de gnyis 'ong ba la 'bad de sdod cing 'dug pa dang / ji
9b7: tsam na de gnyis khyim bdag gi cha byad du byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa dang de ma thag tu rgyal po yang 'ongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtags bstan pa dang rgyal pos lag pa mngon du brkyang na pa smras pa/ kwa'i dbang
9b8: po gnyis bzod par gsol lo/ / rgyal po chen po bzod par bgyi'o// gal te bzod par gyur na ni 'dir spyon cig/ rgyal po chen po gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das las bdag cag gis skyab su 'gro ba dang // bslab pa'i bzhi rnams blangs
10a1: da ga salus dang pong sa tud rgyas te/ ga na da 'dusan bral pag d+hang yang po shing par 'byung // yul mgadum rung bar 'gyur med/ madrang bar ma 'gyung // deltar ma 'gyung
10a2: khyod kyis kho bo cag gi khang bzangs gnyis rtsigs la zla ba drug cing dus mchod kyis shig dang / kho bo cag gi 'khor bzhag la dus mchod kyi tshe yang 'du bar bya'o// rgyal pos de bzhin du byas pa dang / de gnyis kyis 'khor dag kyang bzhag
10a3: la ngas mchod kyang rang nyid nyams du myong bar byed do/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na de dag gi 'khor bag med par gnas pa na klu gdug pa dag gis glags rnyed nas/ de dag gis ser ba dbab par brtsams so// rgyal po'i khab na bram ze ser
10a4: ba'i sngags la mkhas pa gzhan zhig/ yod de// des deb bcing bab pa dag bcad pa dang / de la yul ma ga d+hA na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs kyis dbang thar byin no// lho phyogs na bram ze mes byin zhes bya ba ser ba'i sngags la mkhas pa zhig yod
10a5: pa des byang phyogs na yul nus pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na rgyal po sde mchog ces bya ba rgyal srid du 'jug go// de'i yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yod de/ de na sman mthu che ba pha rol gnon pa yod par thos nas de'i ched
10a6: du 'gro'o zhes de chas te rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas bram ze ser ba'i sngags 'chad pa de'i gnas su zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na ser ba chen po bab pa bram ze gnyug mar gnas pa des bcad par ma nus nas de phyir byung nang du zhugs byed pa dang
10a7: bram ze mes byin gyis dris pa/ mkhan po ci'i slad du mkhan po 'dir phyir byung nang du zhugs par mdzad/ des smras pa/ bu ser ba chen po bab pa bcad par ma nus par bas mod/ bdag gis dbum mo// bu legs so// des chu nyung zhig
10a8: la bzlas te gtor bas tshal ba brgyad gyes so/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rngan pa thogs te bram ze de'i khyim du song nas smras pa/ mkhan po rgyal po'i khab kyi skye bo'i tshogs mngon
10b1: par dga' bar gyur gyis rngan pa long shig/ ci'i phyir/ khyod kyis ser ba chen po khums pa'i slad du'o// des smras pa/ kho bos ni ma bcad de/ 'on kyang bram ze 'dis bcad do// de dag bram ze de'i drung du dong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du
10b2: 'dug shig dang dbang thad sbyin no/ / de bzhin du gnas par bya'o zhes de gnas so// des ser ba de dus thag tsam zhig ni bar du sngags kyis bgags te mi 'bab par gyur to// rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag
10b3: bdag cag nyid kyi bsod nams kyis ser ba mi 'bab na ci'i phyir de la dbang thang sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad de bram ze des bsngags btul nas yul nus pa can du song ba dang phyir yang ser babab par gyur to/ / de rnams bram ze de'i drung du song ste smras
10b4: pa/ mkhan po bram ze'i khye'u de gar mchis/ des smras pa/ khyed cag gis de la bkur sti ma byas pas de song ngo // mkhan po gal te mchis na bdag cag la sbron cig/ de bzhin du bya'o// de yang rim gyis rgyal po sde mchog ga la ba der song
10b5: ste phyin nas/ rgyal po sde mchog la rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas smras pa/ lha khyod kyi yul na klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes zhes bgyi ba mchis pa de'i gnas na mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bgyi ba'i sman mchis kyis lnga de ston cig/ lha'i skal
10b6: ba yang dbul bar bgyi'o/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ kye bram ze klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes ni gtum pa yin pas des khyod brlag par mi byed grang / lha re shig bdag la sngags kyi mthu dang sman gyi mthu mchis te/ gal te klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes
10b7: dang 'dra ba'i klu rnams kyis 'jam bu'i gling 'di lta ste/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ 'dam bu'i tshal bzhin gang bar gyur kyang bdag gis pa spugacig kyang bskyed par rngo ma thig na kwa'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyis lta smos kyang ci tshal/ 'on kyang /
10b8: lha'i mi dgu ma pa la thug pa 'ga' mchis sam bram ze yod do// lted skye shig dang / des de'i gnas ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal pos mi de la pos te bsgo ba/ kye nang rje bram ze 'di la klu'i rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas ston cig/ lha
11a1: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po'i ltar mnyan nas bram ze de khrid de mas so/ / de tsam na mi ring bzhig tu bsdad nas de la smras pa/ bram ze tshal sngo zhing sngo ba dag bsgrengs pa pa be mthong ngam/ mthong ngo // de ni klu'i
11a2: rgyal po rab mdzes kyi gnas yin no/ / de song ste des der mod la mthu skyed pa zhes bya ba'i sman las khur du grags nas/ des de thogs te yul nus pa can du song nas rgyal po sde mchog gi skal ba byin te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu
11a3: byin nas bram zi nyid kyi khyim du zhugs so/ / de nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la sbran pa dang / de dag mchod yon thogs te lhags nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di nyid du 'dug shig dbang thar sbyin no// des smras pa/ khyed
11a4: cag gis bkur sti ma byas pas kho bo ma 'dug go/ de rnams kyis de bzhag par gal gyi sa gcu par brtsams te gsol ba btab pa dang kha sa blangs nas de dag gis 'tshe ba'i ris bcad do// 'jig rten ni phun sum tshogs pa 'ded/
11a5: kyi rgud pa dang mi mthun pas/ des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa na
11a6: khye'u zhig btsas te/ des de'i ming ri bo can zhes bya bar btags so// de yang brtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed na bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i ming zhes ba zhes bya bar btags so// bram ze mo na 'khor bral
11a7: zhes bya'o/ / mna' ma ni glog ces bya'o// des bsams pa/ yang dang yang du ser ba gcod cing ci las med/ yun ring rab tu sngags kyis dgag par bya'o zhes des yun ring po sngags kyis dgag pa byas te gzhog pas ser ba mi
11a8: 'bab par gyur to/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag kho na'i bsod nams kyis mthus ser ba mi 'bab na/ ci'i phyir dbang thad sbyin zhes de rnams kyis bcad de// bram ze de phrag dog gi zil
11b1: gyis non pas bu yang sngags kyi tshig rnams 'dzin dum bcug go/ / bde ba la chags pas kha ton yang ma byas la sman yang skam du ma bcug go// des sngags kyi tshig nams ni bsams na brjed/ sman ni ma skams pas rul bar gyur te/ de
11b2: rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la snying na ches nas/ de rnams la klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mu stegs kyi gnas dang dka' thub kyi tshal de dang de dag tu song nas dris pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis gang bsams pa dang / gang don du
11b3: gnyer ba de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lta ci yod/ ni kha cig gis smras pa/ mer zhugs sheg/ kha cig gis smras pa/ dug zo shig/ kha cig gis smras pa/ g.yangs nas bdag nyid mchongs shig/ kha cigag mi
11b4: smras pa/ bdag rang gi ske la thag pa thogs te shing gi yal ga las 'phyang du chug shig ces thams cad kyis 'chi ba'i thabs bstan gyi/ nges par 'byung ba'i thabs ni ma yin pas de rim gyis 'od ma'i tshal du song ngo // des dge slong zhig
11b5: mthong nas dris pa/ 'phags pa gang gis gang bsams pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba'i thabs lha 'ga' mchis sam/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung shig/ der ci zhig bgyi/ der ji srid
11b6: 'tsho'i bar tshangs par spyod pa yang spyad par bya/ bsam gtan dang / gdon pa dang ldan par yang gnas par bya ste/ gal te re shig mthong ba'i chos nyid la kun shes pa thob na/ de nas de nyid khyod kyi sdug bsngal gyi mthar phyin pa yin no//
11b7: 'on te sbyor ba'i lhag ma dang bcas bzhin dus byed na gang bsams pa dang / gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa de na rngom thog na/ gzhan yang nung zad ci mchis/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi
11b8: dge 'dun spyan drongs la gdugs tshod gsol cig/ de yang rngo ma thog na gzhan bstan du gsol/ bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drongs la/ gdugs tshod gsol te smon la ma tho ba shig dang gang bsams pa dang / gang don/
12a1: du gnyer ba de thams cad 'grub po// 'phags pa de ni rngo thogs gis bgyi'o zhes des bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi spyan drangs te/ gdugs tshod gsol nas smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab
12a2: mdzes klu'i gnas nas bsad la bdag der skya zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces ston pam pa 'o/ / de la chung mas dris pa/ rnga'i sras smon lam ji zhig btab/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rab mdzes klu'i gnas
12a3: nas bsad la bdag der skye zhing de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod pa byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab po/ / legs te bdag kyang khyod kyi chung mar gyur cig/ bus smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bur gyur cig/ de bzhin du bu mos
12a4: smras pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bur mor gyur cig/ de bzhin du mna' mas smras pa/ bdag kyang mna' mar gyur cig ces byas nas de rnams khyim snyid pa zhig tu zhugs te nyal ba dang sprin kha dog lnga pa las char pa bab ste/ rtsig pa 'gyel bas non te
12a5: kha dag go/ / klu rab mdzes shi'i phos nas 'khor klu drug khri dang der skyes nas de yang rab mdzes zhes bya bar grags so// chung ma ni 'khor bral zhes bya'o// bu ni ri bo can zhes bya'o bu mo ni ser ba zhes bya'o// mna' ma ni klog ces bya'o chos nyid kyis klu 'am klu'i bu mo
12a6: skyes nas ring po ma lon par gsum dran par 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o// des bltas na mi las shi 'phos so// gang du skyes she na/ klu rnams su'o// las gang gis she na/ smon lam dbang gis
12a7: so/ / ci'i phyir snyam na/ rgyal po'i khab kyi mi rnams la gnod par bya ba'i phyir ro// des bsams pa/ ci lo tog ji lta ba bzhin du skyes pa la byas na mi rnams kyi sdug bsngal skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te ma skyes pa rnams la 'gyur snyam na/ des ji ltar
12a8: skyes pa la byas pa ltar ma skyes pa la ni de lta ma yin par mthong nas/ des 'khor rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag tshur shog/ yul ma ga d+har reng la char pas lo tog thams cad bskrun pa dang / de nas drug stong gi 'khor dang / gshol mda' tsam gyi
12b1: char gyi rgyun gyis de ltar yul ma ga d+har sog ma yang khyer ba de lta bu'i char gyi rgyun dbab par brtsams so/ / de nas de dag phan tshun du smras pa/ sog ma yang klu 'dis grogs so zhes de'i ming sog ma med ces bya bar thogs so// /
12b2: sdom la/ rgyal po'i khab dang ni land/ 'od ma'i dbyug pa dmar bu'i grong // chu bo gang gA sprin brtsegs dang // sgra can yangs pa tha ma yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan d+ha ka gnas pa na bzhugs so//
12b3: gang gi tshe gzhon nu ma skyes dgra lha sbyin gyis spad nas pa chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa bsad de rang nyid kyi cod pan bcings nas rgyal por zhugs pa de'i tshe de bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa mang po bya bar brtsams te/ dgrongs pa man
12b4: chad bya ba'i phyir glang po che nor skyong dang khyi gtum po za ba dag spad pa dang / de'i ma lus 'phags mas smras pa/ bu bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti ma yin pa ma byed cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bkur sti ma yin pas bsnyengs pa
12b5: ma yin gyis/ rgyal po'i khab nas bzhud de gnod par gyur ta re/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus yul ang ga dang / ma ga d+hA rnams 'byor cing nyams dga' ba yin no// snying rnyog pa can des smras pa/ cig ngan bcom ldan 'das med pa'i
12b6: yul de dag zhig pa dang stongs par gyur tam/ de mas thams cad kyi thams cad du bzlog kyang ma btub nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gzhon nu ma skyes dgra 'di bsod nams ma yin pa mang du sogs kyis ngas 'di gzhi med pa'i dang
12b7: pa la bzhag tu re shig de'i dus la ma bab pas mnyan yod du gshegs so/ / snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu mnyan yod ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa nam nyan
12b8: yod du byin nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mtha'i rgyal phran dag gas bcom ldan 'das la ma skyes dgras bkur stim yin pa byas pas de bkur sti ma yin pas brnyengs
13a1: xxx/ xxx
13a2: xxx/ xxx
13a3: xxx/ xxx
13a4: xxx/ xxx
13a5: xxx/ xxx
13a6: xxx/ xxx
13a7: xxx/ xxx
13a8: xxx/ xxx
13b1: gnod par gyur ta zhes ma smras sam/ nga ni 'di yin no// yum del ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bu bcom ldan 'das la bzod par gsol cig/ yum bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa'i rnga ma thogs lags so// bu khyod kyis sangs rgyas
13b2: bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tsan dan dang ste 'ur mnyam pa/ khong khro ba dang rjes su chags pa spangs pa yin no zhes mthos sam/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag dpung pa gcig la ste'u yis bzhog par byed la/ gcig shos la can
13b3: danas mchog gis nyug par byed na/ dal bcom ldan 'das rjes su chags pa yang mi mnga'/ khong khro ba yang mi mda'o// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgras mi zhig la smras pa/ kye nang rje tshur shog/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang
13b4: na ba der song la/ song nas kho bo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang dam/ 'tsho 'am/ gnod pa mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par bzhugs sam
13b5: zhes snyan gsol la 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ btsun pa lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mching nas btsun pa bung na pa ni mchis kyi pang na pa ni ma mchis pas bcom ldan nas thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste rgyal po'i bab tu gshegs par gsol/
13b6: gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer stongs te ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas chas te rim gyis mnyan
13b7: yod du byin nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa lus/
13b8: 'phags ma'i bre yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyamar btud dam zhes bya ba nas reg par btsugs sam zhes spun gsol lags so zhes bya ba'i ba gong ma bzhin
14a1: dang sas 'gas pa thas zag ba kyis dgra' ba tung / na pams lags sums ga la bas byas gra sa na ba ma pa nagamasangs sa
14a2: bcom ldan 'das thugs rtse ba nye bar bzung ste rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs na zhes bya ba nas ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i ba gor ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung bas mi de la
14a3: gnang ngo / / de nas mi des bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das ji srid bzhes kyi bdu mnyan yod du zhusas nas nyan tho kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu rgyal ba'i khab gang na pa
14a4: der rgyu zhing gshegs te rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegasas na yul ma ga d+hA byon to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis ni dug gis ma rung bar byas pa'i chu de dag bskams so// char pa 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis
14a5: ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkang ngo / / lha rnams ni cha ba 'bebs pa la zhugs so// sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis ni rgyal po'i khab nas mi ma yin pa rnams bskrad nas mi ngas zhi bar gyur to// mtha' rgyal phran
14a6: bdag gis ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong nas grong khyer bskor ba btang ste dong ngo / / tshongar ba rnams kyis ni zong dag bkram mo// bzo phal ba gzhan dag gos ni rang rang byed par brtsams so// yul so son gnas pa'i tshor ba rnams
14a7: dang / ded dpon rnams ni zong dang 'jug par brtsams so// lo ni legs par gyur to// lam po che dang / srang dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo rnams su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid chen po sgrogs par gyur to// mu stegs pa rnams ni bag
14a8: 'khyams par gyur to/ / skye ba'i tshigs rnams ni rab tu dga' bar gyur to// lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang snying dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / ras
14b1: tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba rgya chen po dang / yid bde ba skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag deng la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir dpag tshad phyed dang gsum gyi lam bstar ba dang / grong khyer dag bzang por byos shig/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
14b2: thams cad kyang rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo sol te tsan dan gyi chus chag chag thob la dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po sbyongs shig/ dri zhim po'i phog phor dag shoms la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dag tshugs shig/ bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med
14b3: khang mdzes pa dag byos shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i ltar mnyan nas thams cad rgyas par byed tu bcug go// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga
14b4: d+h+rU'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra rgyal ba chen po'i 'byor ba dang / rgyal po chen po'i mthus bdag nyid dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang bsar song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khongs bzhi po ni 'gro grol ba/ dbugs byin pa 'khor dbugs
14b5: byon pa/ / rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul pa/ dgra bcom par khod dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khar 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mangs pa/ khyu mchog pagrang gi tshogs kyis bsor bsta pa/ brang po tha
14b6: phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ ngang pa'i rgyal po dang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor blta ba/ nam mkha' lding 'dab chags tshogs kyis bkod bltag sa te slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta ba/ sran
14b7: pa mkhas pacang pa'i tshogs kyi bslor ban pa/ dpa' bo dmag mi'i tshogs kyis bkar ba lta bu/ lam mkhan 'gron po'i tshogs kyis bkod ba lta ba/ ded dben tshong pa'i tshogs byas bskong ba sta bu/ tshong dponang gi skye bos pa skong ba sa bu/ tA
14b8: phran blon pa'i chags kyis pamang bka Ta/ 'khang las sbyang ba cu stong gis bkong ba sa bu/ zlabargyas kyis bskor bas bu/ nyi mdzod zer stong gis bsong bkadra/ yul la bang kyang de ba chags kyis bsong bas ba/ lus lagasapa
15a1: bral chu mtshogs byas bkor ba lta ba/ tshig mi bzad klu chags kyis bskor ba lta bu/ nor byen gnod sbyin gyis tshogs kyis bskor ba lta ba/ thag pazangs ris snyam yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor bas bu/ brgya byin sum brgya
15a2: gsum pa'i tshogs kyi gakor ba sta Ta/ tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis bskor blta bu/ rgya mtshamigs bste bu/ snron/ chu dang bcas blta buM/ klung po che dam pa rgyags pa dang bral ba skyed dbang po rnams shi du la bas ma gsangs pa'i rgya
15a3: lam gyi spyod pa can/ su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byed bzang po brgyad pa cus mdzes par byas pa/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong gi 'ad thar bas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun
15a4: mdzes pa/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun rab tu mang po dang lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dang / lha brgya stong
15a5: phrag du mas nas ri byas te rgyal ba'i ba kyi grong byed du gshegs so/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la zhabs g.yas pas mnan pa de'i chos rnam pa drug tu g.yos /
15a6: par gyur te/ sa chen po 'di g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg cing / shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'/ nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/ lho phyogs mthon byang phyogs dmal byang
15a7: phyogs mthon lho phyogs dma'/ mtha' mthon dbus dma'/ dbus mthon mtha' dma' bar gyur to// 'jig rten 'di 'jig rten gyi bar dang bcas pa thams cad kyang snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur to// lhas kyang bar snang la rnga dag brdungs so//
15a8: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi steng nas lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dod/ ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / a ga ru'i phye ma dang / rgya spos kyi phye ma dang / gur kum gyi phye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /
15b1: lha'i me tog man d+hA ra ba dang / gos dga'athor bar byed de/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na de lta bu'i ya mtshan dag byung bar gyur to// gzhan yang dog pa dag ni yangs par gyur to// dma' ba dag ni mtho bar gyur to// mtho ba dag ni/
15b2: phya le bar gyur to// glang po che dag ni skad 'byin par gyur to// rta dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to// khyu mchog dag kyang skad 'byin par gyur to// khyim gyi nang na bzhag pa'i snod sna tshogs dag ni ma brdungs par rang sgra 'byin par gyur to// lod pa
15b3: rnams kyis ni ma ga thob par gyur to/ / 'on pa rnams ni na bas thos/ lug pa rnams ni smra nus par gyur to// dbang po lhag ma ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po so sor thob par gyur to// chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to// rug/
15b4: 'thungs pa dag ni dug zhi bar gyur to// phan tshun khon byung ba rnams ni mdza' bar gyur to// sdum pa dag ni bde bar bcas par gyur to// btson du bcings pa dag ni thar bar gyur to// nor med pa
15b5: dag ni nor rnyed par gyur to/ / de lta bu'i 'byor pa de mthong nas dge snyen zhig gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yul gang zhig tu 'jig rten gtso bo gshegs pa der// lo nyes mi ngas dang ni phyi dgra'i 'jigs pa med// lha rnams char 'beza
15b6: skye bo bsod nams rab tu byed/ / dar ni ya mtshan brgya phrag gzhan yang 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu zhugs te/ skye bo'i tshogs dbugs phyung nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/ 'od ma'i tshal du gshegs so//
15b7: de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /
15b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po me skyes dgra la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzengs bstod par mdzad ces bya ba nas
16a1: yang dag par rab du dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas lus 'phags mi yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba la mngon par bstod de rjes su ye rang nas stan
16a2: las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag gis dgung zlab
16a3: gsum dun bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzibs cha dang / spyan dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes
16a4: dgral cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te
16a5: song ngo / / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig ku lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras zla ba gsum du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad
16a6: rnams kyis brnyan bkur byas so/ / de nas sangs rgyas la mngon par dga' ba'i lha rnams kyis mi ngas de smad nas rgyal po'i khab nas byung nas sgra sgrogs shes bya ba'i nang du byung ste/ yangs pa can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung bar gyur te/
16a7: khyogs dang khyogs 'dud par gyur to// yangs pa can na bram ze mdun na 'don mda' be tshe zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de'i rmi lam na yangs pa can na gnas pa'i lha zhig gis smras pa/ gal te mi 'dul kha los bsgyur ba'i mchog/ shAkya'i rigs dag pa
16a8: yi bcom ldan 'das/ yangs pa can du gshegs par gyur na ni// gnod pa rnams ni rnam par 'dege par 'gyur/ de nam nangs nas yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gis rmi lam 'di 'dra bzhig mtheng ngo // de rnams/
16b1: gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag de la ji ltar bslab par bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya su zhig gtang zhes phan tshun 'gro bar brtsams pa dang / mdun na 'don mda' bo che 'di nyid thams cad du nus pa yin la/ bdag cag la yang byams
16b2: ba yin gyis gtang ngo / / de la de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song la phyin nas bdag cag gi tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ zhes bya ba
16b3: nas srun gsol lo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / 'di skad ces kyang gsol cig/ btsun pa yangs pa can gyis tshogs kyi mchid nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can dum
16b4: gshegs na ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes gsol cig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ni khyed la yun ring du gnod pa byed pa'i phyir
16b5: rgol ba dgra bor gyur pa yin pas bdag la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur grang / de dag gis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yul 'khor gzhan yang 'gyed par yang / pho nya mi gsod ces grag na/ khyod ni rgyal po'i pho nya yin// kun gyis mi gsod
16b6: smos ci dgos/ / de nas mdun na 'don mnga' bo che dge mtshan dang bkra shis dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dag byas te/ rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de lam gyis dub pa bsal te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
16b7: dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
16b8: to/ / kye gau ta ma yangs pa can gyi tshogs bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod ba yang dam/ 'tshe 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang / bde ba la reg par spyod dam/
17a1: zhes kun gsal lags so// bad pa mabyed dang yangs pa can gyi chags pad bar gyur cig/ kyegau ta ma yangs pa can gyi tshogs kyi mthong nas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can dugashegs su gsol/ gal te bcom ldan 'damams
17a2: ma gshegs na ring po mi thogs pa kho na yangs bcan stongs shing mi tsam lus par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o/ / com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ mda' bo che 'dirang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcigs lus 'phags pa'i bu yul ma
17a3: gad+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras zla ba gsum du yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs pas rgyal po la rtogs shig/ gal te rgyal po gnang na de bzhin du gshegs par bya'o// des yangs pa can du bcom ldan 'das ni 'di skad ces gsung ngo zhes spring ngo //
17a4: rnams kyis kyang spring ba/ de nyid kyi phyir khyod lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgrag la ba der song la song nas bdag cag gi tshig gis lus 'phags ma bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgral gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam ba nyung ngam/ brtsod
17a5: pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes kyang dris la 'di skad ces/ lha bcom ldan 'das yangs ma can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ lhas gal te
17a6: bcom ldan 'das la rjes su ma gnang na ring por mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes spros shig/ de nas mdun na 'don mda' bo ches bsams pa/ ci re shig rgyal po la bsten par bya'am/ 'on te blon po
17a7: rnams la bya snyam du bsams pa dang / de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'ga' zhig gi dngags las bsnyen par mi bya ste/ 'on kyang bsnyen par byed pa la bsnyen par bya'o zhes 'byung bas mdongon rnon mo rnams la bsnyen pa bya'o snyam nas ngas blon po rnams la bsnyen par bya bar brtsams so//
17a8: blon po rnams kyis spras pa/ mdun na 'don dgos pa ci zhig la 'ongs/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo na bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lha/ la gsol ba 'debs su mchis kyis khyed cag gis grogs mdzod cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ de bzhin du
17b1: b yas la ba cag gis rnga tsam na bos pa da'i tshe khyod dag casha nas de gagis skabs shes nas bos pa dang de nas mdunan 'don mda' bo che lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma gad+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgrag la ba der song ste song nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma
17b2: gAd+hAng+gA rnas po sa skyes dgral sa pa dang smras ba da byas nas phyogs gcigs ga go/ / phyogs gas nga/ nas mdun 'don padang bcas sus 'apags pa'i bumal lag d+hA nyel bam stes dpral 'dis ces smrasas// sta yangs pa can
17b3: tshogs kyi ba dan sngal gad ba rung dab/ ga par gnams sa zhes bya brgyas par zhunags pa'o// mda' ba ci byed dang / 'das pa can gyi tshigs pa bar gyur ci/ yangs bcan gyi tshogs kyi mched nas 'din ces/ sgrubatsa
17b4: ldan 'das yangs pa can du gshegs par bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gnang bar mdzad dugasol/ lhas gal te bcom ldan 'das la rjes sum gnang na ring po mi thogs pa kho nar yangs pa can stongs shing ming lus par 'gyur ro zhes mchi'o// rgyal
17b5: bis smras pa/ mda' bo che kho bos yun ring mo zhig nas kye ma yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs kyang cim rung snyam du bsams pa de gal te yangs pa can gyi gnas stongs par gyur na kho bo yid la bsam pa chags chung ngus rdzogs par mgyur tam/ de skad ces/
17b6: smras pa dang / mang po ci song ngo // blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gcig kyar yongs su btang ba snya mchis sam/ shes ldan dag med de// de ltar na lhas bcom ldan 'das la bkur stim lags pa bgyis so//
17b7: sa bcom ldan 'das la rjes su gdang yang rung / mi gnang yang rung / bcom ldan 'das ni yangs pa can gyi sems can la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gshegs par byur ba nyid do// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag la bos ma shes kyis gal te
17b8: stan khrag shig/ de dag gis mda' ba che bkug nas rgyal pos smras pa/ mang po che la pos dam bcas te bcom ldan 'das rjes su gnang bar bya'o// gal te la bos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur ci 'dra ba byas pa de 'o na 'dra bar
18a1: 'das pa can ci tshogs kyi byan/ dastan 'phos rjes sa gan // des yangs pacan rnams la rgyal pa 'did ces gsung nas stong ngo // da rnams kyis smras pa/ rgyal ba mag cig zung gyu rapas bcom ldan 'das/
18a2: la mchod pa dang bkur sti byed na/ bdag cag tshogs su gyur pas ci ste mi b+ha zhes de dag gis bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol cig dang / gagag gis bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchod pa dang bkur sti
18a3: bgyi'o zhes snying ngo / / de nas mnga' bo ches de dag rgyal po la rig par byas so// de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi napas gnyis la mgo bos
18a4: byag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul mag d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag
18a5: ji srid 'tshe'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / sun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid par spro lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas gnang bar
18a6: mi 'gyur lags na bcom ldan 'das bdag gi rjes tshod kyi gdugs gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgral cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul
18a7: mag d+ha 'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te song ngo // de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu pral ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras de nyid/
18a8: kyi mtshan mo nas zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gru bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs pa la zhugs pa/ btsun pa bcom
18b1: ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni btul lags na/ btsun pa klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'di yun ring po zhig nas bdag cag la ga'on ma mchis par ne sha kho na bgyid/ 'gran zla ma mchis par ni 'gran zlar gyur/ gnod pa ma/
18b2: mchis par ni gnod pa bgyid par gyur te/ le tog gang dag skyes shing skyes pa rnams ni chung gzon par bgyid lags na/ bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar gzung ste klu'i rgyal po sog ma med legs par gdul bar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
18b3: lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgral yon sngo ba mdzad nas gshegs te/ gtsug lag khang du byon nas dge slong
18b4: gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma meda' dul du 'dod do// byang phyogs na ni phan yon lnga
18b5: yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ me tog phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsod snyoms mod pa dang / skye bo'i tshogs drang po yod do// zhes gsungs nas bcom 'das nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug
18b6: lag khang du zhugs so/ / de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po'i khab nas chu bo gang gA'i bar gyi lam dang grong khyer dag che thang du stong du bcug ste lam rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo thams cad bsal nas tsan dan gyi
18b7: chus chag chag btab dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi pog por dag bshams/ dar gyi chun 'apyang mang po sbyangs/ bar bar du me tog gi gzhal med khang dag byas so// yangs pa can gyi lid tsa byi rnams kyis ni chu bo gang gA nas yangs pa can gyi bar du de bas lhag par khyad
18b8: bar du 'phags par lam dang grong khyer dag stong du bcug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs kanang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo na lan dag la ba dang 'dong ngo // btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal
19a1: zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dang yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ nalan dang byon nas na la nad na a mri'i tshal dgag dbye can zhes bya ba na bzhugs so//
19a2: de'i tshe na lan dan kun turmA bdam bu'i tsho pa zhes bya ba rgas pa/ 'alags pa/ gtugs pa btsas nas lo brtsa nyi shu lon bzhig gnas pa la/ na la na da'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed de/ dgra
19a3: bcom par bkur ro/ / de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba'i sngon gyi grogs po dang / blon po dang / gnyen dang / gnag gi gnyen mtshams su gyur pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba la 'di skad ces/
19a4: drang srong khyod chur shog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces smras na/ gang yang bdag gi tshig mi nyan pa de srid pas/ mal bdag de'i drung du song ste yid kyi dri ba 'dzin du gzhug go snyam nas/ de nas lha de kun tu rgyu 'dam
19a5: bu'i tshong ba ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshor ba la 'di skad ces smras so// drang srong tshur shog/ kho bo las yid kyi dri ba long la kun chub par gyis shig/ ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par lta bar bya/ ji
19a6: ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par rig par bya/ ci'i phyir spong / ji ltar nad med pa 'thob/ drang srong gang zhig khyod kyi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa 'di dag tshig gis lung bstan pas sems rangs par byed pa de'i thad du
19a7: khyod tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces smras nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / de nas kun tu rgyu'angam bu'i tshod pas lha de las yid kyi dri bzung ste kun chub par byas nas 'od srung rdzogs byed ga la ba der song ste phyin
19a8: nas 'od srung rdzogs byed kyi drung dun kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas ji ltar nad med pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'od srung
19b1: rdzogs byed kyis de'i yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes rnam par mi shes na lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong ba 'di snyam du sems te/ 'od srung rdzogs byed kyis bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid
19b2: kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam nas/ de kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang / smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang / mi pha ma skra'i la ba can dang / ka t+ya'i bu nog
19b3: can dang / gcer bu ba gnyen gyi bu ga la ba der song ste phyin nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i mdun du yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ ji ltar mdza' bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas gcer
19b4: bu ba gnyen gyi bu'i bar gyis kyang bdag gi yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes/ rnam par mi shes na lan glan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshong
19b5: pa 'di snyam du sems te/ gang la yid kyi dri ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa'i tshig gis lung bstan pa mi thob pa de 'dra ba'i rab tu byung bas bdag la ci zhig bya/ bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya cher yod pas/ mal bdag 'dug la 'dod pa
19b6: yang longs spyad cing sbyin pa yang btang / bsod nams kyang bya'o snyam mo// yang de'i blo skyes pa/ ma la bdag dge sbyong gau ta ma ga la ba der 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas de chas pa na yang bsams pa/ re shig dge sbyong dang bram ze rgan rabs gang dag yin pa 'di
19b7: lta ste/ 'od srung rdzogs byed nas gcer bu pa gnyen gyi bu'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ de rnams kyis re shig yid kyi dro ba yid kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa rnams kyang mi shes rnam par mi shes na dge sbyong gau ta ma nas gzhon pa gsar du rab tu
19b8: byung bas lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du bsams te slar ldog par 'dod pa las/ yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi kun tu rgyu rnying pa rgan po 'khogs pa spyod pa'i slob dpon dag las bdag gis dge slong gzhon nu la brnyas par mi bya/ dge slong
20a1: gzhan nul rtsal gyis gnan par mi bya ste/ dge slong gzhan yang de ni dbang che ba mthu che bar gyur pa yin na nas thos so snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid kyinu pa
20a2: da kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ dzi gar mdza pa la yin pa la mdza' ba ltar btsas pa yin par blta bar bya zhes bya ba nas stir da med pa' thob ces bya ba'i ba go ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis kun tu rgyu 'dam bu tsho/
20a3: 'i bsam pa mkhyen nas de'i tshetshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mdza' bo gzhan la rnam par spod byed ce// de ni bdag tu zad dozhes sprul// las kyang sla dgu'ad ma zhing byed pa de// bdag gi bshes ma yin par shes par bya// gang zhig bden pa ma yin
20a4: tshig/ mdza' bo dag la sna byed cing // sbal las su mi byed pa'ang // mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs shes te// de lta bu ni mdza bo ma yin pa la mdza' bo ltar bcos pa yin par shes par bya'o// ji ltar bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yin par byazhe na/ gang zhig tag
20a5: chubs med dbye ba yi/ / bsam pas gra gra la de ni mdza' min gyi// gang zhig 'dir ni snying dang 'drang gyur par/ gzhan gyis mi phyed de ni mdza' bo yig// de lta bu ni bdag dang 'dra ba'i mdza' bo yon par rig par bya'o// ci'i phyir spong zhe na/ skyes bu gces pa mthar 'byin
20a6: tsi 'bras chu/ bar byed pa ni// rab tu dga' ba skyed pa'i gnas/ gas 'dren pa na bzhag// dedon duganyer bar bsgom pa// des dang medapa'athob can/ rab tu ben pa da ni// nye bar na pa'i ri shes nas// chos la dga' ba'i bzung ba// !
20a7: ming sdig pa med par 'gyurang / / de ltar na nad med pa 'thob bo// de nas kun tu zla'adam du tshid pa 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs kyis ni bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen no snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gau tam bdag
20a8: lems par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs pa dag slong gis dang po 'thob pa la na/ bcom ldan 'das dge sbyong gau ta ma'i spyan sngar bdag gis tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// kun tu rgyu 'dam bu'i tshod pa legs par gsung
20b1: pa'i chos 'dul ba la ga byung cing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/ de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa des shes bya ba nas de sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das
20b2: kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' phel bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong du 'dong ngo do// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom
20b3: ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu dmar bu can gyi grong khyer dang rgyal po'i khab kyi bar gyi dbus na rgyal po'i gnas 'od ma'i dbyug pa can du nub mo nye bar rten cing bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
20b4: dge slong dag nga dang khyed cag kho nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag ma shes/ ma mthong / khong du ma chud/ so sor ma rtogs pas la mi rang po 'dir rgyug cing 'khor bar gyur to// bzhi po de dag gang zhe na/ nga dang khyed cag kho nas zhes bya ba nas/
20b5: sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa ma shes ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ra dang khyed cag kho nas zhes pa nas/ sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam ma shes ma mthong zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
20b6: bai ni bu'o/ ngas sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rjes su rtogs shi sa sor rtogs pas srid pa'i srid pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye ba zed do ni srid pa gnan med do// des sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang / sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags
20b7: nga'i b.ran pa rjes su rtogs shing po ser rtogs pas srid pa'i sred pa bcad pas 'khor ba'i skye bzad der ni srid pa gzhan med do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de da ces bka' stsam te/ bde bar gshegs pas desad gsungs nas ston pas gzhan
20b8: yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / ra dad khyed cag kho na yis// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag/ ji lta ba bzhin ma mthong bas// lam ni ring ru 'khor bar gyur// bden pa de dag mthong nas ni// srid pa'i sred pa bcad nas su// 'khor
21a1: pa'i skye bzad pas na/ / da ni srid pa gzhan med do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' bral nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cha dang
21a2: ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dmar bu can gyi grong ga na bder 'dong ngo // btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs
21a3: rgyu zhing gshegs pa na dmar bu can gyi grong du byon te/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi dmar bu can gyi mchod rterten bzhugs so// dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas dmar
21a4: bu can gyi grong du byon te/ dmar bu can gyi mchod rten na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khyu nas khyur phrad cing 'dug nas dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das gde na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom
21a5: ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze dang khyim
21a6: bdag dag lnga po 'di dag ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dag yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag 'di la bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag pag med papas/
21a7: med gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs dang po yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pabag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang /
21a8: bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma yin pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su sdig pa dang / bsngags pa ma yin pa dang / grags pa ma
21b1: yin pa'i sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gnyis pa yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung / bram ze'i 'khor du 'ang rung / khyim
21b2: bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung / dge sbyong gi 'khong du'ang dung / 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor de dang der zhu ma num por gyur nas dga' ba med pa dang / bag tshabs 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus gang
21b3: dang gang du zhes bya ba nas bag tshabs zhes bya ba'i bar gor ma bzhin du'o/ / 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs gsum pa yin no// bram ze dang khyim pa dag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus gang nga dgang du zhes bya ba nas bag med pa'i rgyus yi la
21b4: gcags bzhin 'chi bang byung de bla zed byi pad ga cag med pa pan med pa la nanas pa'i rjes yid la gcags bzhin 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs bzhi pa yin no/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i
21b5: tshwas lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag med pa bag med pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba
21b6: sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag med pa'i nyes dmigs lnga ba yin no/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag lnga po 'di dag ni bag yod pa'i phan yon yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag pag yong pa ga yod la gnas pa'i rgyus
21b7: longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus longs spyod chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon dang po yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag
21b8: ngag gzhan yang bag pa yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yo da pa gnas
22a1: pa'i rgyus phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su dge ba dang / grags pa dang / sgra dang / tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po grags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gnyis pa yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag
22a2: yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus rgyal rigs kyi 'khor du'ang rung / bram ze'i 'khor du'ang rung / khyim bdag gi 'khor du'ang rung / dge sbyong gi 'khor du 'ang rung / 'khor gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i 'khor dang dang zhu ma zhum po ma yin pa dang / dga' ba dang bag
22a3: tshab med pas 'gro bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag pag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus zhes bya ba nas/ bag tshab med pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon gsum pa yin no// bram ze dang
22a4: khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa pa g.yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la bcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus yid la bcags pa med par 'chi bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa//
22a5: 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon bzhi pa yin no// bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gzhan yang bag yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/ bram ze dang khyim bdag dag bag
22a6: yod pa bag yod pa la gnas pa'i rgyus lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ras kyi 'jig rten lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni bag yod pa'i phan yon lnga pa yin no/ / de nas dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stan
22a7: las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi gnas su do mod bzhugs par gsol
22a8: bcom ldan 'das kyi dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim 'ad nams la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas dmar bu can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnad par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das
22b1: kyi sa zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi sun snga nas dong ngo / / ma gang+gA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram zer bur byed kyis dge sbyong tam ma ga d+hA'i rdzo btu ni gshegs pan mang na gyi grong gshegs nag/ mar can nga gi dam na tsu
22b2: rten na bzhugs ste/ de la dmar bu can gyi grong gi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur sti byas so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rta rgod ma dang ldan pa'i shar ta thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs nas gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs te/
22b3: bram ze'i khye'u yi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / bram ze'i khye'u yi tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas dmar bu can gyi grong nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song ngo // de ji tsam gzhon pa'o mi'i bar du bzhon//
