22b4: pas song nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pas kun dga' ra bar zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa
22b5: sna tshogs byas nas phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod
22b6: par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzed bstod/ yang dag
22b7: par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / / de nas ma ga d+hA'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
22b8: ldan 'das la bar skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la
23a1: gtogs pa bram zer byar byed la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas mag d+ha'i lnga chen po la gtogs pa zam zer byar byed kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin snga nas song ngo // danas/
23a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i sde chen po'i gagags pa ma med byang byed song nas rang po ma len par thugs su mdunas 'dug gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ 'dug gnas kyi phyi rol tu zhabs gnyis bkrus te 'dug gnas su zhugs nas
23a3: gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs te/ dkyil mo bkrung bcas nas sku drang por bsrang ste dgongs pa mngon du phyogs par gzhag go// bcom ldan 'das 'dug gnas na nyin mgyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa me'i las 'phags
23a4: pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis bre ba gzigs so/ / gzigs nas kyang dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te 'dug gnas nas byung nas/ 'dug gnas kyi grob ma la dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la
23a5: gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dka' bo khyod kyis dmar bu can gyi grong gi grong khyer rtsig par brtson pa su yin ci thos/ btsun pa bdag gas ma hA/
23a6: rtswa'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyung byed legs par thos so// kun dga' bo legs so// legs so// ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed ni mkhas pa yin te/ 'di ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig
23a7: bkres pa lta zhig go/ / kun dga' bo 'don nga 'dug gnas na nyin par gyi gnas pas bzhugs pa na lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa ma'i las 'das pas dmar bu can gyi grong na mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams gnas kyis 'bre ba gzigs so// kun dag
23a8: lo phyogs gang du mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres pa'i phyogs deng 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir mthu che ba mthu che ba'i mi rnams kyi sems gzhol bar 'gyur ro// phyogs gang du lha pad ma dang pal bas gnas kyis bres pa'o/
23b1: pa'i phyogs der ni 'di lta ste/ gnas kyi phyir mi bar ma dang bal ba rnams kyi sams gnol bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir ni mthu che ba mthu che ba'i lha rnams kyis gnas kyis bres pas phyogs 'dang 'di lta ste gnas kyi phyir dbang che ba dbang che bar//
23b2: thathas pa'i mi rnams kyis sems gzhol bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo sa rabs kyi gnas dang / ya rabs kyi tha skad ji snyed pa dang / zong 'grams pa rnams kyinang na yang 'di ltaste/ dmang bu can gyi grong khyer 'di chog tu 'gyur ro// kun dga'
23b3: 'dis par cad gsum 'byung bar rig par byaH/ me dang / chu dang / nang 'khrug gis so// de nas ma gna'i chen pa la gtogs pa zas ze byur byed kyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gas nang bsad pa zhes bya ba nas/ byug babs te ltung bzed byabar
23b4: dgenas zhes bya ba bar gongam bzhin te/ gsar gyi bya ma tham thags te gsol ba 'debs shing stan par 'dug go// 'di sa ces kyang gsol to// kye gau ta ma sbyin pa 'di las bsod nams kyi kyi 'dun pa dang / dge ba'i chu 'thun pa dang / bde ba'i gno
23b5: mchis pa de dmang can na gnas pa'i rnarnams kyi su ra pa don dang / phan pa dang bde ba'i sring du yin pa cwo pa bad dugaso/ denas som ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su par dka'abul pa/ nyes bragang cagad pa can/ gang zhigs rnams/
23b6: bcod byed ga/ ston pa'i ga' bzhin byed paste// de ni sas rgyas rnams kyis bdags// mkhas shing 'a dag ngas pa yis// ga ga kyigs pa gnas 'cha ba// tshum khrims ldan pa pa shes gso pa nas// de yi 'og tu yon 'adz+raH/
23b7: rnams rdung pas ded 'gyur zhing // mchod pas kyang ni mchod par 'gyur// dedes sanas byung ba // thalam bzhin 'das // nyanamam pargya ba'i rgyas thas te// bdapa pa mthang ba 'byu// danas bcom ldan das rgyas mas
23b8: chen po la gtogs pa bram ze byar byed pa tshas dang ldan pa gtam yang dag par na/ yang dag par 'dzin du drug/ yang dag pa dgapa bstod// yang dag par rab tu dga' ba mdzanas gdanams banangs rta gshegs so// de
24a1: ma ga Na'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyis der rgyu lhag gang yin pa de thams cad sbyidan par btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing / 'di snyam du sems kyis sems la mngon par 'du byed de/
24a2: bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma dmar bu can gyi grong gi sgo nas phyi rol gshegs pa de ni bdag gis gau ta ma'i sgo zhes gdags so// chu bo gang gA'i 'jug ngogs ga nas rgal ba de yang gau ta ma'i 'jug ngogs zhes gdags so snyam mo// de nas bcom
24a3: ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i sna chen po la gtogs pa bram ze dbyar byed kyi bsam pa mkhyen nas/ dmar bu can gyi grong gi dbus thog thag gshegs nas byang phyogs su rgyu ste/ chu bo gang gA gang na ba der gshegs so// de nas lus 'phags ma'i
24a4: bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po me skyes dgra 'di snyam du sems te/ mal bdag nyid kho nas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du
24a5: bzung ba dang / yangs pa can gyi lidi tsa bya rnams kyis bsams pa/ lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di bcom ldan 'das mchod pa la rang nyid lhag par spro bar gyur na/ ci'i phyir na bdag cag gis spro bar mi bya snyam nas/
24a6: de rnams kyis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo // klu rnams kyis bsams pa/ re shig mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyur na/ bdag
24a7: cag klu rnams ni rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin na ci'i phyir bdag cag spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo // rgyal chen bzhi'i ras kyi lha rnams
24a8: kyis bsams pa/ re shig mi bsod nams mngon sum du ma mthong ba 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das mchod pa bya ba la lhag par spro bar gyur na/ mngon sum du mthong ba bdag cag gis lta ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de rnams kyis kyang
24b1: rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i lha'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo / / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa/ lha dang mi 'di rnams bcom ldan 'das mchod par bya ba la spro bar gyur na/ bdag cag gis
24b2: ci'i phyir spro bar mi bya snyam nas/ de dag gis kyang rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs lnga brgya bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ji ltar 'di dag phyir zhing dad pa mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba
24b3: de ltar byin gyis bslab po snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar re re'i yid la bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng na bdag gdugs 'dzin to snyam pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub
24b4: pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya lha dang mi rnams kyis sted du bzung ngo / / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrin las ci zhog mdzad na/ des na bcom
24b5: ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya lha dang mi rnams kyis dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan na las byas
24b6: shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna
24b7: bdun dang ldan pa legs mthong chen po zhes bya ba byung ste/ rgyal po de la bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba zhig yod do// rgyal po de'i kun tu spyod pa ni bu btsas shing btsas pa dag pi bzhin khrid de 'khyam par byed do// btsun mo rnams kyis bsams pa// rgyal po
24b8: 'di'i kun tu spyod pa ni sras btsas shing btsas pa dag phyi bzhin khrid de nas 'khyam par mdzad pas na gcig pu yod bzhin du bu med pa dang 'dra/ de ni dang khrims zhig bca' ste/ gal te bdag cag las 'ga' zhig sems can dang ldan par gyur na/ des rgyal po
25a1: la gang sa par mi bya'o zhes bcas so/ / ji tsam na btsun ma gzhan nig sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag gis phyogs dben pa zhig tu gzhag ste/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang khye'u gzugs bzang ba/ bstan sdug pa/ ma
25a2: lpags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs la Ta/ lag pa ring ga bral bar dbye sa che ba/ sprin ma 'jar ba/ sna'i bzangs mthob/ yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcas so// ji tsam na chen por zu ba dang btsun mo de dag thams cad
25a3: 'di la bu'i thug pa skyes so/ / / 'dul bgan/ bal po nyi shu bdun pa/ de nas dus gzhan na gan rgyal po lags mthong chen po shar kyi las 'phags kyi gling nas rin pa che sna bdun gyis sna drangs shing khams kyi rgyal phran stong gi sa yongs su
25a4: bskor te ba stong du gcig gis mtshang bas zla ba kham pa lta bur bskor nas/ gzi brjid nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag par spa zhing 'ong ba bzhon nu khang bzangs kyi steng na 'dug pa des mthong nas/ des mal dris pa/ yum mchib pa bi srel gas/ bu khyod kyi
25a5: yab rgyal po legs mthong chen po yin no/ / yum de 'das na bdag rgyal por 'gyur ram/ bu rgyal po de'i sras stong du gcig gis mtshar ba zhig yod pa de dgathams cad kyi phu bo gang yin pa de 'das na rgyal por 'gyur na khyod ni thams cad kyi nu bo yan no// des
25a6: smras pa/ yum gal te de 'das na bdag rgyal por mi 'gyur na/ gnang bar mdzod cig dang / bdag dad pa yang dag pa kha nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// btsun po de dag thams cad kyis smras pa/ bu khyod la bdag cag gis bu'i sdug
25a7: panyams su gyong gis de ltar ma byed cig/ yum gdon mi 'chal bar rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// de dag gis de gdon mi za bar gal gyis 'chu bar shes nas smras pa/ bu gal te de ltar na dam zhig bcas nas gnang bar bya ste/ gang yang khyod kyis yon
25a8: tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs na de khyod kyis bdag cag la smos shig/ de bzhin du bgyi'o// de de dag gis gnad nas des mtha' gcig tu song ste/ mkhan po dang slob dpon med par byang chub kyi phyogs sum bcu rtsa bdun gyi chos bskyed nas rang byang chub
25b1: mngon sum du byas so/ / rang sangs rgyas de'i bsams pa/ bdag gis ma de rnams la khas blangs pa smra dgos pas song la sngon gyi dam bcas pa mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/ bdag nyid chen po de dag ni ngag gis chos mi ston gyi lus kyis yin pas// des
25b2: de rnams kyi mdun du 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa dag gi cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtong ba yin pas de dag shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin rkang pa gnyis
25b3: la gtugs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs sam/ rtogs so// 'phags pa khyod ni bsod snyoms bzhed pa lags la/ bdag cag kyang bsod nams 'tshal ba lags na/ khyod 'di nyid du bskyed mo
25b4: tshal du bzhugs shig/ bdag cag gis rgyun tu bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyi'o// rang sangs rgyas des khas blangs nas de dag gis rang sangs rgyas la bsod snyoms kyis bkur stir bya bar brtsams so// rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/
25b5: bdag gi lus rnag can 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni byas kyis/ ma la bdag phur po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go snyam nas/ de nas de dad pa'i rgyal po mdab ma brgyad pa ltar steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags
25b6: nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag kyang bstan nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i dbyings su zhugs so// de nas de dag gis shing dri zhim po thams cad spungs te/ spangs
25b7: nas bsregs te me'i phung po de'o mas bsad nas rus pa de dag gser gyi bum pa'i nang du bcug ste/ bskyed mos tshal de nyid du ngus pa'i mchod rten brtsigs te mgul gdub dang / gdu bu rgyan can dang / gzhan yang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis
25b8: brgyan cing gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag btsugs so// de nas dus gzhan nig na rgyal po legs mthong chen po btsun mo'i 'khor gyis bskor nas sos ka'i dus la phab pa me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing dad pa dang / khwa shung dang /
26a1: rma bya dang / ne co dang / ri gegs dang / bya ko ki la dang / shad shang de'u gang 'byin pa'i tshal gse ba tubaskyed mos tshal gyi gzhar song nas/ debaskyed mos tshal na 'khyam pa las dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten de mthong ngo // de nas bskyed mos tsham
26a2: srung ba'i mi la smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje 'di ci yon/ des smras pa/ lha bdag gis ni mi 'tshal te/ 'on kyang 'di'i don ni btsun pos 'tshal te// de nas des btsun mo'i 'khor rnams la smras pa dang / de dag gis rkang pa gnyis la gdugs te smras pa/ lAn
26a3: 'jigs pa sum du gsol/ des smras pa/ de bzhin sbyin no// de dag gis zhabs de rgyas par smras pa dang rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed cag gis bu rgyal srid la mngon par dga' na de kho bo la ma gsol ba bzang po ma yin pa zhig byas so// gal te
26a4: gsol bar gyur dang kho bo do kho na la rgyal srid dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba zhig/ 'on kyang ngas bdag nyid chen po de mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs rnam gdags so// zhes de nas des bu la byams pas rang
26a5: sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten de la gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs rnams btags so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po chen po legs mthong gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// gang yang ngas de na bu la byams pas
26a6: rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten de la gdugs dang / cod pan dang / thor tshugs btags te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas ngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya byas so// las de kho na'i lhag mas da ltar da mngon par rdzogs par byang
26a7: chub pa na lha dang mi rnams kyis rtsibs brgya dang ldan pa'i gdugs nyis stong lnga brgya dbu'i gtsug gi steng du bzung bar gyur to/ / gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshigs 'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur na gzhan du ya dngas 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po nyis stong lnga brgya
26a8: byed par 'gyur ro/ / de lta bas na nga'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can gang yin pa de ngas nyan thos rnams kyi longs spyod kyi rnam par smin par bsngos te/ gal te mu tig bre gang gis 'bras bu gang khugs kyang 'on kyang de'i nyan thos rnams ni bsod snyoms
26b1: kyis phongs par mi 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
26b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras gru zam 'dzugs su bcug pa dang / yangs pa can gyi yid tsa byi
26b3: rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gru zam gtsugs so/ / klu rnams kyis bsams pa/ bdag cag klu rnams ni rnam par ltung ba'i lus can yin pas/ mel bdag cag gis gdengs ka'i zam pas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA bsgral bar
26b4: bya'o snyam nas/ de rnams kyis gdengs ka'i zam pa btsugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed cag las gang zhig lus 'phags ma'i bu yul ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i gru zam las chu bo gang gA'i rgal
26b5: bar spro ba de ni de las rgol cig/ gang zhig yangs pa can gyi ling tsa byi rnams kyis klu zam btsugs pas spro ba gang yin pa de yang de las rgol cig/ nga yang dge slong kun dga' bo dang / thabs gcig/ klu rnams kyi gdengs ka'i zam pa las chu bo gang gA rgal bar
26b6: bya'o/ / den kha cig ni lus 'phags pa'i bu yul mag d+ha'i rgyam tho skyes dgra'i gru zam las gas to// kha cig ni yangs pa can gyi ling tsa byi rnams kyi grub ma las rgal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshe dang ldan kun dga' bo dang thabs gcig klu rnams kyi gdes
26b7: ka'i zam pa las rgal to/ / de nas dge bsnyen zhig gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kha cig zam pa btsugs nas chu bran por te rgya mtsho rgal// skye bo rnams ni gzings 'cha' mkhas pa'i skye ba rnams chu rgal// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bram
26b8: ze rgal bar gyur nas skam la bzhugs/ / dge slong dag 'dir khrus byed nyan thos rnams ni gzings 'cha'o// gal te kun na chu yod na// khron pa'i chus ni ci zhig bya/ sred pa'i rtsa ba bcad nas ni/ su zhig spyod pa tshol bar byed// bcom ldan 'das kyis sa phyog
27a1: gzhan zhig na mtho zhing mtho ba'i sa phyogs zhig gzigs so/ / gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyed rgyal po sgra chen gyi lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la/ sboms su 'dom drug bcu
27a2: yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig yod de// sbyin pa dag byen/ bsod nams dag byas nas chu bo gang gA'i nang du bor ba gang yin pa de lta bar 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ba'i dus la bab lags
27a3: so/ / bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang ba ched sdod de bsgreng na dge slong rnams lta bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yur drung 'khyil pa dang / dra bas 'brel
27a4: ba/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa'i phyag gis la reg par mdzad pa dang / klu rnams kyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir sa la reg par mdzad snyam na mchod sdong gzegs par bzhed/
27a5: par mthong ngo // de nas de dag gis bsgreng ba dang / dge slong rnams kyis mchod sdod blta bar brtsams so// tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni 'dod pa chung ba yin pas mtha' gcig du song nas phyag dar khrod pa dga' tshem mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das
27a6: kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mchod sdod nub par 'gyur gyis rtags zung shig ces pa las de nub par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis zhum pa/ btsun pa dge slong rnams mchod sdong la ltab
27a7: bgad na/ tshe dang ldan pa legs ldan ni 'dod pa chung bas mtha' gcig du mchis nas phyag dang khrid pa'i bcom pal gzigs/ ci lags re shig 'dod chags dang bral ba'i slad du 'am/ 'on te sngon sten pa'i slad du lags/ gal te re shig 'dod chags dang
27a8: bral ba'i slad du lags na ni gzhan yang 'dod chags dang bral ba mchis lags so/ / 'on te sngon bsten pa'i slad du lags na ni/ 'dis gang du bsten lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir yang
27b1: yin pa sngon yang brten pa'i phyir yang yin no/ / 'di rnon gang du bsten lags/ dge song dag sngon zung brgyal por bzlogs zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de lta dbang po brgya bye dang grogs por gyur to// dbu 'dod kyang bu med nas lag pal 'gram pa gta
27b2: sems 'ongs sa rbad cing 'dug sa/ nor rdzas mang po zhig pasags na bdag la bu med pas bdag shin rgyal po'i gdung chud rbang par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de nas pa rgya byin gyis mthong nas dris pa/ grogs po khyed ci'i phyir lag pal 'gam pa gtar nas
27b3: sems khongs sa chud cir 'dug/ des smras pa/ ko shi kanor rdzas 'di snyed cig bsags na bdag la bu med pas bdag shinas rgyal po gdung chud chad par 'gyur bas so// brgya byin byas smras pa/ grogs pa byed sam sa khongs su chad par ma byed
27b4: cig/ gal ta lha'i bu 'ga' zhig 'chi 'pho'i chos byung bar gyur na/ de khyod kyi bur bsko bar bya'o// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'chi 'bo'i chos 'byung ba la ni snga ltas lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/ gos ma snyengs pa rnams snyings par 'gyur ba dang / me tog ga phrar//
27b5: ba ma snyengs pa rnams snyings par 'gyur ba dang / lus las dri mi shem pa 'byung ba dang / mtshan khud nas rdul 'dzag pa dang / rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ba'o// ji tsam na lha'i buzhag la snga ltam lnga byung bar gyur nas de la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras/
27b6: pa/ grogs po rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyor cig/ des smras pa/ kau shi ka de ni bag med pa'i gnas yin te/ ko shi ka rgyal po rnams ni nyes pa mang ba byung ba yin pas chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byas nas sems/
27b7: can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur na mi rung ngo // brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po khyed la ngas dran par bya'o// kau sha ke lha rnams ni dga' ba mang pos bag med pa yin no// grogs po de ni ba dan na 'on kyang kho bos khyod la dran par bya'o// des rgyang
27b8: pa rab sgrogs kyi btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du nying mtshams sbyar to/ / gang gi nyi ma kho na la nying mtshams blangs pa de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra byung bar gyur te// de zla ba brgyad dam dgra 'das nas khye'u zhig btsas te zhes bya ba
28a1: sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ / de'i nye du dag 'dus shing tshogs nas ming 'dogs par byed de/ khye'u yi ming cing gdags/ gnyen rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gis nyi ma kho na la khye'u 'di ma'i mngal du zhugs pa
28a2: de'i nyi ma kho na la skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sgra phyung bar gyur pas/ de bas na khye'u yi ming sgra chen zhes bya bar gdags so zhes de'i ming sgra chen zhes bya bar btags te/ khye'u sgra chen ma ma brgyad la rjes su gtad nas zhes bya ba nas brtag pa brgyad dang / bya
28a3: pa dang / klog pa la mkhas shing bzhes gnyen can du gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur cing yul gyi dbang phyug dang mthu dang / brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan
28a4: nas gnas pan ma kyi bzo' gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ glang po che'i gnyar zhon pa dang / rtal zhon pa dang / sheng rta'i thabs dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / mda' gzhu dang / phyir bsnar ba dang / mdun du bsnur ba dang /
28a5: lcags kyus bsgyur thabs dang / zhags pas gdab pa dang / mda' be che 'phen pa dang / dbyug pas rdeg pa dang / 'dzin stangs dang / gom stangs dang / gcod pa dang / dral ba dang / dbugs pa dang / rgyang nas phog pa dang / sgra grag par phog pa dang /
28a6: gnang du reg pa dang / mi 'tshor bar phog pa dang / tshabs che ba dag ste/ gnas la po de rnams la shin du byed par gyur to// chos nyid kyis re shig pa ji tsam gson gyi bar du bu'i ming mi grags pa yin no// dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rabasgrogs shi nas
28a7: chen rgyal sring la gzhag pa dang / des tha gi na ma zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du bcug nas/ de nas chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug par gyur to// de nas brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrogs
28a8: bye bur bskos te chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig/ sems can dmyal bar gnos par gur ter nas ma bsgo 'am/ des thag tsam zhig chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byang du bcug nas slar yang chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid bying du
28b1: bcug par gyur to/ / lan gnyis su yang brgya byin gyis smras pa/ grogs po kho bos khyod rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi bur bskos te chos bzhin ma yin pas rgyal srid ma byed cig/ sems can dmyal bar gzhol bar gyur ta re zhes ma bsgo'am/ des
28b2: smras pa/ kau shi ka bdag cag rgyal po rnams ni dga' ba mang pos bag med pas skad cig tu brjed par 'gyur gyis/ bdag la khyod kyis mtshan ma zhig zhog shig dang / bdag gis mthong nas nges par sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams dag bgyi'o//
28b3: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu las thams cad pa la sgo ba/ las thams cad pa song la khyod kyis rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnas su lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang / lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod la/ sboms su 'dom drug bcu yod pa/
28b4: thams cad gser las byas shing rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras bu zhig sprul cig/ de nas lha'i bu las thams cad pas rgyal po sgra chen gyi gnasu lha'i 'khor gyi khyams dang / lha'i mchod sdong srid du 'dom stong yod pa/ sboms su 'jom drug
28b5: bcu yod pa/ thams cad gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa zhig sprul to// de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyi mchod sbyin gyi khang ba rtsig tu bcug nas rang gi zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba mchod sdong gi zhal ta par bzhag go/ de nas
28b6: mchod srong la 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i mi thams cad lte bar spobs lhags nas zas zazos shing mchod sdong lta bas rang gi las sgrub par mi byed do/ / de nas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams par chad byas pas rgyal po'i dpya thang bzhin mi 'dra bar
28b7: gyur to/ / blon po rnams kyis dang nyung ngu bral ba dang rgyal po sgra chen gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir dbya nyung bdag cig 'bul/ lha 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs mchis nas 'tshal ma 'tshal cing mchod sdong la lta zhing
28b8: mchis der nga gi las sgrub par mi byed pas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas dpya thang bzhin mi 'du lags so/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ mchod sbyin gyi khang pa drol cig/ de rnams kyis de dral na yang de bzhin du skye ba'i
29a1: tshogs de rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas za zhing mchod sdong la rtogs cing 'dug ste/ rang rang gi las sgrub par mi byed pas zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad byas pas de bzhin rgyal po'i dbye thang bzhin mi 'du bar gyur to// rgyal
29a2: pos dris pa/ shes ldan dag mchod sbyin gyi khang pa dral na ci'i phyir dung dpya nyung bar gyur/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha skye bo'i tshigs rang rang gi rgyags blangs nas 'tshal zhing mchod sdong la rtog cing mchis te rang gi las sgrub par mi bgyid pas/
29a3: zhing las kyi mtha' rnams kyi bar chad bgyis pas des na dpya nyung bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po sgra chen gyis sbyin pa dag sbyin/ bsod nams ngag byas nas mchod sdod chu bo gang gA'i nang du bor ro// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ rgyal po rab sgrogs kyi
29a4: zhang po mya ngan med ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni dge slong legs ldan 'di nyid yin te/ 'dis sngon 'di bsten to// btsun pa mchod sdong 'di gang du zhig par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ma 'ongs pa na mi rnams kyis
29a5: tshe lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur te/ mi tshe lo brgyad khri pa rnams kyi rgyal po dung zhes bya ba yang dag par sdom pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig 'byung
29a6: bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po tshe dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdad pa ni blon po
29a7: rin po che nyid do/ / de la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po ma lus par gnod par sngo ba med/ cing
29a8: 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis bda' ba med la/ chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms pas legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro// rgyal po dung gi mdun na 'don bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ste/ de'i chung ma ni tshangs ldan pa
29b1: zhes bya ba zhig 'byung ngo / / de byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas pas bu byams pa zhes bya ba zhig bca' bar 'gyur ro// bram ze tshangs pa'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khril bram ze rnams kyi gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go// des bram tsho/
29b2: khye'u de rnams byams pa la gtad nas bram ze'i bye'u byams pas bram ze'i khye'u brgyad kyi no ma thas chenam gas ci klo / tu 'jug go// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis gter chen po bzhi po/ ka lid ka nas dmar ser te// mi thil nas skye /
29b3: yi// sa 'dzin nas ni e la'i mdag// bA rA Na sI'i grong nas rung // mchod sdong 'di yang khyer nas rgyal po drud la 'bul bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po rung gis kyang bram ze tshangs pa'i cho la sbyin par 'gyur ro// bram ze tshangs pa'i chos kyang bram ze'i
29b4: khye'u byams pa la'o/ / bram ze'i khye'u byams pas kyang bram ze'i khye'u de rnams la'o// de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis mchod sdong de dum bu dum bur bcad nas 'ged par 'gyur ro// de nas bram ze'i khye'u byams pas mchod sdong
29b5: de'i mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas/ de nyid kyis skyo ba skyes nas nags su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// gang gi nyi ma kho na la nags su song ba de kho na'i nyi ma la byams pa tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas nas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyurate/
29b6: de mtshan bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// gang gi nyi ma kho na la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas bla na med pa'i ye shes
29b7: thob par 'gyur bar kho na'i nyi ma la rgyal po dung gi rin po che sna bdun nub par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po dung yang khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri'i 'khor dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar
29b8: 'gyur ro/ / de'i chung ma rin po chos gzhes bya ba yang bud med brgyad khro'i 'khor dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'thung bar 'gyur ro// bram tha tshangs pa'i cha yang bram ze'i khye'u brgyad khro'o 'khor
30a1: dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa 'khor dge slong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang ri bya
30a2: gagazhang gangan ba der gshegs par 'gyur ro/ / de na dge slong 'od srang gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa 'dug pas ribyigag rkang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa la kha dbye bar 'gyur ro// de nas blan med pa yang dag par
30a3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pas dge slong 'od srung gi rus pa'i tshogs ma zhig pa phyag g.yas pas blangs nas phyag g.yon par gzhag ste nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces/ dge slong dag skye dgu rnams kyi tshel brgya thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya
30a4: ba'ajig rten du byung ba de'i nyan thos rnams las chog shes pa dang / 'dod pa chung ba dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa rnams kyi mchog ni 'od srung yin no zhes bstan pa gang yin pa de ni 'di yin te/ shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i
30a5: bstan pa yang 'dis yang dag par bsdus so zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro/ / de rnams kyis mthong nas skyob skyes te/ 'di 'dra ba'i lus kyis ji ltar 'di lta bu'i yon tan gyi tshogs thob par gyur snyam nas/ de rnams skyo ba de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa
30a6: mngon sa mar byed par 'gyur te/ 'bum phrag dgub nartsa drug dgra bcom pa nyid dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan mngon du bya ba la brtson par 'gyur ro// mchod sdod de ni derang zhig par 'gyur ro// btsun pa rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis dkon mchog gnyis
30a7: 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so// bcom ldan 'das gang du sngon lam btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba yul dbus su rgyal po gas sbyin zhes byab 'byor ba
30a8: rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go// de'i shing rnams me tog dang / 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lhag par lo tog rnams dran
30b1: sumatshags par gyur te/ byang phyogs na rgyal po nor ldan zhes bya ba 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bad pa dang / lo legs pa dang / skye ba dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ban rgyal sring byed du 'jug go// de'i shing rnams me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus
30b2: dus su char gyi rgyun legs pa rababapas lhag par la tog rnams phran sum tshogs par gyur to/ / de dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gos sbyin gyi mdun na 'don las khye'u skye gtsug rin po ches brgyan pa zhig bcas te/ de'i bcas ston rgya cher byas na
30b3: de'i ming rin po che gtsug tor can zhes btags so/ / de dus gzhan zhig narga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba yang dag par mthong nas skyo ba skyes te nags su song ngo // gang gi nyi ma kho na la nags su song ba de kho na'i lci ba la des bla na med pa'i ye shes
30b4: thob nas de'i ming yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ran chen gtsug tor can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya bar gyur to/ / de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po nor ldan steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song
30b5: ste blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor nas 'dug go/ / des khron po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag nga'i ci 'dra ba de ltar rgyal po gzhan 'ga'i yul na 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu ga ba
30b6: rang / shing rnams me tog dang / 'bras bu rtag pa dang / lhas dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par phab pas lo tog rnams phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ yul dbus nas tshong bzong thogs te byang phyogs su 'ongs pa de rnams kyis
30b7: smras pa/ lha yul dbus na rgyal po gos sbyin zhes bya ba zhig mchis so// rgyal po nor ldan gyis thos ma thag tu mi bzod pa chen po skyes te/ de mi bzod pa skyes nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag dpung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go/
30b8: skon cig dang yul 'khor gzhom par bya'o// de nas rgyal po nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta ba'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung ga tshogs go skon te/ yul dbus su dong nas chu bo
31a1: gang gA'i lho phyogs kyi 'gram du 'bod do/ / rgyal po gos sbyin gyis rgyal ba nor ldan dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang ba tsho chags dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shis ba'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas yul dbus su
31a2: 'ongs te chu bo gang gA'i lho phyogs kyi'i gram na 'khod do zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang des kyang dpung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta pa'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas chu bo gang
31a3: gA'e byang phyogs logs kyi 'gram na 'dug go/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis de gnyis kyi gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas chu bo gang gA'i 'gram nub mo nye bar rten cing bzhugs so// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
31a4: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i rnas rnyed de'i tshe brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi sems kyis bcom
31a5: ldan 'das kyi dgod pa shes par 'gyur ro/ / de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gangan ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug
31a6: te can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ de rnams kyi bdog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen po byung bar gyur pa rgyal po nor ldan gyis mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la dris pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gos
31a7: byin gyi yul na snang brgya chen po byung ba'ang tsa yon/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ sgrargyal pa gas sbyin gyi yul du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can gtsug tor can byang ste/ de la blta ba'i phyir brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa mchis pa'o//
31a8: nasnang ba chen po 'di zung ste/ de na rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba lags pas 'di na de'i mthu lags so// rgyal po nor ldan gyis smras pa/ shes ldan gag gi su du gad la brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa yang blta ba'i bya re 'ong ba'i rkang gnyis bsod
31b1: narnams kyi nang des/ bu thung ba de la bdag gis gnod pa ci 'dra ba zhig bya zhes des de la po nya hatang ste/ grogs po khyod del bdag cung zad kyang mi byed kyis tshur ston// khyod ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po can zhig pas khyod kyi yul da/ la brgya byin dang /
31b2: pa la sogs pa yang brta pa'i byong dpa nang gnyis bsodanams kyi zhing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas na chen gtsug to can bzhugs so// 'on kyang khyod kyi mthul nas 'khrud nas 'gro bar byeste/ de stan padag cag pan rgyan yid pades
31b3: 'gyur ro zhes sprid do/ / rgyal po gos sbyin yid mchis nas de yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gangan ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs
31b4: gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag la rgyal po nor ldan gyis sprid
31b5: pa/ grogs po sdug pa khyod la bdag cag ci yang mi byed kyis tshur shog/ khyod kyi mgul ba nas 'khyud nas 'gro bar bya ste/ de lta na bdag cag zan tshun yid bde bar 'gyur ro zhes mchi na de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ yang dag par
31b6: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po song shig dang khyod la legs par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das ci bad gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi 'am/ rgyal po chen po rgyal po dpung chen po
31b7: rnams la ni gtug par bya dgos so/ / de nas rgyal po gos sbyin stan las langs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas chas te rgyal po nor ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
31b8: rgyal po nor ldan gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs so/ / de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis mgul nas 'khyud de yid gcugs par byas te btang ngo // de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gangan po der song ste
32a1: phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
32a2: rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa rgyal po thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gdugs pa'i rgyal po gang lags/ rgyal po chen po 'khor los sbyang ba yin no// de nas rgyal po gos sbyin snyan las langs te bla gos
32a3: brag sa gcig drug zar nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gangan ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom lda/
32a4: 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gtsigasang bdag gi sdum par gdugs chod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gos sbyin la cang mi gsung bas gnang //
32a5: de nas rgyal po gos sbyin yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas dong ngo // de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis
32a6: de nyid kyi rab mo zas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/ nang par sngar langs nas gangan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la spyad
32a7: 'dren gyi dus chang gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshong pa shams lags shing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das dnga'i dris la bab par dgongs su gsol// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gnag tA can snga dro sha mthabs
32a8: mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun gyis bltas na gargyal po gos sbyin gyi bkang sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan
32b1: bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / de nas rgyal po gos sbyin gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag
32b2: rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol
32b3: nas phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzod gru bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ btsun pa sbyin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur cig ces smras nas de ma thag tu rung yang
32b4: bus so/ / de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dung zhes bya bar/
32b5: 'gyur ro// de nas rga chen po'i sgra dag byung ngo // rgyal po nor ldan gyis ca co'i sgra dag thos nas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po gos sbyin gyi yul na ca co'i sgra grag pa de ci zhig yin/ de rnams kyis legs par brtags nas/
32b6: smras pa/ lnga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po gos sbyin 'khor los bsgyur ba kyil por lung bstan pas skye bo'i tshogs dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas des na caco'i sgra grag pa lags
32b7: sa/ / de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang no ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug to can gyi nams gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig
32b8: tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'khor los bsgyur ba thams cad kyis rkang pa gnyis la gtug par bgyi
33a1: pa gang lags/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// de nas rgyal po nor ldan stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig du gzar nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
33a2: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshed spyod zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du
33a3: gsol/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis rgyal po nor ldan la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po nor ldan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ yang
33a4: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod
33a5: pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nad par sngang langs te gdan bshams shing nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can spyan 'dren gyi dus tshod gsol pa/ btsun pa gdugs tshod bshams lags
33a6: shing mchis na bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can snga dro sham thabs mnapas lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
33a7: cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bsdus te rgyal po nor ldan gyi bkad sa gangan ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gangadan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas rgyal po nor ldan gyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
33a8: rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhi sod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam pa du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang
33b1: gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis gsol nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad la byams pa
33b2: tshad med pa'i yan lag gis rgyas par byas nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces btab po// yang dag par rdzogs/
33b3: pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgyad khri thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dge slong
33b4: dag de ltar na smon lam gyi dbang gis dkon mchog gnyis gcig car 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo grong spyil bu can zhes bya ba gang na ba
33b5: der 'dod do/ / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das yul spong byed ces bya ba nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs po dang gro ba spyil bu can du byon
33b6: te/ grong spyil bu can gyi grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi shing sha ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di ni tshul khrims yin no// 'di ni ting nge 'dzin yin no// 'di ni shes
33b7: rab yin no/ / dge slong dag tshul khrims goms par byas na ting nge 'dzin yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin goms par byas na shes rab yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// shes rab goms par byas na 'di lta ste/ 'dod
33b8: chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag las sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro// de ltar sems yang dag pa kho nar rnam par grol ba'i 'phags pa'i nyan thos kyis ni bdag gi zag pa ni zad do// tshangs par spyod
34a1: ba ni bsten to/ / bya ba ni byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes yang dag pa kho nar shes par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das
34a2: kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sgra can gdan par 'dong ngo // btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
34a3: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dang spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / sgra can du byon nas/ sgra can gyi drang srong sgra sgrogs kyi gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe sgra can gyi skye bo'i tshogs la mings byung nas
34a4: de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi/ nye ba dang / lhag par btson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'od dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags byin dang / dge
34a5: pabasnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o/ / de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bas sgra can
34a6: gyi skye bo'i tshigs la mi ngas byung ste/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang shi/ nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'ong dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grag
34a7: pa dang / grags byin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang shi'o// zhes thos so// thos nas kyang sgra can du bsod snyoms la rgyus te zas kyi bya ba byas nas zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs shing / lhung bzed dang ches gos mkhos su phab nas/
34a8: rkang pa gnyis bkrus te bcom ldan 'das gad na ba der dong nas lhags pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom
34b1: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dge slong rab tu mang po 'dir snga dro sham thabs 'tshal/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/ btsun pa bdag
34b2: cag dge slong rab tu mang po sgra can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ban sgra can 'dir skye bo'i tshogs la mi ngas byung nas/ de'i tshe dge bsnyen brtan pa yang gum/ nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa/
34b3: dang / nye mdzes dang / yid 'ong dang / nye bar yid 'od dang / bzang po dang / shin tu bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags byin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang gum mo zhes thos lags na/ btsun pa de rnams kyis 'gro ba ni gang /
34b4: skye ba ni gang / sngon du 'gro ba ni gang lags/ dge slong dag dge bsnyen brtan pa na tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas brdzus te skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi ldog/
34b5: ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro// nye ba dang / lhag par brtson dang / brtson pa'i khyu mchog dang / mdzes pa dang / nye mdzes dang / yid bod dang / nye bar yid 'ong dang / bzang po dang / shin du bzang dang / grags pa dang / grags
34b6: byin dang / dge bsnyen grags mchog kyang tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas brdzus te skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir yang phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro// dge slong
34b7: d ag sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen nyis brgya lnga bcu lha gcig shi ba de dag kyang tha ma'i cha dang 'thun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga rnams spangs pas brdzus te skyes te der yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos can gyi phyir
34b8: mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen sum brgya shi ba de dag ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang spangs la/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dag kyang bsrabs pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin te/ 'jig rten
35a1: 'dir lan cig phyir 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag grong khyer sgra can 'di nyid du dge bsnyen lnga brgya lha gcig shi ba de dag ni kun// sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgun tu zhugs pa rnam par mi ltung ba'i/
35a2: chos can rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges par gzhol ba/ ri ltar thogs na srid pa bdun pa yin te/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du lan bdun du nying mtshams sbyor zhing 'khor nas sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag khyed dus
35a3: las 'das shing shi bar gyur pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba zhu bar byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la tho 'tsham pa yin te/ des na de bzhin gshegs pa bde bar mi 'gyur ro// 'on kyang skye ba yod na 'chi ba'i dus byed pa yin na ngo mtsham
35a4: ci zhig yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang ru ches rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi mngon par mkhyen pas mngon par byang chub nas gsungs te/
35a5: 'dogs par mdzad/ rab tu 'jog par mdzad/ rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ rnam par 'grel bar mdzad/ gsal bar mdzad/ 'chad par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu 'chad par mdzad pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ 'di yod pas 'di 'byung / 'di skyes
35a6: bas 'di skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/ 'byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa rkyen gyi 'di dang / zugs/ ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyi skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis/
35a7: tsharag tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams
35a8: rabatu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ab zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'dis ste/ 'di me na 'di ma 'byung la/ 'di 'gags na 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag
35b1: 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'gagrabs ming dang gzugs 'gagra/ ming dang gzugs 'gag pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshe rab 'gags/
35b2: tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
35b3: mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'gag par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag 'on kyang khyed la chos kyi me leng gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la
35b4: yid la zung shig dang bshad do/ / chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la shes nas dad pa ni chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims ni chos kyi me long gi//
35b5: chos kyi rnams grangs yin te/ ngas khyed la chos kyi me long gi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do zhes gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni de yin no// oM mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na sgra can du byon nas/ sgra can gyi drang
35b6: srong sgra sgrogs kyi gnas na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang a mra skyong ma de la ne tso bzhin rgyas shes bya ba mi skad shes pa zhig yod de/ ne co bzhin rgyas la 'di skad ces smras so// bzhi ni rgyas tshur shog/ khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
35b7: der song la phyin nas kho mo'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la/ gnod pa nyung ngam/ nyam pa chung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par spyod dam zhes
35b8: snyan gsol la/ 'di skad ces a mra skyod ma'i mchid nas/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs par gsol cig/ de nas ne co bzhin
36a1: thamakyis lam thong ma skang na pa/ bcom ldan dpa pa deng song ba de sas pa can gyi pa ci bu'i khye'u gagis mthong nas de dag gas smras pa/ shes ldan dgan ci 'gro ba 'din srang tshang ma'i yin shes de dgags
36a2: de la mda' 'bar bar brtsams pa na/ de yang de dag gi steng du babs so// de nas ni tso tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ yul 'khor gzhan yang 'gyed par yang / pho nya mi gsod ces grag na// bdag lta rgyal ba'i po nya bas// lus can kun gyi ga la sod//
36a3: de rnams kyis kyang tshigs su bcad desmras pa/ khyod kyi tshig gis mda'a' bangs pa/ ldogan nga cag skas ci dgaso// khyod ni rdzu 'phrul ches bskyabs pas// 'jigs pa med par 'gro bar gyis// de nas ne co bzhin byas bcom ldan 'das
36a4: gangan ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas ste bcom ldan 'das la 'disad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la amra skyong ma mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod bcung
36a5: dam/ nyam rab zung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ 'tsho 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes snyun gsol lags so// bzhin rgyas khyod dang / a mra skyong ma bde bar gyur cig/ btsun pa a mra sbyor mi'i
36a6: mching nas bcom ldan 'das nam yangs pa can du gshegs pa de'i tshe thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ thog mar bdag gi a mra'i tshal du gshegs su gsol zhes de skadar mchi lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ne tso bzhin rmas la cang si gsung
36a7: bas gnang ngo / / de nas ne tso bzhin rgyas kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de bcom ldan 'das la dad pa bskyed
36a8: nas song ba las ring po ma lon pa kho nar 'ol bas srog dang bral te dus byas nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ros kyi lha rnams su skyes so/ / chos nyid kyis skyes nas ring po ma lon pa'i lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo ni sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi
36b1: 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o// des bltas na dud 'gro las shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pas so// de nas sngon ne tso byed
36b2: pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag la rigs pa ma yin gyis/ ci nas kyang ba gzhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam nas/ de nas
36b3: sngon ne tsa byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha gdub 'khor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shing se mo do dang / do shal gyis lus brgyan nas de nyid kyi nub mo lha rnams kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad ma dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba'i mi
36b4: tog gis thu ba bkang nas shin tu 'phags shing mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog gis/ de'i nub mo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog gtor te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdug go// de'i tshe
36b5: sngon ne tse byed pa'i lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus snang ba rgya chen pos sgra sgrogs kyi 'dug gnas thams cad gsal bar gyur to/ / / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ne
36b6: byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pas sngon ne tse byor pa'i lha'i bus 'jig tshogs
36b7: la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa/ btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la mas ma bgyis te/ bas ma
36b8: lags/ sdug pas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyis tshogs kyis ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ snga ma bdas pa rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de
37a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad de/ sem+baHna dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi rnams la ni rab tu bzhag/ 'khor ba las ni ring du mdzad/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/ rus
37a2: ba'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum mo// mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum
37a3: du bgyis lags te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bri srog dang yang bsngos
37a4: te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ / de nas sngon ne ce byed pa'i lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas tshod bzod rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul ngong rgyal
37a5: blta ba dang / nad pa nad thams cad las yongs su thar pa bzhin du 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
37a6: dga' bo yangs pa can gangan pa der 'dod do/ / tsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs chu zhing gshegs pa na yangs pa can du byon nas yangs pa can
37a7: kyigyi a ma'i tshal na bzhugs so/ / a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das spong byed nas ljongs rgyu zhing gsheg pa na yangs pa can du byon nas ya dra ba can gyi bdag gi a mra'i tshal kho na na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan na
37a8: bud med kyi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te/ bzhon pa bzang po la zhon nas yangs pa can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bskur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sran sngar song ste/ de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas
37b1: bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma rgyang ring po kho na nas gzigs so//
37b2: gzigs nas kyang dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ a mra skyong ma pa pi 'ong gis brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig/ ngas rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin no// ji ltar na dge slong brtson 'grus la
37b3: gnas pa yin zhe na/ 'di la dge slong gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// rab tu 'jog go// sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi
37b4: bsred pa'i phyir 'dun bskyed do/ / 'thad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// rab tu 'jog go/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// rab
37b5: tu 'jog go/ / dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / goms par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / phyir zhing 'byung bar bya ba dang / ye shes rgya chen po mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do// 'bad do// brtson
37b6: 'grus rtsom mo/ / sems rab tu 'dzin cing rab tu 'jog pa ste/ de ltar na dge slong brtson 'grus can yin no// ji ltar na dge slong shes bzhin can yin zhe na/ 'di la dge slong gis 'gro ba dang / ldog pa la shes bzhin gyis gnas shing / lta ba dang / rnam/
37b7: par lta ba dang / bskum pa dang / brkyang ba dang / snam sbyar dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed thogs pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / gnyid ma log pa dang / smra ba dang / mi smra ba dang / gnyid kyis snyom pas dub pa rnams la
37b8: shes bzhin gyis gnas pa ste/ de ltar na dge slong shes bzhin can yin no// ji ltar na dge slong dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhe na/ 'di la dge slong nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la
38a1: gnon sems dang / yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas so// bya'o lus dang / nang dang phyi'o lus dang / nang gi tshor ba rnams dang / phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang dang phyi'i tshor ba rnams dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'o sems dang / nang dang bya
38a2: sems dang / nang gi chos rnams dang / phyi'i chos rnams dang / nang dang byi'o chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten la gnod sems dang / yid mi bde ba spangs nas gnas pa ste/ de sa ran
38a3: dge slong ngan pa dang ldan pa yin no/ / dge slong dag ngas ma mra skyongam pa ba 'ong gis brtson 'grus dang / shes bzhin dang / dran pa dang ldan pas gnas par gyis shig/ ras rjes su bstan pa ni 'di yin nas ngas gang gsungs pa bshad pa ni de yin no// ngan
38a4: a ma skong ma bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a ma skyong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
38a5: gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzer bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin
38a6: du bcug/ yang dag par gzer stong / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas a ma skyong ma stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom
38a7: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sar bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshong sbyong zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra skyong ma la cang mi gsung bas
38a8: gnang ngo / / de nas a mra skyong mas bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung pas gnang par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis pa mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // yangs pa can gyi lid tsa byi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'a
38b1: spong byed nas ngas tu ning gshegs pa dang yang ba bcan byon te/ yangs pa can gyis ma thod mi'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thesas// thos nas kyang so sonas shing ta dang / tarnams lanon te/ kha cig ni te sngon po dang / shing te sngon po dang / rba ba stsogs
38b2: dang lug sngon po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang / ral gri shubs sngon po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug bsngon po dang / 'khor sngon por/ kha cig ni te ser po dang / shing rta ser po dang / srab sgyogs dang / lcag ser po da
38b3: thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang / ral gri shubs ser po dang / nga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa ser po dang / 'khor ser por// kha cig ni rta dmar po dang / shing rta dmar po dang / srab skyogs dang / lug dmar po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs
38b4: dang / ral gri shubs dmar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / byug pa dmar po dang / 'khor dmar por/ kha cig ni rta dkar po dang / shing rta dkar po dang / srab skyogs dang / lug dkar po dang / thor tshugs dang / gdugs dang /
38b5: ral gri shubs dkar po dang / rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang / gos dang / rgan dang / byug pa dkar po dang / 'khor dkar por chas te skad mthon po dang / skang chen por slar khyed slar khyed ces zer zhing yangs pa can nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das pa palta ba dang
38b6: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi lid tsa byinams rgyang ring po kho na nas 'ong ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dge slor rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyer cag las sus sum
38b7: bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gro ba ma mthong ba de yangs pa can gyi lid tsa byi rnams la ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyang ji lnga da ltar gyi yangs pa can gyi ling tsa bye dag bzhin du rdzu
38b8: 'phrul 'di dang / 'byor pa 'di dang / cha lugs 'dis bskyed mos tshal gyi gnas su 'gre'o// ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas sod nas bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun bar zhu'o// denas pangs pa can gyi 'di tsa byi rnams bcom ldan dpa ga na di
39a1: cag tugs pal ldan das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ / phyogs gcig tu la khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yangs pa can gyi ling ma byin mas la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par
39a2: 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzed bstod/ yang dag par
39a3: rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo / / de'i tshe bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu 'khor 'dus pa de nyid du 'dug par gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gangan pa der logs
39a4: su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni spobs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag ni spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ser skya'i bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces bka' stsal pa
39a5: dang / de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ang ga'i rgyal po nor bu'i go 'chang ba// mga'i dbang pos rnyed par ba rnyed de// de'i yul du bung ba'i sangs rgyas ni// grags pa'i sgra dag gangs kyi ri bo bzhin// ji ltar pad
39a6: ma bzang po legs 'khrus pa/ / dgongs ka kha 'bye dri zhim ldan pa bzhin// bar snang la ni nyi ma lhag ge bar// snang ba lta bur nyi ma'i chud la gos// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis stobs// ji ltar mtshan mi me 'bar lta bu ltos// de ni mig byed snang
39a7: babyed pa ste/ / lhags pa rnams kyi the tshom rnam par 'dul// lid tsa byi lnga brgyas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so// bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu legs par smras so zhes bla gos lnga brgya legs par spras pa'i phyir byin no// de nas yangs
39a8: bcan gyi lid tsa byi rnams stan las langs te bla gos pag/ pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das gangan ba de logs su thal so sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /
39b1: thabs gcig tusang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod skyorang zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol// gnas 'jog dgong sngang a ma skyong mas spyan drangs so// btsun pa amra skyong ma dman pa shes rab dman pa des bdag cag bsdus lags te/ des na
39b2: bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das thogs nyid du bsti ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid cing mche ba'i dom pogasod kyi/ dadung yang bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bgrang 'tshal lo// som ldan 'das kyis de dag la gnas
39b3: 'jog de ni legs par sbas so zhes bka' stsal to/ / de nas yangs pa can gyi ling tsa byi rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi nga nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'dra
39b4: kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo / / bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bu ni de nyid na 'dug go/ de nas bram ze'i khye'u ser skya'i bus yangs pa can gyi ling tsa byi rnams dod nas ring po ma lon par shes nas stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan
39b5: 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa 'dir bdag la ling tsa byi lnga brgyas thogos lnga brgya legs par smras pa'i phyir stsal pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar
39b6: bzung ste bzhes su gsopa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram po'i khye'u ser skya'i bu lathugs brtse banye bar bzung ste bgos lnga brgya banas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i khye'u sa skya'i bul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
39b7: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar chad dpung ba'i chos rnam pa lnga 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ ser bya'i bu 'di la ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
39b8: rgyas rag par zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du 'byung zhing de chos thog mar dgeg bar du dge ba/
40a1: tha mang dag pa/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang gi ma 'dus pa/ yongs pa rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba/ tshangs par spyod pa ston par 'gyur te/ ser sna'i bu 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
40a2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byang na ngo mtshar rmad dbyung ba'i cho 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang po yin no/ / gang dag chos de nas dang bcas pas nyan cing bla mar byed/ dam par byed/ yid la byed cing sems rtse gcig tun blags nas seMs
40a3: bsas cad bsdus nas nyar par byang ba 'di na si sgra'i bung bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byang na ngo mtshar chad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba gnyis pa yin no/ / chos de gang dag gi
40a4: thos nas de lta de ltar sgrub par byed pa 'di nas spyi'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dbyung na ngo mtshar chad du byung ba'i chos 'jig tan du 'byung ba gsum pa yin no/ / dgang dag gis thos na/
40a5: dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa'i dga' ba rgya chen po 'thob pa 'di ni si sgra'i bu bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du byung ba bzhi pa
40a6: yin no/ / chos dgang dag gis thos nas don mam gzhi gas kyis sa sor rtogs par byed pa 'ang nis dasgra'i bu de bzhin gshegs padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'arjirten du byung na ngo mtshar chad du byung ba'i chos 'jig rten du 'byung ba
40a7: la sa thadam pa / sa rgyas yo na sbyin/ dang nga sa Sh+Tas nas ba rnyid 'du / da d+hA'i bu khyod kyis sa grus pa rdzo pa da byas co na
40a8: par byed/ drang la byab pang rud mi gzhanas mnyas kyang dgas byed da/ zul byi/ kyi mo panas la sum la ba gas dag pa mardza
40b1: gnyis la mag sos phyag bcal ta/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sranas song ngo // de nas a mra stong mas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te/ nang bar sngar langs nas gdan bshams te nor bu chu srod dag bzhag
40b2: nas bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyi dus tshed gsol pa/ brlan pa gdugs tshor ba shams lags na bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs mnabs/ lhung bzed dang na bza' chos gos ban+d+ha r+tha
40b3: te dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bsdus nas a mra skyong ma'i bkangs gdan ba dang gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gden bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas a mra skyong mas sangs
40b4: byas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bdabang bzhugs par rig nas gtsang nang bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing
40b5: tshim par byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcu bra ste lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan dma' ba zhig blangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis a mra s+yod mas sbyini pa bus
40b6: bde la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi da bar mdzad de/ gang zhig sprin la dga' 'gyur skye bston// snyan pa 'thob cing de'i grags pa 'phel// ser sna mod cing tshogs par 'gro ba na/ zhum par mi 'gyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de lta bas na mkhas
40b7: pa 'dapas/ bar shA drim tha la sbyin pa // dag su ma bcu na ga / spyanam pa da zhes pa mnyam par dgas// sbyin ga byed ga 'i ngas nas// rang ga 'od kyi ga bang tshalan // de dag nyis kyi/
40b8: dga' ba pa// 'ang jim tan sa po dag dang tran// ma sa skyob pade cig sung thas nas// bde bar ga shegs pa'i na thos mtho sa dga'// de nas bcom ldan das kyis a su myong ma 'chos dang ldan pa'i gtas gyis da/ ba brtan/
41a1: shA dag pa d+hA/ du gan/ gzugs yan nas mal// ngan na man pa tan larnams dag cad pas sa rgyas brtsam ldan 'dus pa zhus pa/ brtan pa
41a2: bcan gyi ling tsa kyi rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ das gal te lha rnams su skyes na yang lha mthu che bar 'gyur la/ gal ta mi rnams sa skyes na yang mi mthun no por gyur cing / da ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams byed par yang bstan lags/
41a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag yangs pa can gyi li tsa byi rnams kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyung ba/ 'o ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/ 2
41a4: dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su ni gagis so sar myong la gyu he/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi ral gyisa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi
41a5: lami 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar dge bdang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni// chung mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams
41a6: la ni/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag ston byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar
41a7: gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar ba blan med pa/ lha dang me rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung bar gyur ti/ de 'khor dag slong te khri dang grong khyer bAR+sha Na sI drang srong smrabar
41a8: dgas kyi nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe bA rA Na sIn dge bsnyen lnga brgya gnas so// de rnams kyis rgya mtsho chen por 'dod pa'i zong sta gon byas te/ rgya mtsho chen po'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / rjes su
41b1: 'dun pa jugs na ga gang dun to/ / nas ngan pa rnams kyis rnab yongasasu dgang sa rgyas pa dang nas rlung gas pa sadas byar maman tha'athong shig tu byin te// de rnams da cing rab mang bar gyur nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgya
41b2: 'di srung gi byed bye pa las marjod ca byas das nang can sa tshugs kyis mchod pa byas so/ / de nas gnyid log pa dang lhazhig gis smras pa/ khyed cag ma 'jigs par bag yod par byas shig dang / zhag bdud kyi nyin par dus rlabs 'ong bar 'gyur te/ sa
41b3: khyad cig padi legs su 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro/ / nam nangs nas do rnams phan tshun du smra zhing gros bya bar brtsams te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag la ltas mi 'jigs pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung
41b4: ge mthu yin pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi mchod rten la bdag cag gis rin po che phul bdag slar blangs te 'dod pa ni mi rigs so zhes de rnams kyis gzugs te smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ gang yang bdag cag gis yang
41b5: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung bsod nams kyi zhing blan med pa la bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis gal te bdag cag lha rnams su skyes par gyur na bdag cag mthu che ba khonar gyur cig/ gal te mi'i nang du mi rnams su skyes par
41b6: gyur na mthu che ba dang / mi rnams su skyes na yang sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi dper rung bar gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang yin pa de dag ni lidi tsa byi lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ 'di dag gis
41b7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi phyir bya ba'i mtshad rten byas shing rin po ci dag gi mchod par byas pas des na mi ma thu chen po rnams su skyes par gyur te/ bum bcu cu gsum pa'i lharnams kyis yang dpar rung bar gyur to// dge slong dam
41b8: de sabs rnams gcig tugadag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tuganag pa yin/ 'dren ma rnams kyini 'dren ma yin/ gcig dung / ra ba rnams kyin ga cig tu dkar ba yin no// dge slong dag sta bas na gang yang las gcig tug nag pa rnams
42a1: dren ma rnams ni spongs la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs/
42a2: ba can gyi grong khyer du song la sgo thim pa la rkang bzhog la gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di smos shig/ bi sar ta/ bi sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sar ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' sum te// sangs rgyas tham
42a3: di kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig smra ba thams cad kyis bsams pa/ chos rnam
42a4: kyis bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyis dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin/
42a5: mang/ bzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa rata/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal te// mun tsa ta/ mun tsa ta/ ma 'dug shig/ yams kyi nad nye bar zhi bar 'dug pa
42a6: gyur cig/ nir gang tshata/ ne rare gang tsha ta/ nir gad tshata/ nir gang tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lha'i yang lha lha'i bla ma gshegs te/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po
42a7: dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten song ba bzhi po dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro// lha brgya stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin brgya stong phrag ma dag kyang 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung
42a8: po brgya stong phrag mang po dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'jug ste/ de dag gis khyed napral gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ ni gang tsha ta ni gad tsa ta/ nir gang tshata/ nir gang tshata/ myur dbyer cig/ khyed cag las gang dag sdang ba'i sems dang
42b1: ldan pa de dag ni brlag par gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhang nyes par mi 'dod la srung bar byed par 'dod pa dngag ni 'khod cig/ dgongs pa la yang 'jug par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis 'di skad
42b2: ces bka' la ta/ / s+yAma?/ suma?/ suma?/ suma?/ sum+ba ru/ samrar+Ya/ su su rA/ su mu ru/ mu ru/ mA du/ mar+Ya/ mAr+Ya/ mu ru/ mA ru/ mu r+ra/ mu ru/ mu ru/ ma / ma ri/ ma / ma ri/ mo / mra drA mad/ mu ru mor/ mu ru mi ri/ ma
42b3: mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi r-i/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi da/ mu ru maM re/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ra/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri ti/ ra ro ri ra ro re/ rI dI rI rA rI ti/ ma ri/ mi ri/ mi re/ mi ri/ mi ri/ me re te// hasi/ mi ri/ mi rIt+ti/ mi d+hi mi rI s+t+r-i tsI mi/ kang ka
42b4: ra/ kang ka ra ta/ kad kar/ ka ka ra ka tsA/ kang ka rA/ kang karA/ ka ka rA/ kang ka R+Sha/ kang ka rA/ ka ka rA/ kang ka rA/ kad ka rA/ ka kaR+Sha/ kang ka rAti/ kun+di she/ kang ki rI she/ ka ka rI ki/ ri de ri ri ri/ re pA// sA ri/ ri bu/ ri pu/ ri bu/ ri bu/ ra bu/ ri
