83a3: ba'i phyir gtsubs la me byung shig ces smras pa dang / des shug pa skam po la sa bcu pa stan byas nas steng du gtsub shing gzhug ste/ me dbyung ba'i phyir gtsug nas me phyung / byang phyogs nas dmangs rigs gzhan nu zhig 'ongs pa dang / de'i
83a4: 'ga' zhig gis 'di skad du kye dmangs rigs gzhon nu tshur/ tsan dan skam po las gtsub stan byos la steng du btsu pa shing zhag ste me dbyung ba'i phyir btsubs la me phyung zhig ces smras pa dang / des tsan dan skam po las gtsubastan byas nas stang du
83a5: gtsub shing bzhag ste me dbyung ba'i phyir btsubs nas me phyung ba dang / de dag 'ga' zhig gis gcig tu bsdus nas 'dam bu bcer ba'am/ sog ma'i phung por gtsug na rgyal po chen bo ji snyam du sems/ mi rigs tha dad pas shing sna tshogs
83a6: las byung ba'i me de las dzi ga me 'di ni 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gsal ba'o// // 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum bcu gsum pa/ me 'di ni de lta ma yin no// me 'dis ni me'i bya ba byed nus so// me 'dis ni
83a7: mi nus so zhes bya ba'i khyad par 'am/ bstan pa 'am/ tha dad bya ba 'ga' yod dam/ 'on te me de thams cad 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gsal ba yin zhing me de thams cad kyis me'i bya ba byed nus/ kye gau ta ma zhugs de thams cad 'od
83a8: dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ gsal ba lags shing zhugs te thams cad kyis zhugs kyi brtsi ba bgyid rdo thog legs so// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du bag yod pa thob pa gtso bos btsubs pa'i me de la ni 'di lta ste/ rnam par grol ba dang /
83b1: rnam par grol ba la khyad par dang / bsam pa dang / tha dad bya ba 'ga' yang med do// shes ldan gau tams de skad gsungs pa ni rigs pa'i tshul lags so// re shig zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du skabs phyen shes ldan khyod la bdag gzhan yang phyogs 'ga' zhig
83b2: zhulags so/ / rgyal po chen po ci dang ci 'dod bzhus shig/ kye gau ta ma lha rnams mchis sam/ rgyal po chen po lha gang dag yin par shes/ lha gang dag sha khon dang bcas/ 'gran zla dang bcas/ gnod pa dang bces shing 'di lta bur 'ong zhing 'od bar 'gyur ba'am/
83b3: lha gang dag sha khon med/ 'gran zla med/ gnod pa med cing 'di lta bur mi 'ad zhang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba yin/ lha de dag ni re shig dor bas/ lha gang dag sha kho na dang bcas/ 'gran zla dang bcas/ gnod pa dang bcas shing / 'di ltar mchi zhing mchi bar 'gyur
83b4: ba'i lha de dag tshe bas/ sug las pas/ bsod rnams bsags gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ba de na lha 'am lha'i bus/ lha 'am lha'i gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bgyi ba 'am/ stug par rdo thog lags sam/ rgyal po chen po lha gang dag sha khon
83b5: dang bcas/ 'gras zla dang bcas/ gnod pa dang bcas shing 'di lta bur 'dadi zhing 'a bar 'gyur ba de dag gis/ tshe thaMd/ bas don mis zad nas gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur bden g+hi 'am lha'i bus/ lha'am lci'i bu gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar
83b6: bya ba 'am/ sdug par mi nus so// kye gau trA~M ma de na lha gang dag sha kho na dang bcas/ 'gran zla dang bcas/ gnod pa dang bcas shing 'di lta/ bur mchi zhing mchi bar 'gyur ba de dag gis lha gnod pa ya mchis pa de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho par bgyi ba
83b7: 'am/ sdug pa'i rdo thog lags sam/ de nas ded dpon 'phags skyes pos ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces smras so// dge sbyong gtam ni 'di skad ces lha rnams ni tshe lhag par ring po lhag par yun ring du gnas pa yin no zhes gsung
83b8: bar 'gyur gang lags pa'i gnas de mchis so/ / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na rdul yab thogs nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems
84a1: te/ sde dpon lus 'phags po 'di ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi bu yin la/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyi sras yin pas sras dang bu ni lhan cig gtam byar rung ngo snyam du rig nas sde dpon lus 'phags po la 'di
84a2: skad ces smras so/ / sde dpon ji snyam du sems/ ko sa la'i rgyal po'i rang gi yul yin la/ de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su bca' ba la dbang sgyur na/ sems can dbang chung ngu kha cig gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya 'am/ sprug par nus sam
84a3: dge sbyong nus so/ / sde dpon ji snyam du sems/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rang gi yul ma yin la/ de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su bcu' ba la dbang mi sbyar na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sems can dbang chung ba kha cig gnas
84a4: de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya 'am/ sdug par nus sam/ dge sbyong ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal rang gi yul ma yin la/ de na yang de'i tshig gis khrims su bca' ba la dbang sgyur na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sems can dbang chung ngu kha
84a5: cig gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ sdug par mi nus so// sde dpon khyod kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yod skad thos sam/ dge sbyong ko sa la'i bdage bo rgyal po 'di nyid las thos so// sde dpon ji snyam du sems/ ko sa
84a6: la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ sprug par nus sam/ dge sbyong re shig ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams mthong ba yang nyams sum
84a7: myong na gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ sdug pa lta spod kyad cing gos/ sde dpon de bzhin du gnod pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis gnod pa med pa'i lha rnams mthong ba yang nyams su mi myong na gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar bya ba 'am/ sprug pa lta smos
84a8: kyang cing gos te de ni gnas med do/ / de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kyo gau ta ma dge sbyong 'di'i med ci lags/ rgyal po chen po kun dga' bo yin no// shes ldan kun dga' bos de skad du smras
84b1: pa ni rigasu pa'i tshul yin no/ / shes ldan kun dga' bos de skad du smras pa ni shin tu rigs pa'i tshul yin no// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// re zhig gal te zhu ba lung bstan po'i slad du/
84b2: shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag zhu ba gzhan yang phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// rgyal po chen po gang dang gang 'dod pa zhus shig/ kye gau ta ma ci lags/ tshangs pa de mchis lags sam/ rgyal po chen po tshangs pa gang yin par shes/ tshangs pagang
84b3: zhig gnod pa dang bcas pas 'di lta bur 'ong bar 'gyur ba'am/ tshangs pa gang zhig gnod pa med pas 'di lta bur mi 'ong zhing 'ong bar mi 'gyur ba yin/ kye gau ta ma bdag ni de la tshangs pa gang zhig gnod pa ma mchis pas 'di lta bur mi mchi zhing
84b4: mchi ba/ mi 'gyur ba'i tshangs pa de lags par 'tshal lo// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam de lta bu glengs so// de nas mi des bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal gzid nas
84b5: ko sa la'i rgyal po gas la rgya sha ngan pa der song ste byin nas/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yi 'di skad ces smras so// lha de 'di lags so/ de nas bkra shas ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal bas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la
84b6: rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas nas phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze'i khye'u yang dag rgyal ba can la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i khye'u nyi ma snga ma
84b7: dang / tshes snga ma la rgyal po'i pho brang du rgyal po dang blon po dang 'khor rnams 'dus shing 'dug pa na/ dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di skad ces dge sbyong dang bram ze gzhan gyis thams cad shes pa'am/ mthong ba gang yin pa ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de de ni
84b8: gnas med de zhes gsung zhes pa ga ma da lta bu sus smras dran nam/ lha dran lags te/ 'di lta ste/ sde dpon 'phags skyes po de skad mchi'o// 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ldan gyi bu bram ze khye'u yang dag rgyal ba'o zhes de dag phan tshun de ltar gta
85a1: khu das 'byin par byed do/ / de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi rim glo ba'i mis ko sa la'i rgyal po gas pa N+Dal la 'di skad ces smras so// lha gshegs pa'i dus la bab lags so// lha dus la bab lags so// de nas ko sa
85a2: la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / shes ldan gau ta ma bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams te zhu ba zhus pa yang shes ldan gau ta mas bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhu ba zhus pa lung
85a3: bstan lags/ 'dir rigs rnam par dag pa dang / lhag pa'i lha dang / lhag sa pa'i tshangs pa las brtsams te/ shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gis zhu ba zhus pa yang shes ldan gau ta mas pa dag la lhag pa'i tshangs pa zhu ba zhus pa lung bstan lags te/
85a4: shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gis zhu ba gang dang gang zhus pa de dang de kho na shes ldan gau ta mas bdag la zhu ba lung bstan lags pas/ shes ldan gau ta ma la bdag gos gzhan gsol du ci mchis/ shes ldan gau ta ma bdag ni bgyi ba dang bsgrub pa mang
85a5: lags pas dmachi lags so/ / rgyal po chen po de'i dus la bab par shes par bgyis shig/ de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yid rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
85a6: la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyen yod du byon nas mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab
85a7: na bzhugs so/ / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa le nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yod na bdag kho na'i kun dga' ba ni bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das
85a8: ga na ba der stong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis le mgo zas phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgan med zas sbyin la tshes dang ldan pa'i gtam
85b1: gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar tshes dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
85b2: 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzed bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
85b3: de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sad bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes
85b4: bya ba nas/ bstan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdog mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
85b5: kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bsten/ yang dag
85b6: par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bzed stong/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa skabs skabs su
85b7: gdugs tshod gsol bar byed pa na dge slong rnams kyis thog mar sprang po rnams la kha zas chung zad byin pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phya bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol pa dang /
85b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gis longs spyad nas lhung bzed kyi lhag ma la sbyin par bya'o// de na sprang po gnyis po bram ze'i khye'u zhig dang / rgyal rigs kyi khye'u zhig yod pa las/ bram ze'i khye'us dus ma shes nas de das
86a1: bor bslong bar brtsams pa las/ de la dge slong 'gas kyang chung zad kyang ma byin no// rgyal rigs kyi khye'us phyi nas slong ba dang / des phal cher rnyed nas des bram ze'i khye'u la smras pa/ khyod kyis cung zad rnyed dam/
86a2: des khros nas smras pa/ gal te kho bo la dbang zhig yod na shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong thams cad mgo drung nas bcad dos la dor ba zhig/ rgyal rigs kyi khye'u sa smras pa/ gal te kho bo la 'byor bzhag yod na kho bos nyi ma re re bzhin
86a3: sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas bstabs pa zhig/ de gnyis de ltar gcig smra zhing mnyan yod nas byung nas shing drang shig tu nyal ba dang / shing rtas la byam pa zhig phyogs der
86a4: 'ongs te/ des bram ze'i khye'u de'i mgo bcad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yod gtso yin// yid 'gyogs rab tu sdar ba'i yid gyis ni// smras sam byas nad
86a5: nas sdug bsngal de/ / 'thob 'gyur 'khor lo 'phyan pas mgo bo bcad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/ kun dga' bo khyod kyi bram ze'i khye'u sangs
86a6: rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems sdug pas tshig rtsub po phyur pa gang yin pa de mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems gdug pas tshig brtsub po
86a7: phur nas mnyan yod nas byung ste shing dung zhig tu nyal ba dang / shing rtas 'khyams pas de'i mgo bcad par gyur to// ngas de las dgongs nas/ chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yon zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du/ 'thob 'gyur 'khor
86a8: lo 'phyan pas mgo bo bcad/ ces bya ba'i bar gsungs so// de'i tshe mnyan yod na tshong dpon zhig bu med par she'o// mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'dus nas smras pa/ su zhig tshong dpon du gzhug/ kha cig gis smras pa
86b1: su bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa'o/ / ji ltar shes par bya/ rtag mod ces de nas de rnam rtag par brtsams pa las de rnams kyis rgal rigs kyi khye'u de shing gi grib ma la nyal ba na shing
86b2: gzhan rnams kyi gribi mas yol bar gzhol/ yol bar 'bab/ yol bar baban shing de'i gri ba ma ni khye'u de'i lus las ma yol bar mthong nas/ de rnams kyis de bslang ste tshong dpon du dbang bskar ba dang de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la
86b3: dpal gyi 'byor pa'i skal ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la brten te yin gyis/ mal bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod la spyan drang ngo snyam nas/ de
86b4: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong dpon de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang
86b5: dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar tshes dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
86b6: 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas tsheng dpon de bstan las langs ste bla gos brag gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba
86b7: btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshed sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas bstan ches dma' ba/
86b8: zhig blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas/ de
87a1: dang / 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas gsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
87a2: nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ btsun pa bdug na 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba dang / bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su 'tsho legs kyis
87a3: bdag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/ deng slan tshad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs sum che bar mngon par dad lags so zhes bya ba'i ba re gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshod pon de la mdang ldan pa'i gtam
87a4: gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong
87a5: gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa la bzhugs te tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yod gtso yin// yid 'gyogs rab tu dang po'i yid kyis ni// smras sem byas na de nas bde ba de/ 'thob 'gyur 'grib ma
87a6: yol bar mo 'gyur bzhin/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pas bka' stsal pa de'i don ci lags/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis rgyal rigs kyi khye'u sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
87a7: slong gi dge 'dun la sems dang ba bskyed pa gang yin pa de mthong dam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sems dad paskyed nas mnyan yod nas byung ste shing drung zhig tu nyal ba las mnyan
87a8: yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis tshod dpon du dbang bskur nas/ de mthong ba'i chos kho na la longs spyod mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur to// ngas de las dgongs nas/ chos rnams sngon du yid 'gro yid gtso yin/
87b1: zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du 'thob 'gyur grib ma yol bar mi 'gyur bzhin/ zhes bya ba'i bar gsungs so// gdub bu can du byon nas gdub bu can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o// sa can du byen nas
87b2: sa can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba grong ma bzhin du'o/ / the she khyod byon nam se nani khrong dus rgyas pa ni gdan nas bya'i rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ grong gsor du byon nas grong gas
87b3: du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes gong ma bzhin du'o/ / grong khyer can du byon nas grong khyer can du sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong me bzhin du'o// rgyal po'i khab tu byon na nas de'i tshe kun tu rgyu khri'i rtsegs zhes bya ba
87b4: ma ga d+hA bzang mo'i rdzing gi 'gram na gnas te/ de mtshan mo mchil bas nya bshor cing bshor cing za bar byed do// de nas langs nas na khre'u yi steng du khri'u bzhag pa la 'dug nas tshigs su bcad pra smra ste/ chos kyi chos mchog gis 'tsho
87b5: srog chags dag/ 'ga' la yang 'tshe mi byed dge slong 'gyur// zhi ba'i yid kyis spong dang brtul zhugs spyad// dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su 'thun// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas de'i drung du gshegs te bka'
87b6: stsal pa/ tshigs bcad de ni ji lte bar// gal te khyod kyang de 'dra na// khyod kyang dam par brtsir rung na// spong ba khyod ni de mi 'dra// re zhig nye bzhi zhing dul ba dang // srog chags 'ga' la'ang 'tshe bar ma byed par// zhi ba'i yid kyis
87b7: spong dang brtul zhugs spod/ / dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su 'thun/ de la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni/ nye bar byas pa yod pa ma yin la// gang zhig gnas gsum dag gis bsdams gyur pa/ dul ba de ni zhi ba'i rjes su
87b8: 'thun/ / de nas kun tu rgyu khri'u brtsegs kyis bsams pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thugs kyis ni bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas mngon par dang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang /
88a1: khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phrugs pa'i bden pa bzhi sor sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ thos pas kun du rgyu khri'u brtsegs zhes bya ba nam pon ma myed pa'i dus nus byasags
88a2: pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag gis de khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag pa lo 'dug pa mthong nas/ dge slong zhig gis
88a3: khri'u'i steng du khri'u gzhab ste chos mnyan na de bden pa'i sdong du gyur kye de bden pa ma mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ci'i phyir dge slong 'dis bden pa ma mi thad snyam na ma gus pas yin par gzigs so// de nas bcom ldan
88a4: 'das 'ad snyam du dgongs te/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slong dag khri'u'i steng du khri'u bzhag nas 'dug pa yin no snyam nas de lta bas ni dge slong gis khri'u'i steng du khri'u gzhag pa la 'dug par mi bya'o// 'dug na 'gal
88a5: tsha brasA can du 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khu bA na sa n+ya gro d+hAr byon nas de nas snga dro sha ma thabs mnabs/ na bza' tshe mgos dang lhung bzed bsdams te/ n+ya gro d+ha ra bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / ser sti
88a6: gzhi'i bram ze'i bu mo zhig n+ya gro d+hAr bag mar gtang ba dang / / bram ze'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes pa/ sku 'od 'dom
88a7: gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi mi stong pas lhag pa/ gshegs na rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu de 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni shAkya'i rigs dga' ba las 'khor
88a8: los sgyur ba'i rigs kyi rgyal srid kyang spangs/ btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang/ bad mdzod kyi 'byor ba rnams kyang spangs nas rab tu byung ba de yin te/ de da ltar bsod snyoms le rgyus/ gal to bdag la bsod snyoms kyi zan/
88b1: bzhes na ni de la bdag gis dbul lo snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis de'i sems mkhyen nas lhung bzed bzed de/ sring mo gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na lhung bzed 'dir phul cig/ de nas de lhag par dad pa/
88b2: skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du rig nas dang ba drag pos bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms kyi zang phul ba dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi
88b3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhes bya ba nas/ mdzod skur nub par gyur to zhes bye ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ rgyu ma
88b4: mchis rkyen ma mchi sra pur ni zhes bya ba nas/ 'dzum pa mdzad ces bya ba'i bar grong ma bzhin du'o// kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze'i bu mo gang zhig dad pa skyes na seng la bsod snyoms kyi zan phul ba mthong ngam/ btsun po mthong lagis so/
88b5: kun dga' bo bram ze'i bu mo de dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa bcu gsum du log par 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyar cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang / lus phyi ma dang / bdag gi don thob pa phyi ma
88b6: larang sangs rgyas shin tu legs smon zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / kun tu bram ze'i bu mo che ge mo zhig dad pa skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis der nga byang chub tu lung bstan to// zhes sgra grags
88b7: po/ / de'i khyo me tog dang yam sreg shing gi phyir dgon par song ba des bdag gi chung mas dge sbyong gau ta ma la bsod snyoms zan zhig phul bas/ dge sbyong gau ta mas der nga byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes thos so// thos nas kyang mi bzod pa skyes te
88b8: bcom ldanas gang na ba der song nas byin pa dang / / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// shes ldan gau ta ma bdag gi sdum par byon tam/ bram ze son to// shes ldan go ta ma~M bdag gi mchis 'brang gis bsod snyoms pa shes shig/
89a1: phul nas khyod kyis de rang byang chub tu lung bstan skad na mad dam/ bram ze bden no// kye gau ta ma khyod 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung na/ de bsod snyoms bshos tsam gyi slad du ji ltar shes bzhin gyi
89a2: brdzun gyi tshig gsung / sa bon 'di tsam gyi 'bras bu 'di'o zhes bgyi ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ bram ze de'i phyir khyed nyid la dri yis/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ bram ze ji snyam du sems/ khyod
89a3: kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos mthong ba 'ga' yod dam/ kye gau ta ma re shig ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gzhan lta zhog/ n+ya gre d+hI 'di nyid du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos shig mthong ba de re shig gson cig/ kye gau ta ma n+ya gro d+hA 'di'i shar phyogs
89a4: na n+ya gro d+hA'i shing chen po zhig mchis te/ de'i ming gas grong 'di n+ya gro d+hA zhes bgyi'o// de'i 'og na shi rta lnga brgyas ma reg cing phan tshun ma thug par mchis lags so// bram ze n+ya gro d+hA de'i sabon tshad ji tsam zhig yod/ tsi re shig zhi de nas tsam 'am/
89a5: gau ta ma me lags so// re lde tsam 'am/ til/ 'dru ba'i 'khor lo tsama'am shing rta'i 'khor lo tsam 'am/ ba'i ko ba tsam 'am/ ba li pa tsam 'am/ ka bid tha'i 'bras bu tsam 'am/ kye gau ta mya ma lags so// kye gau ta ma yungs kar gyi
89a6: bzhi cha tsam mchis lags so/ / bram ze sa bon de tsam gyi 'bras bu shing chen po de tsam gyi 'bras bu shing chen po de tsam zhig skyes so zhes bya ba khyod la su zhig yid ches par 'gyur/ shes ldan gau ta ma yid ches kyang rung ma ches kyang rung ba dag gi
89a7: mngon sum du gyur lags so/ / kye gau ta ma re shig zhing snag che ba sar rmo ba dogs tsha rgo mo mchis pa'i phyogs su sa bo na sar pa grung po ma nyams par mchis pa la dus dus su lhas char ba be na des na shi dun+ya grod+ha chen po 'dir 'khrungs lags so//
89a8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bram ze khyed gyis ji lta bur// zhing dang sa bon mngon sum ltar// de bzhin las kyi rnam smin yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon sum mo// ji ltar bram ze khyod
89b1: kyi sa bor ni/ / chung dang shin du shing chen de mthong ba// bram ze ngas kyang sa bon chung ngu dang // phun sum chen po de yang de bzhin mthong // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ljags brkyang bas dbu sga la thug pa'i bar zhal gyi dkyil 'khor thams/
89b2: sa nas ma pa/ rnam gas du smrasas/ gang shegasanas sngags kyang bsgru sh+tsa ts+tsha ShA la rnams cad ga gal las sna rgyal da m+b+hi shin
89b3: kyi tshig gsung ngam/ kye gau ta ma ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ du yi ljags ni rgyu med bden pas bskrang ba dag/ cig mi bden pa ni gsung ba'i gyur srid dam// bram ze nga yis ji skad bshad pa
89b4: de bzhin pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa yin zhes rtogs par bye ba'i rigs// de nas bram ze de mngon par dang nas de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma
89b5: med pa'i dras nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas ste/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar
89b6: gong ma bzhin du'o/ / bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su ma ni lags kyis bdag dge bsnyen du gcung du gsol/ deng sman chad ji srid 'tshe'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su 'chi bar mngon par
89b7: dang lags so/ / de nas bram ze de bcom ldan 'das kyis gsu pa la mngon par drug 'anas yi ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skapas gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan gyi sbyin sna nas song de// rlom la
89b8: gis pi la dang sbrul gdugs dang / / mthu 'i dang yul 'khor skyod// glang chen grong dang grong khyer che// mug nadang nibram ze'i grong // grong khyer nag por te te// srod ma can dang de bzhin du// dga' ba'i phel bas tshogs su ni// byas te yang dag brjod
90a1: pa yin/ bcom ldan 'das ki ma bi lar byon nas ki ma bi la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ki ma bi la la bka' stsal pa/ kim bi la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la brtsams te/
90a2: bsgom pa khyod la bshad gyis/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do zhes de skad bka' stsal pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa ki ma pi la cang mi smra'o// lan gnyis su yang de bzhin/ lan gsum du yang de bzhin brjod par bya'o// de nas tshe dang
90a3: ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa ki ma pi la la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa kim pi la khyod la ston pa gsung ngo // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'tshal to// tshe dang ldan pa gau ta ma rab tu 'tshal to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
90a4: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la ba ba lags so// bde bar bshegs pa de'i dus la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi las brtsams te bsgom pa
90a5: bshad na/ de'i slad du dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin pa 'gyur lags so// kun dga' bo de'i phyir legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// 'di la dge slong gang yang grong dang grong rdal zhes bya ba dang / dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na
90a6: dbugs brngubs so zhes slob ste zhes bya ba nas/ 'gog pa'i rjes su lta zhing dbugs phyung ba slob ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so zhes
90a7: slob pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs te lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dbyugs phyung ngo zhes slob ste zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe
90a8: 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so/ / kun dga' bo dper na lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig rtsigs par 'gyur 'de nas shar phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ phyogs sam/ shing rtas 'byas
90b1: pa zhig 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa 'gyur lags so// de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs so zhes slob pa zhes bya ba nas/ nang gi yid la
90b2: byed pa yod par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos dga' ba so sor myong bar zhes bya ba nas/ sems kyi 'du byed shin du sbyangs te tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rje su lta zhing dbugs phyung ngo zhes slob bo zhes
90b3: bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// dper na kun dga' bo lam po che'i bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsigs par gyur la/ de nas lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can
90b4: nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig 'ongs na zhes bya ba nas/ tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// gang gi
90b5: 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sngor myong ba dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs nu sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs brngubs so zhes slob
90b6: po/ / sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung na sems rnam par grol bar byed cing dbugs phyung ngo zhes bslob ste/ sems la sems kyi rjes su blta'o// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa nu nang gi yid la byed pa yod dag
90b7: shes te/ mchod rten de nyid la nub phyogs nas zhes dper bya'o// de lus de dang / tshor ba de dang / sems de la brnab sems dang / yid mi bde ba gnyis ka nub pas chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing btang snyoms su gnas so// de'i tshe
90b8: 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na lam po che'i bzhil mdor rdul gyi mchod rten rtsigs par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa zhig
91a1: 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo dzas ma du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa de ltar 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba nas/ de ltar chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i
91a2: 'phyags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ kun dga' bo de ltar na dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi'i dbang du byas te bsgoms pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das ri 'or zhig tu byon to// ri'ir de na tshe dang ldan pa
91a3: mod 'gal gyi bu chen po'i zhang po drang srong rnams kyi nang na rab tu byung ba de tshe dang ldan pa maud 'gal gyi bu chen pos 'dral bar 'gyur bas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mi 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud 'gal
91a4: gyi bu zhang po la sems shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mod 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de'i 'dul ba'i dus shes nas drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su 'jug par brtsams so//
91a5: denas drang srong des smras pa/ dge sbyong 'dug shig/ bram ze rnams kyi bsti gnas 'dir ma 'jug shig/ des smras pa/ nga yang bram ze yon no// drang srong des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze khyed la gsang byed med// glugs bzar
91a6: yang ni yod ma yin/ / khyod ni mgo reg mi mchod min// bram ze bdag ces ci ste smra/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bram ze yi ngo tsha shes// gsang byed glugs gzar shes rab nyid// chu rgun rtag/
91a7: 'bab dad pa ni// nga yi ral ba spyi grugs yin// nang du legs par mnyam bzhag pa'i/ bden pa kho bo mo mchod de// yang dag sdom dang dul ba yis/ nyin mtshan du ni sbyin sreg byed// gal te de ltar gyur na yang dge sbyong mgo reg lan
91a8: 'dir skabs mi 'byed do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa mod 'gal gyi bu chen pos rlung dang char drag btang nas mtsho bran dang nye ba zhig tu seng nas shing zhig gi drung du rten cing 'dug gi/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' ba'i 'khor zhig gnas
91b1: pades bsams pa/ 'di ni 'phags pa mod 'gal gyi bu chen po yin te/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis kyis bla mar bya ba yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di'i mchod pa bya ba la brtson par bya'o snyam ste/ klu de gnas nas byung nas
91b2: tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po'i lus la lan bdun du bkris te steng nas mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug go/ drang srong rnams kyi chos nyid kyis gal te sdug bsngal la ma bsams na drang srong gi chos las nyams par 'gyur bas/ de nas drang srong
91b3: de 'di snyam du sems te/ rab tu byung ba de rlung dang char drag gis nyen nas shi bar gyur te// bdag drang srong gi chos las nyams par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/ de nas bsti gnas de nas phyir byung ste blta bar brtsams bya na/ des de mthong nas smras
91b4: pa/ kye rab tu byung ba kho bo cag gi bsti gnas su zhugs shig/ des smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod drang srong gi chos de las nyams par gyur tam/ drang srong des de'i nga ro las ngo shes nas smras pa/ 'phags pa maud gal gyi bu chen po lags sam/
91b5: drang srong bdag skye bos de ltar shes so// 'phags pa don ci zhig la byon/ khyod nyid kyi 'dul ba'i dus shes nas 'ongs so// tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bzhud do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos zhang po khrid nas
91b6: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug nas/ tshe dang ldan pa mau gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag
91b7: gi zhang po drang srong gi nang du rab tu byung ba 'di lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di la chos bshad pa'i rigs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyel dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen
91b8: nas de dang 'thun pa'i chos bshad par mdzad de/ de thos pas drang srong des phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas nas de nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de
92a1: logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad bces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan
92a2: 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dge slong tshur shog ces bya bas rab tu phyung ngo zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/ skra byi snum sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing // mod
92a3: la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ / sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur// ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po song ba dang klu gzhon nu de gnas de na gcig tu mi dga' bar gyur/
92a4: nas/ de nas ri 'or der yams kyi nang dag btang ste/ bdag nyid drang srong gi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas bsti gnas der song ste gnas so// de nas ri 'ong na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshegs de// bsti gnas der ljags nas de
92a5: nams kyis smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag cag la yams kyi nad byung na bdag cag gis ji ltar bgyi// drang srong gis smras pa/ phyogs 'di nyid du sheg la 'dug shig dang zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de phyogs der
92a6: lhags nas gnas so/ / phyogs dang sbrul gyis gdug byas pas sprul gdug sprul gdug shes bya bar grags te/ dad pa can rnams kyi gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad yod pa zhig brtsigs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma
92a7: rdzal na 'bab chu rab tu bzang ldan zhes bya ba'i 'gram slob pa rnams kyi a mra'i tshal na bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang /
92a8: chos kyi skyabs la gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin/ skyabs gzhan ma yin no// dge slong dag khyed kyis bdag nyid gling dang / bdag nyid skyabs dang / chos kyi gling dang / chos kyi skyabs kyis gnas par bya'i/ gling gzhan ma yin zhing / skyabs/
92b1: gzhan ma yin pa 'di la so sor yang dag par bslab par bya'o// mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams ni ji lta bu zhig yin/ gang zhig yod na/ ci la brten nas/ ci la mngon par zhen te/
92b2: gan ci pa nam rjes srabs pa masal byung dus/ skyegrags da / drug ma / yi ma ba pa dang / mjug pa gang ga byas pa ni ning phyis pan pasan myong ning na cam nga can pajam ldan da
92b3: na chos rnams kyi rtsa ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid dge slong rnams la bshad na/ bcom ldan 'das las dge slong rnams kyis thos nas
92b4: 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ / dge slong dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// dge slong dag gzugs yod na gzugs la brten nas gzugs la mngon par zhen te gzugs ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta
92b5: ba rnams la mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug sngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing skyes pa rnams ni phyi re zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ dge slong dag tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams/
92b6: dang / rnam par shes pa yod ni/ rnam par shes pa la brtan nas rnam par shes pa la mngon pa she te rnam par shes pa ni bdag yin no zhes rjes su lta ba rnams la mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug
92b7: pa gang dag ma skyes pa ni skye zhing skyes pa rnams ni phyir zhing 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag khyed kyis ltos shig ces bya ba nas/ dran bzhin du dbugs brngubs na brngubs so zhes slob ste/ tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o/
92b8: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ dper na kun dga' bo lam po che'i bzhi
93a1: mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig brtsegs par gyur la/ lho phyogs nas bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas 'khyam pa 'ongs na zhes bya ba nas/ tsher rab la tshor ba'i rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma
93a2: bzhin / de'i tsha 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// gang gi tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems so sor myong ba dang / sems rab tu dag pa dang / sems mnyam par 'jog pa dang / sems rnam par grol ba byed
93a3: dbugs brlabs sa zhes sgrub pa dang / sems rnam par thal bar byed ci dbugs phung nasams rnam par thal bar byed cing dbugs byung nas slob ste/ sems le sems kyi rjes su lta ba de'i cha 'phags pa'i nyan thos sems la sa
93a4: kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/ 'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa ni nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes so// des ni nub phyogs nas khyogs 'ong ba de nyid bya'o// de las de dang / tshor ba de dang / sems de la ban pa sems dang / yid mi bad ba de dag
93a5: nub pas chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gtang snyoms su gnas so/ / de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos chos la chas kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so// de'i tshe 'phags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa na nang gi yid la byed pa yod par shes te/ 'di lta ste lam po ches
93a6: bzhi mdor rdul gyi mchod rten zhig gigs par gyur la/ de nas byang phyogs nas ni bzhon pa can nam/ khyogs sam/ shing rtas la byam pa 'ongs na/ kun dga' bo de snyam du sems/ rdul gyi mchod rten 'jig par 'gyur ram/ btsun pa de ltar 'gyur 'gas
93a7: zhes bya ba nas/ de ltar tshas rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta'o zhes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin du'o// de'i tsha bags pa'i nyan thos gnas pa nan gi yid la byed par yod par shes te/ kun dga' bo sbyar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhil rten nas bsgoms pa yin no// bcom
93a8: ldan 'das yul spa ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa nabang mdzod spug po ba byon par mdod / ba can gyi tshal na bzhugs so// bang mdong stug po can gyi tham ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das yul sbra ngan nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa nabang
93b1: mdzod sdug po can du byon nas/ pang mdzod stug po can nabang mdzod stug po'i tshal na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang / khru nas khrur 'dus shing phrad nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung ste/ bcom ldan/
93b2: 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te khyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim
93b3: bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzer bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// /
93b4: 'dul ba ga ni// bam po sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das
93b5: kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa gcig tu sal gyis dag pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba spyad pa 'di ni sra
93b6: bam yini bas mal bdag spa dad ba spu zegs te gos ngur smrig pagos nas dad pa yang dag pa 'a nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam mo/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam grangs du mar bang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang
93b7: ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par bzed bstod / yang dag par rab tu dgang bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo // de nas par mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
93b8: mngon par dga' ste yid rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong / / khyim bdag gi su yul 'khor skyong gis pang mdzod stug po can gyi bram ze dang
94a1: khyim bdag rnams dong nas ring po ma lon par rig nas bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgar nas bcom ldan 'das gar na bde logs su rgyal mo snang ba bcud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag legs par
94a2: gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong ga dngos po 'thob pa ltan/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs pa spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// khyim bdag gi bu pha dang ma gnyis kyis gnang ngam/ btsun pam gnang ngo // khyim bdag gi bu de/
94a3: bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni pa dang ma gnyis kyis ma gnang bar rab tu 'byin pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed do// btsun pa bdag gis ci nas pa dang mas gnang ba de ltar bgyi lags so// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor slong bcom
94a4: ldan 'das kyis gsung ba la mngon par dgal ste yid rangs nas rang gi khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / pa dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yang yum mkhyen par mdod cig/ bdag dang pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ba
94a5: bgyi'o/ / bu yul 'khor skyong shes par gyis shog/ khyod nged kyi bu cig/ pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bzod pa mi 'thun pa med pa yin pas pyod shi bar gyur na ded mi 'dod bzhin du 'bral dang gson bzhin du ga la btang / yab yum gal te re shig gnang na lags/
94a6: gal te ma gnad na ded slan cad tshal ma yang mi 'tshal/ phyag yang mi 'tshal lo// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis nyi ma cig kyang zan bcad pa byas so// gnyis dang / gsum nas bdun gyi bar du zan pa cad pa byas so// de nas khyim bdag
94a7: gi ba yul 'khor slong gi pha dang mas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor slong la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu yul 'khor skyong shes por gyis shig/ khyod ni shin du gzhon pa bde ba 'dod pa yin pas khyod kyi sdug bsngal mi shes te tshangs par spyod pa spang dka'o/
94a8: rab du dben pa bya ka'o// cig pu nyid la mngon par dga' ba dka'o// gnas ma li dgon pa dang / nags khrod dang / bas mthar gnas pa ni mnags dka'o// gu yul 'khor skyong tshur 'dug la 'dod pa dge la spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig
94b1: bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig/ de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyod cang mi smra'o// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas nye du rnams la bcol ba/ kye nye du dag re shig bu yul 'khor slong slong shig/ de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor
94b2: skyong gi nye du rnams khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig/ khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pa lags shes bya ba nas bsod nams
94b3: dag gyis shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyod cang mi smra'o// de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs rnams la bcol ba/ kye gzhon nu dag re shig bu yul 'khor skyod
94b4: slong shig de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs rnams kyis yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ / kye sras nges pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig/ khyed ni shin tu gzhon pas bde ba bzhed pa lags la zhes bya ba nas bsod nasas/
94b5: dag mdzod cig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o// de skad smras na khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyod cang mi smra'o// de nas gzhon nu dag gis yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum sras yul 'khor skyong 'di gum pas ci zhig bgyi rab tu
94b6: 'byung du gnod dang gal te dga' bar gyur na 'di gson po nyi du gzigs par 'gyur la/ gal te mngon par mi dga' bar gyur na yang bu'i gnas pha ma gnyis ma lags pa gzhan su zhig mi ches/ gzhon nu dag bdag cag la gal to rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na de bzhin
94b7: du gdang bar bya'o/ / de nas yul 'khor skyong gi ne'u ldangs dag gis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so// des pa yul 'khor skyong mkhyen par mdzod cig/ pha dang mas gnang ste 'di skad ces gal te rab tu byung nas lta bar byed na'o zhes kyang zer ro//
94b8: shre ldan dag lta bar bya'o de nas khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong ris kyis lus kyi mthu dang stobs bskyed nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lam ga thos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu
95a1: 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag ni pa dang mas gnang lags kyis// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
95a2: bal rab tu 'byung ba dang bsten par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob bstan/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdang tshangs par spyod baspyad par bgyi'o// khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong
95a3: gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gi bu yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung bsten par rdzogs par mdzad nas pad mdod stug po can du ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas mnyan yod gang na bder rgyu zhing gshegs te/ rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang
95a4: mnyan yod byon nas mnyan yod naHla bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mogo ni mad pas sbyin ci kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bsten par rdzogs te lo bcu lon nas dgra bcom po thobaste rnam par grol ba 'daga' ba dang bde banyams su myong nas 'di snyam du
95a5: sems te/ sngon bdag khyim par gyur pa na pha dang ma la rab tu byung nas blta bar bya'o zhes khas blangs pa yod kyis/ mal bdag gis khas blangs pa de mthar dbyung ngo snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom
95a6: ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa sngon bdag khyim par gyur phan pa dang ma la blta bar gyi
95a7: 'o zhes g.yar gyis blangs pas bdag g.yar gyis blangs pa de mthar 'byin du mchi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sems khyab par mdzad cing khyab par mdzad nas thugs la mdzad cing / thugs la mdzad nas 'di
95a8: snyam du dgongs te/ rigs kyi bu yul 'khor skyong ni slar yang khyim na gnas pa 'am/ gsob/ 'jog spyod pas 'dod pa dag la longs spyod pa'i 'os ma yin no snyam du mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong khyod song
95b1: la sems can ma rgal ba rnams ni sgrol cig/ ma grol ba rnams ni grol bar gyis shig/ dbugs ma byin pa rnam pa ni dgas phyung shig/ yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las zlos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom
95b2: ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste yid rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs
95b3: bgos srung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms spyad nas zas kyi bya ba byas te zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms las slar log nas gnas mal ji ltar spyad pa ma'os su pa bte lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs
95b4: nas par mdzod stug po can gang na ba der song ste/ rim gyis spyad pa spyod cing rgyub napang mdzod stug po can du phyin nas/ bang mdzod stug po can gyi bang mdzod stug pa'i tshul du 'dug go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das
95b5: nas sngo dro sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ba mdzod stug po can du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/ de rim gyis bang mdzod stug po can nas bsod snyoms la rgyub na rang gi khyim gangan ba der song nas/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phabar
95b6: sgo'i khyams ni skyes pa sgra mkhan gyis sgra dang kha spu 'chos pa na/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong sgo drung na 'dug pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang kha zer bar byed de/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'on dag gis kho bo'i rigs kyi rgyun bcad de
95b7: 'o ni dag gis kho bo'i bu gcig sdug pa yid du 'ong ba bzod pa mi mthun pa med pa yul 'khor skyong rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas na/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'o ni rnams la su zhig bsod snyoms sbyin par bya bar sems/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yal
95b8: 'khor skyong gis rang gi khyi ma nas rgyag ga ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang mthob/ bskrad kyang ma bskrad pa dang myur ba myur bar phyir byung ngo // de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi bran mo nan mo zhig zan dron rul ba zhag lon bzhig dong ba'i phyir
96a1: thogs te sgor phyung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bran mo rgan mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// sri mo gal te zan dron rul pa zhig lon pa zhig 'dor ba yin na kho bos bzas lhung
96a2: bzed 'dir chug shig/ 'phags pa gsol cig/ de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo des zan dron rul ba zhag lon pa lhung bzed du 'jug pa na tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / bzhin dang / sna dang / smra dgas sa dag gi mtshan ma shin du legs par bzung nas 'di
96a3: skad ces kyang smras so/ / rje'i sas yul 'khor sbyor lags sam sring mo kho bo skya bo dag gis de ltar shes so// de nas sngon gyi bran mo rgan mo de rings pa des rje tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi tha gang na ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyor gi pha la 'di
96a4: skad ces smras so/ / jo bo mkhyen par mdzod cig/ sras yul 'khor sbyor bad mdzod stug po can dbyon nas ring mo zhig lags na nyid kyi khab tu ni byon mi bzhed do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas lag pa g.yon pas sgra bsdus nas ras yug gcig gi slad
96a5: g.yogs bgos bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gang na ba der sor ba dang / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong rtsig drung zhig tu 'dug nas zan dron rul ba zhag lon pa za bar byed pa dang / de na tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyod la 'di skad ces
96a6: sbas so/ / yul 'khor skyor khyod bang mdzod stug po can da byin nas ring mo zhig lon na ci'i phyi re rang gi khyim du 'jug par mi 'dod/ zan dron rul bzhag lon pa khyod kyi bri bar yang ji ltar 'gro rab tub/ khyim bdag khyod kyi khyim du 'ongs na rgyagag ma gtogs pa sbyin pa yang mthob
96a7: bskrad kyang ma bskrad pa dang myur ba myur bar byung ngo / / pu yul 'khor skyor yin par kho bos mi shes mod/ gal te kho bos shes na de skad mi smra ba zhig/ bu yul 'khor skyong bzod par gsol lo// khyim bdag bzod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pas tshe dang
96a8: ldan pa yul 'khor skyor la yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud pa byas nas rang gi khyim du stan bshams pa nyid la 'ug tu bcug go/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi phas yul 'khor skyong gi ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bu yul 'khor sbyor yun ring zhig lon
96b1: nas khyim du 'ongs kyis/ kye re shig khyod bdag nyid kyis snod du tshos la sta gon gyis shig dang de la bu yul 'khor skyong longs spyod par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mas rang nyid kyis snod du bcos nas sta gon byas so// de nas me zhig
96b2: gis tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi mdun du gser gyi phung po chen po gal te mi gcig pha rol na 'greng na mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug pa mi mthong la/ mi gcig tshu rol na 'dug na gcig pha rol na 'greng ba mi mthong ba spungs so// tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyor
96b3: gims tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ / bu yul 'khor skyong khyod kyi ma la bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi nor dang / bud med kyi bag rdzongs dang / bud med kyi khud pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa yang 'di skad cig yod do// gzhan yang khyod kyi
96b4: pa'i ni mtshan mas thebs pa'i gser dang sa le sgyu ma yang brgya phrag du ma dang / stong phrag du ma dang / brgya stong phrag du ma yod na phal gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bu yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod cig/ sbyin pa dag kyang thong
96b5: shig/ bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig/ khyim bdag gi chung ma khyod gal te kho bo'i tshig la dad pas mnyan par bya bar sems palta na/ bdag gis gdams shing rjes su bstan to// bu yul 'khor skyong gdams ngag stsol cig/ bu yul 'khor skyong rjes su ston
96b6: cig dang / khyod kyi tshi ga la bdag dad pas mnyan par bgyi'o snyam du se mas so// khyim bdag gi chung mtshur khyod kyis sha ni'i ras skye sar par byos la/ gser dang sa la sbram gyis khong ste shing rta'i nang du chug la chu bo gang gA'i rgyun shugs drag cing gtir zab pa gang na
96b7: yod pa der 'or cig/ gzhi las khyod kyi mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams skye bar gyur ta re/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi ma 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis de lta bu'i bya bas kyang bu yul
96b8: 'khor skyong bzlog par bya ba ma rus so snyam mo/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul kho sbyong gi mas mna' ma la bcol ba/ kye bag sar re shig ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / de rnams kyis byugs pa dang / gos rnams bskon pa dang /
97a1: rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / 'dug pa rnams kyis bdugs pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba gyi la bu yul 'khod spyod de sngon khyim par gyur pa na dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis brus
97a2: dang / dri rnams kyis byug pa dang / gos rnams kyis bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtor ba gyi sa la Ta yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs la 'di skad ces/ gang gi slad du rje'i sras
97a3: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa snyi'i mo TI ni/ ces kyang smros shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi sngon gyi chung mas ji lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams kyis bkrus pa dang / dri rnams kyis byugs pa dang /
97a4: gos rnams bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / skye ma rnams kyis gtor ba tshed na sul 'apo myong sngon khyim par gyur pa na dga' ba dang yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mnye ba rnams kyis mnyes pa dang / khrus rnams
97a5: kyis khrus dang / dri rnams kyis byug pa dang / gos rnams kyis bskon pa dang / rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa dang / bdug pa rnams kyis bdug pa dang / phye ma rnams kyis gtong ba byas nas tshe ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces smras
97a6: so/ / rje'i sras gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyad pa spyod pa lha'i bu mo de ji lta bu zhig lags/ sring mo kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa ni lha'i bu mo'i tshod du ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis sngon gyi chung ma la
97a7: sring mo zhes tshig tu smras pas brgyal nas sa la 'gyel to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang ma la smras pa/ yab yum gal te kha zas btang ba lags na ci mi sbal tam/ btang snyoms su bzhag ste ci thob tsam lags sam/ bu yul 'khor skyor
97a8: longs spyod cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi pha dang mas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/ rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba
97b1: ngag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas so/ / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis zos nas lag pa bkrus te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor/
97b2: slong gis deng tshe tshigs su babaded smras pa/ ltos shig lus ni nor bu dang // rna rgyan gyisan pas byas pa 'ang // nad dang sru ba'i chos canate// brtan par gnas pa yod ma yin// sgra yi lan bu brgyad bltas shing // mig ni mig sman gyis bslus pa 'ang// byis
97b3: barmongs par byed nus kyi/ / pha rol tshal ba ma yin no// dri rnams kyis ni lus bslus la// rkang pa btsag gis byugs pa yang / byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi// pha rol tshal ba ma yin no// mig sman gsar kyis bas byas shing // dul ba'i lus ni brgyan
97b4: pa yang / / byis pa rmongs par byed nus kyi// pha rol tshol ba ma yin no// ri dgas 'tshor bas snyi btsugs nas// ri dgas gzung bar ma nus ltar// rngon pa'o dod 'bod bcug la// zos nas gnas su 'gro bar bya// de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis pha dang ma/
97b5: la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzer bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bar mdzod stug po can gang na
97b6: ba der so de ste phyin nas ba ru ra'i shing zhig gi drung du nyin par gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dug go/ de'i tshe rgyal po kau rab bya tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi snyan pa yang sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur
97b7: nam zhig na gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phyen bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam mo/ / de nas rgyal po kau ra ba byas tshal srung ba'i mi la bsgo ba/ kri'i nang rje khyod song la myur du bar mdzod stug po can gyi tshal phyag dar byos shig/ sad de darang
97b8: bskyed mos tshal gyi sar 'gro'o/ / lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes skyes pa des rgyal po kau rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas bad mdzod stug po can gyi tshal thams cad phyag dar byed pa na/ mi des tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong ba ru ri'i shing zhig gi drung na nyin par gnas par
98a1: bya ba'i phyir 'dug pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po kau ri bya gang gi snyan pa yang dang yang du sgrogs shing gnas te/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na gal
98a2: te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni 'di yin te/ bad mdzod stug po can gyi 'di lta bu zhig tu phyin gyis/ ma la bdag gis rgyal po ko rab bya la spad par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas
98a3: skyes pa des rgyal po kau rab bya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas rgyal po ko rab bya la 'di skad ces smra so/ / lha gang gi snyan pa yang dang ya da du sgrogs shing bzhugs la/ nam zhig na bdag shes ldan yul 'khor skyong mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur/ nam zhig na
98a4: gal te zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir skabs phye na bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'gyur snyam pa'i shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de ni de lags te/ bang mdzod stug po can gyis 'di ltar bu zhig tu mchis lags te/ lha de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol
98a5: de nas rgyal po kau ra ba byas mi gzhan zhig la bsgo ba/ kwa'i nang rje tshur bzhon pa bzang po myur du sngogs shig/ de la bzhon nas deng kho na shes ldan yul 'khor skyong blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o// lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes mi des rgyal po kau rab bya'i ltar mnyan nas
98a6: bzhon pa bzang po myur du bsdogs te/ rgyal po kau rab bya gang na be der song nas phyin pa dang / rgyal po kau rab bya la 'di skad ces smras so// lha brtsis pa bzang po bsdogs lags te/ lha de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas rgyal po kau rab bya bzho//
98a7: pabazang ngol bzhon nas bang mdzod stug po can nas byung te/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song nas/ de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song ste/ bzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas
98a8: kun dga' bar zhugs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po ko rab byargyang ring po kho nanas 'ongs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di ska ces smras so// rgyal po chen pa rgyal po chen po byon pa legs so tshur spyon/ rgyal po chen po khyod nyid kyi la
98b1: lags pas bzhed na bdag kyang stan lag yar drongs shig/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag gi yul lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang yul 'khor skyong gis bdag stan lagayar drang bar 'tshal lo// rgyal po chen po gad na mchis kyis gal te bzhed na bzhugs shig/
98b2: de nas rgyal po kor ba bye tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po ko rab byas tshe dang bla ba yo
98b3: skyong la 'di skad ces smras so/ / shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gal te rigs dman pa 'am/ longs spyod rnams yongs su zad pa'am/ gtugs par gyur na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung /
98b4: ba yod na/ bdag cag rigs ni kaur ba bya yin la/ longs spyod ni rgya che ba yin gyis/ 'di ltar kho bos shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la longs spyod kyi skal pa dag las bgo bsha' byas/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong tshur khyod 'dug la 'dod pa dag la yang yongs su spyod
98b5: cig/ sbyin pa dgazong shig/ bsod nams dag kyis shig/ rgyal po chen po che ma lags pa'i 'gron du 'bod pas bdag 'gron du 'bod kyi 'tsham pas ni ma lags so// khyod lta bus bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu mkhas pa 'di lta bu'i 'gron du 'bod pas 'gron du yang ma
98b6: 'bod cig/ bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong dang 'tsham pa'i 'gron du 'bod pas 'gron du 'bod pa ji lta bu zhig lags/ rgyal po chen po tshur spyon/ khyod kyis 'di skad ces kye yul 'khor skyong kho bo'i yul 'byor cing gnod pa med pa/ sngo ba med cing
98b7: 'tshe ba med la slong ba po'i bsod snyoms rnyed sla ba yin gyis/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong bar mdzod stug pa can 'dir gnos shig dang / bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong chos bzhin gyis bsrung ba dang / bskyob pa dang / sba ba bya'o zhes bgyi ba
98b8: lags na/ rgyal po chen po sems mngon par dad pa gang lags pa de tsam gyis bgyis lags te 'tshal lo// gzhan yang gal te zhus pa lung bstan pa'i phyir gabs phyen shes ldan yul 'khor skyong la bdag zhulags so// rgyal po chen po gsung ba'i//
99a1: thos nas khyod la rig par bgyi'o// kye yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni yongs su nyams pa lags te/ de dag gis yongs su nyams pa'i rigs kyi bu dag sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas kyis
99a2: med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga bas yongs su nyams pa dang / nad kyis yongs su nyams pa dang / nye dus yongs su nyams pa dang / longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa'o// kye yul 'khor skyong rga bas yongs su nyams
99a3: pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu rgas 'khogs gtugs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni bdag nas 'khogs gtugs pas bdag gis re shig 'dod pa dag ze dog kyang longs spyad par sla ba ma yin na mi bdog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la
99a4: bdag skra dang kha spu bregs la gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas/ de rga ba'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas sgo dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag
99a5: pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byang ste/ 'di ni rke ba'i yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ga ba'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na skra dang kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim
99a6: nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa/ skra/ gnag pa/ na tshod dar la bab pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gang gi tshe rtse mo dang / dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / tsha ba dang / brgyan ze'i gnas la brtson pa dang ldan
99a7: pas gnas par bya ba de'i tshe nye du rnams mchims brnangs shing du bzhin dang bcas pas ma rangs bzhin sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mthong
99a8: bos rtogs nas sgra dang 'a hUM bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de la ni 'azos rangs pa ma yin tam bzod do// kye shes ldan yul 'khor skyong nad kyis yongs su nyams pa gau she na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu
99b1: na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs tsha bar gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni na ba sdug bsngal ba nad tshabs che bas bdag gise re shig 'dod pa dag bdog kyang longs spyod par sla ba ma yin na mi bodog na lta smos kyang ci dgos/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas
99b2: gos ngur smrig bgos nas shes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bgod sa bzhin du'o/ / de nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni nad
99b3: kyis yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ / shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni nad kyis yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na sgra dang la spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o
99b4: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gnod pa med 'i na med pa'i bzhin na dang / ran par 'ju bi'i drod dang ldan pa ste/ ha cang bsil ba ma yin pa dang / ha cang tsha ba ma yin pa dang / khams snyoms pas gnod pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyis zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang /
99b5: 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju bar 'gyur na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong de la ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do// kye yul 'khor skyong
99b6: nye rus yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i nye du rnams rabs chang nye du rnams kha dag nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nye du rnams rabs chang nye du rnams kha dag pas ma la bdag sgra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung bar bya'o
99b7: zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nye du'i yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas sgra dang kha spu bregs te zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni nye dus yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'o// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni
99b8: nyi dub yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pa ma yin na skra dang kha spu bregs nas gong ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong gi nye ru ni ko ra ba bya'i rigs nas bzung ste brgyud pos
100a1: mdzod stug po can 'di nyid ra rgyas par yod na/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mthong zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin te mi bzod do// kye yul 'khor skyong
100a2: longs spyod kyis yongs su nyams pa gang zhe na/ 'di la rigs kyi bu'i longs spyo srabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi longs spyod ni srabs pa dang / yongs su zad pa dang / gtugs par gyur
100a3: gyis/ ma la bdag skra dang kha spu bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// de longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs sunyams pas bla da spa bregs nas zhes bya ba nas rab tu 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// 'di ni longs spyod kyis yongs
100a4: su nyams pa zhes bya'o/ / shes ldan yul 'khor skyong ni longs spyod yongs su nyams pas yongs su nyams pas ma yin ne zhes bya ba nas rab tu byung zhes byaba'i bang gong ma shin to/ na yul 'khor skyong ni bang mdzod stug po can 'di ni rigs mchog dang rigs bzang po yin
100a5: pas 'di lta ste longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ 'di la shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci zhig shes mthong thos rtogs nas sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos drar smrig pags nas dad pa yang dag bapo nas kyim na khyer med par rab tu byung / de la ni kho bo rangs pa ma yin ta mi bzod
100a6: do/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des yid 'byung ba'i lam du gsungs te/ yid 'byung ba de dag gis yid byung nas rigs kyi bu rnams sgra dang kha spu bregs
100a7: tegos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyi ma med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rgabs nye bar khrid pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad
100a8: bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin/ 'jig rten 'di na doms mi shes te sred pas 'khol bas chog mi shes pa yin par bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim
100b1: med par rab tu byung ngo / / bdag gis po dor bsdus te gsungs shing rnam par mi phye ba 'di'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis don de nyid ci nas bdag gis shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis mdor bsdus te
100b2: gsungs shing rnam par mi phye ba 'di'i don rgyas par 'tshal bar 'gyur bar rgyas par bshad du gsol/ shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rga bas nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa de shes ldan
100b3: yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe khyod lo nyi shu 'am lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa nan tshod kyis
100b4: gzhon nu thor bu la tse la bab pa/ sgra gnag pa nyam rtsal bdo ba dang ldan pa de dang da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste tshe'am/ kha dog gam/ stobs sam/ shugs sam/ sma dang kas sam/ srid du'am/ sboms su mnyam zhing mtshungs par mthong ngam/ kye yul
100b5: 'khor skyong gang gi tshe bdag lo nyi shu'am lo nyi shu rtsa lnga lon par gyur pa nan tshod kyis gzhon nu thor bu lang tso la bab pa/ sgra gnag pa/ nyam rgyal bod ba dang ldan pa de dang da ltar gyi lus su 'di lta ste tshe'am/ kha dog ga pa/ stobs sam/ shugs sam/
100b6: srid du'am/ sboms su 'am/ sma dngags su mnyam zhing mtshungs par ma mthong ste/ da ni bdag ni tshod kyis lo brgyad bcu lon pas rgas 'khogs gtugs te bar 'ga' bdag 'dug pa dang lang ba yang gzhan gyis bya dgos so// rgyal po chen po bcom
100b7: l dan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen ning gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di thams cad ni rgabs nye bar khrid pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs
100b8: nas sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do/ / shes lngan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// gang yang shes
101a1: ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsung ba bdag la ni bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gad pa dang / skra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang
101a2: 'dug skyong ma khan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta t+ya dang / shing rta ba dang / ba shan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / 'dral bu dang / gor longs bgyid pa dang / brog len pa rnams dang / rgyal po'i budapa' btul pong pa/ rab tu gdon chen po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag
101a3: bdag go gshed ma phyir rgol ba mi mdza' ba dag mchis pa slar 'joms par bgyid pa mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med pas skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsung bde shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis
101a4: cilas dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal ba chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid 'dris khyed kyis je ltar yod pa de bzhin du lan ci shig/ rgyal po chen pa de ltar khyod la lus kyis gnod pa 'ga' bachis sam/ gyo yul 'khor skyong bdag la mchis ted ltar rlung gis rgyab tu gdod do/ byas
101a5: po che po gang gi tshe rlung gis rgyab tu gnod par byu da'i tshe bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa dang / ban gad pa dang / sgra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dul skyod mkhan dang / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rtan+ya dang / shing rta pa dang / ba shan thogs dang / gzhu 'dzin dang /
101a6: 'drol bu dang / go re long byed pa dang / bro ga len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ rab tu gnon chen po che chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/ bdag la skyes shing byung ba'i sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tshab mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams tshems shig ces
101a7: bgyis na 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so// gang gi tshe rlung gis bdag gi rgyab tu gnod par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang / bzhad gang pa dang / sgra mkhan dang / khrus mkhan dang / 'dral spyod mkhan dang / glang po che'i
101a8: gaN gan pa dang / rgyu dang// pa dang / rkan thogs dang / klu khro dag / 'drol bu dang / gor long bgyid pa dang / tho ga len pa dang / rgyam po'i bu dpa' ba/ thul phong ba/ rab tu gnon can pa ma chen po dang ldan pa gang dag yin pa tshur/ bdag la byung zhing skyes pa'i sdug bsngal ba/
101b1: po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams tshems shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub kyi/ de'i tshe ba dag 'ba' zhig sdug bsngal drag po rtsub pa tsha ba mi bzod pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong ngo // rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
101b2: p a yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni rjes su 'gro ba med de skyabs med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas sgra dang kha spu brags nas gos ngur smrig bgos
101b3: da pa yang ga pa 'odas kyis nas kyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de ba ni bdag rangs te yod do// shes ldan yul 'khor myong gang la ras te tshad padas bdag gakyang ngas te ma dang // gang mang gis ldan pam kyang di na ces 'ji da nga
101b4: ni thams cad bor nas 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong bdag cag la bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa dang zhes bya ba nas/ rgyal po'i bu rnams mchis te zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// gang dag
101b5: bdag mchis na rjes bzhin 'brang la/ 'greng na 'grang ba dang / nyal na zhugs tshe bgyid pa dag mchis na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyod 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de shes ldan yul
101b6: 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa/ skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/
101b7: skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mong 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las byed pa zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu dag tshur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang dag 'jig
101b8: rtertorten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro ba'i phyi bzhin shog shige ces bgyis na 'grub bam/ kye yul 'khor skyong ma lags so// kye yul 'khor skyong gang gi tshe skye bo mang po la mi sdug pa skye bo mang po mi 'dod pa/ skye bo mang po mi dga' ba/ skye bo mang po'i
102a1: yid du mi 'ong ba 'jig rten thams cad kyi thun mo 'di lta ste/ 'chi ba zhes bya ba'i chos de 'ongs par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gi bu dang / chung ma dang / bran dang / las bgyid pa rnams dang zhes bya ba nas rgyal po'i bu'i bar gang dag yin pa tshur zhes bya ba'i bar
102a2: du'o/ / bdag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du miche ba'i phyi bzhin shog shig ces bgyis kyang mi 'grub ste/ bdag 'ba' zhig 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mi che bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
102a3: r dzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen cing gzigs pa des 'di las dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni thams cad bor te 'gro bar 'gyur bas bdog pa med pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag
102a4: pa kho nas khyam nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gang yang 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi shes shing srid pas bkol bas
102a5: chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa/ kye yul 'khor skyong ba dag sgra ngan rgyas pa 'di nyid la yongs su spyod cing btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / pad mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su longs spyod na/ 'on kyang shes ldan yul 'khor skyong 'di skad ces 'jig rten 'di ni ngoms mi
102a6: shes shing sred pas bkol bas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs pa de shes ldan yul 'khor skyong gis ci las dgongs te gsungs/ rgyal po chen po de'i phyir khyod nyid la dris khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ khyod 'di na sgra
102a7: ngan byas pa la yongs su spyod cing btsun mo mang po dang / mdzod dang / bad mdzod rgyas pa la yongs su spyod pa las shar phyogs nas me yid gzugs pa/ yid ches pa/ btan po// 'jig rten la me sru bzhig 'ongs nas de 'di skad ces lha bdag shar phyogs nas 'dir micha ba na den bdag
102a8: gis sdong ba 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bad pa dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang me mang po sa rab sug ba dag cig mthong ste/ lha sdong ba dang/ 'di lta bu'i dpung dang / 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di ga bu'i bzhon pas rba ba rbangs te gzhom pa dang / tsham sa nas nam du da/ dpang rung nas sman/
102b1: rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems kyad pa 'desam shing drangs nas bcom sternal du 'god dpa/ khyod ldengs de dag 'dod dpa/ kye yul 'khor skyong gal te bdag gis ljong sa de dag 'di lta bu'i dbyig dang / 'di lta bu'i dbang dang / 'di lta bu'i bzhon pas dram drang ba dang /
102b2: dra ba drangs nas choms pa dang / bcom nas rnal du dgod du rung bar shes na/ sdongs de dag tu dram drang ni dram drangs nas bcom la/ btsam nas rnal du dgod do// bdag ljongs de dag kyang 'tshal lo//
102b3: 'dus ba zhin/ bam po sum bcun lnga pa/ rnal ba chen pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa des delas dgongs nas 'jig rten 'di ni dmas mi shes shing med pas bkol
102b4: pas chog mi shes pa yin no zhes gsungs gde bdag gis shes mthong thos rtogs nas skra dang bsde brags nas gos dur smrig dgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ de la ni bdag rangs te bzod do// shes ldan yul 'khor stong
102b5: khyod gang la rangs te bzod pa de la bdag kyang rangs te bzod do/ / tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis de skad ces smras nas gnas brtan dgra btsem pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jig rten dag na nor dang ldan pa'i mi// de dag chags dang bcas pas sogs byed cing /
