102b6: nor rnams rnyed nas gtong bar mi byed la// phyir zhing 'dod pa don du gnyer ba mthong // mi dbang rgya mtsho mtha' yis gtugs pa'i sa// thag bcug bcom ste cham du phab nas ni// rgya mtsho tshun cad kyis kyang michog ste// chags pas pha rol don du gnyer bar 'bad// mi dbang
102b7: de bzhin mi gzhan mde bo dag/ yongs su bzung la ngoms pa yod min pas// cho ga mi shes pas rang gi lus bor te// sred dang ma bral bar ni 'chi bar 'gyur// srog ni ther zug ma yin tshe thung ste// rga bas gzir ba la ni skyabs yod min// 'chi ba la ni nor rjes
102b8: 'brang mi 'gyur/ / nye du ma yin grogs min bu ma yin// spun dang sring mo de bzhin grogs kun dang // snying du sdug pa'i tshogs ni 'dus nas ni// kye ma kyi hud 'di ni lhar gyur ces// skra bshig mchi ma can gyi gdong gis ru// de ni ras kyis dkris te phyung nas/
103a1: ni// me spar nas ni de nas sreg par byed// rang gi las kyis sems can de khrid nas// de yi nor rnams bgo skal spyod pas phrogs// 'di ni skye ba na yang gcig pu skye// 'chi ba na yang gcig bu 'chi 'gyur zhing // gcig pus sdug bsngal
103a2: nyams su 'dir myong 'gyur/ / skye bo 'khor bar grogs yod ma yin no// phyug po 'am yang ni bkres pa'am brtan po 'am// bus pa de bzhin gnyis kas reg myong na// brtan po de yis nams kyang g.yos mi 'gyur// bus pa bus pa yin phyir rtag tu g.yo// blo chud/
103a3: min khas rjes su slob byed cid/ de nas las rnam gsum po byed 'gyur zhing // mngal dang 'jig rten pha rol 'gro bar 'gyur// kho na dang rjes 'brel sdug bsngal las mi 'grol// shes rab nor rnams kun gyi mchog tu gsungs// de yis bdag nyid shes pas bdag nyid rig/
103a4: srid dang srid min bdag nyid ma rtogs pas/ blun po sdig pa'i las rnams byed pa yin// phran tshegs thabs sam yang na chos min pa'am// mthu yis gzhan dag yis ni gang 'phrog pa// nyes byas las byed 'khor ba la brten nas// nyid tor brgyud pas grol bar 'gyur ma yin// ji
103a5: ltar rkun po khyim 'bigs bzung nas ni/ / sdig pa'i las can rang gi las kyis bcom// de bzhin skye dgu nyes byed 'di dang ni// 'jig rten pha rol rang gi las kyis btsem// shing las shing tog bzhin du mi rnams ni// gzhan dang bar ba rgan po rnams kyang ltung // 'dod pa sna tshogs
103a6: sdug cing yid 'ong ba/ / rang bzhin de lta bu yis sems rab 'joms// 'dod pa rnams kyis 'di 'ching chags par 'gyur// 'dod pa yod na khon dang 'jigs pa skye// de lta sa rgyal po 'di nas rab byung ste// dge sbyong nyid ni nyams pa med mchog yin// de nas rgyal po kau rab
103a7: byatshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis smras pa la mngon par dga' ste/ yi rang nas nad pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te stan las langs nas song // bcom ldan 'das glang po che grong rdal du byon pa dang / bram pa zhig gis bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum u0f7f/
103a8: rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe pyad bzang po brgyad banus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi mo stong pas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang bde rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
103b1: sngar song nas tshigs su bcad pas bstod par brtsams pa/ gser gyi mdog can mig tu sdug pa dang // dga' ba'i 'byung gnas yon tan kun dang ldan// mi 'dral kha lo sgyur ba lha yi lha// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol byon pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
103b2: 'dzum pa mdzad do/ / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa na zhes bya ba nas/ mdzod spur nub par gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar ba byas
103b3: nas zhus pa/ kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi// zhes bya ba nas kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par
103b4: 'dzum pa mi mdzad do/ / kun dga' bo khyod kyis bram ze de bzhin gshegs pa la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa gang yin pa mthong dam/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bskal pa nyi shur log par ltud par 'gro bar mi 'gyur te
103b5: 'on kyang lha dang mi rnams su nying mtshams sbyor cing 'khor nas srid pa phyi ma dang / skye gnas phyi ma dang / lus phyi ma dang / bdag gi ngo bo thob pa phyi ma la rang sangs rgyas bstod 'os zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams
103b6: cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bram ze 'dis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
103b7: pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang ngal tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas/ ngas grong mchog lnga byin pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang bshad do// dge slong dag sngon gyu ba paR+Sha Na se
103b8: grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba'i 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gad ba la rgyal srid byed tu 'jug ste/ de lhag par stan dngags la dga' bar gyur
104a1: DU / sIn zlas ba skad dang gas ma 'an gagan zhig yod pa de la bram tho mos smras pa/ bram ze zang pa'i dus labab kyis rgyal po de'i spya sngar mod pa rjes su bathun pa'i legs par smra ba 'ga' byas dang / gal ken grang ba'i skyabs cung zad pa
104a2: par 'gyur ro/ / de so ba las ji tsaman rgyal po glang po che la zhon nas byung ngo // bram ze des bsams pa/ ci bdag gis rgyal po la bstod dam/ 'on te glang po che dam pa la snyam pa las de 'di snyam dri sems te/ glang po chadas pa 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis sdug/
104a3: cing yid dra nga ba yin la rgyal po la mi khyad par du yin pas/ shig glang po che dam pa mngon par bstod par bya'o snyam nas des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sa srang bra yi l+r-is kyi ga tsugs ltar// mtshan mchog ldan pa'i gzugs ni bran sus tshogs/ mdog dang /
104a4: tshad kyis lus kyi gzugs legs pa// glang can dbang po bkra shis rab tu bsngags// de nas rgyal po mngon par dga' nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ kho bo'i glang chen sdug cing yid 'ong ba// mi rnams mig 'phrogs dga' ba skyer ba gang // del khyod kyis
104a5: bstod pa'i tshig smras kyis/ / khyod la brong gi mchog ni lnga sbyin no// dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus kyis glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni ra nyid yin no/ 'i bris kyi tha theg yi ba don dam ze di nyid yi te dan yang ngal 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bsted pas das 'di
104a6: lagrod mchogs byin no/ / da ltar yang dal 'dis tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis bstod pas ras yang 'di rang byang chub tu lung bstan to// gro babyer chen por gshegs nas grong khyer chen por sangs rgyas bzhi'i gad na zhes bya ba'i bar rgyas par gong ma bzhin dudo//
104a7: pral sug na gshegs pa dang yul sug nan bram ze dbang po zhes bya ba gzugs dang lang co dang / thos pas rgyags par thur nas bdag dang dra ba ni 'ag yang yod pa ma yin no zhes sgrogs shi rnam par spogs so/ ma ldan nas bya gas gan zhen domo gi dge 'dran
104a8: bya grang ba gdan pagams pa nyid la 'thugs te thos bad do/ / thab ze dbang po zhes byabs dge sbyong go tam phul sug nang byon zhes zas nas de 'di snyam nges pas te/ dge spyong gtam gzugs papar ba sangs pa bstan drug pags sa kyas/ bdag
104b1: las lag par gzugs bzang ba len nas/ khon te ma yin sbyir 'gro bo snyam nas dbyung ba dang / ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das skye skyes pa chen po'i mtshan sum bcun gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ dzod
104b2: 'dom gang gis brgyan pa 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni bdag pas gzugs lhag par bzang mod kyi/ tshad ni lhag par ring ba ni ma yin no/
104b3: snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gtsug tor blta bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na ma mthong nas de phyogs shin tu mtho ba zhig la 'dzegs na 'on kyang ma mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze dbang po la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze nyon mongs kyis bor shig/
104b4: gal te ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzegs te bltas kyang 'on kyang ches nyon mongs su zad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor ni mthong bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang khyod kyis lha dang lha ma yin du bcas par 'gro bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gtsug
104b5: tor mi mthong ngo do/ / zhes mthos sam/ 'on kyang gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i tshad mthong bar 'dod na khyod kyi khyim ne ma'i sbyin sreg byed pa'i 'og na tsan da nas mchog las byas pa'i mchod sdod nyid yod kyis de phyung la gzhol cig dang / de bzhin
104b6: gshegs pa'i ya ba dang yum las lablangs pa'i sku'i tshad na da yin no/ / bram ze dbang pos bsams pa/ de yang ngo mtshar zhig sta bdag gis lan 'ga' yang ma thos na song ste blta'o snyam nas/ de rings pa rings par song nas me'i sbyin bsreg
104b7: byed pa'i thab kyi 'og tu brko par brtsams pa las de thams cad du de bzhin du gyur to/ / de mngon par dad par gyur nas bsams pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa yin gyis sor la bsnyen srur bya'o snyam na sa de dad pa skyes te com ldan
104b8: 'das gangan ba der song nas byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te phyogs gcig du 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan/
105a1: 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas zhes bya ba nas thog pa mang ci'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs
105a2: pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen drug r+b+ha /
105a3: xxx/ xxx
105a4: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis can danas mchog gi mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze gnang gis song la shams shig/ de nas desas phyogs dben
105a5: skabs yod pashig tu rimatho chen pos mchod sdong de bsgrengs nas dus mchod chen po bshams so/ / bram ze dang byim bdag bzhan dag gis kyang rten dge bar gyur cig ces bya bar rig nas/ d+ha ku sha btags te bram ze dbang pos mchod sdong gi dus mchod bshams pas na
105a6: dbang po'i dus mchod ces bya bar grags so/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du tshe 'phrul chen po bstan pas mu stegs can rnams ni spa bkongs/ lha dang mi rnams ni dga' bar mdzad/ skye bo dam pa rnams ni yid rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe mu stegs can
105a7: rnams bros nas mtha' 'khob tu gnas shing kha cig ni bram ze'i grong zhes bya bar dong nas gnas so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das ko sa la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa ni bram ze'i grong du gshegs so// mu stegs can rnams kyis ni dge slong gau ta ma 'ong ngo zhes thos so//
105a8: thos nas kyang rings pa nges par bras ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim dro da ste lpags nas smras pa/ chos thos par gyur cig// chos thob par gyur cig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags par dag ci shig// kho ba tsag gis kyid kyi bran su mtshogs pa ni
105b1: mthong gis/ ji srid chud pa ma mthong ba de'i bar du 'gro bar bya'o// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gi chud pa gang lags/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma 'khor stong nyis brgya lnga bcu dang su bri'i ser ba'i'abebs shing 'od ste/ bu dang bcas/
105b2: ba dum bu med par byed par 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe kho na bzhugs shing grogs bgyi ba la thug pa de kho na'i tshe bzhung pa ni bzang po legs te/ bdag cag rnam pa thams cad du ma rung ngo // de rnams kyis smras pa/ dam
105b3: zhig bca' ste/ gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma gsod na ni 'khod par bya'o// bzhugs shig gsang par bgyi'o zhes de rnams lag na dbyug pa dang gzhu thogs/ khu tshur bcangs/ gos bgos te byung ba dang / lam gyi dbus na shAkya rgan po zhig 'dug pas mthong
105b4: nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang du 'dod/ de rnams kyis smras pa dgrags dpa'i phyir ro// khyed cag gi dgra su yin/ dge sbyong gau ta ma'o// shes ldan dag gal te bcom ldan 'das dgra yin na byams pa gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yin/ shes ldan dag slar
105b5: log shig/ de rnams ldog tu ma btub pa dang / des bsams pa/ 'di dag ni chos bshad pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba ma yin gyi so// rnam pa thams cad du pha rol gnon pa zhig bya'o snyam nas/ des ri brags su zhugs nas me btang ba dang / ri brags kun
105b6: tshig pas ca co dang klu co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sngangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag dang dge sbyong gau ta ma ni thag ring po kho na yin gyi/ ri brags 'dir ni phur ba chen po gzhan 'di byung ste ri brags bsregs kyis me gsad kyis
105b7: slar ldog go zhes de rnams kyis gsad par brtsams pa dang / gsad par ma nus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang de nyid du byon nas bka' stsal pa/ gnas 'jog dag 'di ci byed/ bcom ldan 'das ri bregs rnams zhugs kyis tshig na dgum
105b8: bar rngo ma thog lags so/ / des gsang dam/ bcom ldan 'das dgum du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung phyung ma thag kho nar 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi ni lha'i mthus ma de zhi bar gyur to// de rnams mngon
106a1: bar dad par gyur nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig gi slad du gshegs lags/ khyed cag kho na rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de 'dra
106a2: ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de zhes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum
106a3: du byas so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa btsun pa shAkya rgan po 'dis nye du la chags pas bsod nams ma lags pa meng du bsags te ri brags bsregs
106a4: pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang gnyen la chags pas bsod nams ma yin pa mang du bsags te ri brags bsregs pa de lags par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
106a5: shig dang bshad do/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags zhig na spre'u lnga brgya'i tshogs gnas pas lo thog skyes shing skyes pa rnams chud gsan to// ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas phan tshun du gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag spre'u rnams
106a6: kyis lo thog la gnod pa byed na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ spre'u rnams gas mod// de rnams ji ltar gsar par bya/ ri brags kyi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad bcad de shing tin tu ka gcig pu zhig bzhag la nyen kor rnams tshe rams bskor
106a7: dang de ba bathar ba'i phyir spre'u rnams 'dzeg par 'gyur te/ de ltar gyur pa dang de re de rnams gsad par bya'o// de nas de rnams kyi ri brags kyi nyen kor gyi shing thams cad sa de shi tin tug gcig pu bzhag nas nyen kor rnams tsher ma'i rabs bskor te srungs pa'i ma bzhag
106a8: ras bsgob/ khyod kyis gang gi tshe spre'u na pas tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo cag la sbron cig/ de nas dus gzhan zhig na shing tin tu ka'i me tog dang 'bras bu chags te smin pa dang / spre'u rnams kyis sde dpon la smras pa/ sde dpon shing tin tug smin cing mchis
106b1: kyis gsol du gshegs so/ / de nas sde dpon 'khor lnga brgya dang shing tin tu ka de la 'dzegs te shing tin du ka bza' bar brtsams so// de nas srungs ma'i mis ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras pa/ shes ldan dag shing tin du ka la spre'u
106b2: thams cad 'dzegs nas za bar byed kyis khyed cag gi bya ba 'am byed pa gang yin pa de gyis shig/ de nas ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs lag na mda' gzhung dgra sta thogs/ khu tshur bcangs te rings par song nas shing tin du ka bcad par brtsams
106b3: pa dang / de nas spre'u de rnams bred de mchod rgal zhing shing ka phan tshun rgyu bar byed do// sde dpon ni sems las chung ngus za bar byed pa dang / spre'u de rnams kyis de la smras pa/ sde dpon bdag cag ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga ba thob cing mchis te phan tshun
106b4: du rgyu lags na/ khyod ci'i slad du thugs khral chung ngus bzhugs/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bya ba mang po'i mi rnams la// bya ba min pa'ang de dang 'dra// shing gi 'phro ni mang yod pas/ sems las bsgyangs te bza' bar gyis// de nas yang sde dpon gyi phrug
106b5: zhig ri bregs de na bcings te 'dug pa de lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na spre'u bzang po zhig phyogs der 'ongs pa dang / de sems khongs su chud pa mthong nas smras pa/ grogs po ci'i phyir lag pa 'gram
106b6: pa la gtang nas sems khongs su chung / des smras pa/ da ltar ri brags na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kho bo'i nye du gsod du dong na ci'i phyir sems khongs su chud par mi 'gyur/ ci'i phyir khyod kyis pha rol gnon pa ma byas/ bcings na ji
106b7: ltar pha rol gnon pa bya/ kho bos khyod dgrol lo zhes des de bkrol ba dang / de nas des ri bregs der me btang ste/ ri brags kun tshig pas ca co dang ku co'i sgra chen po byung ba de rnams kyis thos nas sngangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag dang spre'u rnams ni thag
106b8: ring po kho na yin gyi/ pung ba chen po gzhan 'de byung ste ri brags bsregs kyis me gsad kyis slar ldog go zhes de rnams me gsad pa'i phyir bcugs pa dang / spre'u rnams kyang shing tin duka las babs nas bros so dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ spa'u'i phru gu gang 'i
107a1: bde ni N+Da rgan po 'di nyid yin te/ don yang 'dis te dral chags pas ri brags pa sregs la da ltar yang 'dis nye dul chags pas ri brags bsregs sa// nag po'i grong khyer du gshegs nas nag po'i grong khyer du sangs rgyas bzhi'i ga na zhes bya ba
107a2: rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ / ro hi ta kar byon nas ra hi ta kan gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyi gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe gnod sbyin glang chen stobs gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi 'dun sar song ba dang / gnod sbyin blang chen stobs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
107a3: bskyed par byon nas ro hi ti ka na bdag gi gnas kho na na bzhugs zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom
107a4: ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin grang chen stobs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma gzhin du'o// de nas gnod
107a5: sbyin glang chen stobs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de mod bdag gi gnas su bzhugs par gnang bar mdzad du
107a6: gsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin grang chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas gnod sbyin grang chen stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang lnga brgya sprul te/ stan nang tshangs can dang / sngas nang tshangs can dang / gor bu lnga brgya dang / zhugs/
107a7: la di lnga brgya bshams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sad bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang
107a8: chen stobs la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas stan las langs te song nas de'i ne'u zla kha che yul gyi gnod sbyin sgra sgrogs zhes bya ba de la bsgo ba/ kho bos
107b1: sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge sog dge 'dun ga gas chod kun drangs kyis zung phyogs kyi 'bras bu rnams skar cig ces des de la pho nya btang nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsong ba'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sa gon byas nas/ nang par sngar
107b2: langs te gtsug lag khang chag chag dang phyag dar byas nas gdan bshams te nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas/ khang skyong gis gaN DI brdungs pa dang / gnod sbyin sgra sgrogs kyis rgun 'brum gyis skon pa bkang ste gnod sbyin rnams kyi lag tu bskur te/ de dag gis
107b3: gtsug lag khang gi dbus su phung por spungs te bzhag go/ dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu 'di dag ci'i yin pa dang / ji ltar brtag par bya ba mi shes nas/ de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge
107b4: slong dag byang phyogs kyi nags kyi 'bras bu rgun 'brum zhes bya ste/ mes brtag pa byos la rim shig/ dge slong rnams 'brum bu re re nas byed pa na shin du yun ring du thogs par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phung po gnyis sam
107b5: gsum du byos la mes reg par byos shig/ de nas gnod sbyin glang chen stobs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge sbyong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba nas
107b6: stan pa ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin glang chen stobs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan yang dag par 'dzin/
107b7: du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs pa dang rgun 'brum mang du lhag par gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal ba/ rgyan 'brum rnams mnyes la khu ba brim par ba'o// 'on kyang lhag
107b8: nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dro 'jar bya ste bzhag dang dge 'dun gyi dus ma yin pa'i btung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du zhabs gnyis bkrus nas gtsug lag khang du nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir zhugs so//
108a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ de ni tshe thung ngu'i dus la byung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus la bab na gdul ba'i don bya ba ni rab tu mngabs gal te de dge slong kun dga' bo dang thabs gcig tu byang phyogs su gshegs na ni gdul tha
108a2: rnams kyi don bya dka' bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la dgonod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang lhan cig gshegs par bya'o snyam nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje bos pa/ dran dang ldan rnams bzang
108a3: por shog/ dran dang ldan rnams dag tu bzang // zhi bathong ba'i sems kyis ni// dran dang ldan pa bde bar nyal// dran dang ldan rnams bzang por shog/ dran dang ldan rnams rtag tu bzang // rgyal dang pha rol rgyal spangs nas// dran dang ldan pa bde bar nyal// bar
108a4: sdom la/ spungs pa can na sangs rgyas stobs// re tu ka na chos stobs te// srin dun ni phor chen zhabs// mgo reg spyi blugs sog ma med// hu lu klu dang de bzhin nags// gnyid 'grogs drang srong nyams pa dang // kan tha 'bras kyi grong khyer du// mchog gi ma
108a5: btul dbang ldan rje/ / gser ma'i gnod sbyin chen po dang / de bzhin brtsegs skyong dga' 'phel dang // srid pa'i lha dang gtum byed kyi// bu bdun rnams ni btul ba dang // gnod sbyin phyugs skyong 'gro mgyogs dang // nab so'i klu la gzugs brnyan pa dang // sbu bu
108a6: can dang sbubs can btul/ / mdud can zhes ni grong khyer na// mdung can zhes bya'i gnod sbyin mo// 'bra go can dang rdul mchod rten// sog med tshogs su bsdus te brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje tshur dpyad
108a7: phyogs mu klu sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo / / btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu de nyid nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkhar la gshegs pad
108a8: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba bsgrengs pa dag gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis tshal sngo ning sngo ba bsgrengs bdag mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lag so// de na u sha ra'i ri
108b1: yin te/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa na zhi gnas dang rjes su 'thun pa rnams kyi gnas mal gyi mchog tam sa'i tshal zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das spangs pa can du gshegs so// de'i tshe spangs pa can
108b2: na gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs shes bya ba 'dug pa sdig pa'i bsam pa can zhig gnas pas spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis mgu bar byas kyang de dus dus su gnod pa byed do/ / spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bcom
108b3: ldan 'das spangs pa can du gshegs nas phyogs cheg mo na bzhugs so zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gongan pa dang sang ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs
108b4: cig tu 'dug pa dang spungs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng ba stod par mdzad ces bya ba nas yang
108b5: dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas spangs pa can na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs stan las langs nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal
108b6: bo sbar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa gnod srin sangs rgyas stobs 'di bdag cag la yun rid mo zhig nas ga ma chis par ni gakon ci // can tham 'gas pa ni ya/ thabagyid/ glags ma btsal bar ni glags tshol bar bgyid
108b7: lags na/ kye ba'o bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste gnad sbyin sangs rgyas stobs gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshe / nod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs
108b8: rgyas stobs la bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas stobs khyod kyis zos sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so// sangs rgyas stobs khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis thos lags so// dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log
109a1: shig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ldog lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la bzhag go/ de nas des spungs pa can zhes bya ba'i gnas mal brtsigs/
109a2: so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis kyang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa'i gtsug lag khang brtsigs so// bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang gnod sbyin sangs rgyas stobs zha 'bring du chas pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis slar bzlog nas
109a3: bka' stsal pa/ skye bo'i tshogs 'di srungs shig/ des kyang de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang ci nas spyan ldings te 'bab par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gzhan dag gis kyang phyogs der mchod rten brtsigs pas mchod rten
109a4: srungs pa can zhes bya bar grags se raM tu gar byon nas re tu kar gnod sbyin mo stobs zhes bya ba btul te/ des re tu ka zhes bya ba'i gnas mal brtsigs so// sin dur gshegs pa dang / sin du na mnyan pa gzhan zhig yod pa de bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe
109a5: 'phrul gyis dang ba bskyed de/ de nas dang bskyes nas bden pa rnams la bzhag go/ gnod sbyin por chen btul nas zhabs kyis bcags pas bor chen zhabs kyis bcags pa zhes bya bar grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das drang
109a6: srong rnams kyi bsti gnas su gshegs nas der drang srong mgo reg dang ril ba spyi blugs can btul nas bram ze rang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gnas mal ril ba spyi blugs can zhes bya ba brtsigs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
109a7: gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje klu'i rgyal po sag ma med kyi gnas gang na ba der 'dong ngo // btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang / klu'i/
109a8: rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas su gshegs so// klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyis bcom ldan 'das gnas su gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang khros 'khrugs rnga ma yid ma rengs nas steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te ser ba
109b1: dang rdul gyi char dbab par brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis klu 'khrugs so zhes byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang / char ba de dag a ga ru'i bye ma dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i bye mar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so// de nas 'khor lo dang
109b2: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mda' bo cha dang / mdung thung lo sogs te mtshon cha rnams dbab par brtsams pa de dag kyang lha'i ut+pa la dang bdam dang rba dang / par ma dkar po dang / man dA ra bar gyur nas 'bab par brtsams so// de nas sog ma med kyisadz+ra
109b3: ba'i mes dra ba dbyung bar brtsams pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyis dud pa dbyung bar brtsams so// de nas de sbyangs dang / rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal bcom par gyur nas gnas su zhugs te 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das kyig
109b4: dgongs pa/ klu gdug pa rnams 'dral bar 'gyur ba ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis te/ 'jigs pa dang / 'khrugs pas yin gyis/ ma la ngas 'di 'jigs su gzhug go snyam du thugs su chung nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje
109b5: klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'jigs par gyis shig/ de nas gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ rdo rje ri'i rtsol 'phangs nas ri'i rtse mo bshig ste lhung ba des klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas gnon par gyur to// de nas
109b6: sog ma med sngangs skrag brengs nas 'bros par brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs nas phyogs thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun du rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur to// bcom ldan
109b7: 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung na zhi zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par de gang dang gang du song ba de dang de ni ma mthong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhags gnyis la gtugs nas gsol pa
109b8: bcom ldan 'das ci bdag pa thob tsam lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rga ba'i chos can cings tho brtsams sam/ gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu dag mthob na khyod kyis de'i ming lus par byas par 'gyur ro//
110a1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag 'khor lo dang khakra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil ba dang / dra bas 'brel pa/ bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bsgrubs pa/ 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas spyi bo la reg par mdzad nas bka' stsal pa/
110a2: bzhin bzangs khyod kyis bum pa bzang po lta bu'i nyan thos chen po bzhi pazan byin te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gya nom bdag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ba las khyod kyi se smo na lam log par btab pas dud 'gro rnams su skyes// rdeg pa dang gsod pa la zhen cing pha rol gyi srog
110a3: 'phrog pa dang / pha rol gyi srog la gnod pa byed pas 'tshe bar byed na/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal ba ma gtogs par byed kyi 'gro ba ni gang shig yin skye ba ni gang zhig yin/ tshe phyi ma ni gang zhig yin/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal du gsol
110a4: bzhin bzangs tshu rang las skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams zung la/ yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs la mi 'jigs pa byin cig/ btsun pa bdag deng sman cad bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar skyabs su mchi ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mnos nas yul ma
110a5: ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la yang mi 'jigs pa stsal bar bgyi'o/ / de nas de'i chung ma dang khu mo dang / mna' ma rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la bdag cag kyang skyabs su mchi zhes pa skab pa'i gzhi rnams nod lags
110a6: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnamapa sasgrubs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams byin no// de'i bA ri bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang skyabs su mchi ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams nod lags so// sog ma med kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cagak+Sha
110a7: rnams ni mi mdza' ba mang ba lags kyis/ ri bo la skyabs su mchi ba stsal cing ba slab pa'i gzhi rnams ni mi dbog par gsol/ 'dis bdag cag bsrungs par 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la skyabs su 'gro ba byin no// de nas gnod sbyin lag no rdo rdzas
110a8: sog ma ma dgrogs po dang / gnyen mad ba dang / mdza' bshes dang btul ba 'gyur ba mthong nas yid rab tu da/ 'a bas gar byas te smras pa/ khros pas sde bskyod mgo mang bskul nas mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'babs// rang gnas skyes bu dang la phyogs pa ri ma mopo rtse sa bu
110b1: dma'i tshigs lhags de la chang dbugs pa rdzogs bzur cing la byed pa/ / sbrul bdag sog ma med de dang song bka' btsan rnams kyis btul// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sog ma med 'bor drug khri dang btul nas gdan las bzhes
110b2: gshegs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshal sngo gi spo baspangs pa dag gi gas so// gzigs nas kyang gnod sbyin laganordo rje la bka' stsal ba/ lag no rdo rje khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing rdzob pa spangs pa dag mtho dngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// 5!
110b3: na rje de ni 'che'i yul yin te/ da yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon nas dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa dge slong nyi ma'i gung zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ des klu gdug pa hu lu btul nas thabs bshams te de las
110b4: dkyil mo dkrung shor ba'i sa blangs nas la che'i yul kun du bstan pa 'jog par 'gyur ro/ / nga'i lhag mthong dang / rjes su 'thun pa'i gnas mal rnams kyi nang na 'di lta ste/ kha che'i yul mchog tu 'gyur te/ grong khyer dang / klod das drug kri dang thong rnam drug stong dang
110b5: grong rdal drug bcu rtsa gsum po 'di rnams ni kha che'i yul yin no/ / yul gnyid 'grogs su drang srong dang gnod sbyin nyams pa 'khor dang bcas pa btul lo// yul kan thar gnod sbyin mo 'khor dang bcas pa btul to// 'bras kyi grong khyer du
110b6: byen nas 'bras kyi grong khyer du rgyal po sde mchog gi ma bden pa rnams la rab tu bzhag go/ / yul dbang ldan du byon te/ dbang ldan na rdza mkhan gzhan zhig yod pa de bzos shin du rgyags te sdong rnams skams nas 'khor lo las 'gogs par
110b7: byed do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas rdza mkhan gyi cha byad du nyid mngon par sprul te de deng lhan cig gtam bya bar brtsams pa/ khyod kyis snod ci 'dra ba dag cig 'khor lo las 'bebs par byed/ des gsol pa/ bkrams
110b8: nas 'bebs so/ / de yang bsams nas 'bebs so// khyed dang bdag mnyam lags so// 'di kho nar zad dam ci/ da ni so btang nas kyang 'bebs so// khyed lhag go/ so gtod 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad do// 'o na ci zhe na/ gser dang / dngul dang bai dUH
111a1: dang / shel gyi rang bzhin du yang byed do// de mngon par dad par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdza mkhan gyi cha byad mi snang bar mdzad de rang bzhin gyi cha byad du bzhugs nas de 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas te bden pa rnams la rab tu
111a2: bkod do/ / gsing ma can gshegs nas gser ma can du gnod sbyin chen po 'khor dang bcas pa skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la rab tu bzhag go/ brtsegs skyong du klu pa lang skyong dang / dgar ba gnyis so// dga' 'phel du gshegs
111a3: nas dga' 'phel du rgyal po srid pa'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gtum byed kyi bu bdun dang / gnod sbyinas 'tsho bden bdag la rab tu bkod do// de na mtsho chen po yod pa gang yin pa de na 'gro 'gyogs dang / nab so gnyis klu'i skyes gnas skyes te lo bcu gnyis/
111a4: 'das shing steng du byung ste 'khrugs pas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la chos ma bshad pas des na bdag cag rnam par ltung ba klu'i skye gnas su skyes kyis ci nas bdag cag gis de'i bstan pa gzhig par bya'o zhes smra'o// de nas
111a5: bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ klu 'gro 'gyogs dang nab so ni 'di ltar mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de'i bstan pa thal bar blags par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas 'di yod do snyam du mkhyen
111a6: nas bcom ldan 'das klu 'gro 'gyogs dang / nan so gnyis gang na bder gshegs te byon nas 'gro mgyogs dang / nang so gnyis la bka' stsal pa/ 'gro 'gyogs dang / nabaso tshig bzhi pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba yod pa bshad kyis shes pa
111a7: byos shi ka/ btsun pa bdag cag dam pa'i chos 'tshal bar bgyid pa su zhig mchis snyam du rig nas de nyid du slar zhugs te/ de gnyis 'di snyam du sems so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ni bdag cag la chos bshad na bdag cag gis rnam par ma shes so snyam
111a8: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs der sku'i gzugs brnyan btang nas 'gro 'gyogs dang / nab so gnyis kyis de la bltas shing bltas shing bcom ldan 'das da dung bzhugs pa lta zhes slar yang dang yang du zhugs so// phyogs de nyid du bcom ldan 'das
111b1: gyis gnod sbyin mo sra bu can dang / sbubs can gnyis btul to// mdud can gyi grong khyer du gshegs so// mdung can gyi grong khyer na gnod sbyin mo mdung can zhes bya ba khro zhing gtum la gzu lums can zhig gnas pas mdung can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang kyis bdag
111b2: rnams kyi bu bcas shing btsas pa dag za bar byed do/ / mdud can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mdung can gyi grong khyer du gshegs nas phyogs che ge mo na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang tshogs nas tshogs dang
111b3: khru nas khrur phrad cing 'dus nas mdud can gyi grong khyer nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das gad na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das
111b4: kyis mdud can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas mdud can gyi grong khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim
111b5: bdag rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// /
111b6: 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po sum bcu rtsa drug pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig sad bdag cag gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal zas gsol zin nas
111b7: phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gru bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin
111b8: gdag pa de dang de rnams ni btul lags na/ btsun pa gnod sbyin mo mdud can zhes bgyi ba 'di bdag cag la yun ring mo zhig nas shi khon ma mchis par ni sha khon du bgyid/ 'gran zla ma lags par ni 'gran zla bgyid/ glags ma btsal bar ni klags tshel
112a1: par bgyid de/ byis pa bcas shing btsas pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/ gnod sbyin mo mdud can gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshe gnod sbyin mo mdung can 'khor de nyid
112a2: 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdung can la bka' stsal pa/ mdung can khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so// mdud can khyod kyis thos sam/ bde bshegs pa bdag
112a3: gis thos lags so/ / dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa de las log shig/ btsun pa dam zhig bca' ste/ gal te 'di dag bdag gi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig par bgyid na bdag ldog par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdud can gyi grong
112a4: khyer gyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag khyed kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags so// khyed cag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ bcom ldan 'das pa cig lags so// bde bar gshegs pa brtsig lags
112a5: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin mo mdud can 'khor dang bcas te btul nas gsheg so// brago can du gshegs pa dang 'bre go canan gyis brkyang dag rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis byis pa chung ngu dag rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse
112a6: ba gzigs so/ / gzigs nas kyang yang gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal ba/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis byis pa chung ngu rdul gyi mchod rten la rtse ba dag mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// lag na rdo rje nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/
112a7: lo bzhi brgya lon pa na 'dir ku sha ni'i rigs kyi rgyal po ka ni sa ka zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba des phyogs 'dir mchod de rten rtsig par 'gyur te/ de'i ming ka ni sa ka'i mchod rten zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sangs
112a8: rgyas kyi bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa ro hi ta ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar du srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang 'bum phrag bdun btul nas ro hi ta kar gshegs te gtsug lag khang du zhugs nas na dang
112b1: yang dag bzhag go/ / bcom ldan 'das dgongs ka nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dang po'i rgyal srid gdan ba der 'dod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan ba kun dga'
112b2: bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar ni 'di skad ces kun dga' bo byang phyogs su klu'i rgyal po sog ma med 'dul du 'dong ngo // byang phyogs na ni phan yon rnam pa lnga yod do// zhes gsungs la/ nga bcom ldan 'das
112b3: kyis 'di skad du kun dga' bo dang po'i rgyal srid gang na bde 'dong do/ / zhes gsungs na de ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bod gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dang thabs gcig tu byang phyogs su gshegs nas ta ma sa'i
112b4: tshal rnams lung bstan to zhes bya ba nas rdul gyi mchod rten lung bstan to zhes bya ba bar du'o/ / kun dga' bo ro hi ta ka nas klu'i rgyal po sog ma med kyi gnas kyi bar dri de bzhin gshegs pas srog chags sa ya phrag bdun dang 'bum phrag bdun
112b5: btul to/ / byang phyogs na ni nyes dmigs lnga yod do// mthon dman can dang / sdong dum dang tshor mas gang ba dang / rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo mang ba dang / khyi za ba dang // bud med gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa'o// sdom ladang /
112b6: po'i rgyal srid rta bzangs dang // bcom brlag dang ni o ta li'i// kun dga' ra ba dgra mtha' dang // tshugs par dka' dang gang gA'i chu// yi dgas dus dpog phyi ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul dpa'i sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing
112b7: gshegs pa na dang po'i rgyal srid du gshegs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bkur ba dang po rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba de ni dang po'i rgyal
112b8: po yin no/ / de'i phyir 'di dang po'i rgyal srid ces bya bar grags so// rta bzangs su gshegs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po mang pos bkur pa'i rta 'azang po'i
113a1: rin po che byung ste/ de'i phyir 'di rta bzangs zhes bya bar grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo bcom brlag gang na ba der 'dong ngo // btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang
113a2: ldan pa kur dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bcom brlag tu gshegs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po kho na zhig na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba baspangs pa dag gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa kun
113a3: dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ bran dgra' bo khyod kyis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba bsgrengs pa pagi mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lags so// kun dga' bo ni ri bo rtse mthon zhes bya ste/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang / bcom brlag nas gang
113a4: rnakhan dang dpa' bo zhes b+ha ba spun gnyis kyis de la gtsug lag khang rtsig par 'gyur te/ de'i ming gang mkhan dpa' bo zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing lhag mthong dang zhi gnas kyi rjes su 'thon pa'i gnas mal rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo bcom
113a5: brlag 'dir spos 'tsheng gi khye'u sbas pa zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'i bu nye sbas shes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi mtshan med pa zhig 'byung ba de nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lon pa dang bstan pa la rab tu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byed
113a6: par 'gyur ro/ / dge slong kun dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa nyi ma'i gung zhes bya bas nye sbas de rab tu 'byin par 'gyur te/ gdams dag ston pa rnams kyi phyi ma ni nye sbas yin par 'gyur ro// gang ma ban dpa' bo de la phug srid du khu ba ra brgyad dag/ zheng du zhu bcu gnyis pa/
113a7: 'brang du khru bdun pa zhig yod par 'gyur te/ des gang dang gang dag la gdams ngag bstan nas dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas pa de dang de rnams kyis thur ma sor bzhi tsam pa re re phug de'i nang du 'dor bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe phug de dgra bcom
113a8: pa'i thur mas gang bar gyur pa de'i tshe nye sras yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te/ de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dgra bcom pa'i thur pa de dag nyid spungs nas de rnams kyis sreg par byed do// dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas the tsom
113b1: thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pasom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa na skye bo mang po la snying brtse ba tshe dang ldan pa nye sbas lung bstan pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i tshen
113b2: ma zad ji ltar 'di 'das pa'i dus na skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yidi la zung shig dang bshad do/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bo rtse mthon 'di nyid kyi ngos gsum la rang sangs rgyas dang drang srong dang / spre'u rnams
113b3: gnas te/ ngos gcig na ri rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'o// gnyis pa la ni drang srong lnga brgya'o// gsum pa la ni spre'u lnga brgya'o// spre'u'i sde dpon gyi kun du spyod pa ni spre'u'i phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag gsod par byed pa yin no// de nas spra mo de dag phru bu'i
113b4: mya ngan gyis non pas phan tshun thos bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan spra mo dag nyon cig/ bdag cig gi phru gu btsas shing btsas pa dag sde dpon 'dis gsod par byed kyis de la thabs shig bsham par bya ste/ bdag cag las spra mo gang zhig sbrum par gyur na des sde
113b5: dpon la brjod par mi bya'o/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na spyi mo zhig sprum par gyur nas de de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu sbas nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bus bsnyod de spre'u'i phru gu byung nas de yang de rnams kyis dben pa'i phyogs shig tu bsnun gsos bskyed de/
113b6: de gang gi che chen por gyur pa de'i tshes des sde dpon de rang gi zhu nas bskrad nas ri brtse mthonan phan tshun du 'khyam par brtsams so// de 'byam pa na rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sgra thos nas de de rnams kyi drung du song ste/ gang gi tshe bag phebs par gnas par
113b7: gyur pa de'i tshe de rnams la rtsa ba dang / lo mo dang / me tog dang / 'bras ba dang // so shing dag 'bul bar byed do// de rnams kyis kyang de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do// rang sangs rgyas de rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni zos shing zos nas dkyil mo dkrug
113b8: bcas te 'dus go/ / spre'u des kyang de rnams kyi spyod lam mthong nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas shing 'dug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gi lus rnag can 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa ni/
114a1: thob zin gyis bdag cag zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'jug go snyam nas/ de nas de rnams kyis 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / char 'bebs pa dang / grogs 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i rtsa
114a2: ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/ / de rnams ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de'i tshe mi ldang nas spre'u des de rnams ma mthong bas mi dga' bar gyur to// ji tsam na spre'u de phug tu zhugs nas rang sangs rgyas de rnams
114a3: kye chos gos rnams nas gsig par brtsams so/ / de nas phug de na gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ spre'u 'dis rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis sku bshig na mi rung ngo snyam nas rdo leb chen pos sgo bcad nas dgug go// de
114a4: nas spre'u de mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / smre sngags bton te song nas ri bo rtse mthon la kun nas 'khyam pa na mi rnams 'dod pas mi dga' bar gyur te/ rna ba gtod cing mi'i sgra thos par 'dod pa las/ des drang srong de
114a5: rnams smra ba'i sgra dag thos nas/ de 'dron pa la ma ston pa bzhin du rings pa rings par de rnams kyi drung du song ngo // drang srong de dag kyang dka' thub drag pos gdung bar byed de/ kha cig ni lag pa bsgreng nas 'dug go// kha cig ni rkang pa la gcig gis
114a6: so/ / kha cig ni gdud balngas gdung bar byed do// gang gi tshe spre'u de de rnams dang lhan cig bag phebs par gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe drang srong de rnams la tsha ba dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / so shing dag sbyin par byed do// de rnams kyang de
114a7: la zas kyi lhag ma dag 'dor bar byed do/ / des de rnams kyi spyod lam dkyil dkrung bcas shing rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam ston par byed de/ de ni gang dag lag pa sprang pa de rnams kyi lag pa dag phab nas se gol gyi sgra byung te sbran nas mdun du dkyil
114a8: mo dkrung bcas te 'dug go/ / gang dag rkang pa ya gcig pa de rnams kyi rkang pa phab nas mdun du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug go// gang dag gdung ba lngas gdung bar byed pa de rnams kyi me gsad nas se gol gyi sgra phyung ste mdun du/
114b1: dkyil mo dkrung bcas nas 'dug go// de nas drang srong de rnams kyis gdams ngag 'bogs pa la smras pa/ mkhan po spre'u 'di bdag cag gi dka' thub la bar chad bgyid do zhes de rnams kyis de la rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag spre'u dedag
114b2: ni dran pa dang ldan pa yin te/ gdon mi za bar 'dis drang srong kha cig gi spyod lam de lta bu mthong gis khyad cag gis kyang dkyil mo dkrung chos la 'dug shig/ de rnams kyis dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug pa dang / de rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon
114b3: du zur nas de rnams kyis mkhan po dang slob dpon med pa'i shes pas byang chub kyi phyogs sum bcu rtsa bdun dang 'thun pa'i chos bskyed nas rang byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ / de nas de rnams spre'u de la chos las byung ba 'angad pa skyes nas/ de rnams kyis/
114b4: ldongs nas bsod snyoms lo tog sar ba dang / 'bras bu sar pa dang / dus gsar gyi rnyed pa gang yin pa de rnams las de la thog mar byin nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed do// ji tsam dus gnan nig na spre'u de dus las 'das so// de nas ring byang chub de rnams
114b5: kyis yul khams dang phyogs sna tshogs na yod pa'i shing dri zhim po rnams blangs te/ shing dri zhim po thams cad kyis bung por spungs nas bsregs so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ rang byang chub rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas po'i spre'u gang yin pa de
114b6: ni nye sras 'di nyid yin te/ 'di de'i tshe yang skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs so// da ltar na yang ngas 'di skye bo mang po la phan pa dang snying rje bar lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na bcom brlag tu gshegs
114b7: pa dang / bcom brlag gi bram ze rnams kyis dge sbyong gau tam bcom brlag tu phyin nas de shin du rigs bzhi po rnam par dag par 'dod de/ 'chad par byed/ 'dogs par byed/ rab tu 'jog par byed rnam par 'byed par byed/ bye brag tu 'byed par byed/ gsal
114b8: bar byed/ soston par byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed do zhes thos nas/ gal tede/ bcom brlag tu 'dug na bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i bar chad du 'gyur la/ de ni bkur sti ma yin pas skrag go zhes grag gis/ gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis/
115a1: bkur snyam yin pa byas na de ltan de bcom brlag tu 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de la mi smad rims kyis bkur sti ma yin pa byas na ngo bcar du mi 'dzin gyi/ gal te de la skyes bu tso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur sti ma yin pa byas ni des na
115a2: legs par 'gyur na/ bdag cag ga nang ni skyes bu gtso bo su 'ag yang snyam mo// de'i tshe ma badrug na bram ze sdong byar ces bya ba rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol du phyin pa/ rang gi rdza pa gsal bar byed pa/ pha rol gyi rgol 'tshar gcod par nus
115a3: pa de'i tshig bden po'i rjes su 'brang bzhig yod do/ / de nas bcom badrug gi bram ze rnams 'dus shing chogs te/ sngor thur kyi drung du song nas mkhan po 'dir dge sbyong gau ta ma mchis nas/ de shin du rigs zin pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag par rab tu
115a4: rton par byed do/ zhes thos shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// don bkur sti ma yin pas skrag go zhes gda' na/ gal te de la 'ga' zhig gis bkur stim logs pa bgyis na/ de lta ni de bcom brlag tu mchis par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de la mi smad ci
115a5: kyis bkur sti ma lags pa bgyis no ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin gyi/ gal te de la skyes bu gtso bo 'ga' zhig gis bkur si ma lags pa bgyis na legs par 'gyur na/ bdag cag gi skyes bu gtso ba mkhan po ma lags pa su zhig mchis/ khyod kyis del
115a6: bkur rdzi ma lags pa'i tshig gi rgya lug gis skyo bar gsol/ sngor gyur gyis spros pa/ shes ldan dag bdag gi lce 'di ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te smyo bar 'os pa zhig na b+ha'o// 'on te bstod par 'os pa zhig na bstod do// de nas bram ze sdong
115a7: grwar bcom par gan gnas pa'i bram ze rgan y-isanan pa rnams kyis 'jun kya dang nas pa san 'das gangan bder song ban/ bram ze sdor thur gyis kyang ring po khon nas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan
115a8: de ba byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'grob ltar kun nas bzang bshing drung zhig ni rten cing zhi ba'i spyod lam gyis bzhugs pa mthong ngo // mthong
115b1: nas kyang ya mtshan skyes te mig bgrad de bltas nas bstod par brtsams pa/ lus dang ngag dang dbang por bcas pa yi// yid kyis tshul bzhin rtse gcig bgyis nas ni/ yon tan rang bzhin yon tan rgya mche che// khyod kyi yon tan phyogs gcig
115b2: brjod par bgyi/ / smra ba rnams kyi dam par ba mcheg lags// skyon med dbang ba shin du mnyam par bzhag/ pha rol nal bar brtson pa thams cad kyis// don dmathugs su chung la bskyod mi nus// khyod kyis spyod bshin du rdzogs pa nyid/ 6
115b3: thugs bsgrubs pas brtul zhugs shin du rdzogs/ / stobs ldan khyod kyi teng 'dzin zad med pas// sred med bu dang ri yi rgyal po bzhin// skyes bu khru mchog khyod la gdod ma mnga'// mi zhum bstangs pa mi mnga' dra bo mi mnga'// 'byung po rnams
115b4: la'ang me bzod 'ga' mi mnga'/ / khyod ni mchags 'thab pa ka la mda'// btabs pa med cing ha cang zhum mi mnga'// gdung ba med cing dgyes pa'ang yod mi mda'// ri yi bdag po lhun po rab brtan ltar// khyod kyi thugs ni rtag tu dge ba nyid// zlab
115b5: skyes mchog 'ams rnams thams cad nas/ / khyod kyi ye shes yangs bsgrib mi mnga'// skye mched rnam pa sna tshogs dag la ni// mi thogs nyams shing zad pa med par 'jug/ thub pa khyod la gang la'ang som nyi med// yid gnyis yod min the tshom yod
115b6: ma yin/ / byang nyid kyis ni ga ma zhig ga sa zugs bu chung nas thams cad mabyen// mthong na dga' bar 'gyur lamathang na legs// mthong na legs pas mthong na mkhas pa dga'// khyed la dga' dang mi dga' mnyam pas na// rtab tu dag
115b7: ba'i spyod la med pa'in mdzad/ / khyod ni sman pa'i spobs par ldan pa lags// 'dzum pa'i gsung dang dran ldan bsnyengs pa med// mkhas rnams 'dod pa par tu 'chad pas na// 'jig rten gsum du khyod kyi grags pa 'thung / mi dang lha dang u0f7f/ mI
115b8: gnod sbyin dang / / srin po mang dang 'jig rten 'dir mkhas dag/ thub pa'i drang du yang dang yang lhags nas// khyod la yang dang yang zhu mi bzod med// khyod ni snyan pa'i gsung gis dga' mdzad pas// mi dang lha dang lha min gnod sbyin dang // srin po yid
116a1: gnyis bsal rnams thub pa che/ / khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal slar mchi'o// bzhengs dang bzhugs dang gshegs dang bzhud pa dang // mnal dang mi gsung yang na gsung ba'am// 'on te lhung bzed chos gos bsnams pa dag/ gau ta ma khyod
116a2: kyi thams cad mdzes pa nyid/ / thogs pa med mnga' mi myur mnyam pas na/ gsung ni snyan pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan// mi yi mchog ni dus su gsung bas na// gsung gi zlos pa rnam par spangs pa lags// 'jig rten na ni stobs dang ldan par
116a3: grags/ / skyes bu mkhyen pa skyes bu khyu mchog gtso// 'jig rten lhar bcas 'di ni mtha' dag la// nga rgyal mi mnga' khyad du gsod mi mdzad// mdza' ba dang ni mdza' tha ma lags dang // 'thun pa 'di ni 'thun pa ma lags dang // g.yo dang mi
116a4: g.yo rang bzhin gnas pa la/ / ngo mtshar 'dzin pa nam yang mi mda'o// smre sngags 'don cing snying brtser smra ba dang / kha chu 'dzag pas nyam thag skad 'byin dang // yongs su gdungs dang rnam par gdungs ldan dang // 'jigs dang rims nang mya
116a5: ngan gyis nyen pa/ / sdug bsngal rnam pa brgya yis gtses pa dang // yun ring nas ni mgon med bde ba med// srid pa'i sred par zhugs shing mun bsgribs pa'i/ 'gro ba 'khrugs pa la ni rab gzigs nas// bdag nyid rnam pa sna tshogs mthu dag
116a6: gis/ thub pa thugs rje chen po 'jug mdzad cing // shAkya skyes kyi mchog ni khyod nyid kyis// phongs par gyur rnams dgrol phyir brtson par mdzad// srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas 'di dang / srid pa'i sdug bsngal zad pa gang yin dang // srid pa'i sdug
116a7: bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba yi/ / lam mi mtshungs pa med pa khyod kyis bshad// rnam par 'dren pa chen po brtsod 'grus che// rab mchog pha rol sla ba rnams kyi mchog/ 'jig rten gsum na khyod mtshungs ma mchis na// khyod las lhag pa lta zhig ga la mchis
116a8: khyod la khong khro rjes su chags mi mnga'/ / thub pa khyod la yongs su zag mi mnga'// sdug dang 'gal dang con pa brtul zhugs bzang // khyod la mi mnga' rtag tu mi mnga' lags// thub pa sdug dang mi sdug bde ba dang // sdug bsngal mnyam dang de bzhin mi mnyam spangs//
116b1: dga' dang mi dga' ba dag bzod mdzad de// yang dag bsdams shing 'di na nyer ni spyod// smad pa byas kyang gnod pa mi mnga' la// rab tu bsngags pas khengs par mi 'gyur bas// grags pa grags pa ma yin khyod la mnyam// glang chen mche bar ldan pa g.yul ngo ru/ 'dor
116b2: ba drag tu 'phangs pa'i mda' dag ltar/ / skye bo sdig can rnams kyis smras pa yi// tshig ngan tshig rtsub dag kyang bzod par mdzad// drang srong khyod snyan gsung zhing tshig kyang bzod// shin du ngan du smras pa'ang mi bzod med// smad par smras sam dge bar smras kyang rung // thub
116b3: pa mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa lags/ / mchod 'os rtag par mi dang lha dag dang // lha min gnod sbyin srin po rnams dang ni// drang srong bdag nyid chen pos rtag mchod na// khyod ni thugs brtan gzhan du 'gyur mi mnga'// 'di bas bdag mchog ces kyis rlom mi mnga'// 'di bas bdag
116b4: chung zhes kyang rlom mi mnga'/ / bdag ni 'di dang mnyam zhes mi rlom pas// khyod la nga rgyal rnam pa gsum mi mnga'// brtan dang ldan la bong ba gser dang mtshungs// bai dUr+ya dang gseg mgyo mor mtshungs// thub pa chen po lha dang bcas pa yi// 'gro ba 'di ni rtswa shing 'dra bar
116b5: spyo/ / zla ba nyi ma'i 'od zer dang phrad nas// grang dang tsha ba'i rlung dag langs na yang // ri yi dbang po lta bur bzod mdzad de// thugs brtan khyod la rab tu gnod mi mnga'// gzims cha dang ni sbyang nas bshos dang ni// bla gos sham thabs rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ thub pa zag med
116b6: so sor brtags nas ni/ / de yi don du ston par mdzad pa lags// mgon po bdag la med ces thugs ngan med// ma bcings legs gsung bdag gir 'dzin mi mnga'// gnod pa sna tshogs dag las yongs su grol// sham rnyed pa brnyes na'ang dgyes par mi 'gyur la// de ma brnyes
116b7: pas kyang ni zhum mi 'gyur/ / khyad du gsod pa bzod pa mdzad cing 'dor// bkur sti dag la'ang chags pa mi mnga' lags// lha gnas ri yi ngos las 'khrungs pa yi// khrag ltar dmar ba'i tsan dan mchog dag dang / mda'i dang ral gri rnon pos khyod kyi thugs// lan 'ga'/
116b8: yang ni 'gyur ba mi mnga' lags// do ni mad gtam ni gsung bar mi mdzad gang // skye bo ngan pas bsten pa'i gtam ma lags// rnyed pa'i gtam min zad zing bcas gtam min// bdag nyid che rnams mi 'dod ma lags kyi// ma gang rab dben bde ba skyed byed cing // rab tu
117a1: zhi ba 'ba' zhig rab brjed pa/ / lha las 'das pa'i gtam ni gang dag mi// gsungs na sdig rnam par 'dul ba gsungs// snyan pa rnams dang 'brel ba rnams dang ni// legs par bshad dang snying por ldan pa yi// rnam par ngas
117a2: pa'i gtam dag thub pa che/ / 'gro bi'i don spang rab tu gsung bar mdzad// me mkham dag dang log par/ rnams dang // gzu lums can dang dga' bar ldan rnams dang // phra ma can dang tshig nub sgra can gang // de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen//
117a3: ma ni gang dag drang shing bla med la// bden la dga' zhing dbang po thul ba dang // rtag tu legs par brtags nas byed pa ni// de dang lhan cig bcom ldan khyod mi rkyen// chos mkhyen lugs mkhyen gang zag mkhyen pa dang // drug pa mngon mkhyen khyod la rtag phyag
117a4: 245/ zub pa zhing mkhyen mchog dang mchog min mkhyen// tshul da tshul min mkhyen khyod mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyi yon tan rgya mtsha rje chen legs mthong nas// bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig yongs su brjod pa bas// 'phags pa khyod kyi yon tan
117a5: rgya mtsho'i pha rol ni/ / tshogs par rdo thog 'gro ba'i nang nas mchis// nga lta bu la sogs pa brtom pa lnga brgyas bcom ldan 'das la stod nas de ltar mngon par dad par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis stor gyur ji ltar stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du bden
117a6: mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad do/ / de nas bram ze sngor gyur gyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod nas so de ste de lam du zhugs pa na/ becom ba rlag gi bram ze rnams kyis tshig gi rgya lug gis pags pa las thal ba tsam bu rgyad de/ mkhan po khyod la
117a7: cag gis dge sbyong gtam la bkur sti ma yin pa byos shig ces smras na/ khyod dgazod slar bsdad de 'ong ngam/ shes ldan dag kho bos sngar kho bo ni bden pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ gal te smad par 'os pa zhig na smod la/ bstod par 'os pa nyis
117a8: na bsto dado zhem sngar ma smras sam/ dge sbyong gau ta ma ni bstod par 'os pas kho bos bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das sde dron bza' sham thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams nas bcom brlag tu bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de'i
117b1: bcom brlag na d+hu skar gyi nab mo la babab/ / de nas bcom brlag na gnas pa'i lha mo gang yin pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma bcom parlag tu 'ongs na bdag gis rgyu skar gyi nub mo la bar chad byed par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas
117b2: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sgren mor byung nas 'dug go bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo re shig bud med ni shin du bkab kyid bzad ba ma yin na smin mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas lhom de byings nas phyogs gcig tu song do// de nas
117b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis lam las bzur te dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bcom brlag na ni nyes dmigs lnga po 'di dag yod
117b4: de wagang zhe na/ mthon dman dang / sdong du ma dang / tsher mas gang ba dang / rdo ba dang gseg ma dang / gyo me ma dA ba dang / dgongs ka za ba dang bud med mang ba yin na// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs par bcom brlag gi gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas gang
117b5: nab de logs su gshegs te byon nas/ gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas byul te shing drung zhig du rten cing nyin mo'i gnas pa'i phyir bzhugs so// de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu'i gzugs su byas nas 'phyan pa dang / de la khye'u dang bu mo de gzhon pa dang / des de dag kyang
117b6: bcug/ dga' bar byed tu bcuganas nags thibs por song nas za bar byed pas/ de'i ming gond sbyin bong bu gnod sbyin pong bu zhes bya bar grags so// bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das bsod snyoms la gshegs
117b7: pa las lha mo zhig gis thob tsams pas/ bcom pa rlag tu ma gshegs par gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas su gshegs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag so so nas stong du btsos shing bsdogs te shing rkar
117b8: babaganas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag da
118a1: pa can rnams la chom dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa
118a2: gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du 'dir gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag gis shing rta bkang ste
118a3: 'tshal te pa mar/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rtse ba nye bar bzung ste de bzhis su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa de dag
118a4: thams cad rim gro'i gnas su sdus shig/ bsod snyoms yongs su longs spyod du gzhug go// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing gnas pa
118a5: de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su bsogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na bde logs su song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
118a6: ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu'i gnas na dge slong ji snyed nye bar rten cing mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnas su bsogam lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ de nas
118a7: bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// de nas bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can rnams kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
118a8: bde bar bzhugs par rig nas zhes bya ba nas/ phyag gnyis bcabs te lhung bzed gru bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gsol ba gdab pa'i phyir 'khod nas 'di skad ces gsog to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis klu
118b1: gdug pa dang / gnod sbyin gdug pa de dang de rnams ni btul lags na/ btsun pa gnod sbyin bong bu 'di bdag cag la yun ring po zhig nas sha kho nam mchis par ni sha kho na bgyid/ 'gron zlu ma lags par ni 'gran zla bgyid/ glags ma btsal bar ni
118b2: glags tshol bar bgyid de/ bus pa btsas shing btsam pa rnams 'phrog par bgyid lags na/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste gnod sbyin bong bu gdul bar gsol/ de'i tshe gnod sbyin bong bu 'khor nyid du 'dus shing 'dras par gyur to/ de nas
118b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin po bul bka' stsal pa/ bong bu khyod kyis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis thos lags so// bong bu khyod kyis tham sa ma/ be bar gshegs pa bdag gis thos lags so// dam pa ma yin pa'i chos sdig pa las log shig/
118b4: bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gi slad du phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang rtsig par dam 'cha' bar bgyid na bdag ldog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams la bka' stsal pa/ bram ze dang lham
118b5: bdag byed cag gis thos sam/ bcom ldan 'das thos lags te brtsig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod srin bong bu 'khor lnga brgya dang btul to// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyi me de'i tshed du gtsug lag khang lnga brgya brtsigs so// de bzhin du gnod sbyin
118b6: mda' can dang / gnod sbyin rags ldan dang / gnod srin mo bslangs rnyed ma dang / mchu rnams btul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyis bcom pa rlag tu zhugs so// zhugs nas gnod sbyin mo 'gran zlam 'khor lnga brgya dang btul nas de'i don du gtsug lag
118b7: khang lnga brgya brtsigs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bcom brlag gi nang dang phyi rol du gnod sbyin nyis stong lnga brgya btul nas de'i ched du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis gtsug lag khang nyis stong lnga brgya brtsigs so//
118b8: de nas bcom ldan 'das o ta lar gshegs te o ta la na o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs so// de na bram ze shi sa la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu zhes bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig gnas so zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// de nas bcom
119a1: ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham thabs ma nabs/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing ba lnga brgya tsam mgo bo rdul gyi sa yog cing sha na'i ras kyi smad g.yogs bgos nas zhe
119a2: med pa las shing bar rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ gzi brjid kyis mdzes par mthong ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chos bshad pas
119a3: sa bya ba nas mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang mngon du sba bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar dro'o// de nas rmon pa stong po de dag gnya' shing dang ru thag bcad nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskor te
119a4: 'dug pa/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes nas zhes bya ba nas/ bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su dong nga zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams sa
119a5: gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pazhid pa lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas zhing pa rnams su gyur nas dbul po'i khyim rnams su skyes shing 'di rnams ni rmon mar gyur lags/ dge slong
119a6: ga 'di rnams kyis las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ 'di rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba yin te/ 'di rnams kyis de na la los dus 'das par byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas
119a7: shing pa rnams su gyur to/ / rmon pa 'di rnams kyis kyang de nyid la rab tu byung nas bslab pa'i gzhi phra ma phra mo rnams la gus par ma thus pas las de'i rnam par smin pas drang 'gro rnams su skyes sa// 'di rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i mangs
119a8: sa 'od srung gi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas de las bden pa mthong bar byas so/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// bram ze shing bas la chen po lta bu o ta la'i
119b1: s a dge sbyong shakya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las swa dang kha spu bregs te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas dpa' sde nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
119b2: pa dang o ta lar byon nas/ oM ta lan o ta la'i nags khrod na bzhugs te/ shes ldan dag dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i dge ba dang / grags pa dang / skra dang tshigs su bcad pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su grags par gyur te/ 'di ltar
119b3: bcom ldan 'das de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom
119b4: ldan 'das de 'jig rten lha dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa skye dgu dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas/ lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa rnams la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas bdag gi zag pa zad do// tsham
119b5: par spyod pa bsten to/ / bya ba byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed cing / des chos bshad pa ni thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byad/
119b6: 'ba' zhig ston to zhes thos nas/ dge sbyong dang bram ze de lta bu lta ba ni legs pa yin/ nye bar 'gro ba ni legs pa yin bsnyen bkur byed pa ni legs pa yin no snyam du bsams nas/ shing rta rta rgod ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te bram
119b7: ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing bram ze'i khye'u'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas nas gser gyi khar ba dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs te o ta la nas byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste
119b8: de ji tsam bzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs te rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zhugs nas bram gyi shing sa la chen po lta bu o ta la'i bu bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig yang
120a1: dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / yang dag par mgu bar 'byur ba'i gtam rnam pa tshogs byas nas phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la bram ze zhing sa la chen po sa bu o ta pa'i bus 'di skad ces gsor te/
120a2: logau tam dbang po la po stong yul tha dad pa dang / yul ba dad ba can rang rang gi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur gyi// gzhan gyis spyod yul dang yul gzhan nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang / sa'i rabang
120a3: po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / las kyi dbang po gang dag lags pa de rnams kyi spyod yul dang yul nyams su myong bar bgyid pa ni gang shas de rnams kyi ston pa yang gang lags/ bram ze dbang po lnga po spyod yul tha dad pa dang / yul tha dad pa can 'di lta ste/ mig gi rAng
120a4: po dang / rab 'bang po dang / dra'i das po dang / gro'i dbang po dang / sras kyi bang po gang dag yin pa de rnams kyi spyod tshul dang phram nyams su myong ba ni yid yin no// darnams kyi ston pa yang yid yin no// kye go ma yid kyi rten pa gang lags/ bram ze me na
120a5: pa ri d+ha pa yin ro/ / kyo gau ta ma dran pa'i rngon pa gang lags/ bram ze dran pa'i rngon pa ni dran pa nye bar gnag pa bzhi yin no// kye go ta ma dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i rton pa ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yin no/
120a6: kyo go ta ma byang chub kyi yan lag bdud gyi rton pa gang lags/ bram ze byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ton pa ni rig pa dang rnam par grol ba yin no// tse go tam rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i don pa gang lags/ bram ze rig pa dang rnam par grol ba'i rten pa ni
120a7: mya ngan las 'das pa yin no/ / kye ga tam mya ngan las 'das pa'i rton pa gang lags/ bram ze ha cang thal rjes so/ ha cang thal ches so// dri ba rnams kyi mtha' gzung bar ma nus te// de'i drung du ni yang dag par sdug bsngal zad par bya ba dang / sdug bsngal/
120a8: bi mther bya ba'i phyir tshangs par spyod pa bya ngan las 'das par nye bar 'gro ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa can spyod par byed do// de das bram ze o ta la'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la gnod pa ci shige za snyam mo// des kyang rjen
120b1: dge sbyong gau ta mnyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdug mchod gsol nas smon lam btab na/ des ci bsams pa dang / ci gsol ba de thams cad so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes thos so// de nas bram ze o ta la'i bu stan las langs te bla gos zag pa
120b2: gcig tu gzar te bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig du sa da bdag gi sdum par gdugs ched sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar
120b3: mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed g+ha bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'drag nas smodan lam leg pa gdab brtsams pa/ bdag gis
120b4: shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong ji snyed cig bshos gsol ba'i dithams cad bdag gi glad du b+hur cig snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bram ze o ta la'i bu'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bram ze a ti la'i bul 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// brar ze khyod
120b5: kyis mi rung ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar dge slong 'di thams cad ni yang srid pa zad pa yin gyis/ sems gzhan skyed cig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad de gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
120b6: gtsug lag khang du gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so/ / bzhugs nas bcomo lar 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag bram ze mo ta la'i bus smon lam log pas bslang ba'i sems sdig
120b7: bcan bskyed kyis/ khyed cag gis zan zos nas gtsug lag khang gi tshigs su bcad pa brjod cig dang log pa'i smon lam 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/
120b8: dang yul o ta lar bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / o ta lan bran mo rgan mo ka tsang gal zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nas bum pa thogs nas chu chur khron pa'i drung du song ba dang bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
121a1: gdul ba'i dus mkhyen nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rgan mo pha bi la bcom ldan 'das skyems kyis chu phul cig ces sgo shig/ bkun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar
121a2: mnyan nas/ rgan mo ka tsang ga la gdan ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgan mo ka tsad ga la la 'di skad ces smras so// katsang gal bcom ldan 'das skyems kyi chu phul cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag nyid 'tshal te mchi'o// da nas ka tsang ga las chus bum pa bkang nas
121a3: rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das gdan ba der song ba dang / gtsang ga las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad banas mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'odam gang gis brgyan pa/ 'od zer
121a4: ma stong pas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba lta bur kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo // mthong ma thag tu yang de la bu'i sdug pa skyes nas des lag pa bsgred ste bu bu zhes bcom ldan 'das la 'khyud par brtsams pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis de bzlog go// bcom ldan 'das
121a5: kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed kyis rgan mo 'di ma zlog shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni tshe rabs lnga brgyar yang // rtag tu nga yi yum gyur pas// nga yi sku la reg pa las// gal te 'di ni bzlog byas na// de'u re mo dal khrag dron dag/ 'di yi kha nas skyug par 'gyur// bu
121a6: la gdung ba 'di mthong nas/ / byas pa gzo ba rjes dgongs te// thugs rje dang ni thugs brtse bas// skal reg tu gnang bar bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la mgur nas 'khyud tu gnang bas debul chags pa dang bral nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir
121a7: 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'thun pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos nas kyang gtsang ga sa 'jig tshegs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mthob/
121a8: ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod pa mdzad de/ 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas ma bgyis te/ mas ma lags zhes bya ba nas thag ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig
121b1: tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / tshogs su bcad pa dag gis kyang gsol pa/ ma la lan du phan 'dogs pa'i// bu mchog gis ni
121b2: bkyi ba gang / / thar la sems gsol 'gyur ba de// khyod kyis de ring bdag la mdzad// khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'grol ba// drangs te mtho ris thar la bzhag/ khyod ni bcol ba chen po yis// dka' ba legs par mdzad pa lags zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
121b3: zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas du ma gzhan zhig na gtsang ga la ma po la gsol ba btab nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos bya
121b4: 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom
121b5: ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spad par bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skye dgu'i bdag mtshan ma la gtad do// de nas des rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin no// des brtson 'grus dang / 'bad pa dang / bcol ba byas
121b6: nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas nas dgra bcom mar gyur te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba zhes bya ba nasarjed par bya bar gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
121b7: 'dul ba ga'i/ bam po sum bcu rtsa bdun pa/ gang gi cha bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag slong ma rnams la 'thus te mdang bka' phrul na pa/ bcug laga'ang du nang nga yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir 'jug pa mdzad pa de'i tshig cang ga las dpyas par lung ston to// de nas bcom
121b8: ldan 'das kyis dge slong nams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos dge slong ma mdo snga rnam par 'byed par byed pa rnams kyi nangad na 'di lta ste/ dag slang ma ka rbang la 'di mchog yin no// dge slong rnams the tsham skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa
122a1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ btsun pa ka tsang gal las ci zhig bgyis na des na rgas nas rab tu byung bar gyur/ las mi zhig bgyis na des na dbul ba dang bran mor gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa tha ba de'i mngal bu ma bzung bar gyur rab
122a2: tu byung nas kyang dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis shing bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mdo sde rnam par 'byed par bgyid pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong ma ka tsang gal nyid kyis las byas shing tshogs rnyed pa
122a3: dag ces bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa na 'di de'i yum du gyur te/ gang gi tshe da rab tu 'byung bar 'dod pa de'i tshe 'dis nga bzlog pas las de'i rnam par smin pas
