128a2: xxx/ xxx
128a3: byas byedas pa na das ga na diso byinanas yos ldan das la tshul lo/ / sa rgyas mam ldan nas rnam sa ni byen bzhen na pa yin pas/ ma bya mam nag kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dag yol bka'aphrul pa
128a4: dga' bo na sa 'di sa ni shes kyi da byas/ btsun pa thas pa'i bu mo'i go so zhigags bgyis lags so// can da sa khyod tham ze'i rlos dang ldan ginabs kyi gtam dag byas sapa/ bcom ldan 'das bgyis lags so// kun dga' bod na/
128a5: nakhyod zam ze'i bu bo de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtas ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad ngal rgyas par gsol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bram ze'i bu mo dang lhan cig skabs ji snyed byas pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par
128a6: gsol to/ / den sa gsol pa dang / cos ldan 'das kyis med ldanapa can da 'bo la na dul bka' bram pa// kun dag ba khyod kyis kyi myong dras de la sangs rgyas kyi thugs pa marjod/ btsun pa bdag gis 'di byas du
128a7: rnam bya mni thab pa lags pas tho di rtogs par 'i babyung ba gang lagapa 'i gnas de'i sa so stsas du bsas pa dang/ de yang du dgags rnal 'khor los gyur ba bsngags pa brjod lags so// ba da 'a khyod kyis
128a8: legs pa zhig byas te/ khyod kyis gal nyi la sangs rgyas kyi bsngags brjod pa byas na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ba ldog pa'i sems paskyed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i gnas de yod pa zhig/ can
128b1: dga' bo 'on kyang bu mo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba des ni dge slong rnams seng ras gyon nas khyim gyi nang du 'gro ba las gyur gyis/ de lta
128b2: bas na dge slong gis ser ras gyon te khyim gyi nang du 'gro bar mi bya'o/ / song na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// kun tu bram ze'i bu mo chege mo zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi don du nas byi dor byas pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i 'khor
128b3: los gyur ba'i rgyal po'i btsun mo rin po cher lung bstan to zhes sgra grags pa dag bu mo lnga brgyar gnyis kyis mchog pa zhig gis thos nas/ dge slong lnga brgyar dge slong gnyis kyis ma tshang ba rnams kyi nas byi dor byas te/ de rnams
128b4: kyis kyang smon lam btab pa/ bdag cag de'i 'khor du gyur cig/ ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis nas kyi bshos bsol bar brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi mug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku tshe bachud pa de dang
128b5: de rnams su phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs zang zing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa de ni nas rul ba'i bshos gsol ba lta zhes mchi ma dbyung bar brtsams so// de nas
128b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir mi dga' zhing mchi ma glog/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su 'khrungs na rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ste
128b7: phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbul sogs pa bkum zhing sbyin pa btang nas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes pa de da ni su nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba lta snyam bgyid lags mong / bcom ldan 'das kyis
128b8: bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'i bar nas byung ba'i nas kyi zan za bar 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das 'tshal lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mche ba'i bar nas nas kyi zan phyung ste/ tshe dang
129a1: ldan pa kun dga' bo la byin nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bza' bar brlams so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis sngon 'di lta bu'i ra myong bar dran napa/ btsun pa bdag 'khor/
129a2: los skur ba'i rigs su sras shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs las chen por gyur lags na/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi mche ba'i bar nas byung ba'i nas kyi bshos 'di lta bu'i ron ldan myong bar mi dran lags so// kun dga' ba de
129a3: bas na de bzhin gshegs pa la ni ro bro ba'i mchog ces bya ba ro rnams 'phrog pa yongs su dag pa yod de/ / gal te de bzhin gshegs pas kha zas pa la pa la longs spyad na de yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ro brgya par 'gyur ro// kun du rgyal
129a4: po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/ mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas// bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo zhes sla bsgrags so// mtha'i rgyal po rnams kyis kyang rgyal
129a5: po bram ze mes sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te/ mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das ni dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo zhes thos nas// de rnams kyis rgyal po bram ze bas sbyin la
129a6: po nya btang ba las de rnams nang du ma chud de sgo na sdong ngo ro/ / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas 'bras sa lu sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya tsam bkang ste bskur ro// de nas bdud sdig can de 'di snyam du sems te/ dge sbyong gau tam
129a7: la bdag gis lan mang po zhig tho btsam par byas na lan 'ga' yang skabs ma rnyed kyis/ 'dir yang re shig 'di la brgal bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bor bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/ shing rta lnga brgya po de rnams kyi 'dur
129a8: du 'dug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gar 'dod/ darapas kyis sbas pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su 'dug nas
129b1: bcom ldan 'das de dgra bza' nanas gsol lo/ / de nas khyim bdag pagon med zas sbyin gyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi don du 'bras la sog ma'i sbu bur smin pa shing rta lnga brgya po 'di bskur ba lags so// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag
129b2: bcom ldan 'das la de lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin rnams mngon par dad de/ gal te nam mkha' la bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed bzed der yang bum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i bdud rtsis 'gangs par byed na/ bcom ldan
129b3: cir byor nas gsol/ mang lag shig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ca dga' bo bdag cag cas lags dadang rtse ldog pa 'o// bdud byas bsams pa/ bdag gis 'di dag brlag par ma rus kyis thabs sheg bsham par
129b4: bya'o zhes te snang gi rnam mkha' la 'bags nas char pa shing ti'i srog shing tsam gyi rkun da la par rnams te/ dasar shig ta dag gi skye ba na nad nub pa de mgyi bar dur pab bo// de nas shing rta de dag gi glang rnams bkrol te dong ngo //
129b5: nabacom ldan 'das dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis mtshang ba dang thabs gcig tu dgra mtha' na nas gsol lo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni ri rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas lha'i bdud rtsi la la
129b6: spyod do/ / de nas ded dpon des zla ba gsum 'das nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa skyed mos tshal du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du
129b7: dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis ri bo rtse gsum pa la dbyar gnas pa yang 'ongs so// de nas ded dpon gyis de nyid kyi mtshan pa nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag sta gon byas te zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
129b8: gsol ban nas phyag bcabs te srung bzed bya bar rig nas zhes bya ba'i bar gdam bzhin du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi rabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lab gdab par brtsams pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das bdag la bar las kyu
130a1: ba'i rgyal por gyur cig/ rta cang shes ni bu rgyal tshab du gyur cig/ rta lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang bu lnga brgyar gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo btsun mo rin po cher lung bstan pa gang lags pa de ni bdag gi btsun mo
130a2: rin po cher gyur cig/ bud med lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba gang lags pa de ni de'i 'khor du gyur cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ded dpon de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas ded dpon la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// der
130a3: dpon khyod ni 'khor los snang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / rta cang shes ni khyod kyi bu rgyal tshab tu 'gyur ro// rta lnga brgya po de dag kyang bu lnga brgyar 'gyur ro// bu mo de ni bcan mor rini po cher 'gyur ro// bud med lnga brgyar gnyis kyis
130a4: ma tshang ba de dag kyang de'i 'khor du 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
130a5: dga' bo rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi drung du song la nad med par gyur cig ces byos la 'di skad ces rgyal po chen po khyed kyi yul du kho bos zla ba gsum gnas zin te 'gros shes par gyis shig ces kyang smras shig/ btsun
130a6: pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyi khyim gang na ba der song ba dang / de'i tshe rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin bkra shis 'ong ba la sdod cing
130a7: 'dug / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bas zla ba'i skyes pa la sgrub pa/ kye nang rdzu khyod la po bram ze mes sbyin gung na ba der song sa sbyin nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la 'di ska ces dge slong kun dga' bo la mthong
130a8: bar 'tshal nas sge na sdod cing mchis so zhes spros shig/ 'phags pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo ba'i skyes pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i ltar mnyan nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gang na ba der seng ste phyin nas/
130b1: rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha dge slong 'phags pa kun dga' bo lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgo na sdod cing mchis so// des smras pa/ kye skyes bur bkra shis 'ong ba sdod cing 'dug gis dge slong
130b2: kun dga' bo ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin te/ de nyid pa'i bkra shis su gyur cig/ de la ni bzang po lnga yod de/ ming bzang ba dang / gzugs bzang ba dang / kha dog bzang ba dang / spobs pa bzang ba dang / snga
130b3: pa bzang ba yin gyis nang du spyon cig/ shes ldan kun dga' bo la su zhig 'gog/ skyo bas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la de bzhin du smras nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo nang du zhugs so// mtha'i rgyal phran gyi po nya de rnams kyang do dang
130b4: lhan cig nang du zhugs so/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin la nad med par gyur cig ces byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po bram ze
130b5: mes sbyin la 'di skad ces smras so/ / rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas khyod nad med par gyur cig/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yul du ngas zla ba gsum du gnas zin te 'gros shes par gyis shig ces kyang bka' stsal to// 'phags
130b6: pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dang jig yul dgra mthar dbyar bde bar bzhugs sam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal bar ma gyur grang / mtha'i rgyal
130b7: phran gyi pho nya de dag gis smras pa/ lha khyod ni rgyal srid la mi rtog pa lags te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs te mi snang ba'i phyogs su bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
130b8: ni zla ba gsum du nas rul pa'i bshos gsol lags so/ / des smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba gsum du nas rul pa'i bshos gsol ba mad dam/ rgyal po chen po mang lags so// brgyal nas
131a1: sal hral ba dang / tham bzhan gtor nas dbugs mar byung ba dang / dran pa rnams bcug sa smras pa/ shas ldan dgadas khyed na/ rnams sa can shang lnga brgya'i bza' ba dang bca' ba bamed par du
131a2: chu mang po sta gon gyis shig par ma bsgo 'am/ de namra kyis smras pa/ lha de kho na skad bka' stsal ba mchis kyis che ge mo zhig la stsol cig ces ni khyed kyis bka' ma sprul te/ 'on kyang da dung du zhal zas sta gon khon bgyid do//
131a3: de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig du 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
131a4: rgyal po bram ze mas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab du dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas rgyal po bram ze
131a5: mas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das nongs lags so// bde bar gshegs pa nongs lags so/ ji ltar yang bus pa lags/
131a6: ji ltar yang rmongs pa lags/ ji ltar yang mi gsal ba lags/ ji ltar yang mi mkhas pa lags te/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung zla gsum du spyan drangs nas mi gda'
131a7: ba'i phyogs su mchis lags so/ / // 'dul ba bzhi// bam po sum bcu rtsa brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nongs pa de glo bar chud cing nongs par mthong lags na thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste nongs pa la nongs par
131a8: bzung du gsol/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis nyes pa la nyes par khas blangs na bden te/ ji ltar na yang bus pa yin// ji ltar na yang rmongs pa yin/ dzaM lta na yang mi gsal ba yin/ ji ltar na yang mi mkhas pa yin te/ gang
131b1: yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba gsum du spyan drangs nas mi gnang ba'i phyogs na 'dug gam/ rgyal po chen po gang gi phyir khyod kyis nyes pa shes shing mthong la de mthong nas 'chags par byed na/ khyod kyi dge ba'i chos rnams
131b2: nyams par mi 'gyur gyi 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang yang 'ga' zhig nyes pa shes shing mthong la de mthong nas 'chags shing phyis sdom par byed na/ dge ba'i chos rnams nyams par
131b3: mi 'brur gyi 'phel ba kho nar shes par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na
131b4: bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang / snyun spyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams sbyor zhing mchis na gnad par mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs
131b5: pa ni tshe thung ngu'i dus su byung zhing gdul ba'i don bya ba ni rab tu mang la mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la yang 'bab pas mi gnang ngo / / gal te de lta lags na bcom ldan 'das lo bdun nam/ zla ba bdun nam/ dgung bdun zhig gnang
131b6: bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis der yang ma gnang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po bram ze mas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs pacig tu sad bdag gi
131b7: sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ ngas gal te 'di'i zas gcig kyang gsol bar ma gnang na rgyal po bram zems sbyin khrag dron du sprugs nas dus
131b8: las 'da' bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i gnas yod do snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis cad mi gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas rgyal po bram khrims sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das cha ma gsung bas gnang par rig nas
132a1: zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te rang gi gnas gang na ba der song nas byin pa dang / blon po rnams la spras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis na zhal zas 'di thams
132a2: cad sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis longs spyad par 'gyur ba'i thabs bzang po ci yod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha zhal zas 'di thams cad dogs la bkram la dge slong rnams kyi zhal zas bcags na de ltar na yongs su longs
132a3: spyod par 'gyur lags so/ / des zho shas 'tshe ba rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag kha zas ji snyed yod pa'i dri thams cad sa la kun du khrom shig/ de rnams kyis thams cad kun du bkram mo// de nas rgyal po bram ze mes sbyin gyis de nyid kyi mtshan
132a4: me nas btsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag sta gon byas nas zhes bya ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// ji tsam na rgan zhugs zhig mi bzod pa
132a5: skyes te bdag cag zla ba gsum du nas rul pa zos nas da ni rgyal po sdig can 'di'i 'byor pa ston to snyam du bsam nas bza' ba dang bca' ba sa la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'phags pa rnams ni bza' ba dang bca'
132a6: ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas rdzi bar byed de zhes smod par byed/ phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang ci byung ba de ni dge slos
132a7: dag bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas reg par byed pa yin no snyam nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong rgan zhugs che ge mo zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas bza' ba dang / bca' ba khar bzhug pa'i zas sa
132a8: la bkram pa'i steng du rdog pas bsnun pas bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams smod par byed/ phyar kha gtong bar byed/ kha zer bar byed do// de lta bas na dge slong gis bza' ba dang bca' ba khar gzhug pa'i zas la rkang pas bcag par mi bya'o//
132b1: bcags na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po bram thems sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par
132b2: byed de zhes bya ba nas/ phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bram ze
132b3: mes sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzed bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/ rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
132b4: gyis yang dag par bstad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng stong / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so// de nas dge slong rab tu mang po dbyar zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas/
132b5: pa dang ldan/ chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bom phyag byas te phyogs gcig du 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas dge slong rab tu mang pos bcom
132b6: ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag cag gis yul dgra batha' rnams su dgung zla gsum mchis lags kyis/ btsun pa spyil bu gzhig lags so// dge slong dag khyed kyis spyil bu ma gzhig shig/ spyil bu rnams ji srid
132b7: du yun ring du gnas par gyur pa de srid du sbyin bdag gi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur ba nyid dang / bsod nams skyed par 'gyur ba nyid do// bzhi pa 'di dag ni sbyin pa po dang sngon bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang /
132b8: bde ba'i gan yin par rig par bya ste/ gzhi ga she na/ dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan zhing dge ba'i chos la gnas pa zhig gang gis btsug lag khang na gnas shing sems kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nis rdzogs par
133a1: byas te gnas nag ni de las sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi dpag tu med par rig par bya'o// gtsug lag khang ji lta bar chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang /
133a2: gnas mal yang de dang 'dra ste/ bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / dag pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag gi bsod nams kyi tshad re shig bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod
133a3: nams kyi 'bras bu'i rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes bzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// dper na chu bo chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/ gang gA dang / ya mun dang / sa ra yu dang /
133a4: gnas ldan dang / chen po zhes bya ba de dag 'bab cing 'dre bar 'gyur ba de la ni chu'i tshad chu'am/ chu bum pa 'am/ chu bum pa brgya'am/ chu bum pa stong ngam/ chu brum pa brgya stong 'di snyed ces gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i
133a5: tshogs chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba de bzhin du bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa dang / dge ba'i rgyu 'thun pa dang / bde ba'i gzhi bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i sbyin pa po dang / sbyin bdag gi 'asod nams kyi ched bsod nams sam/ bsod nams//
133a6: kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam mo zhes gzung bar mi nus te/ 'on kyang bsod nams che ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// ji ltar rgya mtsho bkra shis gtsang la dag/
133a7: dogs pade rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho mchog der// mi dang ri dgas tshogs kyis bsten pa yi// chu bo so so nas 'bab 'dra ba ltar// de bzhin gos dang zas skom ster ba'i mi// mal cha stan dang gding ba sbyin byed la// bsod nams rgyun ni kun
133a8: nas 'du 'gyur te/ / dper na rgya mtshor chu klung 'bab pa bzhin// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/ gang gis na
133b1: phyag dang / zhabs dang / dbu la sogs pa bkum pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis slongs mo ba'i skye bo tshim par mdzad de/ bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa gsum du sems can gyi don gyi slad du bdag nyid 'ostsal nas mdzad pa thams
133b2: cad mdzad lags pa/ yul dgra mtha' na dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis mtshang ba dang thabs cig tu nas rul ba gsol la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu gnyis ni bdud rtsi 'tshal lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
133b3: pa/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs bzhan rnams su las byas shing bsags pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// dge slong dag sngon byung ba skye dgu'i tshe lo
133b4: brgyad khri thub pa na 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
133b5: rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de 'khor dge slong brgyad khri dang rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan zhes bya ba na/ nye bar rten cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan no tshog
133b6: rnams slob par byed pa'i bram ze zhig lnga brgya'i tshogs la bram ze'i gsang tshig 'don du 'jug ste/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang lhag par bkur sti byas// rim gror byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas te dgra bcom par bkur ro//
133b7: gang kho na nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzig rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du gshegs pa de kho na nas bzung ste// de la su yang bkur sti bya ba dang / rimi gror bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba mi byed pa dang / de yang /
133b8: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la shin du phrag dog skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na dge slong slob pa dang mi slob pa rab du mang po lnga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/
134a1: rgyal po'i po zong gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / de nas tshed ma do sa tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras can gyis spang bzed bkang nas slar log pa bra me ze sa thong nas dris pa/ kye dge slong dag ji 'dra drib sod snyoms zhi rnyed
134a2: bto'o/ / de dag drang po'i nga bzhin can yin pas bstan pa dang / de phrag dog gi dang bzhin can zhig mi bzod pa skyes nas tha ma ze'i khye'u rnams la bos te smras pa/ dge sbyong pog reg 'di dag ni chod ma ro sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chen zab 'os
134a3: ma yin gyi nas phul ba za bar 'os pa yin no/ / de rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang nas mkhan po de de lta lags te/ dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag ni tshod mo ro sde tshogs dang ldan pa dang 'bras chan 'tshal ba 'os pa ma lags kyi nas rul pa 'tshal bar
134a4: 'os pa lags so/ / de na yang bram ze'i khye'u bzang po dad pa can dge ba'i bsam pa can gnyis shig 'dug pa de dag gis mkhan po de skad ma gsung shig/ 'di dag ni bdag nyid chen po ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi 'tshal bar 'os pa lags kyi/ nas
134a5: rul ba ni 'os pa ma lags so zhes smras so/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshesas pa rnam par gzigs kyi tshogs rnams la smod par byed pa gang yin pa deng nyid yin no// bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyar gnyis
134a6: gyis mtshang ba gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong lnga rgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang ba 'di dag yin no/ / bram ze'i khye'u bzang po dang pa can dge ba'i bsam pa can gnyis po gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu 'dri gnyis yin
134a7: ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi nyan thos slob pa dang pi slob pa rnams la sems gdug pas ngag gi las rtsub mo phyung ba dang / bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgyar gnyis kyis ma tshang bas rjes sku yi rang ba dang /
134a8: gnyis kyis rjes su yid ma rang ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar yul dgra mthar de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong lnga brgyar gnyis kyis mtshar ba dang thabs gcig nas rul gsol to// shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu
134b1: gnyis ni lha'i bdud rtsi la longs spyod do/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig du gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/ gcig tu dkar ba'i las rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta
134b2: bul bslab par bya'o zhes bya'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba/ kun dga' bo tshugs dka' gang na bder 'dong ngo // btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun
134b3: dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lho phyogs lnga len nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang tshugs dkar gshegs nas/ tshugs dka' chu bo gang gA'i 'gram na bzhugs so// de nas dge slong zhig
134b4: bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la dge slong des 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji
134b5: ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas gcig du dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtong bar gnas so// gcig tu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtong bar gadra
134b6: pa na/ gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bgyid pa tshangs par spyad pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes
134b7: pas mngon sum du bgyis te bsgrubs nas bdag gi/ skye ba zad do// tshangs par spyod pa la bsten to// bya ba byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar bgyid pa'i chos de lta bu mdor bsdus te legs par gshad du gsol zhes
134b8: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA'i gang na ba de logs su gzigs pa las bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo gang gA'i rgyun gyis shing sdong chen po zhig khyer ba gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dge slong de la bka' stsal pa/
135a1: dge slong khyod kyis chu bo gang gA'i rgyun gyis shing sdong po chen po khyer ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong lag so// gal te 'di tshu rol gyi 'gram du ma chags/ pha rol gyi 'gram dang dbus su ma chags/ skam la ma phyung / mi dang mi ma
135a2: yin pas ma bzung du klong dum nub/ khong rul par ma gyur na dge slong shing sdong po chen po de ni rim gyis rgya mtshor gzhol bar 'gyur/ rgya mtshor 'bab par 'gyur/ rgya mtshor bab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ gal te dge slong khyod kyis tshu rol la
135a3: ma chags zhes bya ba nas khong rul par ma gyur na/ de lta na dge slong khyod rim gyis mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar 'gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa la 'bab par 'gyur/ mya ngan las 'das pa la bab par 'gyur ro// btsun pa bdag gis
135a4: ma 'tshal na tu rol gyi 'gram ni ci lags pha rol gyi 'gram ni ci lags/ dbus su thogs pa ni ci lags/ skam la byung ba ni ci lags/ mis bzung ba ni ci lags/ mi ma lags pas bzung ba ni ci lags/ klong du nub pa ni ci lags/ khong
135a5: rul ba ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis mdor bsdus pa'i chos thos nas zhes bya ba nas/ 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bgyi ba'i chos de lta bu mdor bsdus te legs par bdag la
135a6: bshad du gsol zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong tshu rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni nang gi skye mched drug gi tshig bla dgas yin no// pha rol gyi 'gram zhes bya ba de ni phyi'i skye mched drug gi tshig bla dgas yin no// dbus su
135a7: thogs pa zhes bya ba de ni dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyi tshig bla dgas yin no/ / skam la phyung ba zhes bya ba de ni de'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi tshig bla dgas yin no// mis bzung ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar 'di na la la rab tu byung ba dang khyim pa 'dres
135a8: par gnas te dga' bar ma tshungs pa dang / bde bar mtshungs pa dang / bden bde ba dang / sdug bsngal na sdug bsngal zhing 'phral gyi bya ba byung zhing byung ba rnams yang dag par blangs te mthar 'byin par byed pa lta bu yin no// mi ma yin pas zin pa
135b1: zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar 'di na la la tshul khrims sam/ btul zhugs sam/ dka' thub bam/ tshangs par spyad pa bsten pa 'dis bdag lha 'am/ lha gang yang rung ba zhig du gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas tshangs par spyad pa spyad pa lta bu'o//
135b2: klo ra du nub pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'di ni la la bslab pa phul nas babs blta bu yin no// kho rul ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar 'di na la la tshul khrims 'tshal ba/ sdig pa'i chos can/ khong myags shing phyir 'dzag pa/ shing rul lta bur gyur pa/
135b3: lung bong ltar spyod pa/ dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba tshangs par spyad pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che ba yod pa lta bu yin te/ dge slong khyod kyis gal te de bzhin du tshu rol gyi gram du ma thogs zhes bya ba nas/ mya ngan
135b4: las 'das pa la bab par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas dge slong des bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
135b5: te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / / de nas dge slong de bcom ldan 'das kyis shing sdong po chen po'i dpe 'di'i gdams ngag gis gtams te gcig tu dben pa bag yod pa/ rtun pa dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid gtor par gnas pa na/ gang
135b6: g i phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa de tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon
135b7: sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad do/ / tshangs par spyod pa la bsten te/ bya ba byas so/ 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes bya bar shes nas go bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa de dgra bcom pa sems shin du rnam par grol
135b8: bar gyur to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na gnag rdzi dga' bo zhes bya ba 'dug par gyur pa khar ba la rten nas gnag skyong zhing 'dug pa las de'i khar bas sbal ba zhig brdzis so// de gnad rnams chad la
136a1: zug tshogs rnams bye la thug pa dang / sems bskyed pa/ gal te bdag gis lus 'gul tam/ skad phyung na bzhi ngas gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam gyi bar chad du 'akar ro snyam du rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dang
136a2: par byas nas shi ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes so// de nas gnag rdzi dga' bos pa rab phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gan ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
136a3: phyag byas te phyogs gcig du 'dug go/ / phyogs gcig du 'du gnas bcom ldan 'das la gnag rdzi dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag ni tshu rol gyi 'gram du ma chags/ pha rol gyi 'gram du mi chags/ dbus su
136a4: mi chags/ skam la mi 'byung / mes mi gzung / me ma lag pas mi gzung / klong du mi 'byung / khong du mi 'drul bar bgyi lags na/ legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la bdag rab tu 'byung ba dang bstan par rdzogs pa
136a5: dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// dga' bo khyod kyis bdag po rnams la gnag gtad dam/ btsun pa mi 'tshal lags te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun
136a6: pa rnams kyang gzhon la be'u rnams kyang tshar lags te/ so so'i gnagar 'tshal bas so so'i gnas su mchi lags pas/ bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab du 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge
136a7: slong gi dngos po 'thob pa ltan/ bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// dga' bo ba rnams kyang gzhon la be'u rnams kyang tshar te rang rang gi gnas shes pas rang rang gi gnas su 'gro bar
136a8: 'gyur mod kyi/ 'on kyang gnag rdzi zas dang gos bdag gir byed pas ni 'di ltar bdag po rnams leng bya dgos so// de nas gnag rdzi dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
136b1: kyi spyan snga nas song ngo / / de nas 'jigs so// 'jigs so zhes sgra chen po 'byin cing brgyug par brtsams pa dang / lam gyi bar nas gnag rdzi do shes lnga brgyas mthong ste de rnams kyis smras pa/ ci zhig gis 'jigs/ des smras pa
136b2: skye bas 'jigs so/ / rgabs 'jigs so// 'chi bas 'jigs so// de rnams kyang de'i phyi bzhin du brgyug par brtsams pa dang / gnag rdzi dang / phyugs rje dang // rtsa thun dang / shing thun dang / lam gyis 'tsho ba dang / las gol bas
136b3: 'tsho ba'i mi gzhan dag kyang de rnams mthong nas brgyug par brtsams so/ / lam gyi mdun nas 'ong ba rnams kyis de dag de ltar sgra 'byin pa mthong nas de rnams kyis dris pa/ shes ldan dga'i ci zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/
136b4: 'jigs so// ci zhig gis 'jigs/ skye bas 'jigs so// rga bas 'jigs so// 'chi bas 'jigs so// de rnams kyis kyang thos nas slar log go// ji tsam na ri 'or dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang / de nas ri 'or de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshig nges
136b5: skye bo'i tshigs chen po mthong nas sngangs pas phan tshun du 'dod par byed de/ kha cig ni bros so// kha cig ni rdzas rnams sbed do// kha cig go bgos nas 'dug go// mi dpa' bo gzhan dag cig yod pa de dag gis bsu nas dris pashes ldan
136b6: ngag ci ci zhig/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'jigs so// ci zhig gis 'jigs/ skye bas 'jigs so// rgabs 'dzags so/ chi bas 'jigs so// de nas ri 'or na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs de bag phebs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
136b7: 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gnag rdzi dga' ba song nas ring po ma lon par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ci'i slad du
136b8: gnag rdzi dga' bo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal ba bzlog te sdum par btang lags/ shA ri'i bu gnag rdzi dga' bo slar khyim pa khyim na gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de//
137a1: sogs 'jog yongs su spyod pas 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do// gnag rdzi dga' bo de'u re bdag po rnams la gnag gtad de 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu rnams skra
137a2: d ad kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab du byung nas tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas
137a3: nas skye ba zad do/ / tshangs par spyod pa la bstan to// bya ba byas so// 'di las srid pa gzhan mi shes so zhes go bar byed par 'gyur ro// de nas dus gzhan zhig na gnag rdzi dga' bos bdag po rnams la gnag gtad nas 'khor
137a4: lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis bdag po rnams la gnag rnams gtad lags te/ btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i
137a5: chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la gnag
137a6: rdzi dga' bo 'khor lnga brgya dang rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob par gyur to/ / de ltar rab tu byung ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa de zhes bya ba nas sems shin du rnam par grol bar gyur ces bya ba'i bar/
137a7: snga ma bzhin du'o// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring por ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o// sngon sbal ba byed byed pa'i
137a8: lha'i bus bltas na dud 'gro dag nas shi sogs pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pas yin nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis gang yang zhag lon nas bcom
137b1: ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam mo// de nas sngon sbal ba byed byed pa'i lha'i
137b2: b us rna tsha dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs nas zhes bya ba nas gang gA'i 'gram thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas te bcom ldan 'das lame tog gis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go zhes
137b3: bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon sbal ba byed byed pa'i lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang / 'thun pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur/
137b4: ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad de/ de thos pa zhes bya ba nas thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag
137b5: ni 'phags so/ / mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng slan chad ji srid 'tshol
137b6: par gong ma bzhin du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dad lags so/ / de nas sngon sbal ba byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul las rnam
137b7: par rgyal ba lta bu dang / nad pa nang thams cad las thar pa lta bur 'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa/ de nyid dang rang gi gnas su song ngo // dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smad la mi nyal bar
137b8: skyer ba la brtson zhing gnas pa de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo / / de mthong nas kyang the tshom du 'gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ ci lags bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcom ldan 'das la
138a1: lta ba'i slad du mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis sam/ dge slong dag blta ba'i phyir mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs pa yang ma yin/ lha rnams kyi dbang po
138a2: brgya byin yang pa yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kya ga na ga rdzi dga' bo'i khar bas sbal pa brdzis te gnad rnams kyang chad la thug/ tshig rnams kyang bye la thug pa dang / gnag rdzi dga' bo'i gtam bar chad par
138a3: 'gyur ro snyam nas/ mi g.yo zhing sgra ma byung bar 'dug nas da la sems mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa de med dang la blta ba'i phyir 'ongs nas/ ngas de la chos bshad nas
138a4: bden pa mthong ste rang gi gnas su song ba yin no/ / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa gnag rdzi dga' bo dang 'khor lnga brgyas las ci zhig bgyis na
138a5: gnag rdzi ngag gi nang du skyes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis pa lags/ sngon sbal pa byed byed pa'i lha'i bus las ci zhig bgyis
138a6: na/ des na sbal par skyes par gyur cing bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de nyid kyis las byas shing bsags la tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes
138a7: bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/ de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi
138a8: nags na nye bar brten cing bzhugs so/ / zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i gsung rab la gnag rdzi dga' bo rab du byung ba sde snod gsum pa chos smra bar rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can 'khor lnga brgya pa rtsod pa'i chos la mkhas
138b1: bzhig ste/ de dge 'dun gyi rtsod pa byung zhing byung ba rnams zhi bar byed pa dang / de ni dge slong khengs pa nga rgyal can gnyis shig lan 'ga' yang de'i drung du mi 'dod do// dus gzhan zhig na de gnyis phan tshun du rtsod pa zung nas don de
138b2: drang du dong nas rkang pa la phyag byas te smras pa/ bdag cag gnyis la 'di dang 'di lta bu'i rtsod pa byung na zhi bar mdzad nga gsol/ des bsams pa/ gal te bdag gis 'di gnyis kyi rtsod pa deng kho na zhi bar byas na rag ma las pas 'di
138b3: gnyis phyis 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des dge 'dun thams cad bsogs nas rtsod pa de dge 'dun gyi nang du glengs nas chad par ni ma byaso// phyi de nyid yang de la ri 'or du dgos pa zhig zung nas de der song ba dang / de nas de gnyis
138b4: gyis thogs so zhes dge 'dun gyi nang du rtsod pa de glengs nas de nas dge 'dun gyis zhi bar byas so/ / ji tsam na dge slong sde snod gsum pa deri 'or de nas 'ongs te lam gyis dub pa bsal nas lhan cig gnas pa dang nye
138b5: gnas rnams la dris pa/ re shig rtsod pa dang rtsod zla gnyis mi 'ong ngam de rnams kyis smras pa/ mkhan po de gnyis kyi rtsod pa de zhi bar bgyis legs so// su zhig zhi bar byas/ dge 'dun gyis so// ji ltar byas/ de rnams
138b6: kyis rgyas par smras pa dang / des ngag rtsub mo'i las byung ba/ tshe dang ldan pa dag mi shes te/ ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams ji ltar rtsod pa de zhi bar byas so// de rnams kyis kyang mkhan po de de bzhin te/ ji ltar gnag rdzi rnams
138b7: ji ltar rtsod pa zhi bar bgyis so zhes 'thun par smras so/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong sde snod gsum pa gang yin pa de ni gnag rdzi dga' bo 'di nyid yin no// de'i lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas
138b8: rdza brgya po kang yin pa de dag ni gnag rdza lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yinano/ / gang yang 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gnyan thos byed / 'dun laganag rje zhes bya ba'i tshig blas shing / lhan cigags pa
139a1: nye gnas rnams kyis kyang 'thun par smras pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar 'khor lnga brgya dang gnag rdzi rnams su skyes par gyur to// gang 'dis blags shing bton pas phung po la mkhas pa dang / khams
139a2: la mkhas pa dang / skye mched la mkhas pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang / gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas par byas pas/ da ltar 'di 'khor lnga brgya dang de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams
139a3: cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ / dge slong dag sngon sbal ba byed byed pa'i lha'i bu yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung kho na'i gsung rab la dge slong spong ba ba zhig tu gyur te/ ljongs rgyu zhing song ba dang
139a4: ri 'or zhig na gtsug lag khang zhig yod pa der son to/ / de mtshan ma'i thun dang po la dkyil mo dkrung bcas te yid la bya ba goms par bya bar brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na 'don pa byed pa'i dge slong rnams kha ton byang pa dang / bsam gtan
139a5: kyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas de sgras sems rtse gcig pa nyid ma btub nas des bsam pa/ 'di dag kha ton zer du chug gung thun la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas gung thun la langs te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na dge slong gzhan dag kha ton
139a6: byed nas des bsams pa/ thun tha ma la 'dug par bya'o snyam nas yang / de thun tha ma la langs te 'dug pa dang / ji tsam na gzhan dag kha ton byed nas de 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pas kun nas dkris pa drag po
139a7: skyes nas des smras pa/ 'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni sbal ba bzhin mtshan thog thag sgra 'byin to zhes byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dge slong spong ba pa gang yin pa de ni sngon sbal ba byed byed
139a8: ba'i lha'i bu 'di nyid yin te/ gang yang 'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la sbal ba zhes tshig tu smras pas las de'i rnam par smin pas tshe rabs lnga brgyar sbal bar skyes
139b1: bar gyur/ da lta'i bar du yang sbal bar skyes pa yin no// gang yang nga la sems mngon par dad par byas pas des na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes par gyur to// gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
139b2: sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pas des na da ltar bden pa mthong bar byas so/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin
139b3: la zhes bya ba nas brtson par byas/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA
139b4: rgal ba dang / dran rang pa dang / !dang / dusbrul lnga brgyas bsor te ga brgyas sa de rnams la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gsum gyi chos bshad pa mdzad de/ bzhin bzangs dag 'di ltar 'du byed thams
139b5: cad ni mi rtag pa'o/ / chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba yin pas ngal sems mngon par dad par gyis la/ ci nas kyang dud 'gro'i skyes gnas la 'dod chags
139b6: dang bral bar gyis shig/ de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das las tshig gsum gyi chos thos nas kha zas za bar byed pa ni bdag cag gi cha ma yin nosnyam nas/
139b7: de rnams kyi kha zas bcad pa dang / dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba rnams ni mo'i shas che bas dus las 'das te shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ras kyi lha rnams su skyes so// chos nyid kyis lha'i
140a1: 'u 'am lha'i bu mo skyes nas ring po ma lon par sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o// de rnams kyis bltas na dud
140a2: 'gro dag las shi 'phos nas rgyal chen bzho'i ris kyi lha rnams su skyes pa dang zhes bya bas/ me tog man dA ra bas thub bkang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi nye 'khor dang chu bo gang gA sdang bas gsal bar byas nas bcom
140a3: ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor to/ / bcom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te 'dug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang
140a4: 'dra ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas shes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
140a5: nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ de rnams kyis bden pa mthong ba dang / nges lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod do// btsun pa 'di lta bu ni bdag cag la bas sa bgyis te/
140a6: mas ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang / gnyen gyi tshogs dang sdug pas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags sngon gyi 'das pas ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram
140a7: zas ma lags pa gang lags pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la mdzad de/ sems can dmyal ba dang yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/ lha dang mi rnams su ni rab tu bkod 'khor ba
140b1: las na nga du mdzad/ khrag dang mchis 'a rgya mtshan bsams/ rus pa'ang bo las ni ba du ngan song ga na rnams ni bkran mtho ngas dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni bya thog ma ma mchis pa'i
140b2: dus nas bsags pa'i 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phags so// mngon
140b3: par 'phags so/ / bdag cag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag cag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng slan chad
140b4: ji brid 'tsho ba'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabs su mchi bar mngon par dang lags so/ / de nas sngon nya dang / ngang pa dang / ru sprul byed byed pa'i lha'i bu de rnams tshong ba khe spogs rnyed pa lta
140b5: bu dang zhes bya ba nas rang gi gnas su dong ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa
140b6: dang / ngad pa dang / rul sbal 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na des na ngang pa dang / nya dang / ru sbal rnams su skyes lags las ci zhig bgyis na des na lha rnams su skyes nas bden
140b7: pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dang pa dang / nya dang / ru sbal 'di dag nyid kyi las rnams byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa
141a1: dag ni zhes bya ba nas lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i
141a2: lo nya khri thung ba na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba nas/ de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar rten ci bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i
141a3: bstan pa la de rnams rab tu byung bar gyur te/ de na dge slong de rnams kyis bslab pa'i bzhi phra mo phra mo rnams dral ba las de'i rnam par smin pas nya dang / dad pa dang / ru sbal rnams su skyes par gyur to// gang
141a4: yang ngal sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na lha rnams su skyes par gyur to/ / gang yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa des na bden pa mthong bar byas so//
141a5: dge slong dag de lta bas na gcig tu gdag pa'i las rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces paka
141a6: stu la ta zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das chu bo gang gA rgal ba dang yi dgas sdong dum tshig pa lta bu/ keng rus sbeng pa lta bu/ rang gi sgras lus yog pa/ lto ra srel ltar 'dug
141a7: pa/ kha khab kyi mig tsam yod pa 'bar rab du 'bar kun du rab du 'bar te ma lce gcig tu gyur pa lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor nas de rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun
141a8: pa bdag cag yi dgas rnams ni rnam par ltung ba'i lus can rnams lags te/ sngon gyi las kyi nongs pa chab kyang mi rnyed lags na 'tshal ma mthong ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ khyod ni thugs rje chen po mnga'
141b1: ba lags na bdag cag la chab stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams la chu bo gang gA bstan nas/ chu bsil skye bo kun gyis nye bar spyad bya ba// skal ldan shing rta klung chen 'di ni grong dag dang /
141b2: yul 'khor dag dang grong khyer tshim par byed cing 'bab// zhing rnams su lu kum da dang ut+pal spun// yi dgas rnams kyis gsol pa chu bo skyob kun gyis nye bar spyad bgyi pa// skal ldan
141b3: shing rta'abab 'di bdag cag rnams la gams/ / 'din khrag ga drims gang zhing lag pa na// dbyug pa lnga snar bcas pa thogs pa 'di bsrung sa mthong // bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gA'i stsal bka' stsal pa/
141b4: khyod ni grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer tshim byed cing // zhing rnang sa lu ku krod dang ut+pal spun// ce phyi re yi dgas skom pas ra ba nyen tsham mi byed// khyod la byis pa'i skye ba sdug bsngal snying rje med/
141b5: gang gA'i lhas gsol pa/ byis pa'i skye bo la bdag 'jigs pas ma lags shing // tshig rtsub smras kyang mi mthun chab gtong mi bgyid de// nongs bgyis sgrib pa chen pos bsgribs pa 'di dag la/
141b6: chu bo skams gyur 'di la bdag gis ce zhig nongs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa maud gal gyi bu chen po yi dgas rnams la chu lud cig/
141b7: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas yi dgas rnams la chu bru da par brtsams pa dang / yi dgas de rnams kyi kha khab kyi mag tsam
141b8: po dag bskyed par ma nus so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis de rnams kyi kha bskyed nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos chu blung pa dang / de rnams snyoms pas nyen pas mang du 'thungs
142a1: pas lto rgyas par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la sems dad pa bskyed nas shi'o zhes bya ba nas/ bden pa mthong nas rang gi gnas su song de zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
142a2: ga rnams ma thapa rna ma thams cad gtsad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la lus pa/ btsun pa yi dgas 'di rnams kyis las ci shig bgyis na ngas na yi dgas rnams su seMs lags/ las ci zhig bgyis
142a3: na des na lha rnams su skyes nas bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bas grab tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas
142a4: lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshal nya khri thub pa na ston pa 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung
142a5: zhes bya ba nas/ de bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na nye bar rten cing bzhugs so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de'i nyan thos rnams kyis dad pa las bslangs nas sangs rgyas
142a6: dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la bya ba byed do// gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi bstan pa rgyas pa ma gyur ba de'i tshe dang pa 'dra ba'i dge slong yang nyung bar gyur to// gang gi
142a7: tshe rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe dang ba 'dri ba'i dge slong yang mang bar gyur to/ / ji tsam na 'dun khang zhig na dge bsnyen lnga brgya bya ba 'ga' shig gi phyir lpags shing 'dus par gyur pa dang / dang pa 'dri ba'i dge slong
142a8: rab tu mang bdag de rnams kyi drung du song nas sbyin du/ zug par 'dod pa na/ de rnams kyis kun nas dkris pa drag pos dag rngub ba'i las byung ba/ 'od srung gi dge sbyong 'di rnams ni yi dgas rnams su
142b1: skyes pa bzhin rtag tu lag bzed par byed do zhes smras so/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems dge bsnyen lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni yi dgas lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/ gang yang 'di rnams
142b2: kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi nyan thos rnams la yi dgas kyi tshig smras pa'i las de'i rnam par sbyin pas tsha rabs lnga brgyar yi dgas rnams su skyes par gyur te/ da lta'i bar du yang
142b3: yi dgas rnams su byas pa yin no/ / gang yang ngal sems mngon par dad par byas pa des na lha rnams su skyes so// gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la skyabs su 'gro ba dang
142b4: bslab pa'i gne blangs pa des na bden pa mthong bar byas so/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na gcigatuganag pa rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la zhes bya ba nas brtul bar/
142b5: bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed cag gis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o zhes de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das chu ga gang gA las rgal za na glad pa che'i lta
142b6: stangs kyis g.yas phyogs nas chu bo gang gA la gzigs pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du g.yas nas slar phyogs nas chub
142b7: gang gA la gzigs par mdzadabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed cag chu bo gang gA'i gleng gzhi nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das de de'i dus la bab lags so//
142b8: bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chu bo gang gA'i gleng gzhi gang lags pa bshad na dge slong rnams nyen par 'gyur lags so//
143a1: 'dul ba ga'i// bam po sum bcu rtsa dgu pa// dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po smyug sbams shes bya ba chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ de'i yul 'byor pa rgyas pa dang /
143a2: pa dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang pa/ shid me tog dang 'bras bu rtag pa/ lha rnams dus dus su char 'bebs pas sa gzhi lo thog dang ldan zhing 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang
143a3: 'khrug long dang / chomo rkun dang / mu ge dang / nang rnams rab tu zhi bar gyur la/ mi rnams rtag tu chos la gzhol ba na chos kyi rgyal srid byed tu 'jug go// ji tsam na rgyal po de so ka'i ngas la bab nas shing
143a4: rnams kyi me tog kha 'bus shing drang ba dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne tse dang / ri skegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u rnams skad 'byin pa'i nags khrod du btsun mo'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor nas bskyed mos
143a5: tshal gyi gnas su song ba dang / ji tsam na mi lus gnyer mas gang ba/ mgo skya ba/ lus kyi yan lag rnyis pa/ dbang po rgud pa/ sha skams pa/ zho sha chung bzhig kha ra ba la brten nas gom pa dal bu dal bus 'gro ba zhig
143a6: mthong ngo / / de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan ngag mi lus gnyer mas gang ba mgo skye ba zhes bya ba nas/ khar ba la brten nas 'gro ba 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de rnams kyis
143a7: smras pa/ lha de ni 'du byed rnams dengs pas rgas 'khogs pa zhes bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ljon dag nga la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha chos 'di ni thun mong lags so// /
143a8: de nas rgyal po yid mi bde zhing chas pa dang yang mi skya bo rbab rbab bo// lus gas shing thung thung po// lto ri sul lter 'dug pa/ rmA rnag gis gang pa/ yan lag dang nying lag rnams las 'dzag pa/ lhan pa rnams kyis dkris pa
143b1: zhig shugs ring po ring por 'byin cing khar ba la brten nas 'theng zhing 'gro bar chas pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi skya bo bsed bsed po zhes bya ba nas/ 'thed zhing 'gro bar
143b2: chas pa 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar god ma bzhin du'o/ / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni nad kyis thebs pa zhes bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dgod la yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ blon
143b3: po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha chos 'di ni thun mong lags te/ nyes par spyod pa'i las bgyis pa rnams la sngon gyi las kyi nyes pas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ rnam pa thams cad du sdig pa mi bya'o snyam du bsams
143b4: nas chas pa dang yang des ras sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan dang / dung dang / rnga ba ta ha dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dag bun
143b5: long zhing / mi bzhis bteg nas mgyogs mis ni sna drangs/ skyes bu lag na shing thogs pa ni phye bzhin 'brang zhingad kyi hud pha/ kyi hud sdug pa/ kyi hud spun/ kyi hud jo bo zhes kun du dud mo'i sgra 'don pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang
143b6: blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag ras sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams kyis phyogs brgyan cing zhes bya ba nas/ dang mo'i sde 'don pa 'di ci zhig yin zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// blon po
143b7: rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag ngal yang 'di lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha chos 'di ni thun mong lags so// de nas rgyal pos rgas pa
143b8: dang / nad pa dang / shi ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste/ bdag gis kyang 'di lta bu'i longs spyod rnams spang dgos so snyam nas slar log ste mya ngan gyi khar par zhugs nas 'dug go// de'i yul na bram ze dus dpog ces bya ba
144a1: phrag pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba zhig yod de/ / des ji ltar rgyal pos nus pa dang / nad pa dang / shi ba mthong ste yid byung nas mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug pa thos so// thos nas kyang bram ze brgya stong du mas yongs su
144a2: byakror cing shing rte rdzong ma dang ldan pa thams cad nas dkar ba'i nang du zhugs te/ gser gyi khar pa dang ril bsti thugs thegs nas kyu po skrag sgoms gangan bu de sa 'i sa phyin pa dang / rgyal pa la smon pa rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bram ze rus dpog cha
144a3: sgon mchis so/ / de nas rgyal po bya ri byung nas dkor khang du 'dug pa dang / bram ze dus dpog gis rgyal ba dang tshe spel ba dag byas te 'dug nas smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du thugs ngan gyi khang par zhugs te bzhugs/ rgyal pos ji ltar gyur pa thams cad
144a4: bram ze dus dpog la rgyas par smras pa dang / des smras pa/ lha 'jig rten ni rang gi las kyi 'bras bu la spyod pa lags pas 'di la thugs ngan bgyir ma mchis so// sems can legs pa'i las bgyid pa rnams kyang mchis/ nyes pa'i las
144a5: bgyid pa rnams kyang mchis/ gnyi ga'i las bgyid pa yang mchis te/ 'khor los sgyur ba rnams ni rtag tu las legs pa bgyid de/ gum na yang lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// lha yang 'khor los sgyur ba lags te/ mi'i bde ba khyad par du
144a6: 'phags pa btar nas lha'i bde ba yang nyams su btar bar 'gyur mod kyi/ lha 'on kyang mtho rasi kyi them skas su gyur pa mchod sbyin la brtson par mdzod cig/ de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo bi/ shes ldan dag yul thams cad du
144a7: dril sgrogs su chug ste/ rgyal po gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed kyis khyod sheg la longs spyod cig ces sgo shig/ de nas rgyal pos sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug nas zas 'dod pa rnams ni zas/ btud pa 'dod pa rnams la ni btu dab
144a8: byin no/ / rer 'bras khud zo ba'i dong byas nas/ der dron pa dag blugs pa dang bsil bar gyur pas ma dros pa ma dros pa zhes bya bar grags so// de'i 'bras khu dang 'bras bkrus pa'i khu bas lo bcu gnyis tshang bar bkang bas lud par
144b1: gyur pa'i kha de nas 'bab chur bab pas 'bras khu'i chu 'bras khu'i chu zhes bya bar grags so/ / sdos la// gzhon nu beskyed dang glang chen sgra// dpung rgyan ldan dang nor ba can// sa la stobs dang sa la'i stobs// gser bre dang ni gnas bcas
144b2: dang / thugs pa dang ni mnyan yod dang // ma dros grong khyer bin du dang // yangs pa can ni tha ma yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul gzhon nu bskyed par gshegs nas gzhon nu bskyed par tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
144b3: dga' bo phyogs 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags zhes bya ba btsas nas 'di nyid du chen por gyur to/ / des na grong khyer yang gzhon nu bskyed po zhes grags so// krung krung sgra can du gshegs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
144b4: ldan pa/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo krung krung sgra 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags kyi glang po che dam pas krung kru de zhes bya ba'i skad phyung bas klu dkrud can kru de krud can zhes bya bar grags so// dpung rgyan ldan du gshegs nas
144b5: can ldan gyi phyogs zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do zhes za tha nas sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par gong ma bzhin du'o/ / nor bu can du gshegs nas nor bu can du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo nor bu can 'dir
144b6: byang chub sems dpas nor bu mang po'i mchod sbyin byas pas nor bu can zhes bya bar grags so/ / sa la'i stobs su gshegs nas sa la'i stobs kyi phyogs zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad nas zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bzhi'i gdan zhes bya ba rgyas par
144b7: gong mi bzhin du'o/ / gser gyi brer gshegs nas kun dga' bo gser gyi bre 'dir byang chub sems dpas gser mang po mchod sbyin byas pas da dud ying bram ze rnams gisar bres 'jal zhing 'geng pas gser gyi bre gser gyi bre zhes bya bar
144b8: grags so gnas bcas su gshegs nas gan sa kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gnas bcas 'dir rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shes bya ba 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang
145a1: mi mang pos gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/ / de dus gzhan zhig na spyi bor sha rmen 'jam zhing shin du 'jam pa zhig skye te/ dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba'am ras bal gyi 'dab pa bzhin du cung zad kyang gnod pa sked par mi byed de/ yongs su smin nas brtol pa las/
145a2: gzhon nu zhig byung na gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lkugs pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba zhes bya ba nas yan log thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ spyi bo skyes spyi bo skos zhes bya bar grags so// rgyal po gso
145a3: skyong 'phags kyis gzhon nu b+hud ma thag tu btsun mo'i 'khor drug khri'i nang du bsgri ba dang / mthong ma thag tu btsun mo de thams cad kyi nu ma las 'o mo zags nas so so nas smra ba/ nga las nu ra las nu zhes smras pas/ da las nu nga las nu zhes bya bar
145a4: grogs so/ / de la kha cig gis ni spyi bos skyes/ kha cig gis ni nga las nu zhes bya bar shes so// gzhon nu da las nu yul zhig tu song ba dang / rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags na par gyur nas/ de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras
145a5: bu'i sman gyis bkur sti byas kyang de slar thu bar gyur nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag myur du gzhon nu la rgyal srid kyi dbang skur bas dbang skur cig/ lha bka' bzhin tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis po nyas btang nas rgyal
145a6: po gso sbyong 'phags bsrung bar gyur nas des bka' stsal pa/ gzhon nu spyan drongs la rgyal srid kyi dbang skur ba nyams su myong bar gyis shig/ ces byung gis/ de bas na gzhon nu myur du gshegs pa'i rigs so zhes spring ngo do// des chas pa/
145a7: na rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shi'o// de nas yang blon po rnams kyis yang de la pho nya btang ste/ gzhon nu khyod kyi ya bi nongs kyis gshegs te rgyal srid bzhes su gsol zhes sprid pa dang / gzhon nu nga las nus bsams pa
145a8: bdag gi yab ni nongs na bdag dadeng ji ste 'gro snyam du bsams nas de nyid na 'dug pa dang / yang blon po rnams 'dus nas blon po'i gtso bo bo nyar btang nas de song ste smras pa/ gzhon nu gshegs la rgyal srid bzhes su gsol/ des
145b1: sa shA shA/ / da sa sa na
145b2: pa nga/ nakyil po tha~Mng rgyal sto pa sgyu jal khri// de bstan gzhin sa du gshegs pa'i sa pa// sasmras pa// gal ti ba gagis chos bzhin gyis rgyal zing 'thogro bar 'jun
145b3: du zang / don dalas kyi seMn pa bag na na shesun da pa / snang ba'i khri da thas pa/ bzan nas pa rnams kyis kyang ga sa nga / na / rabargyan gyi
145b4: lpags bo zang na gnas pa dang lhags pas gnas bcas gnas paca pa rnaMs b+ha ba grags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bom nyan yod gangan ba der 'dod // btsun pa
145b5: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis bltar mnyan nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod nas rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na sa phyogs shig na bram ze zhig/ zan ma zos par zhing med pa na/ de'i
145b6: che du bu mo zhig thug pa khyer te 'ongs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs de nyid du gshegs so// de nas bram zes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par rtun pa/ dpe byad bzung po brgyad
145b7: sem par zus pa/ 'od ma ga gis ban pa/ 'o ma stong bas lagag/ rin pa gyi ba 'jo bgang kun nas pa ba mdzang // mang ma tha tu ma bcom ldan 'das la dang nga skyes te/ degang ga 'i rgya
145b8: ba'i sems can la thog ma sangs rgyab mthong ba de ltar na lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas goms par byas pa la sems las bu rung bskye ba dang / bu med pa bu rnyed pa dang / dngul pos nor gyi gter mthong ba dang / rgyal srid la dga' brgyal
146a1: u0f7f/ srid kyi dang skur ba ni de lta ma yin no// des thug pa de khyer ta myur ba myur bar bcom ldan 'das gang na pa dang so de phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye gau ta ma 'di ni thug pa lags te/ gal
146a2: shes ldan gau tam bdag la thugs brtson 'jams gsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la khron pa rnying pa zhig bstan nas/ bram ze khyod kyis gal te yongs su btang na khron pa rnying pa 'dir lugs shig/ ngas khron pa rnying pa
146a3: dang blugs so/ / des zin pa rnying pa der thugs pa dang / 'di ltar yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus khron pa rnying pa de thug pa sa gang nas rlangs pa 'thul zhing 'dug par gyur to// de nas
146a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze dbos nas bram ze zug pa rims shig/ des brim par brtsams pa na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar dge 'dun thams cad kyis 'thungs kyang khron pa rnyid pa de de bzhin du thug pas gang nas rlangs pa 'thul
146a5: zhing 'dug par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas bram ze de lhag par yang mngon par dad par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
146a6: bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas de dang 'dra bar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas shes bya ba nas/ thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig
146a7: tshogs la lta ba'o ro'i rgyu mo nyi shu mtho ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/ btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so// mngon par 'phags so zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// bdag ni
146a8: com ldan 'das dang chos da dge slong ga dag dun la khyabs su mchi lags kyis/ bdag dag bsnyen drug cung drugs pa/ deng sran cad dri srid tsha bang du dang yang rdzas te/ skyabs su bache bar mngon par dang lags sa/
146b1: de nas bram ze de tshor ba ba spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang / zhing ba lo thog legs pa lta bu dang / dpa' bo g.yul dor rgyal ba lta bu dang / dad pa nad thams cad las thar pa lta bur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
146b2: dga' ste rjes su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // ji tsam na zhing drung du phyin pa dang / zhing de la gser gyi nas she dag skyes par mthong ngo // mthong nas kya
146b3: ya mtshan skyes nas mig bgrad de tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ kye ma yon tan rang bzhin zhing / nyes kun rnams par spangs pa la// bdag gis de ring sa bon btab// de ring nyid du 'bras bu thob// de nas bram ze de rings pa rings
146b4: par rgyal po'i drung du song nas son pa dang / rgyal ba dang tshe spel pa dag byas nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha bdag gis stsal nas stsal ba de rnams gser she dag tu gyur gyis de la spyan zhig bsko bar gsol/ rgyal pos spyan bskos te tang
146b5: ba dang / bram zes phung por byas te bgos pa las rgyal po'i skal ba nas tha mal bar gyur nas/ spyan gyis rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang / rgyal pos bsgo ba/ yang bgos shig/ yang bgos pa dang / de bzhin du rgyal po'i skal pa
146b6: ni nas tha mal bar gyur nas/ de ltar lan bdun gyi bar du bgos na de kho na bzhin du nas su gyur pa dang / rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes nas de bdag nyid song ste bltas na de bzhin du gyur nas des bram ze de la smras pa/ bram ze 'di ni khyod kyi bsod
146b7: nams las skyes pa yin gyis/ rgyal po'i skal pa zod la khyod kyis ci lpags pa de kho bo la byin cig/ de nas bram ze de shin du mgu bas ci byin pa de dag gi sar gyi nas sheg tu gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa dang /
146b8: dza tsem na phyogs gzhan zhig na zhing ba skya bo rbab rbab po rkang pa dang lag pa ser ga byung ba/ sha na'i ras kyi smad yogs gyon pa lnga brgya zhing rmad de// rmon pa de dag kyang lcag gzer bu can gyis gzhus pas lus smras shing rma byung bas
147a1: rmag 'dzag la sdum pa 'don bzhin du zhing rmed do/ / zhing ba de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa// de byad bzang po brgyad bcus mdzes par byas pa/ 'od 'dom
147a2: gang gse brgyan pa/ 'od zer nyi ma stod pas lhag pa/ rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas bzang ba mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i sems can rnams la thog mar sangs rgyas mthong ba ni zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas

149a3: srog ster rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgangs pa sems kyis shes par 'gyur bas thu rnams kyis bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci nag gi phyir 'dag tan pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad smras na/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag/

149b1: bdag cag 'dir lhags pa dag ni don med par gyur to zhes sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba skyes so/ / dge bsnyen zhig gis sa phyogs der bskor ba byas nas sems la sems kyis 'di snyam du mngon par 'dus byas te/ bdag gis
149b2: 'di la gom pa bor bas bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de'i 'gyod pa skyes pa bsal ba'i phyir dang / dge snyan de'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas
149b3: tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dad pas// sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni gom 'dor na// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi srang tshad ni// stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/ dge bsnyen gzhan zhig gis//
149b4: yang phyogs der 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig bzhag nas sems kyis 'di snyam du mngon par 'dus byas te/ re shig gom pa bor ba'i bsod nams kyang de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ 'di la 'jim pa'i gong bu bzhag pa'i bsod nams
149b5: ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge bsnyen de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ gang zhig rab dang sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi/ mchod rten la ni 'jim god 'dzeg byed na/ 'jam
149b6: bu'i chu ba'i gser gyi gong bu ni/ stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min// de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag gis kyang 'jim pa'i gong bu bcer to// gzhan dag gis de la me tog sil mas gtor nas sems kyis 'di snyam du mngon par
149b7: 'dus byas pa/ gom pa bor ba dang / 'jim pa'i gong bu'i bsod nams kyang de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bdag cag gi me tog sil ma rnams la bsod nams ji snyed cig du 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam
149b8: pathugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ gang zhig rab dang / sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi/ mchod rten me tog sil ma spungs pas 'thor// 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi bre bo ni// stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/ gzhan
150a1: ngag gis de la me tog gi phreng bas bskong ba byas nas sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ me tog sil ma rnams kyi bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bdag cag gi me tog phreng bas bskor ba la bsod nam sa
150a2: ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshogs su bcud de gsungs pa/ mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dang pas// sangs rgyas mchod rten me tog phreng bskor ba/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i
150a3: gser gyi sgrom dag na/ stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min/ gzhan dag gis de la mar me'i phreng ba phul nas sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/ me tog phreng bas bskor ba'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bdag cag
150a4: gi me mar phul ba'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshogs su bcad de gsungs pa/ mkhas pa gang zhig rab tu sems dad pas// sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me
150a5: 'bul byed na/ 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser srang bye ba ni/ stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min// gzhan dag gis de la dri'i chus chag chag btab nas sems kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa mar me 'bul ba'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das
150a6: kyis gsungs na/ bdag cag gis dri'i chus chag chag btab pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ mkhas pa grang zhig rab tu
150a7: sems dang pas/ / sangs rgyas mchod rten dri chus 'thor byed na/ 'dzam bu'i chu ba'i gser gyi phung po ni/ stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min// gzhan dag gis de la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan btags nas sems kyis
150a8: mngon par 'dus byas pa/ gas pa borang ba dang / 'dis gong bzhag pa dang // me tog si la mas gtor ba dang / me tog phreng bas bskor ba dang / mem daphul ba dang / dri'i chus gtor ba'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na 'ad/
150b1: cag gis gdugs dang // rgyal mtshan dang / 'phan btags pa'i bsod nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ rab dang sems kyis sangs
150b2: rgyas mchod rten la gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ni 'phan/ ni 'dogs byed na// gser ni rib lhun po dang mnyam pa// stong phrag brgya yang de dang mnyam pa min// rgya mtsho lta bu'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// de bzhin gshegs
150b3: pa tshad med pa/ / ded dpon bla na med pa la/ yon du bshad pa de yin no// de rnams 'di snyam du de la re shig bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la bya ba byas pa'i bsod nams de snyed du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs na/ bzhugs pa la bsod
150b4: nams ji snyed cig tu 'gyur snyam pa dang / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa/ 'di na sems rab dang byas nas/ gang zhig bzhugs dang gang zhig ni// mya ngan 'das la mchod byed pa//
150b5: bsod nams mnyam ste khyad par med/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi bya ba/ sangs rgyas chos kyang bsam mi khyab/ bsam mi khyab la dang rnams kyi// rnam par smin pa'ang bsam mi khyab/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khor lo
150b6: thogs pa med pa skor ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag g.yon tan ni rtogs par mi nus so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la gang thos na srog chags rgya stong phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis na nyen thos kyi
150b7: byang chub tu sems bskyed/ kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu semos bskyed/ kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa thob/ kha cig gis ni rtse mo/ kha cig gis ni bden pa dang 'thun pa'i bzod pa dag/ kha
150b8: cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ / kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas/ 'khor
151a1: de las phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol/ chos la 'bab/ dge 'dun la bab par bkod pa de lta bu'i chos bshad mad do// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis phyogs de nyid du dus ston btsugs pa dang / de nas chu mangs dus ston/
151a2: can chu mangs dus ston can zhes bya bar grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu ning gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas mnyan yon rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyan gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs sa/
151a3: khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das ko sa la nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang mnyan yod du byon nas/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi bdag gi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes zos so// thos nas kyang bcom/
151a4: ldan 'das gangan ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam
151a5: gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas khyim bdag mgon/
151a6: med zas sbyin stan las langs te zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sang bdag gi sdum par
151a7: gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gan bar mdzad du gsol zhes bya ba nas/ gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag sta gon byas nas/ nang par sngar langs te gdan bting nas nor bu'i chu snod sta gon byas nas shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/
151a8: bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol ba/ btsun pa gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol/ sgo srungs kyi mi la bsgo ba/ kyen rje shig sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
151b1: gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du gzhan mu stegs pa dag nang du ma gtang shig/ de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa rnams la sbyin no// rdo ba bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sgo srungs kyi mis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin las mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan
151b2: 'das snga co gam thabs mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsnams te dge slong gi chags kyis yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis btas nas zhes bya ba nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed bya bar gnas stan ches dma' bzhig
151b3: blangs te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dgon pa'i gnas mal zhig nas swa dang kha spu ring zhing chos gos ngan pa zhig gyon te rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs te/ des bltas na rgyal byed kyi tshal stong
151b4: par 'dug nas des dge skos la dris pa/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gang du bzhud/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis spyan drangs so// des bsams pa/ de nyid du bsod snyoms bza' zhing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
151b5: slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bya'o snyam nas/ de khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim du song ba dang / sgo srungs kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa nang du ma bzhud par gzhes shig/ ci'i phyir khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi mchid nas re shig sangs
151b6: rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod ma gsol gyi bar du gzhan mu stogs pa dag nang du ma gtang shig/ de'i 'og tu mu stegs pa rnams la sbyin no zhes bsgo lags so// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos bsams pa/ bram ze dang khyim
151b7: bdag dag gis bdag la dge sbyong shAkya'i sras kyi yin no zhes bya bar ma shes pa de ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs pa da gyis song la skye bo bkren pa rnams la snying rje bya'o snyam du bsams te bskyed mos tshal du song na sa des bsams pa/ deng bdag gis
151b8: su zhig rjes su bzung bar bya snyam pa dang / re shig cig na grong phyi nyug ma mdzes thebs pa lus zhigs shing lus las rnag khrag 'dzag pa zhig slongs mo la rgyu zhing 'dug nas de'i drung du de song ba dang des kyang bslangs na 'bras bu zhig rnyed nas/ des tshe dang ldan
152a1: pa 'od srung chen po lus mdzes pa dang sems dang zhing spyod lam zhi bar mthong nas des bsams pa/ nges par bdag gis yon gnas 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pas des na bdag 'di lta bu'i gnas su gyur gyis/ gal te 'phags
