152a2: pa 'od srung chen pos bdag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir 'bras khu ba zhes na bdag gis 'di dbul lo snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas lhung bzed bzed de/ sring mo gal te khyod kyis btang ba yin na lha
152a3: bzed 'dir lugs shig/ de nas des sems mngon par dad par byas nas lhung bzed der blugs pa dang / spang ma zhig lhung ngo // des de dbyung bar brtsams pa dang / 'bras khu de'i nang du ser mo gcig chad de lhung ngo do// des bsams pa/ 'phags pas
152a4: bdag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir ma phor zad kyi 'on kyang gsol ni mi gsol lo snyam pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas de'i mngon sum kho nar 'bab pa'i rtsig drung zhig tu 'dug nas 'thungs pa dang / des bsams
152a5: pa/ cung zad du na bdag gi sems bsrung ba'i phyir gsol gyi/ 'on kyang 'dis zas kyi geg chod par ni ma byas so snyam pa dang / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas grong phyi nyug ma de la 'di skad ces smras so//
152a6: sring mo rab du dga' ba skyed cig dang khyod kyis byin pa'i zas 'dis kho bo nyin zhag gcig 'da' bar bya'o// de lhag par dga' ba skyes nas bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la bsod snyoms bstabs na bzhes so snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa
152a7: 'od srung chen po la sems dad pa bskyed nas shi bas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes so/ / lha rnams kyi dbang po rgyu byin gyis des 'bras khu zhig phul nas sems mngon par dad par byas nas shi ba ni mthong na gang du skyes pa la mthong nas/ des sem
152a8: can dmyal bar brtag par brtsams na yang ma mthong / dud 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / mi dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams su yang ma mthong ste/ 'di ltar lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug gi gong du mi 'jug go//
152b1: xxx/ xxx
152b2: zung bag de pon/ / song mam byir ni rngubs/ 'od chu sa tha phral la// bra me na gang dga' lags// bcom ldan dasas pa 'phrul pa// du ldan zhes pa'i lda na / da pa thams cad stong ba/ 'ang/
152b3: xxx/ xxx
152b4: man ga zhin mas kyi ma cus gnapa pag sted da ga na ya T+Tas/ gas pa da rgya chen pa 'di sdug pa dang/ mgan pa dang / yin nga / bangs pa ma tha
152b5: ba yin gyis/ ma la bdag gis 'dem pa ma sgoms bsgrubs par bya'o snyam du ngas mas nas/ bkren pa'i srang du khyim shig shig tu 'dug pa/ stang lhong rdol ba shin du mi zad bzhig sprul nas 'a ma thag pa sgra yangs pa/ shan
152b6: ra kyi bra yogs ston pa/ / gang lags dag byung bzhig tu stsal nasangs 'thag par brtsams so// lham pa mags pa gapa ma byas nasangs spyad 'dra bar brnams so// de'i phyogs gcig rgyan gyi nal zas na/
152b7: sa/ das na po bzhin pa/ ma sa pa dang / ngas pa'i pa rnams parjes sus pa kyir ngas pa byinan pa 'din ga thal bzhi nas smras
152b8: nas sgor bsdad pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i zhal zas kyis bkang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od su na po 'dims lha'i bdud rtsil khyim gyi spungs ni 'di tsam pas shin du 'gal lo zhes bsams te/ bdag
153a1: gi snying la the tshom skyes pa/ 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma bsams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pas bsams pa la zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya bya ni yin par mthong nas des smras pa
153a2: ko shi ki 'di lta ra nga bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyod kyi yun ring po nas rjes su 'brel ba'i the tshom dang so ma nyo zug rngu nas byung zin na rje phyir skye bo sdug bsngal ba'i bar chad byed/ 'phags pa
153a3: 'dron chen pa skye bosrog bsngal ba'i bar chang kyisti bad/ ri shAg sa 'di rnam sa na bsod nams pa/ mngon sum dum mthong na yang sbyin pa dag gtong / bsod nams dag pacing na/ bdag pasod nams dag mngon sum du mthong zhing dang /
153a4: gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa go ci'i phyir sbyin pa dag mi btang / bsod rnams ngag mi bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsod nams dag ni bya dgos te// bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur// bsod
153a5: rnams dag ni byas pa yis/ / 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol dga'/ zhes ma gsungs sam/ de phyin chad tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bsams nas khyim rnams su bsod snyoms la 'gro bar brtsams so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
153a6: nam mkha' la 'dug bzhin du lha'i zhal zas kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung gi lhung bzed 'gengs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos lhung bzed las phub pas bza' ba dang btung ba bor bar gyur pa'i skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong rnams
153a7: gyis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de'i phyir rjes su gnang gis lhung bzed kyi kha ga yogs bcang bar bya'o// grong phyi thug mche ge mo zhes bya bas 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la 'bras khu gsol nas de dga' ldan
153a8: lha rnams kyis ris su skyes so zhes kun du sgra grags so/ / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis grong rtsi zug mche ge mo zhes byabs 'phags pa 'od srung chen po la 'bras bu gsol nas dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris sa skyes so zhes tham
153b1: so/ / thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos dang /
153b2: ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jig par mdza ces bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu ga' bar mdzad nas cang migasung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gas la rgyal san
153b3: las ladas te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mogayas pa'i lhangs la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gdan bde logs su thal mo sna ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'o//
153b4: srasrung chen po'i slad du dgung bdun du bdag gdugs tshed sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang me gsung bas gnang ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom
153b5: ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsrod pa'i
153b6: bza' ba dang bca' ba dgra sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdun gting na no nr-i n+ya snod bzhag nas/ bcom ldan 'das la spyan dron gyis dus tshod gsol ba zhes bya ba nas/ rang gi la gnas stobs shing tshom par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gis
153b7: mngan no/ / mu sgo bzhig rgan bral logs na 'dug pa rgyal po 'di bsod nams dag mngon sum du mamong zhing rang bsod names kyi 'bras bul gnas pa son pas bsod na mas dag gis ngoms mi shes par sbyin pa dag gtong / bsod nams dag bye
153b8: zhes sams mngon par dang par gyur to/ / de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dag 'dun la rnams grangs du ma ngag tsang ning bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba ring gi la gnas bstabs shing tshim po bya /
154a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zan nas phyag bcabs te lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin snga lugago/ de nas bcom ldan nas kyis bka bus gcal po chen po sro'i mi nas rjod yon
154a2: sngobargya khyod kyi 'am/ 'on te khyod pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gang yin pa zhig gi rgyal pos bsams pa/ bdag gi bsod snyoms bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su longs spyad pas bdag pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gzhan
154a3: lha sa yod snyam du bsams nas/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag pas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed pa gang lags pa de'i ming nas brjod cing bcom ldan 'das kyis yon bsngo ba mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mu'o/
154a4: ba de'i ming nas brjod cing yod bsngo ba badzad do// de bzhin du nyi ma drug gi bar du mdzad pa dang / nyi ma drug pa la rgyal po lag pa la 'gram pa gtang nas/ bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi bsod snyoms longs spyad cing yon bsngo ba ni mu lto ba'i ming nas brjod
154a5: nas mdzad do snyam ste sems khongs su rud cing 'dug pa de blon po rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du phyag la zhal gtad te thugs mi dgyes shing bzhugs/ rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag da ltar bcom ldan
154a6: 'das ni de'i bsod snyos yongs su longs spyad na yon bshad pa ri mu lto ba'i ming nas brjod cing mdzad na/ ci ste sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug/ de nas blon po rgan po zhig gis spras pa/ lha thugs khral chung ngung bzhugs shig/
154a7: dang bdag gis sang ci nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha kho na'i mtshan nas brjod de yon bsngo ba de ltar bgyi'o// des zho sha sa 'tsho ba rnams la bsgo ba/ khyed kyis sad kha zas ches bsod pa dang rab tu mang po sta gon gyis la/ brim pa
154a8: yang 'di ltar ci nas kyang phyed ni dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi nang du 'gro la/ phyed ni sa la 'bo bar gyis shig/ de dag gis phyi de nyin kha zas ches bsod pa dang / ches rab tu mang ba bshams te/ de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge
154b1: slong gi dge 'dun legs par bzhugs par rig nas brim par brtsams te/ phyed ni dge slong rnams kyimi lhung bzed du blugs/ phyed ni sa la pho'o// de nas mu lto bas mal pho ba rnams bsdud pa'i phyir brgyugs pa dang / de phyag tshad 'drim
154b2: pa bdag gis slar ba skrang ngo / / de nas mu lto ba des smras pa/ gal te rgyal po 'di la nor rdzas rab tu mang ba yod na bdag cag lta bu sdug bsngal ba slong ba gang yin pa de dag la ci'i phyir mi sbyin// kha zas 'di bor ba ci phan zhes mu lto ba de
154b3: sems 'khrugs pas sngon gyi ji lta ba de ltar sems dad par bya ma nus so/ / de nas rgyal pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de rnams gdug ma tshod gsol zin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming nas smos te yon
154b4: bsngo ba ni mi mdzad do snyam du bsams nas yon sngob ma mnyan pa kho nar khyim du song ngo / / de nas bcom/ ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi mi de nas smos te yon bsngos pa 'di skad du mdzad de/ glang po rta dang shing rta dpung
154b5: bu rgud/ zhon nas grong khyer yul bcas 'khol byed pa// zan dron lan tshwa dag gis ma btab cing // sngam bag med pa'i mthu ni yin par ltos// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun
154b6: pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi pho brang du gdugs chod lan mang du gsol nas ming nas brjod de yon bsngo ba mdzad na/ 'di lta bu'i yon bsngo ba mdzad pa ni bdag gis sngon chad ni lan 'ga' yang ma thos lags
154b7: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi nas kyi dar thug lan tshwam ma btab pa la brtsams te las gyi rgya ba khyod nyan par 'dod dam/ bcom ldan 'das da de'i dus la bab
154b8: lags so/ / bde bar gshegs pa da de'i dus la bab lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi nas kyi dar thugs lan tshwa sa ma stsal ba las brtsams te las kyi rgyu ba bshad pa bcom ldan 'das las
155a1: dge slong rnams kyis thos nas 'dzin par 'gyur lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'or zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las
155a2: chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhes bya ba nas bskyed bsrings
155a3: chen por gyur to zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ / ji tsam na khyim bdag des chung ma la smras pa/ bzang mo bdag cag gi bu lon ded pa dang / nor 'phrog pa skyes kyis bdag zong thogs te yul gzhan du 'gro'o// de smras pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin
155a4: mdzod cig/ des zor thogs te yul gzhan zhig tu song ba las de de nyid du ma stes shi bar gyur to// de chen po mi bdog pa zhig pas de'i khyim gyi nor rnams zad pas de'i bu yang sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dang / khyim bdag de'i sten grogs shig yod pa
155a5: des de la smras pa/ khye'u kho bo'i zhing las dag byos shig dang ngas khyod kyi zan sbyar bar bya'o// des de'i zhing las dag bya bar brtsams nas des kyang de'i zan sbyar to// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dus ston la bab nas khye'u de'i mas bsams pa/ de
155a6: ni khyim bdag gi chung ma mdza' bshes dang gnyen dang nye du dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze'i skye bo rnams zan sbyin pas brel bar 'gyur gyis/ snga ba tshogs su song la khye'u de'i zan bskal lo snyam nas/ de sna 'tshags su song nas khyim bdag gi chung ma la
155a7: dag go bar bras pa dang de khros nas smras pa/ re sha gi dge slong dang / bram ze dang / nye du rnams kyang da dung ma byin par ma dag gzhugs pa khye'u la sprin nam/ re shig de ring ni sdod cig/ sad nyis 'gyur du sbyin no// de nas khye'u de'i mas
155a8: bsams pa/ khye'u bkres par ma gyur grang snyam nas bdag nyid kyi nas kyi zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa 'di skyal lo snyam mo// des de khyer nas zhing thog tu song ba dang khye'u des de rgyang mi rang ba zhig nas mthong nas des smras pa/ yum zhis
155b1: bo cung zad ma mchis sam/ des smras pa/ bu de ring ni zan nar ma gang yin pa nyid kyang med do// yum ce ste lags/ des bral khyim bdag gi chung mji skad du byed de dag thams cad rgyas par bsnyad nas zan rngon lan tshas ma btab pa 'di yang
155b2: kho mo nyid kyis khyer te 'ongs kyis/ bu 'di zo shig ces smras pa dang / des smras pa/ zhog la bzhud cig/ des bzhag ste song ngo // sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman zhing ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/
155b3: bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur bas ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig phyogs der phyin pa dang / des de lus mdzes pa dang / sems dang ba dang / spyod lam zhi bar mthong na/
155b4: des bsams pa/ gdon mi za bar bdag gis yon gnas yang dag pa 'di lta bu la bya ba ma byas pa des na bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su gyur gyis/ gal te bdag las zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa 'di bzhes na bdag gis
155b5: de la dbul bar bya'o snyam pa dang / de nas rang sangs rgyas des skyes bu bkren pa de'i bsam pa sems kyis shes nas lhung bzed bzed de/ bzhin bzangs gal te khyod kyis btang ba yin na lhung bzed 'dir chug shig/ de nas des dad pa
155b6: chag thos can rngon lan tshas ma btab pa rang sangs rgyas de la bral lo/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tsha de'i dus kyi khang bkren pa gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di nyid yin te/ de rdo'i dus na 'a
155b7: sangs rgyas la zan dron lan tshwas ma btab pa bral ba gang yini pa'i las desan lan drag du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug sa dang byas / / mnyan yod di ny-id du ya ban rgya pa rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bsku /
155b8: las kyi lhag ma nyid kyis da ltar yang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bsrur bar gyur u0f7f/ ngas 'di'i ban pon gyi rnam par srin pa rdzogs pa de la dgongs nas/ glang po rta dang shing rta dpung bu chung/ zhon nas thong khyer yul bcas 'khor byed
156a1: pa/ zan dron lan tshwa dag gis ma btab cing / snum pag med pa'i mthu ni yin par ltos/ zhes gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi zan dron lan tshwa sa ma btab pa las brtsams nas las kyi
156a2: rgyu ba bshad do zhes kun du sgra grags pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis thos nas/ de bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu
156a3: 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis zhes bya ba nas/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
156a4: stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das
156a5: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag dgung zla ba gsum dun bza' chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / snyun gsol gyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams 'bul zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
156a6: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis zla ba gsum du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa gsol nas dge slong re re la yang
156a7: 'bum ri ba'i gos re re bskon te/ 'bru mar gyi bum pa bye ba bsogs nas mar me'i phreng ba bltam par brtsams so// de na gdugs tshod kyi kha dang mchod pa'i tshe ca co'i sgra chen po grag pa dang / ci tsam na grong nyug ma shin du sdug sngal ba zhig
156a8: rje'i chag dra ma zhig thogs te slong ba la zhugs pa des sgra chen po dang sgra mthon po thos so/ / thos nas kyang dris pa/ shes ldan dag sgra mthon po dang sgra chen po 'di ci zhig yin/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
156b1: gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la zla ba gsum du gdugs tshod gsol nas dge slong re re la yang 'bum ri ba'i gos re re bskon te/ 'bru mar gyi bum pa bye ba bsogs te mar me'i phreng ba gtong bar brtsam pa yin no// de
156b2: nas grong shug ma de 'di snyam du sems te/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'di bsod nams kyis doms mi shes nas da dung yang sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag byed na/ ma la bdag gis kyang 'ga' zhig las bslangs la bcom ldan 'a
156b3: la me mar zhig bltam mo snyam nas/ / des bslangs pa'i 'bru mar cung zad snod gyo ral gyi nang du blugs te bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa'i slad du mar me bltam nas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar ston
156b4: pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na 'jig rten du byung ba de bzhin du/ bdag kyang skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na ston pa shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba kho nar 'gyur zhing / yang ji ltar 'di'i zung mchog dang zung bzang po
156b5: shA re'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang / yab zas gtsang dang / yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang / sras gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po dang / grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi lags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi ya
156b6: zung mchog dang zung bzang po shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang / yab zas gtsang dang / yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang / sras gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po dang / grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir 'gyur
156b7: zhing ji ltar yang bcom ldan 'das 'di sku gdung gses nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de bzhin du/ bdag kyang bu gdung gsas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces byas so// ji tsam na mar me de dag thams cad ni
156b8: shi'o/ / des btang ba'i mar me ni 'bar zhing 'dug go// chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji srid nang du yang dag ma bzhag pa de srid du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nye gnas rnams nang du yang dag mi 'jog
157a1: par tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bsams pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od la mnal bar mdzad pa de na gnas ma yin zhi go skabs med pas mal bdag gis mang me gsad par bya'o snyam nas des lag
157a2: pas gsad par brtsams pa las ma nus so/ / de nas chos gos kyi grwa dang / de nas bsil yab kyis g.yabs na 'on kyang gsad par ma nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
157a3: dga' bo 'di ci byed/ des gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi glo pa la bsams pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od la mnal bar mdzad pa ni gnas ma mchis shing go skabs ma mchis kyis/ ma la bdag
157a4: gis zhugs mar dgram mo snyam nas bdag gis de sug pas dgum par brtsams na rngo mi thog go/ de nas chos gos kyi grwa dang / de nas gsil yab kyis g.yabs na 'on kyang rngom thog lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
157a5: bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo dub par ma byed cig/ gal te rnam par 'thor rlung langs na des kyang gsad par mi nus na lag pa dang / chos gos kyi grwa dang / bsil yab kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'di ltar mar me 'di ni
157a6: bu ma 'das sems kyis mngon par 'du byed pa chen pos bus pa yin no/ / gzhan yang kun dga' bo bu mo 'di ni skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
157a7: rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing de'i zung mchog dang zung bzang po shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / nye gnas dge slong kun dga' bo dang / yab zas gtsang dang / yum lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo dang / sras gzhon nu sgra gcan zin
157a8: bzang po dang / grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi zhes bya bar 'gyur la/ de sku gdung gses nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// grong nyug ma che ge mo zhes bya bas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'chag sa'i slad du mar me btang bas de bcom
157b1: ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to zhes kun tu sgra grags pa bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis zos nas/ / de'i ma 'ongs pa'i yon tan la bsams nas yo byad thams cad kyis
157b2: bstabs so/ / de nas kos la'i rgyal po gas lapa rgyal gyis zos nas de nas ngamatshar skyes te/ 'brumar bum pa stong bsdogs nas mang ma ga tshegs su sbrengs te rin pa che sna bzhi'i mar me 'chag sa'i slad du bus so// de nas bcom ldan
157b3: 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis 'phags pa 'od srung chen po mchod pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun gyi ba du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
157b4: bdag gi sngon gyi tshal ma dron po lan tshwas ma stsal ba las brtsams te las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bdag gis dgung zla gsum du gdugs tshod gsol nas dge slong re re la yang
157b5: 'bum ri ba'i gos phrugs re bskon te/ 'bru mar bum pa bye ba bsdogs te phreng bar sbrengs nas zhugs mar blta ma lags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan lags na/ bcom
157b6: ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur bar lta na/ bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan na legs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po bla na med pa
157b7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni zab pa/ zab par snang ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ rtogs par dka' ba/ brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/ rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/ zhib mo brtags pa'i rtogs pa dang / mkhas pa dang
157b8: 'dzangs par rig par bya ba ma yin te/ de ni khyed kyi sbyin pa lan gcig byas pas thob par sla ba ma yin te/ sbyin pa la/ brgyas ma yin/ sbyin pa lan stong gis ma yin/ sbyin pa lan brgya phrag stong gis
158a1: ma yin no/ / 'on kyang rgyal po chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod na sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin/ bsod nams dag kyang bya zhing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag kyang bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen
158a2: bkur bya'o/ / rgyal po chen po khyed kyis de bzhin du sbyin pa dag ni btang / bsod nams dag ni byas shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag kyang sten/ bsnyen/ bsnyen bkur byas na de lta na khyod nam zhig na 'jig rten gyi gtso bo 'dren par 'gyur
158a3: gang/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal mchi ma blags te dus so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis gos kyi mtha' mas mchi ma phyis nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ btsun pa
158a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba na sbyin pa ni ci snyed cig stsal/ bsod nams ni ji snyed cig bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po re shig 'das pa'i/
158a5: la ba gzhan rnams lta zhog gi/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer bas rnam grangs du mar sbyin pa btang ba dang / bsod nams byas pa de dag legs par rab tu nyon la zung shig dang /
158a6: bshad do// / bar sdom la// nga las nu dang legs mthong che/ dus dbog ku sha gdol pa dang // lha chen po dang mu khyud rgyal// me long gdong dang nor bzangs dang // thams cad sgrol dang 'dum byed do// rgyal po chen po
158a7: sngon byung ba ste dgu rnams kyi tshe lo dpag tu med pa na rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags shes bya ba byung bar gyur te/ de'i spyi bor sha rmen 'jam zhing shin du 'jam pa zhig skyes pa dper na shing bal gyi 'da' ba 'am/ ras bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur
158a8: gnod pa cung zad kyang mi skyed do/ / de yongs su smin nas rdol ba las gzhon nu gzugs bzang po mdzes pa/ blta na sdig pa/ lpags pa'i mdog gisang 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ 'phral ba'i dbyes che ba/
158b1: srin ma 'jang ba/ sna'i gzangs ma thob/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa'i lus dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo // byung ma thag tu btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du bkri ba dang / rgyal
158b2: po gso sbyong 'phags kyi btsun mo brgyad khris gzhon nu mthong nas nu ma rnams las 'o ma zags pa dang / bud med re res kyang nga las nung las nu zhes smras pas de'i mid da las nud las nu zhes bya bar gyur to// gzhan dag di ni ni spyi bo las skyes pa/
158b3: de'i phyir gzhon nu'i ming spyi bo skyes shes bya'o zhes zer to// de na kha cig gis ning las nu zhes bya bar shes so// kha cig gis ni spyi bo skyes shes bya bar shes so// gzhon nung las nu gzhon nu'i rtsod mos rtsa ba la brgya byin dug shi 'phos pa lon
158b4: no/ / rgyal 'tsha ba la gnas pa la brgya byin drug sha 'phos pa lon no// gzhon nu nga las nu yul zhig tu song ste/ de yul du phyin pa dang rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags na par gyur nas de rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu'i sman
158b5: gyis bsnyen bkur byas na yang phyir thu ba kho nar gyur nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag myur du gzhon nu la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bas/ dbang bskar cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon po rnams kyis pho nya bkug
158b6: ste rgyal po gso sbyong 'phags bsnyud nas/ des gzhon nu spyan drongs la rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba nyams su myong bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal gyis/ gzhon nu myur du byon pa'i rigs so zhes spring ngo // de chas pa dang rgyal po gso sbyong
158b7: 'phags shi'o/ / de nas blon po dag gis yang pho nya gzhan zhig gtong ba la bzhon nu khyed kyi ya ba ni nongs kyis/ tshur spyon rgyal srid bzhes shig ces spring ngo do// gzhon nu nga las nus bsams pa/ gal te bdag gi yab nongs na dang
158b8: song yang ci pan snyam du bsams nas de nyid na 'dug go/ / blon po rnams yang 'dus nas blon po zhig po nyar btang ba dang de song nas smras pa/ gzhon nu d+hil srid bzhes shig/ des smras pa/ gal te kho bos chos dang 'thun pas rgyal
159a1: srid 'thob par 'gyur na rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba 'di nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / blon po rnams kyis sprid pa/ lha rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba la ni mang du 'tshal te/ rin po che'i gcal dang / seng ge'i khri dang / gdus
159a2: dang / cod pan dang / dbu rgyan gyis pho brang gi nang du rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur bar bgyi 'tshal bas de lta bas na gzhon nu 'di nyid du byon pa'i rigs so// des smos pa/ ngas chos dang 'thun par rgyal srid 'thob pa lta na thams cad 'di nyid du
159a3: 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro ba gnod sbyin lha gnas shes bya ba des rin po che'i gcal dang / seng ge'i khri de nyid du blangs so// pho brang nas gnas pa rnams kyis kyang gdugs dang / cod pan dang / dbu
159a4: rgyan khyer nas rang de nyid du lhags te/ pho brang 'khor ba rang lcags pos gnas de'i ming gnas bcas gnas bcas shes bya bar grags so// phyis blon po de rnams dang / khrom gyi ra pa dang / grong mi dang / yul mi rnams kyis ni dbang
159a5: bskur ba khyer te deng nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha dbang bskur ba bzhes su gsol/ des smras pa/ dra mi rnams kyis cod pan bcing ngas/ gal te chos kyi rgyal srid 'thob na mi ma yin pa rnams kyis cod pan 'ching grang / ji tsam na de mi
159a6: ma yin pa rnams kyis cang ban bcings pa dang / de'i rin po che sna bdun byung ba 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / ta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa
159a7: blo po rin po che nyid do/ / de la bu dpa' brtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar byung ngo // yangs pa can gyi nyen kor na nags tshal sdug po dag dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa
159a8: zhig yod pa de na drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa lnga brgya bsam gtan byed do/ / nags tshal stug pa de na yang bya gar rab tu mang po dag cig kyang gnas so// bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas bya gar rnams lding zhing skad 'byin par byed
159b1: pa dang / de nas drang srong rang bzhin ngan zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de 'khrugs nas des bya gar rnams la mdab gshog rnams lhags par shog shig ces dmod pa bor ro// de rnams drang srong 'khrugs pas mngab gshog rnams lhags pa grwar
159b2: to/ / de nas de rnams rkang pas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang / rgyal ba de yang ldengs rgyar song bas bya gar rnams rkang pas 'gro ba mthong ngo // de nas des blon po rnams la dris pa/ ci'i phyir bya gar 'di rnams rkang pas 'gro bar gyur/
159b3: blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni skra lags pas drang srong 'khrugs pa dag gis 'di rnams la dmod pa bor ba dang / de nas drang srong 'khrugs pas 'di rnams kyi bdapa gshog rnams lhags par char to// dan rgyal pos smras pa/
159b4: gang dag sems can rnams la snying brtse ba med pa'i drang srong 'di lta bu yang yod pa lta zhes smras nas/ shes ldan dag deng la drang srong rnams la khyed cag nga'i yul na ma 'dug shig ces sgo shig ces smras so// de nas
159b5: blon po rnams drang srong gi thad tu dong nas bsgo ba/ rgyal po'i zhal nas khyed cag nga'i yul nam 'dug shog ces bka' stsal to// drang srong rnams kyis bsams pa/ rgyal po 'di ni gling bzhi la dbang ba yin pas ri rab kyi bang rim du
159b6: 'gro'o snyam nas/ de rnams der dong ste gnas so// rgyal po nga las nu'i mi rnams ni sems par byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / nye bar rtogs par byed pa yin te/ de dag gis bsams shing nye bar brtags nas bzo'i gdas
159b7: dang las kyi gnas pa dad pa rnams bya bar brtson pas de rnams bya bar brtson pas de rnams sems par byed pa dang / 'jal bar byed pa dang / nye bar rtogs par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ming shed las skyes shed las skyes zhes bya bar grags
159b8: so/ / de rnams kyis zhing las ngag bya bar brtsams pa dang / rgyal po ljongs rgyur song bas mi de rnams zhing las dag byed par mthong nas/ des blon po rnams la smras pa/ mi 'di rnams ci zhig byed/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha
160a1: kun du 'gyur bar brtse ba'i srad du la thag lasags pa stan pa lagasas/ / rgyal bas smras pa/ bdag ga rgyal srad kyi ma rnams nang sas byed pa/ na ma das smras pa/ smram sazan cags te tha na bdun
160a2: bob shig ces byas pa dang / rgyal po las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu ltas sa bon gyi rigs nyi shurtsa bdun gyi char babago// rgyal po las rus yul mi rnams la dris pa/ 'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung / de rnams kyis
160a3: smras pa/ lha'i yang lags/ bdag cag gi yang lags so// yang mi de rnams ras bal gyi zhing mo bar brtsams pa dang / yang rgyal po las nu ljongs d+hur song bas mthong nas/ de nas blun po rnams la smras pa/ ma 'di rnams ca zhig/
160a4: byed/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha mi 'di rnams ni ras bal gyi zhing med lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ci zhig du dgos/ de rnams kyis spes pa/ lha gos bgyi ba'i slang du'o/ de nas rgyal po nga las nus smras pa/ ci ri'i rgyal
160a5: srid kyi mi rnams ras pal gyi zhing med dam/ lha ras pal gyi khana'i char po btsag ces byas pa dang / rgyal po las nas sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas ras pal kho na'i ching bshig/ rgyal pos yul mi rnams la chis pa 'di sa
160a6: su'i bsod nams kyis byung / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i yang lags/ bdag cag gi yang lags so// yang me de rnams ras bal de rnams 'khal bar brtsams pa na rgyal pos smras pa/ mi 'di dag ci zhig byed/ blon po
160a7: rnams kyis smras pa/ lha skud pa 'tshal ba'i slad du ras bal de 'khal lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ ci nga'i rtsal sred kyi mi rnams ras skud 'khal lam/ lhas ras skud kyi char kho na ze bshig ces byas pa dang / rgyal por las/
160a8: nus sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas ras skur kho na'i char phab bo// rgyal pos des smras pa/ 'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i yang lags/ bdag cag gi yang lags so// de nas rim gyis ras
160b1: 'grag par brtsams pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di dag ci zhig byed/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gos su bgyi ba'i slad du ras 'thag lags so// rgyal pos bsams pa/ de ci nga'i rgyal srid kyi mi rnams ras 'thag gam snyam nas/ lhas
160b2: ras nyid kyi char po bshig ces byas pa dang / rgyal po ngal nus sems bsad ma thag tu lhas ras nyid kyi char bab bo// rgyal pos dris pa 'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'a yang lags/ bdag cag gi yang
160b3: lags so/ / rgyal pos bsams pa/ mi 'di rnams ni bdag gi bsod nams dag gi mthu rab tu mi shes te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang me mang pos gang ba yang yod/ bdag
160b4: la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / btsun mo rini po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/ bdag la bu dpa' ba/ rtul pod ga/ yan
160b5: lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par byed pa stong yang tshang bar yod kyis/ kye ma bdag gi pho brang gi nang du rin po che'i char 'bab cing de las phyi rol du ni kar sha pa Na 'ga' yang mi 'bab par gyur cig snyam
160b6: pa dang / rgyal po de las nus sems bskyed ma thag tu pho brang gi nang du zhag bdun du rin po che'i char bab bo// phyi rol du ni kar sha pa Ni 'ga' yang ma bab ste/ ji ltar mthu chen po/ rdzu 'phrul chen po/ bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/
160b7: rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu so sor nyams su myong ba bzhin no// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'di dag su'i bsod nams kyis byung / de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha'i lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis nyes
160b8: gal te khyed kyis lha'i bsod nams kyis lags so/ / zhes smras dang / ngas 'dzam bu'i glid mtha' dag tu rin po che'i char phab par 'gyur ba zhig/ 'on kyang khyed las rin po che su 'dod pa des rin po che ci 'dod pa dag lo da shig/ de
161a1: nas rgyal po las nu rgyal srid chen pa 'dabang byed du 'jug pa la brgya byin drug gi 'bas pa lanan/ / ngalas tshwa mdun nas 'gro ba zhin da sbyin lha gnas shes bya ba de la rgyal pos smras pa/ gangangs bka' bul dgos pa
161a2: bka' 'og tu ma chud pa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/ lha gnas kyis smras pa/ lha shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bgyi ba'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba mchis kyis/
161a3: lha der gshegs te bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas rgyal po de las nu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gad ba yang yod/ bdag la rin po
161a4: che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/ bdag la bu dpa' ba rtul phod pa/
161a5: yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshad/ bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du bab na/ shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i gling zhig yod ces grag gis ma la
161a6: bdag dang yang song la rjes su bstan par bya'o/ / snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal pong las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang thabs gcig tu bu stong gas yongs su bskor nas mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang nam mkha
161a7: la 'phags te/ rgyal po nga las nu shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du chas nas rgyal po nga las nu shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du gnas te/ rgyal po nga las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ mthu chen po/
161a8: rdzu 'phrul chen pos rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba ltar shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo rgya stong phrag mang por rjes su bstan par byas so//
161b1: de shar gyi lus 'phags gling na rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no// yang rgyal po nga las nus gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/ bka' 'og tu mchud pa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/ lha gnas kyis smras pa/ lha nub kyi ba lang
161b2: spyod ces bya ba'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba mchis kyis lha der yang gshegs te rjes su bstan du gsol//
161b3: 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa gcig pa/ de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba yang yod/
161b4: bdag gi pho zang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du bab/ bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du phyin/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags
161b5: kyi gling du rjes su bstan na/ nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya ba'i gling zhig yod ces grag gis/ ma la ba dag der yang song la rjes su bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang /
161b6: thabs gcig tu bu stong gis yongs su bskor nas mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te/ rgyal po nga las nu nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du chas nas rgyal po da las nu nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du gnas te/
161b7: rgyal po de las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ mthu chen po/ rdzu 'phrul chen pos rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba ltar nub kyi ba lang sprod kyi gling du lo mang po dang / lo ba rgya phrag mang po dang / lo
161b8: stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por rjes su bstan par byas so// de nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling na rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drag shi 'phos pa lon no// yang rgyal po de las nus gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/ bka' 'o//
162a1: tum chud pa'i gling gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/ lha gnas kyis smras pa/ lha byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bgyi ba'i gling 'byor ba dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo lags pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang la/ gzhan yang med dag ni bdag/
162a2: gir bgyi ba ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa zhig mchis kyis/ kye ma lha der yang gshegs te/ nyid kyi dpung gi tshogs rnams la rjes su bstan du gsol/ de nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i
162a3: gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gangad ba yang yod/ bdag gi pho brang gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du bab/ bdag shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du song ste/ yang lo mang po dang / lo brgya pag
162a4: mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling du rjes su bstan/ bdag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du yang song ste lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya
162a5: stong phrag mang por bdag gis nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du rjes su bstan na/ byang gi sgra mi snyan ces bya ba'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang la/ gzhan yang mi de dag ni bdag gir bya ba/
162a6: med pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa zhig yod ces grag gis/ ma la bdag der yang song la rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su bstan par bya'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po nga la nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang thabs gcig tu bu
162a7: stong gas yongs su bskor nas mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang nam mkha' la 'phags te chas pa dang / rgyal po nga las nus ri rab kyi ngos logs nas sa phyogs dkar ning dkar ba dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin lhaganas
162a8: la smras pa/ lha gnas sa phyogs dkar zhing dkar ba pha pi ci zhig yin/ lha de ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru lags te/ 'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams ni marmo sa ma btab pa'i 'brasas lu'i
162b1: 'bru la longs spyod pa lags pas lha yang der yang gshegs nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru la longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/ / rgyal po da las nus thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ sna bo dag khyed kyis sa phyogs 'ag
162b2: zhig dkar ba dag mthong ngam/ lha mthong lags so// sna bo dag de ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru yin te/ 'di ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i mi rnams ni ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru la longs
162b3: spyod pa yin pas/ khyed cag kyang der song nas ma rmo sa ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru la longs spyod par 'gyur ro// rgyal po da las nu chas pa na ri rab kyi ros logs na bkra zhing bkra ba'i ljon pa phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa dag rgyang ring po
162b4: kho na nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang yang gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/ lha gnas bkra zhing bkra' ba'i ljon pa phreng ba bkod pa bzhin du gyur pa pha bi ci zhig yin/ lha de rnams ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi shing lags te/ 'di ltar
162b5: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi gos 'tshal lags so/ / rgyal po nga las nus thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ sna bo dag khyed kyis bkra zhing bkra bI ljon pa phreng ba bkod pa bzhin tu gyur pa dag mthong ngam/
162b6: lha mthong lags so// sna bo dag rnams ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi dpag bsam gyi gos kyi shing yin te/ 'di ltar byang gi sgra ma snyen gyi ma rnams ni dpag bsam gyi shing gi gos gyon pa yin gyis/ khyed kyang der son nas dgas
162b7: gyis shing gi gos gyon par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po de las nu byang gi sgra mi snyan du song ste/ rgyal po ra las nu byang gi sgra mi snyan du 'dug nas/ rgyal po nga las nus ji ltar sems can bsod nams byas pa/ dge ba byas pa/ mthu chen po rdzu 'phrul
162b8: chen pos rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu myong ba ltar byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / le stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por rang gi dpung gi tshogs rnams la rjes su bstan to// de den rang
163a1: gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/ / yang rgyal po nga las nus gnod sbyini lha gnas la smras pa/ bka' 'og tu ma chung ba'i gla gzhan 'ga' lta yod dam/ lha ma mchis so// 'on kyang lha sum bcu rtsa
163a2: gsum pa'i lha tshe ring ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ bde ba mang zhing gzhal med khang mthon po na yun ring du gnas pa dag mchis kyis/ kye ma lha sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la gzigs su bzhud cig/ de nas rgyal po dade las nu 'di snyam du sems te/
163a3: bdag 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos gang ba yang yod/ bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang
163a4: bud med rin po che dang / khyi me bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod/ bdag la bu dpa' ba/ rtul phod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshad/ bdag gi pho brang
163a5: gi nang du yang rin po che'i char zhag bdun du bab/ bdag shar gyis lus 'phags kyi gling du yang song ste/ lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis shar gyi lus 'phags kyi gling
163a6: du rjes su bstan/ bdag nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du yang song ste lo mang po dang / lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling du rjes su bstan/ bdag byang gi sgra mi snyan
163a7: gyi gling du yang song ste lo mang po dang / lo rgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por bdag gis byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su bstan na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha tshorang
163a8: ba/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ bde ba mang zhing gzhal med khang mthon po na yun ring po du gnas pa dag cig yod ces grag gis/ ma la bdag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu
163b1: rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'brum dang babs cig tu bu stong gis yongs su bskor nas mdun nas 'gro ba rin po che sna bdun dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te chas so/ / ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni gser gyi ra bo bdun gyis
163b2: bskor ba yin pas/ de nas rgyal po nga las nu gser gyi ri bo mu khyud 'dzin laganas te/ dede na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no// ri bo ma khyud 'dzin nas gser gyi ri bo rnam par 'dud la 'dug ste/ de
163b3: de na rang ga dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/ / ri bo rnam par 'dud nas gser gyir bo rtan la 'dug ste/ de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no// ri ba rtan nas
163b4: gser gyi ri bo blta na sdug la 'dug ste/ de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no// ri bo blta na sdug nas gser gyi ri bo seng ldeng can la 'dug ste/ de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su
163b5: ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no/ / ri bo seng lda can nas gser gyi ri bo gshol mda' 'dzin la 'dug ste/ de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'bos pa lon no// ri bo gshol mda' 'dzin
163b6: nas gser gyi ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin la 'dug ste/ de de na rang gi dpung gi tshogs la rjes su ston pa la brgya byin drug shi 'phos pa lon no// bar sdom la/ mu khyud 'dzin dang rnam par 'dud// de bzhin ri bo rtan dang / blta na sdug
163b7: dang / sang ldeng can/ gshol mda' 'dzin pa dang gnya' shing 'dzin// ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin nas steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags te chas pa na ri rab kyi bang rim de la drang srong lnga brgya po de rnams gnas te/ de rnams kyis rgyal po de'o
163b8: ba mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po 'thab krol can 'di 'ong ngo // de na drang srong bzhin dan zhes bya ba des sbyor bar chu blugs te gtor bas dpung gi tshogs rnams thogs par gyur pa dang / de'i mdun nas blon po
164a1: rin po ma mo sengs drang sro rnams la smras pa/ bram zetho ba da bang gyis// 'di ni kun pa 'grub pa yin// 'din me dbang dalas na// phyag de dag ma yinano// rdo tsaman N+Dal pong las na phyogs der byanas
164a2: smras pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag/ blon po rin po ches smras pa/ drang srong rnams kyis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong 'di rnams nang na/ ce zhig la dga'/ des smras pa/ lha ral ba la dga' lags so// rgyal pos
164a3: smras pa/ 'di rnams ral pa byi nas bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig ces byas pa dang / de nas de rnams kyi ral pa byi nas lag na mda' gzhu thogs te mdun du brgyug par brtsams pa dang / bud med rin po ches rgyal po la gsol pa/ lba drang /
164a4: srong 'di rnams ni // 'thub can lags na 'di dag ci ba thod lags/ rgyal pos btang ba dang / de rnams kyis skar yang btsun 'grus la gnas nas mngon par shes pa la mngon sum du byas so// rgyal po las nu yang dpung gi tshogs dang /
164a5: nam mkha' la 'phags te chas so// ri rab ri'i rgyal po dpag tshad brgyad khri ni 'og tu gser gyis gzhi la thug par 'dug go// dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i steng du byung ste/ de ltar dpag tshad 'jam drug khri yod do// de'i dos re re la yang dpag/
164a6: tshad brgyad khri yod do// de ni khor khor yug tu dpag tshad sum 'bum nyi khri yod do// rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin bzad pa/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa yin no// de'i steng na lha sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams gnas te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i//
164a7: lha rnams kyi srungs ma lnga po chu la gnas pa'i klu rnams dang / gnod sbyin lag na yol go thogs pa rnams dang / phreng thogs rnams dang / rtag ci myos rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams bkod pa la/ chu na gnas pa rnams kyis rgyal po
164a8: nga las nu'i dpung gi tshogs rnam bkag pa dang / ji tsam na rgyal po de las nu phyogs der phyin nas smras pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha chab na gnas pa'i klunam kyis so// rgyal pos smras pa/
164b1: bdag dud 'gro rnams dang g.yul bgyed dam/ des smras pa/ chu la gnas pa'i klu 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig ces byas pa dang / de rnams rgyal po nga las nu'i mdun nas 'gro bar chas so// ji tsam na klu de nas
164b2: rgyal po de las nu'i mdun nas rgyug cing / lha lag na yol go thogs kyi drung du phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa/ shes ldan dag ci ste rgyug/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'dir me'i rgyal po 'ad do// de nas klu de rnams dang / lha lag na
164b3: yol go thogs rnams log nas yang dpung gi tshogs de thogs par byas so/ / ji tsam na rgyal po nga las nu 'ongs nas des smras pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag des smras pa/ lha lha lag na yol ge thogs 'di rnams kyis
164b4: dpung gi tshogs bkag lags so/ / rgyalapor las nus smras pa/ lha lag na yol go thogs 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig/ de nas de rnams mdun nas rab tu brgyugs te/ ji tsam na klu de rnams dang lhan cig lha phreng
164b5: thogs rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis de dag las dris pa/ shes ldan dag ci ste rgyug/ de dag gis smras pa/ mi'i rgyal po 'dir 'ong ngo // de nas lha dang klu de rnams yang log nas/ dpung gi tshogs thogs par byas pa dang / rgyal
164b6: po phyogs der phyin nas des smras pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di su zhig gis bkag/ des smras pa/ lha lha phreng thogs rnams kyis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ lha phreng thogs 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas 'gro bar gyur cig/ de nas de rnams
164b7: mdun na brgyug par brtsams so/ / de rnams kyis brgyugs nas lha rtag tu myos rnams kyi drung tu phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa/ shes ldan dag ci ste rgyug/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ me'i rgyal po 'dir 'ong
164b8: nas de rnams log nas yang dpung gi tshogs de thogs par byas pa dang / rgyal po phyogs der phyin nas des smras pa/ dpung gi tshegs 'di su zhig gis bkag/ des smras pa/ lha lha rtag tu myos rnams kyis so// rgyal pos smras pa/ lha rtag tu
165a1: myos 'di dag nyid bdag gi mdun nas la gro bar gyur cig/ de nas de rnams mdun nas brgyugs so// de rnams kyis brgyugs nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi drung du phyin pa dang / de rnams kyis de dag la dris pa/
165a2: ldan dag ci ste rgyug/ mi'i rgyal po 'dir 'ong ngo // rgyal chen bzhi rnams kyis bsams pa/ sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin te de dgag par mi nus so snyam nas/ de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha de rnams//
165a3: kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la 'dir mi'i rgyal po de las nu 'ong ngo zhes sbran to// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyis bsams pa/ sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin pas de bzlog par mi bya'i
165a4: mchod yon gyis bsu bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de rnams kyis mchod yon gyis bsu'o// rgyal po nga las nu ri rab kyi rtse la 'dzeg pa na tshal sngo zhing sngo ba'i phreng ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mthon po dag mthong ngo //
165a5: mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin lha gnas la smras pa/ lta gnas tshal sngo zhing sngo ba'i phreng ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mthon po pha bi dag ci zhig yin/ lha de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol zhes bgyi ba lags te/
165a6: sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang 'byor cing ldan par de na rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar gyid/ dga' bar mgur spyod par bgyid do// lha yang der byon nas lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang
165a7: 'byor cing ldan par rol par mdzad/ dgyes par mdzad/ dgyes mgur spyad par mdzod cig/ rgyal po de las nus thos nas kyang blon po rnams la smras pa/ sna bo dag khyed cag gis tshal sngo zhing sngo ba'i phreng ba sprin spangs pa lta bu
165a8: mthon po dag mthong ngam/ lha mthong lags so// sna bo dag de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi shing yongs 'dus brtol ces bya ba yin te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dbyar zla ba bzhi lha'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang
165b1: 'byo cing ldan par de ni rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mthur spyod par byed kyis/ snga bo dag byed pag kyang dar byin nas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang 'byor cing ldan par rtse bar gyis/ dga' bar gyis/ dga' mgur spyad par gyis shig
165b2: rgyal po ra las nus ri rab kyi rtsen dkar zhing dkar ba sprin spungs pa/ lta bu mthon po zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gnod sbyin lnga gnas la spras pa/ lha gnas dkar zhing dkar ba sprin spungs pa lta bu mabon po pha bi ci zhig yin/ lha de ni
165b3: sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos bzang lags te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi rnams der 'dus shing tshogs nas lha dang mi rnams kyi don sems par bgyid/ 'jal bar bgyid/ nye bar
165b4: rtog par bgyid de/ lha yang der bzhud par 'gyur ro// rgyal po da las nus thos nas thon po rnams la smras pa/ sna bo dag khyed cag gis dkar zhing dkar ba sbyin spungs pa lta bu mthon po mthong ngam/ lha mtho lags so// sna bo dag de ni/
165b5: sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi mdun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba yin te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / rgyal chen bzhi rnams der 'dus shing tshogs nas lha dang mi rnams kyi don sems par byed/ 'jal bar byed/ nye ba rtog/
165b6: par byed de/ sna bo dag khyed cag kyang der 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba ni chu dang zheng du dpag tshad nyis stong lnga brgya yod de/ kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad khri yod pa/ gser gyi ra ba rim pa
165b7: bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba ste/ ra ba de rnams kyi 'phang du ni dpag tshad byed dang gsum yod do// ra ba de rnams la sgrog rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / she la las byas pa
165b8: dag btags so/ / skar khur kha yar lta ba dang / mar blta ba dag kyang btod do// grong khyer ltan sdug gi nang gi sa'i phyogs ni bzang po/ mdzes pa/ ltan sdug pa/ bkrag shin du bkra ba/ tshen brgya rtsa gcig gis bkra bar byas pa/ dper
166a1: na ras bal gyi 'da' ba 'am shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur 'jam pa/ shin tu 'jam pa/ rkang pas mnan na nems shes byed la/ rkang pa bteg na bar zhes byed pa/ lha'i me tog man dA ra'i phung po pus mo nub tsam bkram pa ste/ rlung langs pra
166a2: me tog rnying pa rnams khyer la btogs ba rnams 'bab par byed de/ / blta na sdug gi grong khyer la sgo dgu bar+b+ha/ dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/ sgo re re na gnod sbyin gos sngon po can go cha bags pa/ mda' gzhu skye skor thog pa lnga brgya 'di ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum hA
166a3: lha rnams bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / mdzes par bya ba'i byar gnas so// grong khyer bltan sdug de grong gi sred du ni dpag tsad nyis stong lnga brgya yid pa rgyang ni dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod de/ bzang po// mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa/ gser gyi bye mas/
166a4: 'dal ba/ tsan dan gyi chus cig chag btab pa/ gsor gyi drabs zas pa/ da'i phyogs kun na rdzing bu rnam kha sna tshogs yod de/ rdzing bur rnams phag gun ma pa bzhi pa gsar las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai d+yAr+ya las byas pa dang /
166a5: shel las byas pas bskor to// rdzing bu de rnams kyi themaskas rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shes las byas pa yin no// rdzing bu de rnams lan kan rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa
166a6: dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pas skor cing / gasde las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs gzer ba dang / gdang bu dang / lan kan gyi rten ma dngul las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs/
166a7: gzer dang / kadang bu dang / lan kan gyi rten ma gser las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i lan/ na cigazungs gzer dang / gdang bu dang / lan kan gyi rten ma shal las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa'i lan kan gyi gzungs gzer dang / gdang bu
166a8: dang / lan kan gyi rten ma bai dUr+ya las byas pa yin no// rdzing bu de rnams chu sbrang rtsi ltar ma dang zhing bsil bas gangad la/ ut+pal dang / pad ma dang / ku mud dang / pad ma dkar pos gang zhing tshul gnas pa'i bya rnam pa rnags dod krung sbyar ba'i gzugs
166b1: can rnams kyis snyan cing 'jebs la yid tu 'ong ba'i sgra skad 'byin ra byed do/ / de'i phyogs kun ni me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / dbu rgya de skye ba dag shin tu dbyi bas legs shing legs par skyes pa ni dper na phreng ba mkhan nam
166b2: phreng ba mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis na rgyan du bya ba'i phyir me tog gi phreng ba logs par brgyus pa bzhin no/ / thad la gnas pa'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs can rnams kyang snyan cing 'jebs pa'i sgra skad
166b3: 'byin to/ grong khyer blta na sdug na dpag bsam gyi gos kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa bzhi po sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po rnams las dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa las byung ba'i gos rnam pa bzhi po sngon po dang / sar
166b4: po dang / dmang po dang / dkar po rnams te/ lha 'am lha'i bu mo dag rnga lta bu/ 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// rgyan gyi shing rnam pa bzhi po rnams las rgyan rnam pa bzhi po lag
166b5: pa'i rgyan dang / rkang pa'i rgyan dang / smad kyi rgyan dang / snang bar bya ba'i rgyan no// lha'i bu 'am lha'i bu mo dag ji lta bu 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// rol mo'i cha spyad rnam pa bzhi po bi bang dang / gling
166b6: bu dang / bi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / sgra snyan rnams las lha 'am lha'i bu mos ji lta bu 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// lha'i kha zas rnam pa bzhi po sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar
166b7: po rnams las lha 'am lha'i bu mos ji lta bu 'dod pa sems bskyed ma thag tu de lta bu lag tu thob par 'gyur ro/ / khang pa dang / khang brtseg ma dang / bsil kha dang / khyams dang / skar khung dang / mthongs khud can bud med kyi tshogs/
166b8: rnams dang / lha mo'i tshogs rnams 'du ba'i gnas dag yod de/ den btud pa sbrang rtsi'i btud pa dang / ma d+hi ba'i btung ba dang / ka dam b+ha ra'i btud ba dang / rol mo'i sgra skad rnams kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rtse bar byed/
167a1: dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ rang gi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong bar byed do// sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mdun sa chos bzang zhes bya ba srid du dpag tshad sum brgya/ rgyar dpag tshad
167a2: sum brgya ste/ kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad dgu brgya yod pa/ bzang po/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba ste/ grong khyer de las dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi gyen du 'phags so// der sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi
167a3: stan bshams pa ni nye dbang po sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi stan dag so sor bshams so// rgyal po nga las nu'i stan ni stan de dag thams cad kyi mjug kho nar bshams so// de
167a4: nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams mchod yon thogs te rgyal po de las nub su'o/ / de na sems can bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas dbang che bar grags pa gang yin pa de dag ni rim gyis nang du zhugs so// lhag ma rnams ni
167a5: phyi rol na 'khod pa dang / rgyal po nga las nus bsams pa/ stan bshams pa gang dag yin pa 'di rnams las stan tha ma gang yin pa 'di ni gdon min ba bdag gi stan yin no// rme nas rgyal po nga las nu 'di snyam du gya ma'o lha rnams kyi dpe dpe rgya byin gyis
167a6: stan phyed bdag la bstabs kyang ci ma rung snyam du bsams pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu/ rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rgyal po nga las nul stan byed pa stabs nas/ rgyal po ra las nu lha rnams kyi dbang po
167a7: brgya byin gyi stan phyed la 'dug go/ / rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu dang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan gcig la 'dug pa na 'di ltas srid du'am/ zheng du'am/ kha dog rgyas pa 'am/ sgra dang gsal khyad par 'am/ bsam pa
167a8: 'am/ tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med de/ gzhan du na lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin ni mig mi 'dzums so// rgyal po chen po rgyal po nga las nu sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa la brgya byin sum bcu rtsa drag shi
167b1: 'phos pa lon no/ / yang de na lha rnams la lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa 'byung ste/ de la gal te lha ma yin rnams pham par gyur na ni lha ma yin de rnams grod khyer gyi sgo bcad nas ra ba'i kha bskor nas 'dug go// 'on te lha rnams pham par
167b2: gyur na ni lha de rnams kyang khang pa'i sgo rnams bcad nas ra ba'i kha bskor nas 'dug go/ / ji tsam na lha ma yin rnams dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bskon nas gcan rami pa lnga dral te lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi drung du g.yul 'gyed tu 'ongs
167b3: ba dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ kau shi ka mkhyen par mdzod cig/ lha ma yin rnams kyis gcan rim pa lnga dral te nye bar mchis kyis/ khyod kyis bgyi ba dang bshams pa gang lags pa de mdzod cig/ de nas lha
167b4: rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bgos nas lha ma yin dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir spags pa rgyal po de las nus mthong nas smras pa/ bzhugs shig bdag nyid mchi'o// brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de bzhin mdzod cag/ de na
167b5: rgyal po nga las nu dpung gi tshogs bye ba brgyad 'bum dang steng gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas gzhu rgyud kyi sgra sbrengs so/ / lha ma yin rnams kyis de thos nas smras pa/ 'di su'i gzhu rgyad kyi sgra yin/ de rnams kyis 'di ni rgyal po de las nu'i gzhu rgyud/
167b6: kyi sgra yin no zhes thos so// thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur to// ji tsam na rgyal po nga las nus spags pa dang / chos nyid kyis lha rnams dang lha ma yin de rnams g.yul 'gyed pa'i shing rta dag nam mkha' la thad ka thad kar 'dug ste/ gang gi
167b7: yA mthon dman med pa yin pa las rgyal po da las nu'i ni lha ma yin thams cad kyi ltag gi nam mkha' la 'phags nas 'dug go/ / lha ma yin de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi ltag na nam mkha' la spags te 'dug pa 'di su zhig yin/
167b8: de rnams kyis 'di ni mi'i rgyal po de las nu zhes bya ba yin no zhes thos so// thos nas de rnams kyis bsams pa/ gang gi shing rta bdag cag gi ltag tu nam mkha' las 'gro ba'i sems can 'di ni bsod nams kyi rnam par smon pas dbang che bar
168a1: grags pa yin no snyam nas de rnams bam par gyur te 'jigs skra gtsang bcom pas rgyab bstan nas lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas su zhugs so/ / rgyal po nga las nus smras pa/ gang rgyal blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal
168a2: lags so/ / rgyal pos bsams pa/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams pas ni bdag lhag go// snyam mo// de nas rgyal po las nu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag la 'dzam bu'i gling 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/
168a3: skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba yang yod/ bdag la shar gyi lus 'phags dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling yang yod/ bdag la rin po che sna bdun 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo ra ni pa tshe dang / glang po rin po che dang /
168a4: rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / btsun mo rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa blon po rin po che yang yod// bdag la bu dpa' ba/ rtul bod pa/ yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms par
168a5: byed pa stong yang tshang bar yod/ bdag gi po brang gi nang du yang gser gyi char zhag bdun du bab/ bdag sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du yang phyin/ lha'i mdu na sa chos bzang du yang zhugs/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang
168a6: bdag la stan phyed bstabs kyis/ kye ma'o bdag gis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gnas 'di nas phyung la/ bdag kho nas lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bya'o snyam pa dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rgyal po
168a7: nga las nu 'byor pa de las nyams te/ 'dzam bu'i gling du 'ongs nas nad tshabs po che zhig gis thebs te/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa 'chi ba la thug pa myong ba dang / de nas rgyal po de las nu'i blon po dang / rtsis pa dang / rgyal srid 'bul ba'i
168a8: sna chen po la gtogs pa dang / gsang sngags kyis lhan cig 'tsho bar byed pa rnams rgyal po nga las nu gang na ba der song ste/ byin pa dang / rgyal po nga las nul 'di skad ces smras so// lha 'das nas yul khor gyi mi slad sa rnams bre ldan dag
168b1: rgyal po nga las rus nongs pa'i dus kyi tshe ci zhig gsungs shes 'drin/ de skad du 'dri ba de dag la bdag cag gis ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi/ sna bo dag nga 'das nas gal te khyed cag la skye bo phyi mi rnams nye bar 'ongs nas de skad du 'dri bar byed na
168b2: 'dri ba de dag la khyed kyis lan 'di skad ces thob shig/ shes ldan dag rgyal po las nu ni rin po che sna bdun dang yang ldan/ mo'i 'byor pa rnam bzhis gling bzhir rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la yang dbang byed du bcug/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams
168b3: kyi nang du yang song nas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga po dag gis ma ngoms bzhin du nongs so zer ro zhes gyis shig/ tshogs su bcad pa dag kyang smras pa/ kar sha pa ni'i char bab kyang // 'dod pa dag la ngoms pa med// mkhas pas 'dod pa mnog
168b4: chung zhing / sdug bsngal mang por shes zhes ni// lha yi 'dod pa rnams la yang // dga' bar 'gyur ba med pa nyid/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// nyan thos sred pa zad la dga'// gangs kyi riding mnyam pa yi// gser gyi ri bor gyur kyang ni/
168b5: gcig gi nor du'ang des mi chog/ mkhas pas de ltar shes par bya// gang zhig gzhi 'dis sdug bsngal rtog pa de// 'dod pa dag la gzhar yang ji ltar dga'// 'jig rten nor dgazug rngur rtogs nas ni// brtan pas de nyid gdul phyir bslab par bya//
168b6: rgyal po chen po de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar gang mi'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas ngoms shing chog shes te 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mi gang dag yin pa de dag ni nyung la/ mi'i 'jig rten na 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas mi ngoms
168b7: shing tshig mi shes te 'chi bar 'gyur ba ni ches mang bar rig par bya'o/ / de nas rgyal po de las nus gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin btang nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ 'jig rten pha rol yang zhing // tshe thung bar ni shes byas nas// bsod nams
168b8: ngag ni bya ba ste/ / bsod nams ma byas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ de bas bsod nams 'dod pa yis// sbyin pa tshul bzhin btang byas na// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// sbyin pa byas pa dga' bar 'gyur// ji tsam na grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis rgyal po
169a1: nga las nun ste shi la thug cing 'dug go zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang yang srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag rgyal po nga las nu blta ba'i phyir nye bar song ba dang / rgyal pos skye bo'i tshogs rnams la 'dod pa rnams kyi nyes da rigs kyis/
169a2: gtam yang byas/ khyim na gnas pa'i nyes dmigs dang / de bzhin du 'dod pa smad pa yang bshad de/ de thos nas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag khyim gyi gnas spangs nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste/ nags tshal du 'dug nas
169a3: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgoms pas 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa spangs te/ de la mang du gnas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skal ba mnyam par skyes so// rgyal po chen po rgyal po las nus ji srid gzhon nu rtse ba'i san rtses pa dang ji srid rgyal 'tshab byas
169a4: pa dang / ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyal srid chen po byas pa dang / ji srid shar gyi lus 'phags dang / nub kyi ba lang spyod dang / byang gi sgra mi snyan dang / gser gyi ri bo bdun la gnas pa dang / ji srid sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi gan
169a5: su song ste gnas pa de'i bar la brgya byin brgya rtsa bcu bzhi shi 'phos pa lon no/ / rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi tshe'i tshad ni mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyan zhag gcig yin no//
169a6: nyi zhag de sum bcu la zla ba gcig/ zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha rnams kyi lo stong ni sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad yin te/ de la me'i ltar bgrang na lo bye ba phrag gsum dang drug khri yod do// rgyal
169a7: po chen po gang gi tshe rgyal po nga las nus sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du song ste 'di skad ces/ kye ma'o bdag la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis stan byed pa stabs kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed pa de'i tshe de'i rjes
169a8: kyi brgya byin ni dge slong 'od srung yin no/ / gang gi tshe rgyal po nga las nus 'di lta bu'i sems skyed de/ ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin gnas 'di nas phyung la/ bdag nyid lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang
169b1: phyag la dbang pa'o snyam pa de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yin te/ sems can shin tu dbang che bar grags pa la ngan sems skyed pa des na 'byor pa de las nyams nas 'jam
169b2: ba'i gling du 'ongs ten rdzabs chen pos thebs shing 'chi ba la thug pa'i tshe rab mi zad par myong bar 'gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po nga las na gang yin pa ni nga nyid yin te/ gang yang ngas sems can de
169b3: skad cig la phan pa byas nas des bla na med pa'i ye shes ma thab po/ / 'on kyang de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po thetsam skyes nas the tshom thams na gnod pa sangs rgya bcom
169b4: ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po nga las nus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam pang smin pas sems bskyed ma thag tu dgung bdun du po brang nad du gser gyi char bab lags/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na
169b5: 'jig rten tu ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo snar ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams
169b6: kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad zil gnon ces bya ba byung ste/ de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu khyim phub nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas so// yul de ni chos lugs kyis bag mer btang nas ring po ma lon par
169b7: bag rdzong sa btab ste khyim thab la gtong ba'i bag ma gang yin pa de rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i me tog gis brgyan nas khyim thab la gtong la/ khyim thab des kyang de khrid nas rang gi khyim du 'gro bas tshong dpon gyi bu des rin po che sna
169b8: bzhi las byas pa'i me tog thogs nas shen pa la zhon te rang gi khyim du chas so/ / de chas pa las re shig cig na lam na tshur yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon ljongs rgyu zhing byon te/ des de skyes bu chen po'i
170a1: mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas shin tu dad pa skyes so// de nas de dad pas brlan pa'i sems kyis bzhon pa las bzas nas rin po che snga bzhi las byas pa'i me tog
170a2: de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la gtor to/ / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnor gyisi me tog de dag ji ltar shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam sha stag tu gyur nas gshegs na yang phyi
170a3: bzhin 'ong zhing bzhugs na yang 'dug pa de lta bur byin gyis brlabs pa dang / de dad pa skyes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yis ni// 'gro ba'i nang du rang byung sangs rgyas shog/ rgal nas sngon gyi rgyal bas
170a4: ma bsgral ba'i/ / bo'i tshe ga rnam bdag gos sgrol gyur tsag/ drang srong che kun zil gnon bcom ldan la/ da yis gser gyi me tog bzang gtor nas// go 'phang mchog 'di 'dod nas de yi tshe/ da yis smon lam rgya chen btab pa yi//
170a5: bsod nams de nyid kyi na na ma smin gyis/ legs mthong chen po de yi grong khyer yang / gser las byas ba dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa/ pho brang rtswa can zhes ni bya bar gyur/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i'atshe de nyid kyi tshong dpon gyi bu de na
170a6: nga nyid yin no/ / gang yang ngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnon la sems dad pa bskyed nas rin po che sna bzhi'i me tog gis gtor ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas de'i pho brang gi nang du zhag bdun du gser gyi char
170a7: bab bo/ / btsun pa rgyal po de las nus las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas gling bzhi pa rnams su rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bgyis pan de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bar du mchis lags/ rgal po chen pa
170a8: sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu gdul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sa
170b1: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba byung ste/ de ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brang gnyen ldan du byon to// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzegs snga dro sham thabs mnapas/ lhung bzed dang chos
170b2: gos pa snams nas rgyal po'i the brad gnyen ldan du bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ / de nas 'bru 'tshod pa'i tshod ba zhog gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de lta bas cho ga mi shes pa mthong nas lhag par dad pa skyes te/ de dad pa zhes
170b3: sa sra ma dag la sbyar bas bcus te lhung bzeng du blugs pa dang / de las sran mud ga 'brum bu bzhi zhig lhung bzed du song ngo // 'brum bu gcig ni lhung bzed kyi khar phog nas sa la ltung ngo // lhag ma rnams de ltang bzed kyi mang du ma so dab
170b4: sal ba'o/ / de nas tshong ba de dag dad bskyes nas smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pa chen por gyur pa 'di yas ni// 'gro ba'i ning du rangadabyung sangs rgyas sheg/ rgal nas sngon gyi rgyal bas pa bsgral ba'i/ sra ba'i tshogs rnams bdag gis sgrol gyur cag/
170b5: ces btab bo// @#/ 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bzhi bcu gnyis pa// rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'bru 'tshong ba'i tshong ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/ ngas de na gang yang dag par rdzogs par
170b6: sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la dad pa skyes te/ sran bud dgal sbar bas nus nas lhung bzed du blags pa dang / de las sran mu/ dang 'brum bu bzhi zhig lhung bzed du song ngo / lhag ma rnams ni sa la'angape'o// las de'i rnam par smin pas/ gling bzhin mas
170b7: suN+Dal srid kyis dbang phyug la dbang byas so/ / gang yang de na sran mud dag 'bram bu gcig gis lhung bzed kyi khar phog nas sa la ltung ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi bar du son to/ rgyal po chen po gal te
170b8: klan mu dag lhung bzed du blugs pas lam ltung na las de'i rnam par smin pas lha dang mi rnams kyi par la rgyang srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ / de'i tshe de'i dus kyi babru 'tshed ba'i tshing ba gang yin pa de ni nga las nu de di yin no// de lta ngan tul
171a1: po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po can la bya ba byas pa ni 'bras bu dang phan yon shin tu chen por 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po chen po de lta bas na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bya ba bya'o zhes bslab par bya'o
171a2: rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa gang da na cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung brgyal po lags mthang chen po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgya
171a3: bo mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal ba chos dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun dang / me rnams kyi 'byor pa bzhi dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo // rgyal po lags mthong chen po rin po che sna bdun po gang dag dang ldan zhe na/ 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin
171a4: po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / btsun mo rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bdun pa ni blon po rin po che yin no// rgyal po legs mthong chen po mi rnams kyi 'byor pa bzhi po gang dag dang ldan zhe
171a5: na/ tshe ring zhing yun rang du gnas pa yin te/ de gzhon nu'i rtsed mos rtse ba la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no// rgyal 'tshab byed pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no// rgyal srid chen po byed pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no// rgyal po'i drang srong gi tshangs par
171a6: spyod pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi stong lon no/ / rgyal po legs mthong chen po tshe ring zhing yun ring du gnas pa gang yin pa 'di na rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong chen po ni gzugs bzang ga mdzes
171a7: po/ blta na sdug pa yin te/ mi'i kha dog las ni 'das la lha'i kha dog ni ma thob pa ste/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ lta na sdug pa gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o// gzhan lnga//
171a8: rgyal po legs mthong chen po ni gnod pa chung zhing nad med pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ pho ba ha cad bsil ba ma yin zhing ha cang dro ba ma yin pa/ drod snyoms pa dang / dus kun du bde ba dang / gnod pa med pa dang / ldan pas zos pa dang / 'thungs/
171b1: ba dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju ba 'gyur te/ rgyal po legs mthong chen po gnod pa chung zhing nad med pa'i rang bzhin can gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang rgyal po legs
171b2: mthang chen po ni grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyi snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba yin te/ dper na bu rnams la pa bzhin te/ rgyal po chen po dus gcig cig na rgyal po legs mthong chen po skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba na shing rta sgyur ba la smras pa/ shing rta
171b3: skur ba re shig shing rta rim gyis dal bu dal bus skur cig/ ngas grong mi dang / yul mi rnams la yun ring du lta'o// grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyis kyang shing rta sgyur ba la smras pa/ shong rta myur ba re shig shing rta rim gyis dal bud la bus sbyar cig dang /
171b4: bdag cag kyang lha la yun ring du blta'o// rgyal po legs mthong chen po grong mi dang yul mi rnams kyi snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba gang yin pa 'di ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i 'byor pa zhes bya'o// de nas dus gzhan zhig na grong mi dang yul mi
171b5: rnams gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu rin po che dang / la ba rin po che mang po dgathogs nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po gdan der dong ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di
171b6: da ces smras so/ / lha'i slad du bdag cag gis gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu rin po che dang / la ba rin po che mang po 'di dag 'tshal te mchis lags na/ lha thugs brtse ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ sna bo dag da'i yul na 'di 'dra ban
171b7: nor gyi rigs yod pas mi 'dod do zhes smras nas len du ma btub po/ / grong ma dang yul mi rnams kyis lan gnyis lan gsum du rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i slad du bdag cig gis gser dang / dngul dang
171b8: nor bu rin po che dang / la ba rin po che 'di dag 'tshal te mchis lags na/ lha thugs brtsa ba'i slad du 'di dag bzhes su gsol/ rgyal po lags mthong chen pos kyang lan gnyis lan sum du grong mi dang yul mi rnams la 'di skad ces/
172a1: smras so// sna bo dag nga'i yul na 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod pas mi 'dod do zhes smras nas len du ma btub bo// de nas grong mi dang yul mi rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag gis lha'i phyir gser dang / dngul dang
172a2: nor bu rin po che dang / la ba ren pa tshe rab tu mang po sta gan byas la/ dbadag cag gis blangs te slar sa so'i gnas su 'dong ba ni bdag cag gi tshul ma yin pas/ ma la bdag cag gis rgyal po legs mthong chen pa'i mdun du gser dang / dngul gyi
172a3: phung po cher spungs la/ mtha' gcig tu nor bu rin po che dang / la ba rin po che bzhag nas/ 'di dag ni lha kyad kyi dkar gya rigs lags sa/ zhes smras te mi blta bar 'dod nga snyam nas/ de nas grang ma dang yul ma rnams kyis rgyal po legs mtha
172a4: chen po'i mdun du rin po che dang gser phung po chen por spungs nas/ mtha' gcig tu nor bu rin po che dang / la ba rin po che bzhag ste/ 'di dag ni lha khyod kyi dkor kye rigs lags so zhes smras nas me lta bar dod do// de nas rgyal po legs mthong
172a5: chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi nor gyi rigs ni chos bzhin gyis rnyed pa yin gyis chos ma yin pas ni ma yin pas mal bdag gis chos dang 'thun pa'i khang bzangs brtsig go snyam pa dang / mtha'i rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gas rgyal po legs mthang
172a6: chen po chos dang 'thun pa'i khang bzangs brtsig par spro'o zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang rgyal po legs mthong chen po gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / rgyal po legs mthong chen po 'di skad ces smras so// lha chos dang 'thun pa'i khang bzangs rtsig pa la
172a7: thugs kyi phrin las bskyed du gsol/ lha'i chos dang 'thun pa'i khang bzangs bdag cag gis brtsig par bgyi'o// sna bo dag kho bo'i yul na 'di 'dra ba'i nor gyi rigs yod pas mi dgos so// zhes smras nas ma gnang ngo // de nas khams kyi rgyal
172a8: phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po'i rkang pa la gtugs nas kha cig gis ni gos kyi mtha' nas bzung / kha cig gis ni rgyal po legs mthong chen po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas rgyal po legs mthong chen po la 'di skad
172b1: ces smras so/ / lha chos dang 'thun pa'i khang bzangs rtsig pa la thugs kyi phrin las bskyang du gsol/ lha'i chos dang 'thun pa'i khang bzangs bdag cag gis brtsig par bgyi'o// rgyal po legs mthong chen pos khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad bri
172b2: bzhi stong la cang pi smra bas gnang ngo / / de nas khams kyi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong gis rgyal po legs mthong chen po cang mi smra bas gnang ba ga nga shegs su dong de// gser dang / dngul mang po dang rin po che'i ka ba re re khyer nas/ rgyal po legs
