192b5: nas gzhi lhag par le tog dang ldan pas yul yang bza' ba dang btung ba mod par gyur to/ skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa/ gal te 'ga' zhig gis klu'i bu de yul 'di nas phrogs na klu'i bu te cir 'gyur/ ru bar mi 'gyur te/ de pha ma dang bral ba las gyung ba'i sdug bsngal
192b6: myong bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal ba dang yul mis phrogs na/ de la khyod kyis ji ltar bya/ srog dang dpral bar bya'o// khyod kyis klu'i bu gang yin pa shes sam/ mi shes so// deng nyid yin na lho phyogs lnga len pa'i sprul khas sdigs par 'phrog pa byed de/
192b7: de gtor ma dang / yo byad kyi phyir slar song nas zhag bdun gyi nyan par 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'ongs nas mtsho dgas su seng ldeng gi zur ba grwa bzhir btsugs la tshon spung sna chags kyis bres te/ gsang sngags rjod par byed kyis/ de nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu
192b8: khyod mi mngon par 'jug la/ gang gi tshe des tshag de lta bu byas par gyur pa de'i tshe mcha'i nang gi chu 'bol zhing lud par 'gyur te nga yang 'byung gis de'i tshe khyod kyis spel las sdigs de'i gnad du mdas sngun la de ma thag du drung du song ste gsang sngags slar
193a1: sdus shig/ ma bsdus na khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la por ta re zhes spros shig/ gal te des gsang sngags rnams ma sdus par srog dang bral te shin ni kha bo ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gas sngags kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ro// rngon pas
193a2: smras pa/ gal te khyod gcig pu la phan thogs na yang de bzhin du kho bo kho nas bya na/ yul mtha' dag la pha nan lta smos kyang cir dgos te/ kho bos skyabs byas song shig/ de nas klu'i bu des de la dben pa'i phyogs cig bstan nas/ ji tsam na rngon pa de zhag
193a3: bdun gyi nyin par phyogs dben par bdag nyid ge ba ste 'dug pa dang / sbrul khas sdigs pa de yang 'ongs nas gtor ma dang yo byad kyi cho ga bya bar rtsom ste/ de phyogs bzhir ser ldong gi bur bu bzhing tsu/ sa tshen sud sna tshogs kyis bres te gsang sngags brjod do// de nas
193a4: chu de khol du cha ba dang rngon pas gnad du mangs bsnun nas ral gri shu/ sa nas phyung ste smras pa/ khyod kyis nged kyi yul na gnas pa'i klu'i bu gsang sngags kyis dbrog gam/ gsang sngags slar sdus shig/ ma sdus na khyod kyi mgo drung nas bcad de sa la bor ra re
193a5: de nas sbrul khas sdigs pa sdug bsngal nyams su myong bas nyam thag cing 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas skrag nas gsang sngags brtul ba dang / rngon pas de ma thag tu de bsad do// de nas klu'i bu gsang sngags kyi zhags pas bcings pa la sa thar te mtsho nas
193a6: byung nas rngon pa la 'khyud de 'di skad ces smras so/ / khyod ni kho bo'i ma yin la khyod ni kho bo'i pha yin te/ 'di ltar khyod la brten pas kho bo pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal ma skyes so// tshur shog gnas su 'dod do zhes des de gnas su
193a7: khrid de song nas bza' ba dang btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis tshim par byas te/ rin pa che dag bstabs nas ma dad pa la smras pa/ yab yum 'di ni bdag gi snying du sdug pa skyabs dang gnyen du gyur pa lags te/ 'di'i mthus bdag khyed dang ldan
193a8: cig pa las bral bar ma gyur to/ / de dag gis kyang de 'das pa sbyin par byed de/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs byin nas des de rnams khyer te mtshad nas byung ngo // mchod dang ha cang mi ring bzhig na pa sti gnas btog dang 'bras bu thun sumachog sa /
193b1: sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/ de na drang srong byams pa dang snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ sems can nams la sdug par 'dzin pa zhig gnas so// de nas ngon pa de drang srong da'i drung du rus gsum du 'gro bar rtsom zhing / de la klu'i buskye ba sna tshogs pa dang / na
193b2: cig ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad rgyas pa smras so/ / de nas drang srong des smras pa/ khyod la rin po che dang / gsar ci dgos/ de'i gnas na dan yod pa zhes bya ba'i zhags pa yod kyis de slongs shig/ de nas rngon pa de don yod pa'i zhags pa la chags pa
193b3: skyes nas drang srong gi tshig mnyan te slar klu'i gnas su song ba dang / de nas ji tsam na klu'i khang pa'i sgon don yod pa'i zhags pa de mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag 'dod pa'i don yod pa'i zhags pa gang yin pa de ni 'di kho na yan no snyam
193b4: nas klu'i gnas su zhugs so/ / de nas klu'i bu skye ba sna tshogs pa dang / klu gzhan rnams kyis yang dag par dga' ba dang / mgu ba dag byas nas rin po che dag bstabs pa dang / des smras pa/ kho bo la rin po che mi dgos kyi/ 'on kyang don yod pa'i
193b5: zhags pa 'di kho bo la byin cig/ skye ba sna tshogs pas smras pa/ khyod la 'di ce dgos/ kho bo cag la ni dgos rab ste/ gang gi tshe nam mkha' lding gis gnod pa byas pa de'i tshe 'dis kho bo cag srung bar 'gyur ro// rngon pas smras pa/ khyed cag la ni nam
193b6: mkha' lding gi gnod pa la na 'ga' zhig 'byung ba na 'di dgos kyi/ kho bo la ni dus kun du dgos kyis gal te legs pa byas pa dang / phan ba tags pa dran ldan byin cig/ klu'i bu skya ba sna tshogs pa 'di snyam du sems te/ 'dis bdag la pan char ga
193b7: kyis pa sal btags te sbyin no/ / snyam nas des pa dang ma la btags te zhags pa de byin no// de nas rngon pa des bdag thob pa bzhin du bad ba dang yid bde bas che mnas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te klu'i gnas nas byung nas rang gi khyi
193b8: du song ngo / / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po nor can btsun mo dang lhan cig rtsa bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu pha yang med/ bu mo yang med nas la
194a1: xxx/ xxx
194a2: bar 'byung ba snyamanas/ sems yongs su chud ci 'dug pa dang / de ma dag stong dang / zas ze dang / grogs po dang / mda' sa dang / nye du rnams kyis smras pa/ n+ya'i skad du thugs mi dmes/ des skams de nams la byas par smram pa dang / danas/
194a3: xxx/ xxx
194a4: thun da/ 'a ba'i ga / nags ma kyi lta dang / bzhim dang lta ga / sum ma da lta ga dang / gtong mayin pa'i rta da ga dang / cig skyes pa dang / chos 'aldan pa dag da/ ga rjes su 'brang ba'i lha dgal ya dag pal ba
194a5: so/ / 'dig rten na gang gsol pa 'debs pa'i rgya las bu po dang bu mo dag skye'i nas bya ba'i gtam de lta bu yod de/ de ni de lta bu ma yin te/ gal te de ltar 'gyur du zin ner re la yang 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po bzhin du
194a6: bu stong stong yod par 'gyur ro/ / 'on kyang gnas gsum po dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur te/ gsum po de dag gang zhe na/ pha dang mdag chags par gyur cing 'dus pa dang / ma dus la bab cing zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
194a7: dri za nye bar gnas shing 'jug 'dod pa ste/ gnas gsum po de dag mngon du gyur pa las bu pho dang bu mo dag skye bar 'gyur ro// de de ltar gsol ba 'debs pa lhur len cing 'dug pa na/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'
194a8: zhig btsun mo dam pa de'i mngal du zhugs so/ / bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can kha cig lam 'dres pa'i chos lnga yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa chags par gyur pa shes shing chags pa dang bral ba shes pa dang / dus shes shing
194b1: zla mtshan shes pa dang / mngal du zhugs pa shes pa dang / gang las mngal du zhugs par de yang shes pa dang / khye'u shes shing du mo shes pa ste/ gal te khye'u yin na dku g.yas par rten cing 'dug la/ gal te bu mo yin na dku g.yon
194b2: par rten cing 'dug go/ / de yid dga' zhing yid dga' nas khyo la smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag la sems can zhugs par gyur pa ni 'di ltar bdag gi dku g.yas par rten cing mchis pa las na nges par khye'ur 'gyur gyis dgyes
194b3: pa bskyed du gsol/ / de yang yid dga' zhing dga' nas ro stod bsrang ste lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas 'di skad ces/ kho bo yun ring po nas mngon par 'dod pa bu'i ngo mthong ba dang / kho bo dang 'thun par skye zhing mi mthun par mi skye ba dang /
194b4: kho bo'i bya ba dag byed pa dang / gsos pas phyir gso ba dang / bsgo skal la spyod pa dang / kho bo'i rigs rgyud yun ring du gnas par sgrub pa dang / bdag cag shi zhing dus la bab pa dag la nyung ngu'am mang po yang rung ba'i sbyin bdag byin
194b5: bsod nams dag byas nas 'di de gnyis gang du skyes pa der 'gro zhing rjes su 'gro bar gyur cig ces ming gis yon bsngo ba byed par gyur cig ces ched du rjod pa ched du rjod par byed do/ / de la sems can zhugs par rig nas 'di lta ste mngal
194b6: na gnas pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhing grang ba na grang ba'i oM byad dag dang / dro ba na dro ba'i yo byad dag dang / sman pas bstan pa'i zas ha cang mi kha ba dang ha cang mi skyung ba dang / ha cang lan tshwa mi che ba dang /
194b7: ha cang me mdang ba dang / ha cang mi tsha ba dang / ha cang mi bska ba dang / kha ba dang / sbyar ba dang / lan tshwa dang / mngang ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba spangs pa'i zas dag dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rgyan gyis klubs pa'i lus lha'i bu mo dga' ba'i tshal na rnam par
194b8: spyod pa lta bu dang / khri nas khrir dang / khri'u nas khri'ur dang / shod kyis gzhir ma'i 'bab pa dang / des sgra yid du mi 'ong ba cung zad kyang mi thos par nyam bag du zhag go// de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das pa dang khye'u gzugs bzad pa blta na sdug pa/
195a1: mdzes pa/ gsal ba/ gser gyi mdog 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dpral ba'i dbyes che ba/ sprin ma 'dzar ba/ sna'i gzangs mthe ba/ yan lag dang / nyid lag thams cad dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/
195a2: de btsas pa dkun dga' bar 'gyur ba'i da drangs pargyal pos thos nas smras pa/ de ci rig yin/ btsun mo rnams kyis rgyal po la sgrub pa/ sku dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/ khyod kyi sras po zhig bltam mo// de nas rgyas pos grong khyer da thams ca
195a3: rdo ba dang / gsag ma dang / gyos bsal te byi der byas nas can dan gyi chub chag chag btab/ rgyal mchan dang ba dan bsgreng / shin tu dri zhem pa'i bag por dag bshams/ me tog sa la pa sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar bkram ste bsgo ga/ dge sbyong
195a4: dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa byin cig/ btson thams cad khye shig/ de'i phyir nyis bdun gsum nyi shu cag gi du tshas pa'i tsha ston kyi mams dang / khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes ming 'dogs par byed pa na/ blon po rnams kyis
195a5: smras pa/ / khye'u 'di rgyal po nor can gyi sras lags pas khye'u ping nor bzangs su gdags so zhes de'i ming nor bzangs zhes bya bar btags so// khye'u nor bzangs ma ma brgyad po ba ngan 'tshe ba'i sem gnyis dang / sum snun pa'i sa ma gnyis
195a6: dang / dri ma byi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang / rtse grogs kyi sa ma gnyis la rjes su gtang de/ de ma ma brgyad po dag gis 'o ba dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying khu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis srid par
195a7: byed/ skyed par byed cing rdzing ngan gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du byur du skyed par byed do// gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe yi ge slob tu bcug ste zhes bya ba nas/ btag pa brgyad dang / dbye ba dang / klog pa la mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gsapa
195a8: bar gyur to/ / zhes bya ba'i bar gongs bzhin no// de rgyal po kyal rigs spyi ba nas dbang bskur pa ljongs kyi dbang phyug dang mthu dang brtson 'grus thob pa/ sa chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di mngon par rgyal bar byas ste/ gnas pa rnams kyi bzo'i
195b1: gnas dang / las kyi gnas zhes bya ba nas/ gnas lnga la byed par gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin te/ de'i phas chung ma gsum po chen pa dang / 'bring ba dang / chu ba dag bzhag cing gnas pa'i khang pa rnam pa gsum po dkun gyi dang /
195b2: dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi rnams brtsigs nas/ bskyed mes tshal rnam pa gsum po dgun gyi dang / dpyid kyi dang / dbyar gyi dag btsugs so// de nas gzhon du nor bzangs steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhal skyes pa med par song nas sil snyan nas/
195b3: kyis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa byed do// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rngon pa spang leb can ri dgas tshol zhing de dang de dag tu rgyu ba na ri bo gzhan zhig la phyin pa dang / des ri ba de'i shed ni drang srong gi bsti gnas me tog dang
195b4: 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs rgyu ba/ den mtsho chen po ut+pa la dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma kar pos yog pa/ ngang pa dang / bya ka rand pa dang / ngur pas mdzes pa de mthong nas de bsti gnas der 'khyam par brtsams pa las/ ji
195b5: tsam na drang srong skra dang / kha su dang / sen mo dang / spu nams ring ba/ lus rlung dang / tshabs gdungs pa/ shing gos gyon pa zhig shing gi drung du gnas bcas te cha'i spyil bu na 'dug pa mthong ngo / mthong nas kyang rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te
195b6: thal mo sbyar nas dris pa/ legs ldan phyogs 'did khyod bzhugs nas yun ji srid cig lags/ lo bzhi bcu lon no// khyod kyis yun de sreng cig tu phyogs 'dir lon na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos 'ga' lha gzigs pa 'am gsan pa
195b7: lta mchis sam/ drang srong zhi ba'i bdag nyid des dal bu dal bus spras pa/ bzhin bzangs khyod kyis mtsho 'di mthong ngam/ legs ldan mthong lags so// 'di ni tshangs pa 'dra ba'i rdzing zhes bya ste/ ut+pal dang / ku mu da dang / pad ma kar pos
195b8: gang ba/ bya sna tshogs kyi tshegs kyis bstan pa/ kha ba dang / dngul dang / ba mo'i mdog lta bu'i chus shin tu gang ba/ shin du dri zhim pa'i me tog gis bskor ba'i chu'i rdzing 'dir tshes bcwa lnga la mi 'amo ce'i rgyal po ljon pa'i bu mo yid
196a1: 'phrog ma zhes bya ba'i mi 'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor nas mgo khrus dang bsku mnye sna tshogs dang 'ongs nas khrus byed do/ / de khrus byed pa'i che bro gar dang / glu dang rol mo'i sgra snyan pas bya dang ri dgra rnams kyang yid 'brog
196a2: par byed do/ / kho bo yang de'i sgra thos nas dga' ba dang / yid bde ga chen pos zhag bdun 'da' bar byed de/ bzhin bzangs kho bos ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba 'di mthong ngo // de nas rngon pa spang leb can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi klu wa don
196a3: yod pa'i zhags pa thob pa stes te/ de mi 'am ci'i bu mo yid 'phrog ma la gad po snyam nas/ des dus gzhan zhig na chos bcwa lngal don yod pa'i zhags pa khyer te mtsho 'gra ma dang nye bar me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo mtshad tshong zhig
196a4: tu'akhras nas gcig tu bsgrim pas byar byed cing 'dug go/ / ci tsam na yid 'phrogam mi 'am ci mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor te/ de 'dra ba'i 'byor pa nyid kyis tshangs pa 'du ba'i rdzing du khrus kyi phyir zhugs pa dang / rngon pa spang leb can gyis dem
196a5: thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa btab pa las/ des mi 'am ci mo yad 'phrog ma zin to/ don yod pa'i zhags pas zin nas mtsho'i nang na mchod rgal zhing 'jigs pa'i sgra yang phyud pa dang / mi 'am ci mo'i tshogs lhag mas de thos nas phan tshun
196a6: brgyugs te mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma la brtag par brtsams pa las bzung bar mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang skrag nas bros so// rngon pa des mchog tu gzugs bzang mo blta na sdug pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gzung ba'i phyir drung du gtugs
196a7: pa dang / des smras pa/ mangs khyod ni nga meg shig khyod kyi na thog dus ma yin// nga ni gzugs bzangs rgyal gyi sa 'os yin pas// 'dzin pa legs par 'gyur ba ma yin no// rngon pas smras pa/ gal te khyod ma bzung na 'bros par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ kho mo
196a8: mi 'bros kyi gil te yid mi ches na 'di'i mthus kho mo steng gi nam mkha' la 'gros gtsug gi nor bu 'di zung shig/ rngon pas smrab pa/ bu shes/ des de la gtsug gi nor bu byin nas smras pa/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di su'i lag pa na gnas pa
196b1: de'i dbang du kho mo 'gyur ro/ / de nas rngon pas nor bu de blangs te zhags pas bcings bzhin du khrid de song ngo // de'i tshe gzhon nu nor bzangs ri dgas 'tshor du chas pa dang / rngon pa des gzhon nu nor bzangs gzugs bzang ba mdzes
196b2: pa blta na sdug pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di nin rgyal bu gzhon nu yin la/ 'di yang mchog tu gzugs bzang mo blta na sdug pa yin te/ gal te 'di mthong na btsan thabs su khyer bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag
196b3: gis 'di skyes kyi tshul du bdag nyid kyis dbul lo snyam nas/ de nas de zhags pas bcings bzhin rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzangs gang na ba der khrid de song nas phyin pa dang rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha bdag gis bud med
196b4: rin po che 'di skyes su 'tshal te mchis na pa zhes su gsol/ rgyal bu gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma gzugs bzang mo blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ yon tan thams cad
196b5: 'dus pa bud med kyi mtshan bcwa brgyad kyis brgyan pa/ yul gyi mi pas bzang ba/ nu ma gser gyi bum pa dang ru sbal ltar rgyas zhing rlo ba dang / mkhrab zhing mkhregs pas shin du legs par zlum pa ldem pa/ mig mthon mthing la rtsa dmar
196b6: zhing dkyus ring la pad ma gzhon nu 'dra ba/ sna'i bzangs ring zhing mtho ba/ ma mchu byi ru dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / bami pa'i 'bras bu'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ 'gram pa ma rnyongs sha ri yongs su rgyas pa/ mkhur tshos lhag par dga'
196b7: bar byed pa'i ri mo'i thi le can/ smin ma rim gyis mdzes shing 'jar la bung ba'i tshogs ltar gnag pa/ dpung ba zla ba nya ba dra me med pa ltar rgyas la ring ba/ lto gnyer ma zab mo gsum dang ldan zhing yid tsam song ba/ nu ma'i g.yur
196b8: gyis ro stod pags kyis 'dud la/ dku shing rta'i yan lag ltar dbyibs shin du mdzes pa/ lag pa chu shing gi snying po 'dra ba/ brla byin gyis phra bar zlum pas mdzes pa/ rtsa shin du mi mngon zhing gya gyu med pas yan lag thams
197a1: cad mdzes pa/ nor bu mang po'i mgo rgyan dang / mgul gdub dang / rkang gdu dang / gdub bu dang / do shal dang / se mo da'i spris 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ skra gnag la 'dam pa/ bde sogs ltar rkang pa rkang gdub gyes brgyan cing gser gyi
197a2: 'og pag can/ lho byang ngab/ do shal mang po sbyangs pa/ mdag gser btsem ltar bzang ba mtho // mtha ma thag tu gzhon du 'dod chags kyi zhags pa chuzla drim med cing gsal ba g.yo ba'i rang bzhin lta bur gzung dka' ba/ klung chu rlabs dang bcas/
197a3: pa'i chu srin lta bur rtogs par dka' ba nam mkha' lding dang rlung gi shugs dang 'dra bar 'gro ba/ shing bal gyi 'da' ba lta bur myur du 'gyur ba/ spre'u lca sa gcig na mi 'dug pas g.yo zhing tsa ba yab can gyis ni dam du zin/ 'dod chags kyi mda' rtag
197a4: du nyan mongs pa bstan pa gams pa'i 'dod chags kyi bad bar myong ba la brkam pa/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yul ngani 'gro'i g.yangs las ma zlogs pa/ bzang mo la rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis shin tu rim can du byas pa/ phrad par
197a5: 'dod pas shin du dbyung mi bzod pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i gzhus 'bangs pas ni snying la phog ste/ me'i nang du phye ma leb bzhin du de nyid du 'gyel to// smras pa/ dbyar gyi char sprin nang nas glog ni 'gru ba ltar// bzhin ras zla ba
197a6: 'dra nang bangs kyis mthong ste/ de la chags pa'i 'dod pa steg/ tshul las byung ba'i// 'dang chags mda' yis da yi sems la theg// 'dul ba gaN+DI// bam po zizhi bcu rtsa lnga pa// de nas rgyal bu nang
197a7: bzangs kyis yid 'phrog mkhrid nga glang ba'i khyim gyi grong khyer du sang nas/ dran pa de la yang grong khyer mchog cig byin no// de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig steng gi 'ang bzangs kyi gzhir dang nas ldan ce
197a8: tu rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// yid 'phrog ma'i gzugs dang / na tshod dang / bsnyen bkur brgya phrag du ma'i yon tan gyis gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi sems ji ltar de dang skad cig kyang 'bral mi phod pa de ltar
197b1: phrogs so/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnyis shig ljong ba rgyu zhing 'ongs pa las de las gcig ni rgyal po la rten bcas so// gnyis pa ni gzhon nu nor bzangs la'o// rgyal po la rten bcas pa gang yin pa de ni rgyal pos mdunan 'don du
197b2: bcug ste longs spyod kyi skal ba yang byin no/ / gzhan nu na ra bzangs kyi gang yin pa de la ni das langs spyod kyi skal btsam zhig byin pa dang spras pa/ gnon nu gang gi tsha yab 'das nas khyod rgyal por bcug pa de'i tshe bdag la ci zhig bgyi/ na
197b3: nu nor bzangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod kyi grogs po bram ze nga'i yab kyi mdun na 'don du bcug pa de bzhin du khyod kyang nga'i mdun na 'don du gzhug go zhes byas pa'i gtam re cig nas gcig tu brgyud de bram ze mdun na 'don des thos nas de 'di
197b4: snyam du sems te/ ngas ci nas gzhon nu nyid kyis kyang rgyal srid mi 'thob pa de ltar bya na mdun na 'don du gzhug pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po de'i yul du ri 'or pa zhig sngo bar gyur nas rgyal pos de 'bebs su
197b5: dmag kha chen cig btang ba las de bcom/ rnam par bcom ste pham par byas nas slar log go// de bzhin du kha chen bdun gyis bar btang ba las de rnams kyang bcom rnam par bcom ste bam hAkya nas slar lhags so// rgyal po la blon po rnams kyis
197b6: gsol pa/ swA tse'i slad du rang gi dpung nyams shing gzhan gyi mthu skyed par mdzad/ gang yang lha'i yul na mtshan gyis 'tshab ji snyed mchis pa thams cad dkrug tu gsol/ bram ze mdun na 'don gyis bsams pa/ gzhon nu bsad pa'i thabs
197b7: bya ba'i dus ni 'di yin na snyam nas des rgyal po la gsol pa/ lha de lta bus ni dbab par rje mi thog go// rgyal pos smras pa/ ji ltar bya nyid khon 'gro 'am/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ ci'i slad du lha nyid gshegs/ gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di ni dngal
197b8: bab cing mthu rtsal snyoms pa dang ldan pa lags pas dmag 'di rnams dang lhan cig dgyer gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu bkug nas bsgo ba/ gzhon nu dmag dang lhan cig tu deng la ri 'or ba rnams
198a1: bo ba shig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas/ btsun mo rnams kyi gan du song ste/ yid srog sa mthong ba da de thams cad brjed par gyur to// de nas yang rgyal pos so/ ba dang yang
198a2: mthong ma thag tu thams cad brjed par gyur to/ / de nas mdun na 'don gyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha gzhon du nor bzangs ni yid 'bog ma la lhag par chags pas mchi rngo ma thog gis/ dmag sngogs la gzhon nu btsun ma rnams kyi nang nas
198a3: byung ba dang ci nas kyang yid 'brog pa'i drung du mi mchi bar thal byung gtang bar ci'o/ / rgyal pos blon po rnams la sbas pa/ shes lnga ra dag dpung gi tshogs ste/ gon gyis shig/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas dpung gi tshogs
198a4: glang po che dang / rta dang / shing ta dang / dpung bu chung phun sum tshogs pa 'chag chas go mtshon rnam pa dum dang ldan pa dgas gon byas so// de nas gzhon nu phyir byung ba dang / bsgrog/ gzhon nu dpung gi tshogs sta gon byas
198a5: kyis song shig/ des smras pa/ lha yid 'phrog ma la bltas te/ mchis par bgyi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu thegs par 'gyur gyis ma lta shig/ yab gal te de lhan ma la bltas te mchi'o// gzhon nu ma la ni ltos shig/ des yid
198a6: 'phog ma'i gtsug gi nor bu byer nas ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/ spras pa/ yum bdag ri 'or ba rnams 'bebs su mtsha lags kyis/ gtsug gi nor bu 'di khyod kyis shin du dben par spos la yid 'brog ma 'bum pa
198a7: la thug pa ma lags pa ji ltar gyur byang ma stsol cig ces des des dam la bsgo nas mchi phyag byas te dmag gi dpung gi tshogs dang rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis yul 'das nas ri 'or de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na shing / ljon pa shig gi drung du btab ste 'dug go/
198a8: / de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu 'khor gnod sbyin du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor gnod sbyin stong phrag dum dang / 'khor gnod sbyin brgya stong phrag du ma dang / la mede nas
198b1: gnod sbyin rnams kyi gnod sbyin gyi 'dun sar chas so/ des de sa ras pa na nam/ mkha'i lam la thegs par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lam 'di nas lan mang po zhig du song na bdag gi bzhon pa lan 'ga' yang thogs par
198b2: mgyur na gang gis nad ltar thogs pa 'di la rgyu ci yod snyam pa la sa/ des gzhon nu nor bzangs mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ni bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/ dmag la chas pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/ sa
198b3: grogs byas te/ ri 'ong ba 'di rnams srog chags 'ga' yang gnod par mi 'gyur bar dbab bo snyam du bsams nas/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga len la smras pa/ lnga len tshur shog/ khyod kyis gzhon nu nor bzangs ri 'ong ba
198b4: rnams dang g.yul ma bkye bar srog chags 'ga' la yang gnod par mi bya bar po pashig/ gnod sbyin rdzi sde dpon chen po lnga len b+his bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po rnam zlos kyi bu las mnyan nas lha'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi bshi
198b5: ta la'i chang tsam gyi skyes pa dang / ri'i tshid tsam gyi glang po che dang / glang po che'i tshad tsam gyi ta dang / gzhal med khang gi tshad tsam gyi shing tA na mas sprul to// de nas ral gri dang / tho ba dang / mda' bo tsho dpa mdung dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung thung dang / mad nga
198b6: dgra sA la sogs te mtshon cha'i byed par rnam pa sna tshogs dang / sil dkrol gyi sgra rnam pa sna tshogs 'byin pas 'jigs pa chen po ston cing / lnga le nam thu chen po'i tshogs rnams dang ri 'or du phyin pa dang / glang po che dang rta dang shid rta'i sgra dang /
198b7: sal dkrol gyi sgra sna tshogs dang / gnod sbyin rnams kyi rang gi mthus rab dag ral bar gyur to// de nasar 'a'od na gnas pa de rnams kyis dpung gi tshogs de dgang bdags pa yo na 'ag sa skyes te dris pa/ dpung gi tshogs 'di gang nas
198b8: de rnams kyis spras pa/ myur dus bye shig/ gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di'i mjug nas 'od ste dbang gi tshogs 'di ni de'i yin no// gal te myur dum phyen thams cad mig med par 'gyur ro// rnams kyis bdag cag rgyal lam ldog ste/ gzhon
199a1: nu bo dang ldan la min/ rgyal po zho shas 'tshornams kyis/ bdag cag 'jigs shing p+lag gur mod ces blas nas de nams kyis sgo pra ste/ de nas rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas bum pa gang ba dang rol mo'i sra sna cho ga rtsi
199a2: gzhon nu nor bzangs bsu'o/ / des kyang dbugs phyung nas de rnams 'dra ba las snga po bsgos te pya blang bcad / gtalu ya bzung // de nas ri 'ong bar rnams cham drub ba nas gzhon nu nor ba bdus slar log go// rgyal po na rA can gyis de
199a3: nub mo'i rmi las na bya rgod cig 'ongs te rgyal po'i lha dril nas rdu sa gzangs te grong khyer de bya thams cad kyi mtha' skor ba dang / rin pa che sna bdun khyim du 'ongs par mthong ngo // sa bong nas de nas rgyal po'i jigs skrag sa dga' zhing spu bad zhes byed
199a4: nas myur ba myur bar langs te mal chen po la 'dug nas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad de gzhi 'di las bdag rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ srog gi bar chad du mi 'gyur grang snyam nas sems khongs su chud cing 'dug pa las de nam nangs nas
199a5: rmi lam de bram ze mdun na 'don la smras pa dang / des bsams pa/ lha rmi lam de lta bu mthong ba ni gdon mi za bar gzhon nus ri 'ong ba rnams pham par byas kyis log pa zhig tu bstan par bya'o snyam nas/ smras pa/ lha khyod kyis rmad lam du
199a6: gzig pa ni bzang ba ma lags te/ gdon ma tshal bar gzhi 'di las lha'i rgyal srid las nyams pa 'am/ sku tshe'i bar chad du 'gyur lags so// 'on kyang 'di bzlog pa'i thabs mchis te/ de yang bram ze rnams kyis gsang tshigs las mthong ngo //
199a7: bzlog pa'i thabs de ci yin/ lha skyed mos 'tshal du ljid dbyibs legs pa chad la bab pa bgyis la/ de nas rdo thal gyis thugs te/ legs par bstan la ri dgas phra mo rnams kyi khrag gis bkang la de nas lhas khrus la gshegs
199a8: pa ni rdzi de de la them skas gcig las 'jug par gyi'o/ / gcig las zhugs nas gnyis pa la 'dzeg par gyi'o/ gnyis pa las zhugs nas gsum pa la mdzeg par bgyi'o// gsum pa las zhugs nas bzhi pa la 'dzeg par gyi'o// de na
199b1: bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhis lha'i zhabs lces pa ldags la mi ma yin pa'i tshal gyi bdug pas 'dug go/ de ltar na lha'i dngos sdig 'byang zhing yun ring por rgyal srid spyod par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa de dag
199b2: thams cad ni nus na 'di ltar mi ma yin pa'i tshil 'di ni shin tu dkon no/ / mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha mod pa gang lags pa de dkon lags sam// rgyal pos smras pa// de ji lta bu zhig yin/ mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha yid 'phrog ma
199b3: 'di me ma lags bam lags sam/ / rgyal pos smras pa// mdun na 'don 'di la gzhon du'i srog 'dug gis de skad ma smra shig/ des smras pa/ lha khyim gyi phyir ni 'ga' gtang ste// grong rdal phyir ni khyim gtang ngo // yul ljongs phyir ni grong rdal te/ bdag
199b4: gis phyir ni sa gtang ngo / / zhes bgyi ba ma gsan tam// rgyal po bdag nyid brtan gyur nas// gzhon nu blo ldan de la ni// gzhan zhig skul bar spyod grang gis// yid 'phrog 'di ni dgum par mdzod// bdag nyid la mngon par chags pa ni mi byed pa ci yang //
199b5: mod pas des khas blangs so// donas mdun na 'don gyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bya bar brtsams te/ rdzing brkos nas rdo thal gyis byugs shing legs par bstar nas ri dgas phra mo rnams kyi khrag sogs pa la zhugs so// sbyor ba de nor
199b6: bzangs kyi btsun mo'i skye bos shes nas de rnams dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ bdag cag lang tshol bab ci gzugs phun sum tshogs pa yin pas/ da ni bdag cag dang gzhon nu nor bzangs su yongs su dga' mgur spyod par 'gyur ro//
199b7: zhes de rnams rab tu dga' bar byed pa de dag yid 'brog mas mthong nas dris pa/ khyed cag ci'i phyir lhag par dga'/ ji tsam na gzhan zhig gis yid 'phrogs la ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang / yid 'brog ma bcug sngal ba dang / yidam pa
199b8: bskyes nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis gang na ba der song ste rkang pa gnyis la gcugs nas snying dzi ga du phra bcos chung ngus don de dal bus smras pa dang / des smras pa/ gal te de lta na legs par rtogs shig/ bdag gis kyang brtag ga yid
200a1: 'phrog mas brtags nas yang smras pa dang / des brtags na yang bden pa mthong nas des gtsug gi nor bu de dang gos shi ge yid 'phrog ma la byani nas smras pa/ bu khyod dus la ma bab par ma 'gro shi gi/ de lta na kho mo la kha mchu 'byung ba//
200a2: mi 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po ji skad bstan pa'i rim pa bzhin du khrus la chas te khrag gis gang ba'i rdzong bur zhugs nas byung ba dang / de nas de'i rkang pa gnyis la bram ze rnams kyi lces bldags so// ji tsam na ma 'am tsa mo khridi de shog ces bsgo
200a3: ba dang / de ma thag 'a nar yid 'phrog ma nam mkha' la 'phags te chags su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni rig dang zad pa dang / bdag ni bag dang rtses pa las/ ban glang po btags thar pa ltar/ da ni bdag mo 'gro bar bya/ rgyal pas kyang nam
200a4: mkha'i lam las 'gro ba mthong nas de skrag ste/ mdun na 'don la smras pa/ gang gi phyir 'bad par bya ba de ma grub par mi 'am ci yid 'phrog ma bros so// mdun na 'don gyis smras pa/ lha da ni don grub ste/ dngos sdig dang bral lags so// de nas
200a5: yid 'phrog ma nam mkha'i lam las 'gro ba na 'di snyam du sems te/ gang yang bdag gnas skabs 'di thob pa de ni drang srong des bstan pa las gyur gyi/ gal te des ma bstan na ni bdag bzung zha 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba zhig/ de lta
200a6: bas na re shig drang srong de'i drung du 'gro'o snyam nas/ de de'i bsti gnas su song ste/ rkang pa gnyis la phyag byas nas drang srong la smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyod kyis bstan pas bdag gzung ste mchis nas ma'i reg pa rnams thob cing srog gi bar
200a7: chad du cung zhig gsem gyur to/ / de bas gsol pa ni gal te brgya zhig la gzhon nu nor bzangs bdag cho zhi ma chis des dag gi so nga du 'gro la zhin 'i shis so// gzhon nu lam yang bgrod par dka' ste nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis slar ba'ad
200a8: cig/ gal te bzlog kyang mchis sum btub na de la lam bstan pa'i rigs kyis/ gzhon nu yid 'phrog mas bstan pa byang phyogs logs na ri nag po gsum mchis so// de dag rgal ba'i pha rol tu na yang gsum mo// de dag rgal bI pha rol
200b1: na yang gsum mchis so/ / de dag rgal ba dang ri'i rgyal po gangs can mchis so// de'i byang phyogs na ri bo phur ba'i rtse mchis so// de nas lam chu skra can dang / ser lder can dang / rgyud cig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod dgur sbyar ba'i gzugs
200b2: can dang / phur ba'i dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyibs dang / mi g.yo ba dang / rab zol te/ ri ba de dag khyod kyis rgol cig/ de la ri ba sor ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / phur ba'i dbyibs la ni phugs nas 'jug/ rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos
200b3: 'jug te/ thabs 'di dag gis ri bo de rnams rgal bar bgyi'o// 'khrul 'khor ra gdong can dang / lug lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag kyang gzhom par bgyi'o// phrag na sprul kha chu'i rgyun chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug
200b4: pa zhig mchis te/ / de ni zho shas gzhom par gyi'o// gang na sbrul ni nag po zhig/ phrag na phyed 'dug mthong nas ni// bdag gi slad du gzhu rdungs la// mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis// gang nas lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ drung ba byed
200b5: pa mthong na ni/ de gnyis rar ga cag mdzod dang // lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so// 'jigs pa che bskyed mtshon thogs pa'i/ lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na/ de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang / lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so// srin ma
200b6: lugs kyi mchu can zhig/ kha 'dzums gdang bar bgyid gzigs na/ de tshe yi 'bral ba la// bang padag gis gdab par mdzad// de bzhin khron pa klong dag 'khyil// drug bcu'i khru can la khyod mtshangs/ sgra mig seng go'i ltar ser zhing / mi
200b7: bzang bsnyen par dka' ba yi/ / gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag/ gzhu bkang sta ni gsod mdzod la/ chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yin// chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig/ nang gi phye ma le ba gdungs dang / sna tshogs drad mo dgod pa dang / sbrul can 'odam can
200b8: gyi gling / nang ga na ni srin mkhrikhro/ phye ma leb na ma ma yin// gdungs pan ni 'din khre mang / sna tshogs canan 'dod sbyar gzugs/ drad mor mi 'am ci yi zin// dgad pan na mi'am ci'o// mnam sbrul can sbrul mang na/ 'od ma can klang shal mchi/
201a1: nad dag la ni brtan par bya/ phye ma leb la rtul phor bya/ gdungs par 'dzin khri kha cing ngo do// sna tshogs can du klu sna tshogs// dud mo can du yid bde bas// dgod byed du ni smra ba yi// sbyor bas kun du rgal bar mdzod/ sbrul
201a2: can dun snrel drug gi/ sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can// klang ngamatshan rnon gdab pa yi// sbyor bas kun turgal bar mdzod// chu ba rnams rgal nas gan pa'i gnas na gnod sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te gzhom par mdzod cig/ de
201a3: nas ni me'i maci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so zhes gsungs shig/ drang srong de la yid 'phrog mas// de skad ces smras nas rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te de nas song ngo // ji tsam na gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ri 'or de phab nas skyes
201a4: khyer te glang po'i grong khyer du 'ongs so zhes rgyal pos thos nas mchog du dga' ba skyes so/ / de nas gzhon nu ngal sos nas pa'i drung du song ste phyag byas nas mdun du 'dug pa dang // rgyal pos mchog tu dga' bar 'gyur ba'i gtam byas na smras
201a5: pa/ gzhon nu khyod bde bar 'ongs sam/ lha khyod kyi bka' drin gyis ri 'or pa phab ste/ gte'u bzung sna bo bskos lags te/ dpya dang skyes kyang 'di dag lags kyis phyag mdzod du gzhug du gsol/ rgyal pos smras pa/ bu legs par byas kyis
201a6: bzhes so/ / de ras gzhon nus pa la phyag byas nas chas pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu skyes la lhan cig kho nar longs spyod kyis 'dug shig/ lha bdag gis yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas/ yun ring zhig lags pas mchi
201a7: lags so/ gzhan nu dang 'gro ba shol las song shig/ de gal gyis 'chu zhing 'di skad ces smras so// yab nges par de nyid bdag mchi lags sa// rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas gzhon nu rang gi khyim du so ngan btsun mo pho brang gi
201a8: snod pal gyis stong par mthong nas de sems khongs su chud bzhin du 'gran/ yid 'phrog ma ma mthong nas snying stor te phan tshun du rmu zhing yid grogs yid 'phrog ma zhes sgra byung ngo // ji tsam na btsun mo rnams tshogs nas btsun mar rnams
201b1: kyis gtam rlung la bskur ba dang / de'i snying la zug rngus zug pas yang nas yang du dris pa las/ de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa smras so// de mya ngan gyis yid blong bar gyur to// bud med de rnams kyis smras pa/ lha btsun mo'i 'khor 'di
201b2: nade bas bud med shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa dag mchis na ci'i slad du thugs ngan mdzad/ des pa snying rje med cing byas pa chud gsodan pa thos nas ma'i drung du song ste rkang pa la gtugs nas smras pa/ yum yid bzhin yon tan ldan
201b3: gyur cing / gzugs mdzes phun sum tshogs pa yi// yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na// bdag gi yid 'phrog/ gang du mchis// yid kyis rab tu bcug snyam na'ang // bdag gi yid ni kun tu rmongs// de dang bral bar gyur pa yis/ snyid ni shin
201b4: du gdungs pa nyid/ / bdag gi yid du mchi zhing yid 'phrog la// yid du 'thad cing yid la dga' ba yi// yid 'phrog dang bral bdag lus gdungs pa yi// bdag gi sdug sngal 'di ni gang nas mchis// des smras pa/ bu yid 'phrog ma
201b5: sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyam nga bar gyur nas kho mos btang ngo / / yum ji ltar gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa thams cad rgyas par smras pa dang / des pha snying rje med cing byas pa mi bzo ba yin no zhes smras nas yang smras pa/ yum gang du
201b6: mchis/ shul ni gang nas/ des smras pa/ gang du yid 'phrog song ba yi/ lam de ring dang drang srong dang // seng ge dag gis rtag bstan cing // chos kyi rgyal po gnas pa yin// de yid 'phrog ma dang bral ba'i sdug sngal gyis mi bzod par
201b7: nyam thag cing snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa/ / yid bzhin yon tan ldan gyur pa'i// yid 'phrog ma ni mi gda' na// zhes bya ba nas bdag gi sdug bsngal 'di ni gang nas 'das zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// de nas
201b8: mas smras pa/ bu btsun mo'i'i khor 'di na de bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i bud med dag yod na ci'i phyir mya ngan byed/ gzhon nus smras pa/ yum de ma rnyed par bdag dga' bar ga la 'gyur// des de dbugs phyung yang 'on kyang
202a1: mngan gyis gdungs nas de'i khungs tshol zhing phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams te de'i blo skyes pa/ gang kho na las thob pa de nyid la shige dra'o// snyam nas/ des rngon pa spang leb can gyi drung du song ste/ dris pa/ khyod kyis yid
202a2: 'phrog ma gang nas rnyed/ des smras pa/ ri bo che ge mo'i ngos la drang srong zhig gnas te/ de'i bsti gnas na tshangs pa 'du ba zhes bgyi ba'i rdzing mchis te/ der khrus la zhugs pa las drang srong gis bstan nas rnyed do// des bsams pa/ de ni drang
202a3: srong gi drung du song dang de las khungs phyin par 'gyur snyam mo rgyal pos gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma dang bral bas shin tu yid blong ba'i gtam de thos so/ / de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod yid blong du ni yod/ da ni de bas khyad par
202a4: 'phags pa'i chung ma sbyin no/ / des smras pa/ yab bdag ni de ma lags pa'i mchis brang gi 'khor dang mchis par rngo mi thog lags so// rgyal pos de la lan du ma smras kyang ma zlogs so// de nas rgyal pos grong khyer gyi sgo dang ra ba'i khang
202a5: ci nas kyang gzhon nu phyir mi 'chor ba bya ba'i phyir skyes bu srungs ma dag bkod do/ / de nas gzhon nu ni mtshan thog thag mi nyal bar gyur to// lnga po 'di dag ni mtshan mo cung zad nyal gyi phal cher mi nyal te/ lnga gang zhe na/ skyes pa bu med la/
202a6: chags pas sems bcings pa dang / bud med skyes pa la chags pa dang / srog chags ngur ba dang / chom rkun pa'i rab go dang / dge slong brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin no zhes gsungs so// de nas gzhon nu 'di snyam du sems
202a7: gal te bdag sgo nas song na pa the zlas kyo nga ma gtum po dag yod de/ de rnams kyis bdag chad pas gcod pa 'am// srog dang bral bar byed par 'gyur gyis/ ci nas kyang ma la bdag srungs ma med pa'i lam nas 'gro
202a8: snyam nas de mtshan mo langs te ut+pal sngon po'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa'i phreng ba rgyal mtshan la btags nas gang na srungs ma'i mi med pa de nas babs pa na zla ba shar to/ / de nas des zla ba la bltas nas yid 'phrog ma dang bral
202b1: ba'i smre sngags 'di lta bu dag 'don pa byedade/ zla nya rgyu skar rgyal po mtshan mo gsal byed kye// khyod ni skar ma'i mig tu sdug pa ded dpon bzang // cig bdag gi sdug pa ut+pal lta bu'i mig/ yid 'phrog ces bgyi khyod kyis sa stengs gzigs lag
202b2: sam/ zhes smras nas/ sngon gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba dran zhing song ba las ri dgas mo zhig mthong nas de la yang smras pa// kye ma ri dgas so khyod rtswa chu lo ma za// khyod ni legs gyur pa der spyod bdag ni rngon pa min// ri dgas mo ltar mig
202b3: dkyus ra de bas gzugs bzang ba/ / bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam// de de nas song ste phyogs gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang / tshal me tog dang 'bras bus mdzes par byas pa'i snying po la bud pa dag longs spyod pa
202b4: mthong nas de nas bud ba zhig la smras pa/ / sbrang rtswa'i bung ba ri bo mthon ting lta bu'i mchog/ smyug ma'i skabs dang pad ma dag la gnas 'cha' ba// skra yi tshogs ring kha dog bur ba ltar gnag pa// bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong
202b5: zur tam/ phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang sbrul zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang smras pa/ kye ma'o sbal gnag shing lo lta bur lce g.yo zhing // mig dang kha yi nang nas dud pa'i tshogs 'byin pa// khyod kyi gdug pa'i me dang 'dod
202b6: chags mer mi mtshungs/ / bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam// de nas kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu son pa dang / tshal gzhan zhig na bu byug sgra 'byin pa zhig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khu byug de la yang
202b7: smras pa/ kye ma khu byug tshal mchog ljon shing la gnas pa// 'dab chags tshogs kyi rgyal po bud med yid 'phrog ma// ut+pal sngon po lta bur dri med mdzes pa'i mig/ bdag gi yid 'phrog ces bya khyod kyis mthong gyur tam//
202b8: phyogs de nas kyang song ba dang // shing mya ngan 'tshang zhes bya ba me tog thams cad rgyas pa zhig mthong nas// ming gi rnam grangs bkra shis shes brjod pa// ljon pa rnams kyi rgyal po cher gyur la// yid 'phrog mya ngan gyis ni
203a1: blong bdag/ thal mo sbyar na khyod kyis mya ngan songs// de de ltar yang klong bzhin ris kyis drang srong de'i bsti gnas sa byid/ sa des drang srong de la dul ba dang bcas pas phyag byas nas smras pa// bzed 'phags so//
203a2: su shing shur dang ni g.yang gzhi mnabs// rtsa ba myu gu skyu ru bil ba ka pid gsol// drang srong mgos bdud phyag 'tshal bdag gi yad 'phrog ma// khyod kyis gzigs ma khyod ni bdag la myur du gsungs// de nas drang srong des
203a3: gzhon nu nor bzangs la byed pa legs so/ / zhes byas pa dang / stan bting ba bya ba la sogs pa sngar bya ba'i yang dag par dga' ba byas nas smras pa// smin ma 'jam pa'i smin mtshungs mthon mthing bzhin legs mthong na dga'
203a4: ba'i gzugs 'chang ba/ / bzhin ras zla ba nya'ang ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i mig de bdag gis mthong // dpon khyod bag chung bzhugs te rtsa ba 'bras bu sna tshogs gsol bar mdzod cig dang // slad kyis bde blag byon 'gyur
203a5: 'di la bdag gi yid la the tshom yod ma pa chis/ / smin ma bzang mos 'di skad tshig smras te// gzhon nu khyod la sred pas bdag mi bde// nags khrod gnas pa'ang sdug sngal chen po ste// gshegs par gyur na nges par bdag mthong ngo //
203a6: des sor gdub rgyar 'di byeni smras pa// lam yang la bzod dka' bas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ slar log shig/ gal te bzlog kyang 'dug tum btub na de la lam bstan pa'i rigs so// des yang 'dis dkyis bstan te/ byang
203a7: phyags logs na de dag pa gsum yod do/ / de dag rgal ba'i pha rol na yang gsum/ de dag rgal ba'i pha rol tu na yang gsum yod de// de dag rgal bu dang re'i rgyal po gangs can zhes bya ba yod de// phyogs de nas sun 'di sa
203a8: blang bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste shin du'om 'dzag ces bya ba'i sman yod de// demar las bo cas nas btung bar bya'o// des na skom pa dang bkres pa med cing dran pa dang mthu stobs 'phel bar 'gyur ro// spre'u shig kyang bkri bar bya
203b1: gsang sngags kyang bslab par bya/ / gzhu mda' dang chas pa dang // nor bu 'od dang ldan pa dang // dug gsod pa sman dug sel dang / lcags kyi phur ba gsum dang / pi bad yang bcad par bya'o// re'i rgyal po gangs can gyi byang
203b2: phyogs na ri bo pur ba'i rtse yod do/ / de nas lamachu sgra can dang // sang ldeng can dang / rgyud gcig pa dang / rdo rje can dang / 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can dang / pur ba'i dbyibs dang / sa srung bu'i dbyabs dang / mi g.yo ba dang /
203b3: rab 'grol lo/ khyod kyis ri de dag rgal dgos te/ de la ri bo seng ldeng can la ni phug nas 'jug/ rgyud gcig pa dang / phur ba'i dbyibs la yang phug nas 'jug/ rdo rje can la ni bya'i rgyal pos 'jug ste/ thabs 'di dag gis
203b4: ri bo de rnams rgal bar bya'o/ / 'khrul 'khor ra gdod can dang / lug lta bu dang / skyes bu srin po ser skya'i gzugs can dag gzhom par bya'o// phug na sbal kha chu'i rgyan chen po'i shugs kyis rgyug pa zhig mchis te/ de ni zho shas
203b5: gzhom par bya'o/ / gang na sprul ni nag po zhig/ phug na byed 'dug mthong nas ni// bdag gi slad du gzhu rdungs la// mda' yis bsnun te gsad par gyis// gang la lug gnyis phan tshun nas/ rdung bar byed pa mthong na ni/ de gnyis
203b6: rwa re bcag mdzod dang / / lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so// 'jigs pa che skyed mtshan thogs pa'i// lcags kyi skyes pa gnyis mthong na// de gnyis las ni gcig brdegs dang // lam ni rnyed par 'gyur lags so// srin mo lcags
203b7: kyi mchu can zhig/ kha 'dzums gdangs par bgyid gzigs na/ de tshe de yi 'phral ba la// phur ba dag gis gdab par mdzod// de bzhin khron pa klong drag 'khyil// drug bcu'i khrun can la khyed mchongs// skra mig seng ge'i ltar ser
203b8: zhing / mi bzad bsnyen par dka' ba yi// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dag/ gzhu bkang ste ni gsad mdzod la// chu srin 'dzin khris gang ba yi/ chu bo mang po rgal mdzod cig/ nang gi phye ma leb gdungs dang / sna tshogs drad mo dgod
204a1: pa dang / sbrul can 'od ma can gyi klung // nang ga na ni srin mo khro// phye ma leb na mi ma yin// gdungs pa na ni 'dzin khri mang // sna tshogs can na 'dod sbyar gzugs// dud mor mi 'am ci yi bran// dgod pa na ni ma ma ci'i/ mna'am
204a2: sprul ban smrab ma ni/ / 'od ma can klung shal ma li// nang gdan ni brtan par bya// phye ma leb la rtul bod bya// gdung bar 'dzin khrib cing ngo // sna tshogs can du kla sna tshogs// dung mo can du yid bde bas// dgod byed du ni misma
204a3: sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod/ / sbrul can dra ni sbrul drug gi/ sngags kyi sbyor dang 'od ma can// klung du mtshan non gdab pa yi// sbyor bas kun tu rgal bar mdzod// chu bo rnams rgal nas gcan pa'i gnas nagan
204a4: sbyin lnga brgya yod pa de rnams la sran tshugs te gi zhom par mdzod cig/ de nas ni mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang mchis so zhes gsungs shig/ de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis ji skad bstan pa'i sman dang / gsang sngags dang /
204a5: sman dug sel gyi sbyor ba rnams btsal ba'i phyir drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas song ngo // de nas des spre'u mgatogs par ji skad bstan pa thams cad sta gon byas nas// de nas de rnams khyer te yang drang srong de'i drung du song ba
204a6: nga/ des de la spre'u byini nas smras pa/ gzhon nu 'bad pa 'dis ci bya// yidi 'phrog ma ni tsi la dgos// khyod gcig bu grogs med pa lus// do mi za bar 'gyur gyis thong / gzhon nus smras pa/ drang srong chen po bdag ni gdon mi za bar mchi'o//
204a7: ci'i slad zhe na/ mkha' la zla ba rbA bgrogs shig/ ga las mchis// mchi ba'i mthu stobs ldan pa'i ri dgas gtso bo dang // me yis nags sreg pa na grogs shig ga las mchis// bdag lta bu la grogs po mthu ldan ci zhig 'tshal/ kye tsi
204a8: rgya mtsho che chur 'dzag par mi bgyi 'am/ ci lags sbrul gyis zin ces gso bar mi bgyi 'am// sems can spangs can gyis bsten brtson 'grus cher brtsams te// gal te 'bad de ma rung 'di la nyes pa med// de nas gzhon nu nor
204b1: bzangs yid 'phrog mas bstan pa'i rnam pa sna tshogs dang chas te rim gyis ri dang / chu bo dang / phug dang g.yang sa la sogs par sman dang // gsang sngags dang / sman dug sel gyi sbyor bas rgyal bar byas nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon
204b2: ba'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu son pa dang / gzhon nus grong khyer dpal dang ldan pa skyed mes tshal gyi tshal memo tog da 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pas mdzes par byas pa/ bya sna tshogs kyis bsten pa/ rdzing bu dang / mtshe'u ring po dang /
204b3: gru bzhi dang / mi 'am ci mo rnams kyis skor ba de la mi 'am ci ma rnams chu len du 'ongs pa mthong nas/ de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs de rnams la smras pa/ chu mang po 'dis ci zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po
204b4: ljon pa'i sras mo yid 'phrog sa zhes bgyi ba zhig mchis/ de me'i lag tu son par gyur pas de'i me'i dri ba shal ba lags so// gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis dris pa/ ci bum pa 'di dag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu da' steng/
204b5: nas lcags sam/ 'on te rim gyis/ de rnams kyis spras pa/ rim gyis so// des bsams pa/ thabs 'di bzang ste/ sor gdub kyi rtsa 'di bram pa gcig gi nang du gzhug go snyam nas/ des mi 'am ci mo gcig gi bram
204b6: par mtshar bar bcuganas mi 'am tsas de la sbas pa/ khyod kyi bum pa 'dis thog mar yi 'phrog sa la khrus byos shig/ des bsams pa/ gdan mi za bar 'di la dgas pa zhag yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ de nas des
204b7: a pa thogs pang 'brag na bya bar thugs palas dgas nas dgas kyi rtswa yang du ltung ba dang ba 'phrogasas de 'breg so/ / de ma ma'am tsam sa dras pa/ di bdaga' zhigs 'dasas pa/ des smras pa/
204b8: mchis sa/ song la de dben pa zhig du zhog shig/ des de na nga khrid nas dben pa zhig du bzhag go// de nas yid 'brog mas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la gcugs te/ smras pa/ yab gal te bdag gi khyim thab bgyid pa gzhon nu
205a1: na ngas dum pas na dus rgya kyus na nagas+ho/ ngas smras pa/ dpald par yang sem la thos das dengam thag ta rgyas la phyogs pa na ga// / ga/ dang // yang 'phruganas smras pa/ ya m-ir gyur bsu 'di ga/
205a2: mchi/ bdag nyid sa ma'i bar bsas// de nas pa'am ci'i rgyal ba'i ldan pakran nas dkris pa dang thal te/ de nas kun nas dkris pa dang thal nas smras pa/ gal te gzhan du 'ongs na das khyod rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
205a3: no dang yo byad mang po dang / mi 'amachi mo stong gis yongs su bskor te de la chung ma don du sbyin no// de nas yid 'phrog ma dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bas gzhon nu nor bzangs lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pa
205a4: bstan to/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gzhon nu nor bzangs gzugs bzang po mdzes pa// blta na sdug pa// kha dog rgya mchog dang ldan pa mthong ngo // mthong nas shin tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ de nas de bgram par 'dod nas gser gyi
205a5: sdong po bdun dang / shing rta la bdun da// je bo che bdun dang / phag bdun btsugs so// gzhon nu nor bzangs ni byang chub sems dpa' yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas de dang / de dag la mkhas
205a6: pa yin no/ / lha rnams kyang de dag la bgegs med par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' gar dang / glu dang pi bang dang // nga rnga dang / shin tu sgra snyan dang / pi bang rgyud gsum pa dang / rdza rnga la sogs pa lha rnam
205a7: gyis bsgrubs pa'i sa la stan rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sku'i khyad par ni kun nas 'brad cing mi 'am ci snying phrag du mas ni yongs su bskor nas/ / ral gri ut+pa la ston pa'i 'dab ma 'dra ba thogs te/ mi 'amaci'i rgyal po ljon pa mthong ba
205a8: gser gyi sdong po'i drung du song nas chu shing la gcod pa bzhin du sdong ba de dum bu dum bur bcad par brtsams te/ de nas de til gyi 'bru tsam du thags so// mangs ni shing rta la bdun dang / rnga bdun dang / phag bdun gtsang mar byung
205b1: ste/ ri rab bzhin du mi g.yo bar gnas so// de nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i lha dang / mi 'am ci brgya stong phrag du mas a la la zhes ca co dang gzhi'i sgra chen po phyung ngo // mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas mthong zhing thos nas shin du ngo mtshar du gyur
205b2: to/ / de nas mi 'am ci mo yid 'phrog ma 'dra ba sha stag stong gi dbus su yid 'phrog ma bzhag ste/ gzhon nu nor bzangs la smras pa/ gzhon nu tshur yid 'phrog ma ngo shes par gyis shig/ de nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis do shes par bya ba'i
205b3: bya'i tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smras pa/ ji ltar khyod ni ljon pa'i bu yin la/ kho bo'i sdug pa yid 'phrog yin zhe na/ bden pa 'di yis myur ba kho nar ni// yid 'phrog gom pas myur du 'gro bar shog/ de nas de ma thag tu gom pas/
205b4: sod ba dang / mi 'am ci rnams kyis smras pa/ lha gzhon nu nor bzangs 'di stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa shin du tshogs pa lags te/ yid 'phrog ma dang thab ri rabab lags na// ci'i slad du 'di la tho ba tsam/ 'di la
205b5: yid 'phrog ma stsol cig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i tshogs rnams kyis rjes su bsngags pa dang / mi 'am ci rnams kyi 'dun pas gzhon nu nor bzangs la rje bkur sti chen po byas nas yid 'phrog ma lha'i rgyan rnams
205b6: kyi brgyan te lag pa g.yon pas bzung / gser gyi byam bum lag pa g.yas pas bzung nas gzhon nu nor bzangs kyi drung du song ste/ smras pa/ gzhon nu yid 'phrog ma 'di mi 'am tsa mo stong gis yongs su bskor te/ kho bos khyed kyi
205b7: chung ba'i phyir byin gyis/ mi rnams ni de mi rtag pa yin gyis// ji ltar yang 'di mdor cig/ yab bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gzhon nu nor bzangs kyis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa las mnyan nas mi 'am ci'i gnas kyi khang pan
205b8: 'phrog ma dang lhan cig skyes pa med par sil snyan rnams kyis rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de dus gzhan zhig na rang gi yul dran nas pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mya ngan gyis gdungs /
206a1: gyur nas yid 'phrog ma la smras pa/ pha ma dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug sngal gyis non par gyur to// de nas yid 'phrog mas de ltar gyur pa dag tha la rgyas par smras so// des smras pa/ gzhon nu dang lhan cig song //
206a2: mi rnams ni slu bar byed pa yin gyis/ khyod kyis bag yod par gyis shig/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldan pas nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gser la sogs pa mad du brdzangs te btang nas de yid 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu steng gi
206a3: nam mkha'i lam la mi'am ci'i shugs kyis chas pan/ rim gyis glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du phyin no// de nas glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab/ dar gyi chun byang
206a4: sbyangs/ rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan btsugs/ shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por dag pa shams// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bkram ste/ dga' dga' lhur byas so// de nas gzhon nu ma'i gtso bo stong phrag dums yongs su bskor cing yid
206a5: 'phrog ma dang lhan cig tu glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du zhugs so/ / de nas lam gyis dub pa'i ngal bsos nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag khyer te pha'i drung du song nas rgyal po'i stan gyi glo zhig tu 'dug ste/ mi 'am ci'i grong khyer du song ba
206a6: pa dang 'ongs pa rnams rgyas par smras so/ / de nas rgyal po nor can gyis 'di ni shin tu stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa can no zhes bya bar rigs nas rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur to// gzhon nu nor bzangs
206a7: kyis bsams pa/ gang bdag yid 'brog ma dang lhan cig tshogs pa dang / rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa 'di ni sngon byas pa'i rgyu'i khyad pa yin gyis/ ma la yang bdag gi sa sbyin pa dag ni btang / bsod snyoms dag ni b+hi/
206a8: snyam nas/ des glang po'i khyim gyi grong khyer du lo bcu gnyis su gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas so// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na gzhon nu nor bzangs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/
206b1: nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na rgyal po nor bzangs zhes bya bar gyur to// ngas gang yid 'phrog ma'i phyir stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa bstan nas/ lo bcu gnyis su gtan
206b2: pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byas pa des ngas bla na med pa'i byang chub ma thob mod kyi/ 'on kyang sbyin pa de dang / brtson 'grus de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan lnga
206b3: ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog bI byang chub don tu gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyis grong khyer na rgyal po thams cad kyi
206b4: bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/ 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang / mi mang pos rab tu gang ba dang / 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa rnams rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba nas
206b5: chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod/
206b6: par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas khye'u gzugs bzang po mdzes pa bstan sdug pa phags pa'i mdog ser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba/ dpral hI/
206b7: dbyes che ba/ smin ma 'jar ba/ sna'i gzangs mtho ba zhes bya ba nas/ gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// gzhan nu thams cad sgrol dang pa bzad pa/ dge ba'i bsam pa can/ bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan
206b8: la phan par zhugs pa/ snying rje can bdag nyid chen po chos 'dod pa/ skye dgu rnams la byams pa/ thams cad sbyin pa/ thams cad gtong ba/ chags pa med par gtong ba/ gtong ba chen po la zhugs pa yin no// de'i gtong ba rgya chen po thos na
207a1: dpag tshad brgya nas kyang don du gnyer ba'i skyo ba spangs te thams cad kyang yid la re ba rdzogs par byas nas gtong ngo / / de nas re shig cig na byang chub sems dpa' shing rta nor bu dang gser dang dngul dang / rdo rje dang / bre
207a2: rUd+ya dang / spug dang / ba ma rA pa dang / in+d+ra nI las 'bar bar byas pa/ tsan dan mchog gi snying po las bsgrubs pa/ seng ge dang skrag dang gung gi pags pas g.yogs gta rlung gi shugs ltar mgyogs pa/ gser dang dngul gyi dril bu g.yer ka
207a3: sgra 'khrol ba bzhi dang ldan pa mchog gi nang du zhugs nas grong khyer dam pa nas skyed mos tshal du mngon du song ngo / / de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol mngon du ba su nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs/
207a4: gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ yang smras pa/ khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du// thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags// bram ze rnams la shing rta 'di// khyod kyis sbyin pa gtang ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub
207a5: sems dpa' thams cad sgrol shing rtid las sgyur ba myur bar babs te snying dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba sa bram ze de dag la shing rta byin nas smras pa// bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la// mchog du dga' bas shing rta gtong / de
207a6: bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum/ gtang nas byang chub mchog reg shog// 'dul ba gzhi// bam po bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa// / de dus gzhan zhig na glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba me tog
207a7: kun da dang / ku mu ta dang / kha ba dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po lta bu'i mdog can bdun legs par gnas shing rkang lag legs par gnas pa/ glang po ches srung gi bu ltar 'gying zhing 'gro ba/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis
207a8: brgyan pa/ mthong na bkra shis pa la zhon nas shin tu sdug pa'i bran dang / mdza' bshes dang / g.yog rnams kyi bzhin 'brang zhing zla ba rgya skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su ga/ ba bzhin du sos ka'i dus la bab pas shing rnams me tog
207b1: kha 'bus shing / ngad pa dang / khrung khrung dang / rma bya dang / ne co dang / ri skyegs dang / khu byug dang / shang shang te'u sgra 'byin pa'i nags tshal gyi bskyed mos tshal gyi sar song ba dang / de nas phyir rgol bas spang ba'i bram ze
207b2: kha cig gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyi drung du rings pa rings par 'ongs nas/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig ces smras nas yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du/ khyed ni thams cad gtong zhes
207b3: grags/ khyod kyi glang po mchog 'di ni// bdag cag rnams la stsal pa'i rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i glang po'i mchog de las myur bsgyur bar babs nas dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' bI
207b4: yid kyis de dag la glang po mchog de byin nas smras pa/ bdag gis ji ltar bram ze la// mchog du dga' bas glang chen btang / de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum// gtong nas byang chub mchog reg shog/ rgyal po thams
207b5: cad bshes gnyen gyis khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po che'i mchog rgyal srid 'phel zhes bya ba phyir rgol bas spang ba'i bram ze rnams la byin no zhes thos so/ / thos nas rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shin du khros
207b6: 'khrug nas gzhon nu thams cad sgro la bkug ste/ gzhon nu khyod nga'i yul na ma 'dug par song shig/ de nas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol bas spangs pa dang / bsam+ba pa/ bdag gis byang chub kyi phyir 'bad par byas pa dang / 'jig rten
207b7: pa thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos pas glang po chen po yang btang ste/ de bas khyim na gnas pas ni// ci nus par ni sbyin pa gtang // dka' thub nags su brten nas ni// nges par mchog
207b8: dag bya ba yin/ bslangs na mi sbyin zhes bya ba'i/ tshig ni smra bar mi pod kyis// de bas bdag ni khyim spangs te/ dka' thub nags su rab tu 'gro// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar snying la mna' mtho bcad nas chung ma rgyags sbyin ming
208a1: drang dus sad dag rgyas par smras so/ / de nas rgyags kyirnams kyis ma thag zhug pa dang rnal par dgas pa'i snyid gas thal mi m+b+hi/ byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ rje sras gas tad ldan bdag kyang gang /
208a2: thub kyi na graganas su ste/ bdag ni rje'i sras dang bral na skad cig tsam yang 'tsho bar rngo mi thog lags so// ci'i slad du zhe na/ nam mkha' zla bas stongs par gyur pa dang / ji ltar sa ni lo tog gis stongs dang / pad ma chu yis stongs par
208a3: gyur pa dag/ bud med khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no// byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/ bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bra la bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin yin no// khyod ni bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / mal// /
208a4: cha dang / bgo ba mchog la goms pas lus shin tu skyid pa yin dka' thub kyi gnags ni ni/ rtswa dang lo ma bting bar ni nyal rtsa ba dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu ni za/ rtswa ngur ba dang / zug rdo dang / rtswa dang / tsher mas gang ba'i sa la ni rgyu/ yang dang yang
208a5: duza gcig pa la ni brten/ bdag nyid skye bo thams cad la ni bsten dgos/ glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni 'bad dgos la/ re na yang dag don mi za bar ci nus kyi sbyin pa gtong ste/ de la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya
208a6: dgos so/ / de bas na re shig da dung yang legs par soms shig/ rgyags sbyin mas smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag rdo ci thog gis rje'i sras kyi rjes su sgrub lags so// byang chub sems dpa' smras pa/ gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de khyod kyis
208a7: dran par byos shig/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' ba'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/ yab cig bdag gis sbyin par glang chen stsal/
208a8: nongs pa gang lagasas bdag bzod par gsol/ bdag ni grong nas dgon par mche lags kyis// / mi yi dab pa'i phyag mdzad stongs mi 'gyur// den
208b1: rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sngag sngal gyis dbugs kyis pa nangs te skad 'dar 'dar por smras pa/ bu sbyin pa'i blo 'or la 'dug shig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ri dang bcas par yang / gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi/ sa bdag
208b2: bdag ni sbyin pa las/ se mes ni ldog par mi bgyid do// zhes smras nas song ngo // de nas bu dang / bran pa dang / chung ma dang / ldan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/ grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas po byung 'tshang gyi sam yi mam
208b3: stong rjes su 'brang bzhin song ngo / / de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing spro sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang thos/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas mi zhig la dris pa/ kye nang rje skye bo'i tshogs chen po tshangs 'debs pa 'di/
208b4: ci las gyur/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci mi shes sam/ 'di ltar mi yi dbang pos nyid kyi sras po mche ba bzang // brtan pa'i ding tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'dis na spags// de ni bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chas pa las//
208b5: pho brang 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes tsho des 'debs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor gyi mi rnams la ci rigs pari mngon du song nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag slar deng shing slar dad//
208b6: shig/ 'di ltar shin du yun ring po nas sdug pa dang 'grogs pa yang 'jug tu gdon mi bza bar 'bral ba'i mtha' ca na du 'gyur te/ gnyen pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i pasti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon/
208b7: mi za bar sdug pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang medade/ mdza' ba rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur bsams nas/ khyod kyis sa snyed 'bad pa thams cad kyis// zhi phyir blo gros mig so
208b8: brtan par gyis/ de nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag ni khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi
209a1: yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/ khyod kyis shing rta mcho ga 'di bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mtshas par bgyi ba'i rigs so// de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas tshig brlang bas bram ze de la smras pa/ e ma'o nags
209a2: na'ang mi dbang sras la slong ba gang / bram ze 'di ni shin du rtsa ba med pa'i blo// mi dbang sram po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa// 'di la 'dir ni snying rje cig mi skye 'am/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo shi ga/ de ci'i
209a3: phyir zhe na/ rgyags sbyin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di dag med gyur na/ kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob// sbyin stsogs pha rol phyin drug tshul gyis yon tan mchog can gyi// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun
209a4: mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog du dga' bas yang rta dang ldan pa'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa/ bram ze ser sna'i drim sel byed pa/ shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yi si 'dir/ bdag ni drang srong che mchog
209a5: gis bskor ba'i/ zag med chos kyi shing rta cher skor shog/ de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhon nu nag po phrag pa la khyer/ rgyags sbyin mas ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas/ dka'
209a6: thub kyi nags logs su chas pa dang rim gyis dka' thub kyi nags su phyin to/ / de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub tshal der rang gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas so// ji tsam na rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang / 'bras bu'i
209a7: bya dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang / bram ze zhig thams cad sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa// rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ bdag cag bkol bar ma mchis pas/ spa shug/ lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na/ de yi
209a8: don du bus pa gnyis/ khyod kyi bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol bu sdug pa gtong ba la cung zhig sems shing 'dug pa dang / de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams/
209b1: cad sgrol la sdus pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu bdag gis khyod thams cad steng ba'o zhes thos na 'di ltar khyod la bdag gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyad du yod/ khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi// bdag nyid can du sa steng grags/ ji ltar gras/
209b2: pa de bzhin du/ khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze de la smras pa/ kye bram ze chen po/ rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang // lan 'ga' da byed pa mi myong na/ rang gi bu ni//
209b3: btang ba la/ bdag blo gzhan du gyur ci smos// bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/ bdag gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i// bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs nas/ ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ 'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam med/ gzhon nu shin
209b4: tu brtse med pas/ bus pa btang la bdag min zhes/ kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gis// bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs/ de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa
209b5: 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stis spos kyi glang po che lta bu/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa
209b6: skye bo bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mgon med pa dang / ltogs pa yongs su sdud pa/ thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa 'am/ lam gyis dro ba pA'i bras bu med
209b7: pa'am/ mthong ba don med pa 'am/ re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag parnag po'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni tshe ma yin te/ khyed kyis med do / zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo'i yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta bte ba na mAr du ldog
209b8: par 'gyur ro/ / de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byas nas gtang ba'i rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu gter gos su gyon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa/ ri bo mchog rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can/ grong //
210a1: khyer gleng rdal bcas pa'i sa la bcal byas kyang / mche bzang khyed dang mtshungs par gtong pod yang ma yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i che go de thos nas bu la chags pa'i blod pas 'di//
210a2: mas par byung gas kyi shig blaganyis po khrim ma byin da bu dang ni/ zlal ba las byung sngag sngal dag/ bdag dang rgyags byin gyis thob 'gyur// 'an kyang 'di lam byin na/ btum zhugs las kyang nyams 'brur zhing / zam ze
210a3: 'di ni tsho dang / ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro// nyis na bu bral nyam thag pa'i/ mya nganas steng bdag gis blung / de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa/ zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis
210a4: sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par gtang bar chad nas smras pa/ b+he kha bos bka' spyang brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gyis// rgya mtsho chen po so sor 'jigs byed pa/ gting mi dpogs par rab tu bying bdag/ pha rol rgal phyir lam gyi zam stegs bcal/
210a5: zla ba dri med nya ba'i gzhin ras can/ ma zhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas/ mchim rlan chus mig ni gad gyur pa'i/ byis pa gnyis po bram ze de la byin/ yang smras pa/ bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni/ rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas/ des ni 'khor ba'i rtse
210a6: mtshe las/ / 'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya/ bus pa bzhon nu dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas sa g.yos pa des tshal de na gnas pa'i dka' thub can rnams spangs nas phan tshun smras pa/ sa ni mi bzad g.yos gyur
210a7: pa/ 'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin/ gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba/ shin tu gsal bar shes par bya/ den gnas 'jog dang rus gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des drang srong de rnams la don dge bar byas pa//
210a8: gdon mi za bar dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba yid du 'ong ba/ mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis skye bo sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir spangs te/ des nas g.yos/
210b1: par gyur to// de nas bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis kyis pas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas snying rje rje skad du du ning thal mo gnyis sbyar nas thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ yab cig yum ni ma mchis pa/ khyod ni
210b2: bdag cag stsol bzhed pa/ re shig de na mthong gyur nas// de nas bdag cag stsal du gsal// de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug sngal gyis ngo zum gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin de gnyis la khyud nas smras pa/ bu dag
210b3: yi snying du mi sdug min/ snying brtsa snying rje mad min te/ 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin/ ci nas nga yis byang chub mchog/ zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni/ sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i// rten med 'jig
210b4: rten rnams pasgril lo/ / de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis pas snying nas yongs su btang ba'i blo rig nas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas snying rje rje skad dang / spa bab pa'i tshig gis dal gyis smras pa/ gal te khyod kyis
210b5: thag bkum na/ ma la bdag cag gnyis kyi 'phrin// khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cig ces// yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol// yab gzhan yang / byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs pa bgyis pa gang / gal ti la lar thugs la mi 'bab
210b6: tshig 'ga' smras pa 'am/ gus par mnyan nas yongs su mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa// de ni byas pa'i nongs pa lags shes bzod pa mdzad du gsol// de skad ces smras nas pha la phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas mig mchi
210b7: mas gang bzhin du bla ma la smra bar yid la chags pas yang dang yang phyir/ zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' byis pa gzhon nu'i tshig shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blong nas yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam
210b8: btab ste dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i sbu bur zhugs so/ / byis pa gzhan nu dag dod ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug du g.yos so// lha stong phrag du mas yang bar snang la ca co dang gzhi'i
211a1: sgra 'byin cing / a ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che/ byas pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang / gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa/ de yi nges pa med cig go// de nas rgyags sbyin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnams khyed te bsti gnas logs su
211a2: rmas pa las des che thang du g.yos pa des myur ba kho nar ba sti gnas de nyid du song ba dang / lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad thar bar bya bar brtson pa byas pa'i spyan pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i
211a3: bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong do snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te la ma bkag nas 'dug pa dang / rgyags sbyin mas ri dgas kyi rgyal po'i chung ma de la smras pa/ ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgeg ma/ kho mo'i 'di bgag
211a4: nas ni ci ste 'dug/ ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo des shes na/ lam las bzung ste myur du 'gro bar gyis/ gzhan yang / khyod kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma la// bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi/ btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spun gyur gyis
211a5: ri dgas rgyal mos bdag gis lam phye shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / lha seng ge'i gzugs su bsgyur ba de sa pa mde nas logs shig 'asod do// de nas rgyags sbyin mas bkra mi shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas yud tsam zhig bsams pa/ ji ltar/
211a6: bar snang la dud mo'i sgra grag pa dang / ji ltar yang tshal na gnas pa'i lha rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra ga ga pa las na gdon mi za bar bstiganas su ma legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to snyam nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang / ji ltar/
211a7: bya skad 'byin pa dang / ji ltar bdag ni dogs pa las/ bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges// ji ltar sa 'di g.yos pa las// bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang / ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba las// bus pa de gnyis btang bar des/ zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya
211a8: stong dag sems shing bsti gnas su song nas bsti gnas su zhugs te mi dga' bzhin bltas na bu gnyis ma mthong nas/ de nas rmongs shing snying 'dang nas bsti gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/ phyogs 'di na ni gzhon nu nag po srid mo/
211b1: dang lhan cig ri dgas kyi phru gu dang rtag rtse rtse/ 'di ni de gnyis kyis rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin/ 'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed mo'i cha spyad yin na de gnyis mi snang na/ gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi/ lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas
211b2: nyal lta krid dam snyam du de ltar snying la re zhing / bu mthong bar 'dod pas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs ste smras pa/ rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo gnyis
211b3: gang du mchis/ thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig/ re bas yang dag 'ongs gyur nas// bus pa de gnyis de la byin/ de dag rjes su yi rang rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyags sbyin ma ri dgas mo mda' dug can gyis/
211b4: bogs pa bzhin dus la skyel nas nya chu'i ka nas nas phyung ba bzhin du ni 'gro ldog par byed/ krung krung bu stor bu bzhin du ni snying rje rje skad du ru/ ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni 'ba' sgra sna tshogs 'don cing smras po/ pad mo gzhon nu lta bu'i byad bzhin
211b5: can/ lag pa pad ma'i 'dab ltar gzhon sha can/ bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba/ 'gro ba gang da song nas sdug bsngal 'gyur/ ri dgas bu ltar drang zhing ri dgas mig/ ri dgas lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na/ de ring bdag gi bu gnyis/
211b6: ji lta bur/ gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug bsngal gyur// mig ni mchi mas gang ba'i mig gis ni/ snying rjes du ba shin tu sdug bsngal ba/ de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas/ skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas 'tshor/ gnyis padag gis ba nas/
211b7: bskyed bskyed pa/ zas su rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu za/ bzod dang gnam pas bla ma brtag dkar ba/ bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngas lo// de gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang / rtsa lag rnams kyis gzu lams spangs pa las/ skye bo sdig can dan dang
211b8: prang gyur nas/ bdag gi bu gnyis shin du sdug bsngal lo// skom zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs nas/ de gnyis su yi dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur/ bran du gyur pas gdon mi za bar ni/ de gnyis nyam thag sdug bsngal
212a1: yongs su gzir/ / bdag gis nges par tshe rabs gzhan dag tu// srog chags sngag pa brgya dang bral ba yi// sdig las shin tu mi bzang 'dir byas pa// des na ba be'u med 'din chongs 'debs// bden tshig gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang // sems can kun la yid ni mnyam
212a2: gyur pa/ bden tshig des ni bdag gi bu gnyis po// ban du gyur pa las ni thar bar shog/ rgyags sbyin mas bus pa gzhon nu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrungs pa'i shing gang yin pa de dag lo pa thib ba 'dug par mthong nas snying du sdug nas 'khyud nga smras pa/ bus pas ril ba chung ngus
212a3: chu bcus pa/ / lo ma rnams las chu thigs 'dzag pa yi// ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhin// bus pa du zhom krung lta bur du// yang bus pa gzhon nu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phrag gub sti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste snying rje rje skad kyi tshig
212a4: gis dal bus smras pa/ de yi ni'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang // nags su sa tshugs mtshon cing tshol byed pa// ri dgas phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang // bdag gi sdug bsngal mi chung gzhan yin no// de nas bus pa gzhon nu de dag lam gang nas dong ba'i lam der rjes bcad pa dang / bus
212a5: pa gzhon du de gnyis kyi rjes drang por ma byung gi bya gyus gang bar mthong nas lhag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas smras pa/ ji ltar 'then pa'i rjes byung dang // la lar myur du song ba las/ brdegs te khrid par gdon mi ze// kye ma bram zab rtse med mchog/ mgul ni dbugs
212a6: kyis brdzangs shing skad kyang 'dzer/ / ma mchu mdzes pa 'das ning bdag gi bu// ri dgas bzhin du mig kyang rig rigaste/ rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig gu// de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'o//
212a7: tshig de dang de dag gis rnam grangs mang por dgo bar byas nas smras pa/ kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yos// btang ba ma yin sdang bas min/ sems can kun la phan don du// btang bar dka' ba'i bu de btang // mchog tu gtang dka' bdag nyid dang // bu dang chung ma rnams btang nas
212a8: sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du/ / byang chub mchog na thob par 'gyur// rgyags sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brten gtad dka' ba'i// bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i do du btang // bdag dang chung ma bzhin dang nar yang btang byas te// kun la thams cad gtang bas/
212b1: blo gros ngal yod// de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brtan te byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis// khyod zo gzhan du ma gyur cig/ gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhed nas// dogs pa med par bdag stsol gcig/ gzhan yang / dpa' bo gang
212b2: byir nyid kyi phyir/ / sdug pas chags pa btang ba yi// do de myur du thob nas ni// srid las 'gro ba bskal bar mdzod// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang / rgyags sbyin ma brtson 'grus shin du rmad du byung ba dang / shin du bya dka' ba sa
212b3: rig nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor te steng gi nam mkha' las bsti gnas der lhags nas snang ba rgya chen pos nags de gsal bar byas te/ ram mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras// 'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa
212b4: blo ngan gzhung gis bcings pa'i bla gros can/ / longs spyod la chags snying gzhigs pa su yis bcings pa'i nang na yang // khyab bdag khyod gcig chags pa med pas dga' ba bskyed pa'i bu gtong bas// nges par go 'phang bde nga zhi ba dri med dka' ba med par 'thog//
212b5: de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ 'di gcig pu g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis rgyags sbyin ma bslang do snyam nas/ de nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur te byang chub sems dpa'i
212b6: drang du song nas yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ yan lag kun bzang khyim thab las// 'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba// rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di// bdag la bran mo'i don du stsol// de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzad pa skyes nas bram ze la smras pa/ ngo tsha med cing
212b7: brkam pa khyod/ / 'di na bram ze tha shal te// khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing // dam chos dga' bar 'dod dam/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis rgyags sbyin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang / de nas rgyags sbyid mas byang chub
212b8: sems dpa' la sbas pa/ bdag ni bdag la g.yang ngan med// de bzhin bdag la lta ma lags// gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes// de ltar khyod slad g.yang ngan bgyid// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ go 'phang mi zad mya ngan med
213a1: pa tshol bdag la/ / sa srang 'dir ni chags sten mya ngan / mi dgos// khyad ni mya ngan med par brab ze 'di rjes 'thongs// bdag ni radags 'chi ba bzhin du bsti gnas 'byen// de skad ces smras pa dang / dga' ba dang / mgub dang / yid rab tu dga' bas/
213a2: bsams pa dang / ston 'ad nanags rnal dang // bdag ga stod pa tham yin// rtags ston yang yangs ga nas// sangs rbagang ya pa gyung// sa ma rig nas rgyags smin ma lag panas pa rang / bram tha~Md pa sdus pa/ bdag gas mtsha
213a3: zang rtag pa 'di/ / snying nas snang nye bsgo ba nyan// ya rabs tshul can tan par b+ha// bam tha' mchog khyod banas su gsol// de nas ma ba bzang po yi// rlung ma byang chub 'dod byir rkang // rgyal gran dza lta bar// sa na mtha' dag rnam drug g.yas// de nas rgyags
