213a4: sman ma bral ze'i dbang dgrar te/ / khyo dang ba dang / bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyisanyam thag nas dbugs brdungs pas sgra dang dang por 'gags bzhin 'di skad ces smras pa// bdag gis cha rabs snga ma la// ci 'dra ba yaM las ngan byas// de nas babe'u shing
213a5: bzhin/ / ba mang pa nags na du// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i che byad mi spang bar byas te// rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin pa la smras pa/ skal bzangs pad ni bram ze ma yin ma yang ma yin gyi// bdag ni snyam
213a6: dbang po pa byin lhaman pa joms byed de/ / khyod kyi 'dral ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgra yis// bdag las dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis// de nas de chog gis rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba skyes nas brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/ spyan rdzong
213a7: ldan pa bdag ga za/ / bran gyur pa las thar mdzad cing // mes po'i drung du phyin par yang // sum bcu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod// de skad ces smras nas lnga'i dbang po chen po bstig nas su zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste rgyags sbyin ma lag pa
213a8: g.yon pa nas bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ bdag gis khyod la rgyags sbyin 'di// g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas// khyed kyi sul 'ang ma spyan cig/ bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze khye'u dang bum
213b1: ber ba de ji ltar grong khyer gzhan yin no snyam nas grong khyer de nyid du song ste bus pa gzhon nu de dag bcod par brtsams pa de lta bur rmongs par byas so/ / ji tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/ lha khyod kyi dpon po nag po dang // dra ba can dang
213b2: de gnyis ni/ / bram ze shin du ma rungs pa// grong khyer mchog 'dir 'tshong gang mchis// de skad thos nas rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa/ gzhon nu gnyis myur du stan cig/ blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang grong khyer ba rnams myur du rgyal po'i mdun du rtse
213b3: bar grags pa/ / rje tsam na pon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal pa dred du khrid pa dang / ma'i dbang bamadun phyogs srid pa'i bsagos med cing // lus thag drim can gyi lus di de yis mthang nas na// mdal seng ge khrilas sa yi snying du ltar gyur to/ ba brang ba thor mthon
213b4: tshogs bud med dag kyang du bar gyur/ / de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ gang zhig nags na gnas na yang // sbyin la mngon par dga' ba'i yid/ mig bzangs de ni kAr du'i dang // chung pa dang bcas dgrag par gyis// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
213b5: byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnas su so nga/ / byi zhig na rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen shi ba dang / bram ze dang / blon po dang / grong mi dang / yul ma rnams lhan cig tu bste gnas der song nas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol ba btab ste rang gi gro
213b6: khe ru bronas rgyal bar bcug go/ / de nas rgyal po thams cad rgyal thams cad gto shes bya bar gyur to// des dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tshab rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du mdag byin nas
213b7: tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ byang rbab don du gnyer ba yis// rgyal rigs bram ze rje rigs dang / dmangs rigs gdol pa gsung pola'ang // 'jigs pa med par sbyin pa gtang // gser dang dngul dang ba lang dang // rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang / de bzhin las dag byed pa'i/
213b8: brang// rdzal khrims phun sum tshogs pa sbyid// chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/ maM yis dag pa thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba tshon pa de'i tshi da'i dus kyi rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar byung ban
214a1: gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang / gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin nas bsod nams dag byas pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/
214a2: de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur te/ de nyid kyis de ni dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / bkren pa dang / phongs pa dang / mdza' bo dang / nye du dang gnyen bshes dang / zho shas 'tshe ba rnams la sbyin pa rnam pa du ma dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas
214a3: so/ / rgyal po chen po de'i sbyin pa'am sbyin pa'i bgo bsha' des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i sbyin pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshegs tsam
214a4: yin no/ / rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag btang / bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal gyi grong khyer du rgyal po/
214a5: thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bya ba zhig byung bar gyur te/ de 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang ba/ 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / khrag khrug dang / 'gyed pa dang / chom rkun dang / nad rab tu zhi ba/ 'bras sa lu dang /
214a6: bu rab shing dang / ba lang phun sum tshogs pa/ bu gcig pa la byams pa bzhin du rgyal srid byed du bcug ste/ chos bzhin gyis rgyal srid byed du 'jug go// des rigs mnyam pa las chud ma blangs nas de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur
214a7: spyod par byed de bar byed dga' bar byed/ ga gur spyod par byed pa las/ khye'u gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ lpags pa'i mdog gser 'dra ba/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa/ dpung pa ring ba/ 'bral ba'i dbyes che bzhig btsas te/ de'i nye du rnams
214a8: 'dus nas khye'u'i ming cir gdags zhes mi de 'dogs par byed de/ shes ldan dag gzhon nu 'di ni rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen gyi bu yin pas gzhon nu thams cad sgrol zhes bya bar gdags so zhes gzhon nu thams cad sgrol du mi de btags nas/ ma ma
214b1: brgyad la gtad de zhes bya ba nas/ gnas lnga rnams la byang bar gyur to// zhes bya ba'i bar ge dom bzhin no// de gang ci slob pa de thams cad slong ba po dag la sbyin par byed pas de'i ming thams cad gtong ba thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags so// khams kyi rgyal
214b2: phran gyi bu mo rgyags sbyin ma zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de de'i tshed du bslangs nas dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na khye'u zhig btsas pa dang / de'i meng nag po
214b3: zhes bya bar btags so/ / yang de dang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu mo zhig btsas te/ de'i mi dra ba can zhes bya bar btags so// rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen la glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba yod de/
214b4: de'i mthus khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'god par byed do// des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ bu bdag cag gis gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'god par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis khyod thams cad gtod na yang
214b5: glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan ni zhog shig/ khams kyi rgyal phran rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi mthus na bdag cag thams cad rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen 'dis zil gyis mnan/ kha cig gis smras pa/ rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la glang po'i
214b6: mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bya ba zhig yod do/ / de'i mthus bdag cag 'dis zil gyis mnan to// de dag gis smras pa/ gang gis na glang po'i mchog de dgug pa'i thabs bzang po lta ci yod/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen
214b7: gyi bu thams cad sbrel zhes brtse ba de mi sbyin pa'am mi gtong ba ci yang ma mchis te/ de ci slong pa de thams cad sbyin pas de'i ming thams cad gtong ba thams cad gtong ba zhes bya bar grags kyis/ bram ze dag cig mngags dang de rnams kyis bslangs na lugs par
214b8: 'gyur ro/ / de rnams kyis bram ze dag bkug nas smras pa/ bram ze dag ded la thams cad ces bya ba'i grong rdal na/ thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba las glang po'i mchog slongs shig/ de dag mngags nas thams cad kyi grong rdal du dong ngo // gzhon nu thams cad sgrol
215a1: glang po'i mi chog ma tog kun dang / kra mu da dang / khab dang / dngul dang / sprin dkar po'i mdog lta bum cha ba drug pa// bdun lags par gnas pa/ glang po ches srung gi bu ltar 'gyid zhing 'gro ga/ rang bzhin gyi mtshan mchog gis brgyan pa/ mthong na
215a2: bkra shis pa la non nas sha du sdug pa'i bran dang / grogs po dang / g.yog rnams phye bzhin 'brang zhing zla brgya skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba bzhin du grong khyer nas byung nas bskyed mos tshal logs su song ngo // de nas mdags pa de dag gis
215a3: gzhon du thams cad sgrol mngon du bkranas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon na khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ yang smras pa/ lha min lhar bcas 'jig rten du// khyod ni thams cad gtong zhes grags/ khyod kyis glang po mchog 'di ni// bdag cag rnams la sprul ba'i
215a4: rigs/ / de sad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' glang po'i mcho gang las babs nas dga' ba dang / mgub dang / rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis bram ze de dag la grang po'i mchog de bstan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas der // bram ze rnams
215a5: las glang chen btang / / de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum// btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog/ blon po rnams kyis rgyal po thams cad bshes gnyen la smras pa/ lha khyod kyi sras thams cad sgrol gyis glang po'i mchog bkra shis ldan zhes bgyi ba
215a6: phyi rgol bas mngags pa la phumato/ / rgyal pos zos nas shin du khros 'khrugs te bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la thams cad sngol khrid ngad shog shig/ de rnams kyis de khrid de 'ongs pa dang / rgyal ba thams cad kyibashes gnyen gyis thams cad sgrol la
215a7: smras pa/ gzhon nu kho bos khyod la gang cung zad khams kyi rgyal phran rnams spa 'god par byed pa de thams cad ni glang po'i mchog 'di'i mthu yin gyis/ khyod thams cad gtod na yang glang po'i mchog 'di ni zhog shig/ ces snga mo zhig tu ma bsgo 'am/
215a8: ca' phyir khyod kyis glang po'i mchog yongs su btang / des mnyan nas smras pa/ yab bslangs na ji ltar mi stsal/ ci ji snyed bslangs pa de thams cad sbyin nam tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyim na gnas pa'i skyes bu yis// ci rigs par ni sbyin pa gtang /
215b1: 'on te nags su song na ni// des pa yi ni mchog bya'o// yab gal te sbyin pa dag btang// bsod nams ngag bgyi ma mchis na/ dka' thub kyi nags su brten par bgyi'o// gzhon nu de bzhin du gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpas rgyags sbyin ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/
215b2: rgyags byid pa bdag ni dag 'thub rtsinags su gnas kyis// khyod khyim na pa ga yod par gnos shig/ des smras pa/ rje'i sris dang thabs gcig dka 'thub kyi nags su gnas par bgyi'o// rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pa la dga' bas ga
215b3: te khyod 'ga' zhig slong na byin par 'gyur ro/ / rje'i sras gal te khyod kyis btang na stsal du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ khyod kyis dam bcas pa 'di dran par byos shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' ba'i drung du song nas mgo bos phyag byas te smras pa/
215b4: yab cig bdag gis sbyin slong glang chen btang// nongs pa gang lags sa bdag bzod par gsol// bdag ni grod nas dgon par mchis lags kyis// mi dbang khyod kyi phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur// de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i blong bas mchi mas brnangs nas/
215b5: smras pa/ ba sbyin pa dang dka thub kyi nags kyi blo gros 'di zlog shig/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ sa ni ding bcas par yang // gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yi// sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa las// sems ni ldog par mi babyed do// zhes smras nas sod ste/ byang
215b6: chub sems dpa' bu dang bu mo dang / chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta mchog gi nang du zhugs nas dka' thub kyi nags su chas so// de nas bram ze rig da gi byed kyilan sa shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sbol bsu nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur
215b7: cig/ khyod ni 'jig rten thams cad du// thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags// bram ze dag la shing rta 'di// khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad krol shing rta'i mchog de las babs nas dga' ba dang /
215b8: mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram ze de dag la shing rta'i mchog de bstan nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas ded// bram ze rnams la shing rta btang // de bzhin bdag gis srid pa gsum// btang nas byang chub mchog rag shog/ de nas
216a1: sems dpa' ta la zhon nas rgyags sbyin ma dang lhan cig dong ba dang / de nas bram ze rig byed dang rig byed kyi yan lag shes pa kha cig gis thams cad sgrol bsu nas smras pa/ rgyal rigs gzhon nu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/ khyod ni 'jig rten thams
216a2: cad du/ / thams cad gtong zhes rnam par grags// bram ze rnams la rta 'di ni// khyod kyis sbyin par gtang ba'i rigs/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol rta de las pabs nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang / rab tu dga' ba'i snying gis bram zede
216a3: rnams la te de bstad nas smras pa/ ji ltar bdag rab dga' bas deng // bram ze rnams la rta btang ba// de bzhin bdag gi srid pa gsum// btang nas byang chub mchog reg shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpas ne nag po khrid/ rgyags sbyin mas ning bcan khrid de rkang
216a4: bas ngong nas byang chub sems dpas gangs ri'i sul me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum tshogs pa zhig tu song ste byang chub sems dpa' ni bsam gtan byed do// rgyags sbyin ma ni 'bras bus bsnyen bkur byed do// ri 'or gzhan zhig na bram ze zhig gnas/
216a5: pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u mtshan dan pa bcwa brgyad dang ldan pa zhig btsas pa ngan tor zhes
216a6: sgra 'byin pas de'i ming ngan to reng na te re zhes bya bar gyur to/ / ri 'or gzhan zhig na bram ze rig byed bzhi shes pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las ji tsam na bu
216a7: mo gzugs bzang mo/ mdzes ma/ blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te bsrings bskyed nas chen mor gyur pa dang / bram ze des bdag gi bu mo 'di byad gzugs sam/ rigs sam/ bzo 'am/ nor gyi phyir ni sul yang mi sbyin no// 'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi
216a8: klog pa zhig yod na/ bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas so// de nas ngan to ragasang tshig don du gnyer zhing gsang tshig tshol ba bram ze de'i gan du song ste phyin pa dang smras pa/ mkhan po'i zhabs la bdag bkur sti bgyid par 'tshal lags so//
216b1: ci'i phyir/ rig byed klog pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du gyis shig/ de de las rig byed klog par brtsams pa las de yid gzhungs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yin pas des ring po ma lon par rig byed rnam pa bzhi la byang bar gyur to// bram ze des bsams pa/ bdag gis dam
216b2: bcas pa ni bdag gi bu mo 'di rigs sam zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar te/ / bram ze'i khye'u 'dis bdag las rig byed bzhi byed par byas pa yin na mtshan ngan pa bcwa brgyad dang ldan te/ gal te 'dis bu mo ma 'dod na ni legs so snyam nas des de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u
216b3: bdag gis bu mo 'di byad gzugs sam/ rigs sam/ bzo'am/ nor gyi phyir su la yang mi sbyin te/ 'on kyang su zhig bdag las rig byed bzhi klog pa zhig yod na bdag gis de la 'di sbyin par bya'o zhes dam bcas pa las bdag las khyod kyis rig byed bzhi byang bar
216b4: byas pa las khyod la bu mo 'di chung mar sbyin no/ / des smras pa/ bkra shis par gyur cig/ blang bar bgyi'o zhes des de la dpal gyi 'byor pa chen pos bag mar btang nas smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u bdag gi chung mkhrid la rang gi khyim du song shig/ des chung ma de khrid de
216b5: rang gi khyim du song ba dang / des de la smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag ni shin du gzhon pas las bgyid rngo mi thog gis bdag la bkol ba stsol cig/ des de la smras pa/ bzang mo kho bo la bkol ba ga la mchis/ des smras pa/ rdza'i sras thams cad ces bgyi ba'i grong rdal na
216b6: rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen zhes bgyi ba de'i sras thams cad sgrol zhes bgyi bde gang cung zad ci slong ba de thams cad stsol gyis/ de la bdag gi bkol ba slongs shig/ bzang mo gal te de lta na lhan cig tu 'dong ngo // de nas ngan to re thams cad kyi grong rdal du phyin
216b7: nam dris pa/ gzhon nu thams cad stsol gang na/ de dag gis smras pa/ bka' thub kyi nags na gnas so// / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa 'dun pa/ de nas ngan ti'i chung ma dang lhan cig dka'athub kyi nags su song ba dang / de'i tshe rgyags sbyin mam
216b8: tog dang 'bras bu'i bying song ngo / / de nas bram tha na ta rgyags sbyin ma ma tog dang 'bras bu phyir song ba dang / thams cad sgrol kyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/ chu gter dgos su byon zhing gza' mig mtshungs med pa// ri bo mchog rgyas nu mang ldan pa'i dastod cam/
217a1: grong khyer grong rdal bcas pa'i sa la btsal byas kyang // mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtod phod yod ma yin// bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas// spa shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na// khyod kyis rjes su brtse bgyis te// bdag la bkol ba/
217a2: stsal pa'i rigs// kho bo la bkol ba ga la yod// de dang ha cang mi ri de bzhig na nag po dang dra ba can rtse zhing 'dug pa dang / des smras pa bus pa gzhon nu'o ni dag byin cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' bu sdug pa yongs su gtor ba la
217a3: yud tsam nig sems par gyur te/ / de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras pa/ kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu kho bos khyod thams cad gtong ba'o zhes thos nas de'i phyir kho bo khyod la slong na/ 'di la khyod kyis dpyad du ci zhig yod/ snying rje yin bdag nyid
217a4: khyod/ / thams cad gtong bar sa steng grags// ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du// khyod kyis sa steng bya ba'i rigs// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so// rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang // bdag gis res 'ga'ang
217a5: ma dpyad na/ rang gi bu ni gtang ba la// bdag blo gzhan 'gyur smos ci dgos// bram ze chen po de lta mod kyi/ bdag gis nags su bskyed bskyed pa'i// bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs na// ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa/ 'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam
217a6: mod/ gzhon nu shin du brtse med pas// bus pa btang la bdag min zhes// kha cig bdag la 'phyar 'ong gis// bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs// de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so// kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen
217a7: po'i rigs su skyes pa/ sa 'di thams cad du yon tan grags pa/ srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/ sbyin pa dang / mchod pa dang / bkur stis spos kyi glang po lta bu/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / glo bur ba dang / skye bo bla ma la
217a8: mchod pa/ bkren pa dang / mgon med pa dang / phongs pa rnams yongs su 'dzin pa/ thams cad kyi re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ mthong na don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa 'am/ lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa 'am/ mthong ba don med pa
217b1: 'am/ re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bras bu med par bya ba gang yin pa de ni cha ma yin te/ khyod kyi med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis kho bo yid la re ba kun tu rtog pa'i rtag btab na myur du ldog par 'gyur ro// de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi ra ba yongs su
217b2: rdzogs par byas te/ gtong ba'i rigs so// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bram ze gal te de ltan yongs su gtang // bus pa gzhon nu dag gtong ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas lha rnams
217b3: kyi dbang po ba rgya byin gyis bsams pa/ rgyags sbyin ma byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i bor chad byed par 'gyur du 'dod snyam nas/ seng ge ma zhig gi gzugs su bsgyur te lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang / de nas rgyags spyan mas smras pa/ ri dgas rgyal po'i
217b4: chung ma bsgeg bsgeg ma/ / khyod ni ci ste lam bkag 'dug par byed// gal te bdag ni mi 'byo bden zhe na/ lam las zur te myur du 'gro bar gyis/ khyod kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma la// bdag kyang mi yi dbang po seng ge yi// btsun mo yin pas chos kyi
217b5: spur gyur gyis/ / ri dgas rgyal po'i chung mas bdag lam phye// de skad ces smras pa dang / ri dgas kyi rgyal mo de lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo // de nas rgyags sbyin ma ba sti gnas gang na ba der song ba dang / nag po dang / dra ba can gang na yang ma mthong nas
217b6: byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste smras pa/ rje'i sras bus pa gzhon nu gnyis gang na mchis// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ kho bo'i drung du bram ze zhig/ rabs yang dag 'ongs gyur na// bus pa de gnyis de la byin// de dag rjes su yi rang rigs//
217b7: de brtul nas sa la 'gyel ba dang / de la chu mang pos btab nas rtas te smras pa/ rje'i sras bus pa gzhon nu dka'athub kyi nags nas bskrun pa bde ba'i bdag nyid can de dag khyod kyis ci'i glid du yongs su spang / de nas byang chub sems dpas rang gi lus las bla gos//
217b8: phud de rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/ ci de gnyis la byams pa med snyam 'am/ nga'i ba spu'i khung thams cad nas gas te khrag byung ba la ltos/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa la dga' bas gal te
218a1: 'ga' zhig gis rgyags sbyin ma blangs te de la byin nagayog byed pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ bdag nyid bram ze'i khye'u zhig gi cha byad du sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa/ grogs po g.yog byin cig/ byang chub sems/
218a2: dpas smras pa/ bdag la g.yog gal yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rgyags sbyin ma byin cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rgyags sbyin ma'i gdong du brtag par brtsams pa dang / rgyags sbyin mas byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa shes nas smras pa/ rje'i sras gal te khyod
218a3: kyis bdag btang na sul du gsol/ byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ bram ze khyod la byin no// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u yi cha byad mi snang bar byas te rang gi cha byang du 'dug nas smras pa/ drang srong bdag gi rgyags sbyin pa'i dakhyod la bcol
218a4: kyis/ khyod kyis sul yang ma sbyin cig/ rgyags sbyin mas brgya byin gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te smras pa/ kau shig ci nas kyang bus pa gzhon du de gnyis bran nyid du mi 'gyur ba de ltar mdzod cig/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras
218a5: nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bus pa gzhon nu khyer ba'i bram ze ji ltar thams cad kyi grong rdal du 'tshod par brtsams pa de ltar rmongs par byas so// de gnyis rgyal po'i zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams rgyal
218a6: po'i drung du dong ste smras pa/ pus pa nag po dang / dra ba can ni bram ze zhig tshong 'dus na 'tshong zhing mchis lags so// des bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag de la khrid de shog shig/ de gnyis brid de 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos srang la ba tsal te mnyam du gser gyis brus so// rgyal po
218a7: des blon po rnams la bsgob/ shas ldan dag/ gang zhig bye'u dngadabu mo yang yongs su gtor bar byed pa de la gzhan yongs su gtang bar mi bya ba ci yod/ gzhan du de khrag shig dang rgyal sris kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed du gzhug go// blon po rnams kyis de dka' thub kyi nags
218a8: nas bkug ste/ de rgyal po'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas des grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi khang pa brtsigs nas lo mang po dang / le brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo brgya stong phrag mang por sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas
218b1: te de bdag nyid kyi mchod sbyin gyi phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ byang chub bsod nams na gnyer bas/ dge sbyong rnams dang bram ze dang / dmangs rigs gdol pa g.yung po la// 'jigs pa med par sbyin pa byin// gser dang dngul dang b.lang dang /
218b2: rta dang nor bu rgyad rnams dang // de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran// tshul khrims ldan pa rnams la sbyin// chags pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// mi yis dag pa 'thob par 'gyur// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus
218b3: dargyal po thams cad sol zhes bya bar gyur pa gang gis bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam na/ / khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal ba thams cad sgrol zhes bya ba der gyur te/ ngas den bu dang chung ma yongs su btang ngo // rgyal po
218b4: rad bangs budang drung pa yongs su btang bdes blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu thob bo snyos na byad kyis de sbyar mi blta ste/ 'od kyang sti pade ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'i rgyu nam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs pa ma yin no// rgyal po gan pang
218b5: ngas bla na med par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed de/ 'byor pa
218b6: dang byas pa dang zhes bya ba nas chos bzhin gyis rgyal sring byed do zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / ni tsam na ltas mkhan dag gis bArA Na snying lo bcu gnyis su char ba mi 'bab bo zhes lung bstan to// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis rang gi yul du drib sgrogs su bcug na da'i
218b7: yul da gnas pa'i shes ldan grong byer ba dag nyon cig/ lhas ma'an dag gis lo bcu gnyis su zar mi 'bab par lung bstan gyis// khyod cag las gang dag la lo bcu gnyis su bza' ba dang btung ba yod pa de rnams ni 'dug shig/ gzhan rnams ni bza' ba dang btu ba mod ci
218b8: yul du rengs shig/ lo legs par gyur pa dang / slar yang shog shig/ de'i tshe bAdAN+Da mI'i gro khyer na khyim bdag 'dum byed ces bya ba phyug pa/ nor mdab/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/ rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/ rnam thos kyi bral
219a1: nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas so/ / des mngon bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje pad ban bdag 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas pa lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/ 'on te med/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so// de nas khyim bdag 'dum byed 'khor dang bcas pa ni
219a2: 'dug go/ / skye bo'i tshogs gzhan ni bza' ba dang btung bamod pa'i yul du dngango // sangs rgyas 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying brtse ba can/ bas mthi' gnas mal la dga' ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur
219a3: bas ji tsam na bA rA Na sI'i phyogs gcig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnas so/ / phyogs gzhan zhig tu yang rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya'o// de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ khyim bdag 'dum byed gang na ba der
219a4: dong ste lhags pa dang / khyim bdag 'dum byed la 'di skad ces smras so// khyim bdag khyod kyis rab tu byung ba lnga brgyal lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms 'bul nus sam// des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag re shig mdagal rmas te bgyi'o// des mang na bkrag ste smras pa/
219a5: kye nang rje bdag 'khong dang bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so// de nas rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs so// ji tsam na gyi dro dus su rang sangs rgyas
219a6: lnga brgya po gzhan yang lhags nas khyim bdag 'dum byed la khyim bdag rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po 'di dag la khyod kyis lo bcu gnyis su bsod snyoms dbul bar nus sam zhes bslangs pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed cag la g.yar gyis blangs lags/
219a7: na yang bslad ci 'tshal/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan la/ bdag cag kyang gzhan yin no// des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gal tinyi de lta na re shig mngan la rmas te bgyi'o// des mngon bkug ste smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu
219a8: byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi rgyags thub pa yod dam/ des smras pa/ rdo bo mchis so// de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de rnams la khas blangs nas zhus pa/ khyed cag gi dus gang lags/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ gung tshigs ma yol ba'o// de nas khyim
219b1: bdag 'dun byed kyi sbyin pa'i khang pa brtsigs nas sbyin pa'i zhal ta pa'i midag kyang bskos/ / dus chod brjod pa dag kyang bskos te/ des nyi mi re re zhing nga sangs rgyas stong la bsod snyoms 'bul du cug go// mu ge de yang bahud mkhon rabar yem chad nas/ de nas khyim bdag
219b2: des rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/ 'phags pa dag ltas char 'bebs par 'gyur ngam/ char 'bebs par 'gyur ro// bdag gis sa pon sum nyam/ thob shig/ de dag gisas pon btab po// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis shes pa/ mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug
219b3: pa yin pas des bsams pa/ 'jig rten na yon gnas gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni rang sangs rgyas rnams yin la/ sbyin bdag gang ji snyed pa de rnams kyi mchog ni khyim bdag 'du ma byed yin gyis bdag gis 'di dag gi grogs bya'o snyam nas/ de nas
219b4: lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis dbang po chen po'i cher bab pa dang / lo tog de rnams sku bar skyes so// de nas skye bo'i tshogs de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas rnams la zhus pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gi lo thogs bskrun pa gang lags pa de dag slu bar skyes
219b5: par gyur na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ ma gcad par skun cig/ de rnams kyis bskrun pa las me tog dang 'bras bu rdza ma'i tshad tsam chags so// de nas de rnams kyis rang sangs rgyas de dag la rgyas par smras pa dang / de rnams kyis smras
219b6: pa/ ma garbad cig dang / rang nyid srin nas gas par 'gyur ro// ji tsam na de rnams smin nas gas pa dang / gang gis sa bon ji lta bu btab pa de'i de kho na lta bu sha stag gis gang bar gyur to// de nas mu ge rgyun chad de la legs par gyur nas yul phyogs sna tshogs na gnas
219b7: pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / srog chags gang dag mu ges 'jigs skrag nas dong ba rnams kyang yul bA rA Na sIng 'ongs so// de nas mu ge rgyun chad de lo legs par gyur nas khyim bdag 'dum byed kyis de na rang sangs rgyas stong la gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang
219b8: bca' ba sna tshogs dang / tshe ma ro dang ldan pa rnams kyis tshim par byas te tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blo ldan mkhas pas nor dang ni// dad pa shes rab rnyed nas ni// skyes bu de yis rtag par yang // 'dod chags bral la yon dbul lo// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang
220a1: wA/ na ga ldan pa// gnanam ga gas pag gas pa pa/ napa ba da bas// stang rgya khris can gas pa // ga dgas yanapa na// tan da par ma // de bdag
220a2: nyid/ rgyal ba dab 'a ban gyis bdag 'dum byed cer bya bar byung ba gang gis phrag lo bcu gnyis su byung ba na rang sangs rgyas stong la mad snyams sbyar cing de'i grogs su rnams kyi dbang pa ba byin gyis byas pa gzhan zhig yin nyam na byang kyis
220a3: detang pa bta ste/ 'ad kyang sa pa da na kyim pa dag / dus byed ca bya de byang / da kyi den mugs bcu gnyis mazung ba na nga sangs rgyas stong sa pa mad snyoms gyur bas da grags skarnams kyi dbang ba byin gyis byas so// rgyal ba chen
220a4: nga'i byin pa'am/ sbyin pa'i bgo ba sha 'dis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo sta ba na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i sbyin pa de ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no/ sdom
220a5: la/ sprin shugs dbang po sprul mgo gnyis// de bzhin chu sreg na tse dang / stag mo ru sbal sde bzangs dang // ded dpon tshogs su bsdus pa yin// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can
220a6: rnams rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun nor tshol ba rab tu mang po dag gcig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs te/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod nas de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ shas ldan
220a7: dag bdag cag rgya mtsha chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste gcig la gcig pan thogs par mngon pa med kyis/ mal bdag cag nor tshal ba rnams so so nas phongs pan dgos pa rgyal gyi cha spyang dag khyer te rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par bya'o zhes de ltar chas
220a8: bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rgyal gyi cha spyad kha cig gis ni shing shal ma li'i srang leb/ kha cig gis ni ras skye nang tshangs can/ kha cig gis ni sku ba brgyus pa/ kha cig gis ni ra rgyal khyer te rgya mtsho chen por zhugs so// de rnams rgya
220b1: mtshachen pa'i dbus su phyin pa dang / rgya srin nya'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i thu bo che bshig go// gru bo che bshig pa dang / de rnams rgyal pa ri re la zhon te chu ji lta ba bzhin du khyer te dod pa las/ de rnams kyi les kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i drung byang phyogs nas langs te/
220b2: des lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang / da na bud med gzugs bzang mo// mdzes ma/ bltan sdug bdag yod de/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzangs dag chur spyon/ bdag cag jo bo ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang / khyim zab ma mchis
220b3: pa rnams kyi phyim thab dang / gnas mchis pa rnams kyiganas dang / gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi ming dang / mganam mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang / rgyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / rten ma mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzad cig/ 'di dag ni khyod kyizas kyi bang pa dang /
220b4: skol gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / gnas mal gyi 'ang ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga'ang ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi rin cho btu mang po 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bidUr+ya dang / dung dang / man kes
220b5: dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sdug dang / pad ma rAg dang / dung g.yas su 'khyil bdag lags kyis khyed tshur spyon/ bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar brtse/ dga' mgur spyad par bgyi'o// khyed cag las su yang smyos kyang
220b6: lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud cig/ de dag bud med de rnams dang / lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ de dag de rnams dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu po dang / bu mo dag btsas so//
220b7: dar pa tshang ba babs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig 'di snyam du sems te/ ci'i phyir bud med de dag gis lho phyogs kyi lam lhag par bsrung bar sems/ ma la bdag gis bud med gang dang lhan cig nyal ba de mal duganyid log par rig nas bags kyis dal bus dal bus
220b8: nas pathams sa byags kyilamadu 'grol sta nag/ de de lta ngas par byas nas thang mdag dang stan ciganyas bad ga nyid kyis lag par riganas pags kyi/ mal nas papas te sa krinan pa pacan phyogs nas kyi phyogs kyi la ma du bang ba dang deb na
221a1: po'i tshogs chen po smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra kyi hud ma/ kyi hud pa/ kyi hud sring mo/ kyi hud spun/ kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs sam/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de skyid ces sgra 'byin pa dag thos so// thos nas kyang de 'jigs par gyur/ rmongs par gyur/ spyi bung
221a2: zhes byed par gyur to/ / de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can des 'jigs pa dang / spyi bur zhes byed de shin du legs par stsal nas lho phyogs kyi lam de kho na'i rjes su song ba dang / des de na lugs mkhar chen po mtho zhing rgya che ba zhig mthong nas/ des grong khyer de'i
221a3: mtha' khor khor yug tu bskor na/ ci nas kyang sgo cung zad gcig rnyed grang snyam nas/ des grong khyer de'i mtha' khor lor yug tu bskor ba dang / chung ngun byi la'am sprul 'dzul ba'i sgo tsam yang ma rnyed do// den shing shi ri she zhes bya ba sbom la ring ba zhig mthong nas/ de nas
221a4: tsho ba mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis shing shi ri sha de la bags kyis dal bus dal bus 'dzegs nas skye bo'i tshigs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/ / shes ldan dag ci'i phyir gyi hud ma/ kyi hu da pa/ kyi hud sring mo// kyi hud kun/ kyi hud 'dzam bu'i gling bkra bas spangs
221a5: sam/ 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na re skyid ces shin du smre sngags 'dod/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ kye nang rje bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun nor tshol ba rab tu mang po dag gcig rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsrubs te// rgya mtsho chen por 'jug par 'dod pa las bdag cag 'di
221a6: snyam du sems te/ shes ldan dag bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig phan 'dogs par mngon pa med kyis// ma la bdag cag nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rgyal gyi cha spyad dag khyer te/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug
221a7: par bya'o zhes de nas chas bcad nas nor tshol ba rnams so so nas phongs pa na dgos pa rgyal gyi cha spyad kha gcig gis ni shing shal ma li'i slar leg/ kha gcig gis ni ris skye nang tshangs can/ kha cig gis ni sku ba bzlas pa/ kha cig gis nir rgyal khyer te rgya mtsho
221a8: chen por zhugs so/ / bdag cag rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang chu srin nya'i rigs kyis gru bo che bshig go// gru bo che bshig nas bdag cag rgyal pa re re la zhon te chu ji lta ba bzhin khyer te dong ba las/ bdag cag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung
221b1: ba'i rlung byar phyogs nas langs te/ des bdag cag lho phyogs kyi 'gram du khyer ba dang / de na bud med gzugs bzang mo// mdzes ma/ blta na sdug pa dag yod de/ de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so jo bo dag tshur spyon/ bzhin bzangs dag tshur spyon/ bdag cag ngo /
221b2: po ma mchis pa rnams kyi jo bo dang / khyi ma thab ma mchis pa rnams kyi khyim thab dang / gnas ma mchis pa rnams kyi gnas dang / gling ma mchis pa rnams kyi gling dang / mgon ma mchis pa rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs ma mchis pa rnams kyi skyabs dang / rten ma
221b3: mchis pa rnams kyi rten mdzod cig/ 'di dag ni khyed kyi zas kyi khang pa dang / skom gyi khang pa dang / gos kyi khang pa dang / gnas mal gyi khang pa dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' ra ba dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshal dang / dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rdzing dang / 'dzam bu'i
221b4: gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / dngul dang / gser dang / rdo'i snying po dang / sdug dang / bad ma rA ga dang / dud g.yas su 'khyil ba dag lags kyis khyed tshur spyon/ bdag cag dang lhan cig/
221b5: rtsed mo bgyi/ dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgur spyad par bgyi/ khyed cag las su yang smos kyang lho phyogs kyi lam du ma bzhud gcig/ bdag cag bud med de dag dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed de/ bdag cag de dag dang lhan cig/
221b6: rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las khye'u dang bu mo dag btsas te/ ji srid 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun gzhan rnams kyi rgya mtsho'i gru bo che zhig go zhes mthos pa de srid du bud med de dag dang bdag cag lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar
221b7: byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las/ gang gi tshe bud med rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po gzhan dag kyang rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su phyin pa dang chu srin nyi'i rigs kyis rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bshig go zhes thos nas/ de nas bdag cag gi drung du
221b8: 'ongs te/ kha cig ni zos so// skyes pa za bar byed pa na lhag rol sgra 'am/ spu 'am/ sen mo'om/ so lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag kyang ma lus par za bar byed do// de rnams za bar byed pa na khrag dron mo'i thigs pa sa la lhung ba gang dag yod na yang de dag kyang sor mo'i ru mo/
222a1: rnams kyis byung des dang bcas par bar 'jug par byed do// bdag cag kha cig ni lcags kyi mkhar 'dir bcug go// kye nang rje 'di dag ni mi'i bud med ma yin te/ srin mo yin gyis 'di dag las bdag nyid srungs shig/ de gad ces smras pa dang / chod pa mkhas pa'i dang /
222a2: bzhin can gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po de la 'di skad ces smras so// gang gis na khyed cag dang bdag cag legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs 'ga' ci yod/ de rnams kyis 'di skad ces smras so// kye nang rje re shig bdag cag gang gis na legs pa
222a3: dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du byin par 'gyur ba'i thabs ni nung zad kyang kho bo cig la med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gal te bdag drug gis 'di snyam du kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di las rgal te 'bros so snyam du bsams na/ de'i nyis gyur ram de'i sum gyur gyis mthon po/
222a4: 'gyur ro// gal te bdag cag gis 'di snyam du kye ma bdag cag gis lcags kyi mkhar 'di'i glo phug ste 'bros so snyam du bsams na/ de'i nyis gyur ram/ de'i sum gyur gyis zheng du skye bar 'gyur te/ de ltar re shig bdag cag legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin papa
222a5: 'gyur ba'i thabs bdag cag la med do/ / 'on kyang gang gis na khyed cag ni slar legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs yod de/ 'di na bdag cag gis par snang la rgyu ba'i lha rnams kye ma 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rnams gso sbyong bcwa lnga bde/
222a6: nyid la byang phyogs kyi gseb lam gang na ta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu za ba bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa/ mgo 'phang ba stod de pha rol du 'gro ba ni su yod/ su ni pha rol du ba kri/ su ni 'dzam bu'i gling du/
222a7: legs pa dang / bde bar phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched brjod pa yod par mi 'gro ba ni byis pa'o zhes sgra 'byin pa thos kyis/ khyod de'i drung du deng la 'di skad ces bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o// bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol du bkri zhing legs pa dang bde
222a8: bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smros shig/ de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen po des smras pa shin du legs par bzung ste chub par byas nas/ bags kyis dal bus dal bus shing shi ri sha las babs nas g.yas phyogs
222b1: kyilam de nyid du song ste/ bud med dgang dang lhan cigatal ba de ma lan ga nyid kyis log par rig nas pags kyis dal bus dal bus nyal lo// de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das pa dang na par sngar 'das nas 'dzam bu'i gling ga don
222b2: 'thun rab tu mang po gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gidon 'thun rab tu mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag re shig gang na bskyed mos tshal dben pa yod bzhin gshig dang / kho bos khyed cag dang lhan cig gsang ste gleng dgos
222b3: bcud zhig yod kyis/ khyed su yang smyos kyang khye'u 'am bu mo ni khrid de ma 'ong shig/ shes ldan dag de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams kyis mnyan to// de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams bskyed mos tshal rab tu dben/
222b4: pagadan der dod ba dang / de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis skye bo'i tshogs chen ba de dang lhan cig skabs kyi gtam ji snyed glengs pa de dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi don yun rab tu mang po rnams la rgyas par smras nas 'did ces kyang smras te/ 'di dag ni bud med ma yin/
222b5: 'di dag srin mo yin gyis shes ldan dag yid las bdag tad pa srung bar gyis shig/ de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po rnams de bzhin du gso sbyong bcwa lnga pa de nyid la byang phyogs kyi gseb lam gang na rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can marmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu zab
222b6: bde ba dang / nad med pa dang / stobs dang ldan pas dbang po rnams tshim pa mgo 'phang bstod de pha rol du 'gro ba ni su zhig yod/ su ni pha rol du bkri/ su ni legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par bya zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa yod par song ba dang / tshong pa ta
222b7: rdzi'i regs shig gis rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can ni pha bi yin te/ pha ba'i drung du dod la 'di skad ces
222b8: bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o/ / bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/ bdag cag pha rol du bkri zhing bdag cag legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra'o// de nas tshong pa mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can gyis don 'thun rab tu mang po la 'di skad
223a1: ces smras so/ / shes ldan ga dag gi ji ltar skye bo'i tshigs chen po des smras pa'i don go bltar na 'di ni bdag cag gis rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi drung du dod nas 'di skad ces/ bdag cag pha rol du mchi'o// bdag cag pha rol du mchi ste/ bdag cag pa
223a2: rol du bkri zhing bdag cag legs pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling phyin par mdzad du gsol zhes smra ba'i dus la bab pa ma yin no// 'on kyang gang gi tshe rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu zos nas zhes bya ba nas/ su ni legs
223a3: padang ba dbang 'dam pa'i gling nga byin par bya zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin dubya/ de ni bdag cag d+ha'i rgyal ba sbyin kyi thugs can ci chung dod la 'disad ces bdag cag pa rol du mche'o// bdag cag pa rol du mchiste/ bdag cag pa rol du ba nang bdag cag lags
223a4: dang / ba bang 'das ra snyid byen pa mdzad drugapo pa nas dgang da sla pa'i sa la ba pa yin no// denas ta rgyal ba snyen gyi thugs can gyis mchos ma ga pa pa'i bras sa lu zos nas zhes bya ba nas sun migs pa dang / bdab 'dam bu gling dbyin par bya nas
223a5: ba'i par gong ma bzhin du'o/ / de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi don 'thun rab tu mang po blo gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus po g.yas pa'i ltungs la btsugs te ta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gang na ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la di na
223a6: res smra'o go dag ca par bdu ga nga Nag pa do ma nag cag pa rol du bkri ning bdag cag legs pa dang / bde bar 'dom bu'i gling byin par mdzad du gsol de nas ti'i rgyal po sgron gyi shugs can gyis 'jam du'i gling gi no thun rab tu mang po la legs par ra
223a7: tu btams shing rjes su bstan pa/ shes ldan dag bud med de dag lhag par gzugs pa zang pa/ lhag par mnges pa/ lhag par bstan stug par byas nas bye'u dadabu mo rnams khrid de 'ong zhing / de rnams 'disad ces/ jo bo dag chur skyon/ bzhin bzangs dag tshur spyon zhes
223a8: bya ba nas/ bdag cag dang stan cig rtse bar brtse/ dga' bar brtsi/ dgar ma thang gyud par brtse'o// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// 'on te byed cag la 'ga' zhig gis cung zad smras te bdag cag mi dgos na nga rang gi bu dag khridi dong shig ces zer ba de la byed
223b1: cag las gang dag 'di snyam du bdag cag gis chung ma'am/ bu 'o'am/ bu mo'om/ bdag gi zas kya khang pa'am/ skom gyi khang pa'am/ gos kyi khang pa'am/ gnas mal gyi 'a pa'am/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i kun dga' raba'am/ dga' bar 'gyur ba'i rtide dang / 'ad
223b2: bu'i gling gi rin po che rab tu mang po 'di lta ste/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bidUd+ya dang zhes bya ba nas/ dudang g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sems phan chad de dag kho ba'i ra steng dam rgyab la zhon yang shing tog gi 'bras bu smin ba rgya 'chad pa bzhin du ltung bar 'gyur
223b3: shing / bud med de rnams 'ongs nas za bar 'gyur te/ de dag skyes bza bar byed pan khrag dron pa'i thigs pas la lhung ba gang dag yin pa de dag kyang sor mo'i rtse mosas dang bcas te thung nas khar bdug go// khyed cag las gang dag 'di snyam du bdag gi chung ma'am/ bu'am/ bu mo
223b4: 'am zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du mi sems na de rnams kha bo'i spu'i rtse me'i bye ba'i tshal rten kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur te/ de dag lags pa dang / bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par 'gyur ro// de nas rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyis
223b5: 'dam bu'i gling gi tsher pa rab tu mang po la legs par rab tu btams shing rjes su bstan nas rgyab smad do/ / de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshed pa rab tu mang pos rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can la kha cig ni ro steng du/ kha cig ni rgyab tu/ kha cig ni gnya' bar ro// kha cig ni mju/
223b6: mal 'phra lo// de nas rta'i rgyal po sbyin gyi shugs can gyis rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas de nyid nas steng gi nam mkha' la sad pa dang / de nas bud med lhag par gzugs bzang ba/ lhag par mdzes pa/ lpag pas
223b7: bstan thug pa rnams kyis khye 'u dang bu mo rnams srid de lhags na pa'idi skad ces jo bo dag tshung spyan/ bzhin bzangs dag tshur skyon zhes bya ba nas bdag cag dang lhan cig rtsed mo bgyi// dga' bar bgyi/ dga' mgung spyad par bgyi ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//
223b8: 'on te khyad cag la 'ga' zhig cung zad smras te/ kho mocog mi dgos na rang rang gi khye'u dang bu mi rnams khrid de dang shig ces smras pa de la gang dag 'di snyam du bdag gis chung ma'am/ bu pho 'am/ bu ma 'am/ bdag gisas kyi khang pa'am zhes bya ba nas dung g.yas su
224a1: 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du sems pa de dag ni rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi ro stod dang rgyab tu 'on yang shing rtog gi 'bras bu smin pa rtsab chad pa bzhin du de nas slar ltung bar gyur pa dang / bud med de rnams de dag gi drung du dong ste phyin nas za bar/
224a2: byed de/ skyes pa rnams za bar byed pa na lhag ma lus pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste skra 'am zhes bya ba nas/ sa dang 'dren mar brud de khar 'jug par byed do zhes bya ba'i bar god ma bzhin du'o// gang dag 'di snyam du bdag gi chung ma 'am/ bdag gi bu pho 'am/ bdag gi bu mo zhes bya ba nas/ rung
224a3: g.yas su 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/ de ltar mi sems pa de rnams ni 'di ltar rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi spu'i rtse mo'i cha shas la 'jus pa yang legs pa dang bde bar 'dzam bu'i gling du phyin par gyur to// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gang dag 'di snyam du bdag ni
224a4: mig yin no/ / mig ni bdag gi yin no// bdag ni na ba dang / sna dang khye ba cu dag dam na pa ni dgagi no/ bdag ni gzugs yin no// gzugs ni bdag gi yin no// bdag ni sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / bdag ni chos yin no// chos ni bdag ga yin no// bdag na sa'i khams
224a5: yin no/ / sa'i khams ni bdag gi yin no// bdag ni chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i khams yin no// rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gi yin no// bdag ni gzugs kyi phung po yin no// gzugs kyi
224a6: phung po ni bdag gi yin no/ / bdag ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / bdag ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin no// rnam par shes pa ni bdag gi yin no snyam du sems na/ de rnams sdug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ srin me'i nang du tshong pa bzhin// rgyal po chen po gang dag 'di
224a7: snyam du bdag ni mig yin no/ / mig ni bdag gi yin no zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni bdag gi yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste// de ltar mi sems na/ de rnams bde ba 'thob 'gyur te// sprin gyi shugs kyis chod pa bzhin/ sangs rgyas bstan la blun po'i ma// gang
224a8: dag dang bar mi byed pa/ de rnams sug bsngal 'thob 'gyur te/ srin pa'i nang du chod pa bzhin/ shes rab can gyi mi gang dag/ sangs rgyas bstan la dang byed pa/ bde bar pha rol 'gro 'gyur te/ sman gyi shugs kyis tshod pa bzhin// rgyal po chen po rdo snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de 'dus na
224b1: rta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rta'i rgyal po sbrid kyi shugs can zhes bya bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshangs sems can rnams la zan pa byas pa des bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs
224b2: pa'i byang chubathob po snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang sems can rnams la phan pa byas pa de ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
224b3: don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig rgyal po chen po sngor byung ba yul bA rA sI dang ha cang yang mi ring bzhig na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can la'o byams pa zhig gnas so/ / de'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig
224b4: na khyim bdag zhing pa gnyis shig ning rmed pa las de gnyis phan tshun rtsod pa byung bar gyur te/ de na gcig khros pa dang / gcig shos kyang slar khros so// gcig gis brgyab pa dang / gcig shos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo// de gnyis ka yang drang srong gi drung du dong nas dang srong de la
224b5: gcig gis dbang btsugs pa dang / gcig shos kyis kyang btsugs so// de gnyis rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / rgyal pos de gnyis la smras pa/ khyed gnyis la dpang su yod/ gcig gis smras pa/ lha bdag gi dbang drang srong lags so// gcig shos kyis smras pa/ bdag
224b6: gi dbang yang de kho na lags so/ / de nas rgyal pos drang srong bos te dris pa/ drang srong chen po 'di gnyis sngar gang gis nyes/ drang srong gis smras pa lha gal te 'khor los sgyur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal che bcad na/ de lta na bdag gis dbang bgyi'i gzhan du ni ma lags so//
224b7: rgyal pos smras pa/ de bzhin du bya'o// de nas drang srong gis smras pa/ lha gcig khros pa dang / gcig shos kyang slar khros so// gcig gis brgyab pa dang / gcig shos kyis kyang slar brgyab bo// rgyal pos smras pa/ 'on gnyis ka chad pas gcad do// drang srong gis smras
224b8: pa/ lhakhyod la bdag gis slar lhagal te 'khor los skur ba'i bka' khrims kyis zhal che bcad na de ltan bdag gis dpar bgyi'i gzhan du na ma lags so zhes ma gsol tam/ rgyal pos smras pa/ drang srong chen po 'khor los sgyur bas zhal che ji ltar gcod/ drang srong
225a1: gis smras pa/ sgral khor los par pa'i rgyal po nag dang pa las zlog cing par pal sbyor bar byed do// de nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gnyis ga dang la daphyin pad de ltar ba byed cig/ rgyal po tshon pa dang tshe 'i dus dadang srong dgyur ba ga gas cob bzhin d+ha/
225a2: dpang dbyas pa gan pa dag pa na pa kyid kyi / phe / 'a pa 'a sa shes das kyad kyimam tshan kyis par gyis zhes thabar ba ga ya da // rgyal y-i pa las shi kyang nga byab pa shA bang pa /
225a3: par rdzogs pa'i byang chu brtags pa snyam na pyod byas de kar mibs / don kyang ngas chos banan gyis dpang byas pa den thaMd med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed chub zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yi zhes bya ba'i bar god pa bzhin do// rgyal brjid pa gan yang
225a4: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na rang gi srog yongs su btang nas sems can mang po rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba na nags tshang tshing zhig nas ngag yab
225a5: can zhig gnas so/ / lam denas don ban lnga brgyam mdod dag/ de dag gici co zlas dus bdul bas sbrul chen pa zhags pag bu zhes bya ba zhig mo bur dru langs nas des don 'thun mong dpon dang bcas pa bskor ba dang / de rnams na gnas sgra' byin cing / zha ba dang rbaH
225a6: dang las da dang / ngar phyug la sogs pa lan pas lags so bahal pa dang / de nas se ges par byib po// thos da kyang phyogs dang 'os pa dang / na pan phrul can pozhogs pas thu'as thabs don 'granas btamal ba sod ba nga // de dang cang yang
225a7: ra ba dag glang ba'i phru ba zhag kyang rgyu zhing 'drag pa dang / dede'i drong du sang ste smras pa/ grogs pa sul chen po zhogs pa la bu zhes bya bas don 'bru lnga brgyab sor na de nams kyi don ma phye nga gi srog yongs su gang bar byer spong ma/ jil bu zhig bya/ bdag ni
225a8: rkang pa khyod kyi glang par bzhag la thal mos sbrul chen po la bsnyun dang / bdag gi rkang pa brten pa'i thugs kyis ni khyod 'chi bar 'gyur ro// thal lug gis ni thul lo// sbrul chen po'i 'i chus reg pas ni ba dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur ro// glang po che'i phru gus de bzhin
225b1: byar zhes pas blangs nas sang dgas grang ba ma bu bra steng dra rkang pa bzhag nas thal mas sbrul chen po la brdzun pa dang / sedags rkang pa brtan pa'i shugs rgyas ni glang bza'i bru bra / thal mos kyang sbrul chen pog/ sbal chen pa'i 'chus kyang ri rigs kyi rgyal po
225b2: seng ge shi ste 'gro ba gsum char yang ngo / / don 'thun gyi tsho gas chas pa dang lha zhig gis smras pa dang / bskal pa bza pa'i byang chub sems dpas khyod kyi phyir rang gi srog yongs su btang nas skyabs byas kyis re shig de'i lus la mchod par byos la phyin deng shig/ de nas
225b3: de rnams kyis de'i rus pa bsregs te rus pa la mchod pa byas so/ / rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge zhes bya ba nas/ ras don 'thun lnga brgya po de dag sbrul chen po las rang gi srog btang nas thar bar byas so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// rgyal
225b4: po chen po ngas sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po snyam na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi bilta ste zhes bya ba nas/ ngas sems can rnams rjes su bzung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
225b5: rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no// zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir gsod pa la yang byams pa bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung
225b6: nags thong gcig na byung chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung pol gnas pa dbya ma go gnyis la sems pa da pazhigang byu / de la gcig di chos can zhes bya'o// gcig shos ni chos min zhes bya'o// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na chos can gyis 'dud rjem
225b7: thu bzhin rnas / chos pan kyis drug ga nas pa'ig nas thas sa nyis sang ga ga sa pa myos par thang nas pa tshu dpa brtsams pa da/ gcig gis sog pa spyon la la btapag/ khyod kyi skye gang ga gyis pa da
225b8: gsod pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bor gyur cig ces byas so// gcig shos kyis kyang smras pa/ bdag ni khyod la thams cad du byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse ba'i sems su gyur cig ces byas so// rgyal ba chen po ji snyam
226a1: du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// chos min ni lha sbyin yin no// rgyal po chen po nga'i byams pa'i sems nges bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i
226a2: byams pa'i sems kyis than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyun ma dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs cam yin no// 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa// / rgyal po chen po gzhan yang sa blan mang pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don
226a3: du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can gyi skyabs byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgya gling zhig gi 'gram na byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pan tu sreg rnams kyi nang du skyes nas chu sreg lnga brgya'i dpon por gyur to// ji tsam na chu sreg nan/
226a4: po zhig chu sreg de rnams kyi sgong dang phru gu rnams thabs kyis sngar zos nas dbu mdus pachag cing res 'ga' bya ba med pa na rkang pa gcig bskum nas 'dug go// de nas chu sreg de rnams bu dang bral ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas dpon po'i drung du song ste
226a5: sa mi 'thun pa'i skad gnyug mas ngu bar brtsams pa dang / de nas dpon pos rang gi khyu rnams de ltar sdug bsngal bar mthong nas chu gling kun nas byul bar brtsams pa dang / chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis rnam par ltung bar 'gyur gyi sems kyis
226a6: ni ma yin pas/ des chu seg rgan po de dal bus dal bus 'chag cing phyogs gcig tu song nas rkang pa gcig bteg ste gnas pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpas 'phrigs pa/ 'di ni rang gi rigs kyi phyir rgol ba rang bzhin ngan pa yin no snyam du rig nas tshigs
226a7: su bcad de smras pa/ bdag gi sgor pA gu dang / bus chags rnams kyang zos nas ni/ rkang pa gcig btsugs 'dug pa de// kye ma khyod kyi brtul zhugs yin kha cig smra pa yang bden te// gom pa dal bus 'dor byed cing / dal bus dal bus smra ba dang / gnya' ba gyur
226a8: gyur byed pa ni/ / de ni ngan g.yo'i mtshan nyid yin// des bsams pa/ dpon po 'dis ni bdag gi rgyus shes so snyam du rig nas de nyid las skyabs su song ngo // de nas dpon pos smras pa/ khu gun ma chu sreg gi tshogs rnams 'khrugs par ma gyur pa de'i bar du
226b1: khyod kyi sems pa da bar byas shig/ da nas chus gzhan pa dathos nas chus gang rnams padabar gyur // rnal ba can pa da tsha 'i dusan tu sreg sa pon por byung ba dag gas sus kyang yang nyam tas// 'on kyang nga 'dris nanas ga ga san
226b2: po de brur to/ / rgyal po chen pongs sems can rjes su bzung ba des blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu po ba bo snyam na khyod kyis de lta mi blta ste/ 'od kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang /
226b3: rkyen nam dang / tshogs cam yin no// la bachen po gzhan ya ngas panas pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba don du gnyer ba'i phying sesas can rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa kon cig/ rgyal ba chen po sngon byung banags tshang cheng shigan byang chub sa sa/
226b4: dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa nan tsam sangs pa zhig du gyur to// de'i tshe yul bA rA Na sI rgyal po tshongs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa de chos ma yin pas rgyal sring byed du 'jug go// de nas ne co de nyin pa ning rgyal po de'i khang pa'i phu shu'i ste na yab cing rgyal po chen po chos
226b5: ma yin pas rgyal sri ma mdzad cig ces smra'o/ / rgyal ba de dang lhan cig yi gzug la byung dang// de nas ngas rgyal po dang/ grub kyi gnas lnga pa rab tu bzhag nas chos bzhin kyis rgyal srid byed pa la zhugs nas/ ri dgas dang bya thams cad la ma 'jigs pa byin no//
226b6: rgyal po chen po da tshong 'i dus nin cor gyur pa de gzhan ni ga yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mig ste/ 'on kyang nyid tshod dus nani tsam skang su pa de yin par gyur to// rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas/ des blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
226b7: thob bosam dpyod kyis de ltar mi ba s+ho/ / 'on kyangs sems can la pan byas pa de ni sbyin med par dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen ma dang / tshegs tsam yin no// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu bdon du
226b8: gte ya'i phyir gsod pa la byams pa'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po sngon byung ba yul ka shinas bya ba na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal srid byed de/ de rtag tu lus 'phags kyi yul 'dod pa kho na'i phyir lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang mi mthun/
227a1: par gyur to// lus 'phags kyi rgyal po ni de bas khyad zhugs pa'i mthu dang ldan yang yul de mi 'dod pas rtag tu de la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / snying brtse bas gnas so// 'on kyang de sred pas 'khol bas yul de kho na 'dod pa'i phyir de dpung//
227a2: gtsogs yang lag bzhi pago con nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal po dang g.yul spyad pa'i phyir chas so// de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos thos nas dpag chad byed dang gsum gyi lam skar du bcug ste grong khyer ded thams cad rdo ba dang / gseg ma dang / gyo mo bas la nas rgyal
227a3: mtshan dang pa ngan ni bsgreng / ngar gyi chun 'phya mang po ni sbyangs/ dra zhib po'i pog por ni bshams// tsan dan gyi chu'i chag chag gis btab cing me tog sil ma sna tshegs kyis dga' dga' ltar byas nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba rab du mang po dag sta gon byas te grong mi dang
227a4: blon po rnams bskur bkye nas mgu bar 'gyur ba brgya phrag dag spring ba thos pa dang / rgyal po tshangs sbyin kun nas dkris pa dang bral te de nas bsams pa/ lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la so sor yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba zhig byas te slar ldog go snyam du bsams nas lus
227a5: 'phags kyi rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang / lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos bkur sti chen pos bsu nas nang du khrid de/ kha zas bsod pa rnams kyis tshim par byas nas chags su bcad de smras pa/ rgyal dbang bdag la bzod par mdzod// khyod la bdag ni rtag tu 'dud// bdag ni
227a6: grogs por gyur lags na/ / khyod kyis bdag la brtse bar mdzod// des kyang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bzod pa yini gzhu bdudangs nas// khrod dang rgyal 'joms pa yi// yon tan ldan pa'i mda' gcig gis// khyod kyis bdag cag ril bcom mo// de nas de gnyis phan tshun
227a7: yid gcugs par gyur nas rgyal po tshangs spyir yang rang gi yul du song ngo / / lus 'phags kyi yul mi rnams kyang 'jigs pa dang bral bar gyur to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na lus 'phags kyi rgyal por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta stong/
227a8: da tshe 'dus na lus 'phags kyi rgyal po de yin par byur to// rgyal po chen po das yid kyi dregs pa bcom pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang nga'i yid kyi dregs pa bcom pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
227b1: zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ / rgyal po chen po gzhan yang des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can gyi don chen po byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba byang chub sems//
227b2: dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na rgya mtsho'i ru sbal gyi dpon po zhig tu gyur to// rnga tsam na ded dpon 'khor lnga brgya pa nor tshel ba zhig rgya mtsho'i grub che bsgrubs nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa las ji tsam na gru de chu srin nyi'i rigs kyis bshig nas tshul ma yin pas sdug
227b3: bsngal bar gyur to/ / de nas ru sral des chod pa lnga brgya rgyab tu bskyon nas rgya mtsho chen po las bsgral to// rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na rgya mtsho'i ru skal gyi dpon por gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kya ngang nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgya mtsho'i
227b4: du sbal gyi dpon po der gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob tho snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang des sems can rjes su bzung ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes
227b5: bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no/ / rgyal po chen po gzhan yang des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can la phan pa byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba lus 'phags kyi rgyal
227b6: po'i blon po lnga brgya blang ba las den sde can dang / sde bzangs shes bya ba stan gnyis shig ston pa'i gtso byed pa las snga can gyis sde bzangs la rtag tu glan ka chol zhing gnod pa bya ba la zhugs so// sde bzangs ni de la rtag tu phan par bya ba ba nags so// rgyal po'i blon po dang grong mi
227b7: rnams kyis kyang sde bzangs kyi ched du snga can dang sdums byas kyang gnas skabs thams cad tu gnod pa byed pa las ldog tu ma btub bo/ / de nas lus 'phags kyi rgyal pos mang po// gi spros nas yul nas bskrad do// de bA rA Na mA song nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis blon po'i
227b8: gtso bor bcug go/ / de dus gzhan zhig na long bar gyur to zhes nu bo sde bzangs kyis thos nas rgyal po la gsol ba byas te bA rA Na sIr song nas mig phye ba dang / skye bo'i tshogs chen pos sde bzangs 'di lta bu gang gis na mthus phu bo long bar bya ba'i rigs na/ snying rje dang ldan pa
228a1: 'dis de'i mig phye'o zhes sde bzangs la sems dga' bar gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na blon po'i gtso bo sde bzangs shes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam na zhes bya ba nas/ 'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba de ni bla na med pa yang dag par
228a2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o/ / rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rjes su gzung ba byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/ rgyal po chen po
228a3: sngon byung tshong khang zhig na ded dpon gnyis shig gnas pa las de gnyis shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgyad nga nyo tsha la dgon pa'i lam zhig tu zhugs pa dang de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag dgon pa'i nang nas 'dod pa rnams 'di lta ste/ gcig la gcig phan thogs par ma na/
228a4: pa med kyis/ ma la bdag cag gis shi rta ba'i 'don pa rabs gnyis su bcad la dgon pa'i lam du 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/ de gnyis kyis shing rta ba'i 'dron pa rabs gnyis su bcad nas dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so// de la ded dpon bcig ni shing rta ba lnga brgya dang dgen
228a5: ba'i lam gyi mgon 'dug go/ / ded dpon gcig shos ni shing rta ba lnga brgya dang dgon pa'i lam du zhugs so// ded dpon gyi mi chod pa'i mdun nas 'gro bas skyes bu nag po mag che la dmar ba/ bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo rdzab kyis yog pa/ gos rlan pa skra gshe
228a6: ga me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/ mgo 'dren dang dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces smras so// kye nang rje cing gon pa'i lam du ltas char pab nas nA dang chu sar pa mang du skyes sam/ kye na rje bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du/
228a7: lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu sa rab mang du bskyed kyis/ shes ldan dag chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma byas par 'or cig/ khyed cag rtswa dang chu sar pa la longs spyod dang bde ba dang gas par dadon pa'i ma ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar 'gyur ro// de nas ded dpon gyi mi 'dron
228a8: ba gdan ba der song ste byin pa dang / 'dron pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig/ kho bo tshong ba rnams kyi mdun nas 'gro ba na 'di na skyes bu nag po mig che la dmar ba/ bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo rdzab kyis yog pa/ gos rlan
228b1: pa/ / skra gsher ba/ me tog ku mu da'i phreng bas mgo bo bcings pa/ mgo 'dren dang / dkyus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces kye nang rje cing gon pa'i lam du lhas char bab nas rtswa dang chu sar pa mang du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang / de 'di skad ces kye
228b2: nad rje bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtswa dang chu sar pa bskyed kyis// shes ldan dag rtswa dang chu rnying pas khal rnams dub par ma byas par bor cig/ khyed cag rtswa dang chu sar ba la longs spyod dang bde ba dang legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba lhag ma yang /
228b3: rtol bar 'gyur ro zhes zer gyis/ bdag cag gi khal rnams ma dub par rtswa dang chu bor ba bdag cag rtswa dang chu sar ba la longs spyad nas bde ba dang legs par dgon pa'i lam ma rtol ba lhag ma yang rtol bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyi rtswa dang chu rnying pa bor te dgon pa'i lam du zhugs/
228b4: pa las de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon yang rtswa dang chu sar pa ma rnyed do// zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun gyi bar du song yang rtswa dang chu sar pa ma rnyed do// de nas 'dron pas zhag bdun lon pa dang gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btag go/ de nas de dang dpon
228b5: gcig shos 'di snyam du sems te/ tshong pa dag dod nas deng du zhag bdun lon no snyam du bsams nas dgon pa'i lam der zhugs pa las/ ded dpon gyi mi tshong pa'i mdun nas 'gro bas skyes bu nag po mig che la dmar ba/ bong bu'i shing rtar zhugs pa/ 'khor lo rdzab kyis
228b6: yog gagos na pa/ sngagasheng ba/ ma rtag tu mutab phreng bal mag pa bcings pa/ mgo dren da dkus ma dag dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo // thong nas kyang 'di nad ces smras so// rkyen rje ci gon pa'i lam du stsas char ba ba nas nA dang chus dpa mad du skyes sam/
228b7: na rjen/ dgon papa mang ra yam ldad nus da mang byed kyis/ shes na dan n+tadang nan pas pa rnams sa pa bya ba la ci// 9 cag d+ha dang rgyas pas ladas spyod da pade ba dang legs pa dben pa'i mam to pa sngags ya
228b8: 'gyur ro/ / de nas deng dpon gyi mi de 'dron pa gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / 'dron pa la 'dig ces smras so// shes ldan dag shes par gyis shig/ kho 'i tshong ba'i mdun nas 'gro ba na 'dil skyes bu na ga po zhes bya ba nas/ mgo 'dren dang dkyus mdag
229a1: dbyangs su len pa mthong ngo / / mthong nas kyang zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ 'di skad ces kye nang rje ci dgon pa'i lam du lhas char phab nas rtsa dang chu sar pa mang du skyes sam zhes byas pa dang de 'di skad ces kye nang rje bden te/ dgon pa'i lam du lhas
229a2: char phab nas zhes bya ba nas rtol bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes zer zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin du'o// shes ldan dag re shig bdag cag gis ji srid rtswa dang chu sar pa ma rnyed kyi bar du rtswa dang chu rnying pa ma dor ro// de rnams dong nas zhag gcig lon na yang rtswa dang chu sar
229a3: pa ma rnyed do/ / zhag gnyis dang / gsum dang / bdun gyi bar du song yang rtswa dang / chu sar pa ma rnyed pa las/ ded dpon gyi mis mdun na 'dron pa gnod sbyin mi zan gyis tshul ma yin pas kha btag pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces/ kye ma'od dpon gyi mi ni
229a4: bus pa ste/ des 'dron pa tshul ma yin pas kha btag gis med do zhes smras so// de ni bde ba dang legs par dgon pa'i lam rtol bar gyur te/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon phyi ma shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no// rgyal po chen po ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba des
229a5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob po snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang ngas sems can rjes su bzung ba ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi zhes bya ba nas tshogs tsam yin no zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// sdom la
229a6: mche ba drug dang ri bong dang / pa dang ma dang chu skyes dag/ tshal tshig glang po klu dang ni// yul 'khor skyod la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po gzhan yang ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i phyir sems can rnams la byams pa'i/
229a7: sa / dag / sa can ldan pa nas ca nga tsus ga ga lda po dang / nga / shes la dang / pal ga ma ya byas pa'i byigapa gag byang chub ma dpa' sa pa
229a8: gnas pa na glang po che'i rgyal po mche ba drug pa zhig du gyur to/ / de'i chung ma pa la glang mo bzang mo zhes bya ba ba la glang mo thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu byung ba de dang de lhan cig khru las gar te phyogs gzhan zhig tu dga' mgur d+ha zhing gnas pa na/ ji tsam na
229b1: bas zang mo mchog mchog tu yid 'brogs gzhan zhig 'di 'a'ang mi bsam papas grang pa ma'i rgyal pa la cha drug par dung byen to/ / nasapa da yangs sa pa yon tad dang ldan pa ga pas grang po cid la chags pa'i sems dang brel bas de 'dzin yang b+h+ya
229b2: bzhin thang / 'dug da yang 'dug par 'gyur ba des de sa bur bsnyen babur byas so// de nas pa glang mo bzang mo srog dog ga ston gyis mi bzod pa skyes nas pa la grang ma de la yang thanag chol bar gyur/ glang po chos cha badrug pa la yang shin du tshig pa za'o// gnas
229b3: skabs thams cad du nam yang glags ma rnyed pa de'i tshe smon lam log par gad ba par brtsams pa/ gang du glang po che byas pa chud gzon pa 'di'i srog gcod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas des raM kha nas bdag nyid mchongs te shi ba las
229b4: lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa'i mngal du skyes nas zla ba dgu 'das nas bu mo zhig btsas te bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur to/ / gang gi tshe bag mar gtang ran pa de'i tshe yul ka shi'i rgyal po tshangs sbyin la byin te/ des btsun mo dam par byas so// des tshe/
229b5: rabs snga ma'i sha khon yod pas byar ba rnams kyis glang po che mche ba drug pa bya ras song bar byed du bcug ste/ de nas des rgyal po tshangs sbyin la smras pa/ lha phyogs che ge mo zhig na glang po che me drug pa mchis na de'i mche baM bdag la 'tshal ba zhig mchis kyis lhas grong mi
229b6: rnams la bka' stsal du gsol/ / de nas rgyal pos yul thams cad na gnas pa'i rngon pa rnams bkug ste bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag deng la phyogs chege mo zhig na glang po tsho mche ba drug pa zhig 'dug pa de'i mche ba dgos kyis myur du khyer te shog shig/ lha bka' bzhin
229b7: 'tshal zhes rngon pa de rnams kyis rgyal po tshangs sbyin las mnyan to/ / de nas rjon pa de rnams kyi sde po gang yin pa des rngon pa de rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag rang rang gi las la 'bod cing bdug shig dang / kho bo kho na 'gro'o zhes des gtor ma'i chog byas/ go bgos
229b8: mda' dug can lag na thogs/ gzhu bdungs te glang po che tshol zhing song ba las phyogs der phyin pa dang / des de khyu las gar te chung ma dang lhan cig dga' mgur rgyu zhing bag brgyad ste 'dug pa mthong ngo // smras pa/ ut+pal pad mo mod pa'i chu ldan yul phyogs su// glang chen
230a1: dam pa me tog kun da zla ba dang / / ba yi 'o ma dang ni ba mo'i mdog can de// gangs ri brtsegs pa 'gro ba lta bu re de yis mthong // glang chen mchog gi dbang po zla ba 'dra ba de'i// mche ba drug po zla ba'i 'od zer ltar spa ba// pad ma dkar po'i pur chen gyen tu
230a2: 'phags pa la/ pad ma'i rtsa lag dri med du cig rten ko lha// de nas rngon pa de lus la gos ngur smrig bgos/ mnga' gzhumatshan du bcug nas 'khri zhing tshang tshing gi nang nas 'jab cing gom pa brtan te dal bus nye bar song ba dang / de nas bal glang mo des rgyang ring po kho na nas
230a3: mthong nas des khyim thab de la smras pa/ lha tshur spyon mi zhig mchi yis gzhan du bzhud do// des smras pa/ mi ci 'dra ba zhig/ des smras pa/ gos ngur smrig can zhig go// byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ gal te de lta yin te ci ste de la ngur smrig yod na bag ma tsha zhig/ dur
230a4: smig las ni mi dge ba mi 'byung ngo / / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni snying rje'i bdag nyid byams pa'i yid ldan pa/ gzhan gsong dga' ba spangs pa rnams kyi rgyal mtshan te// zla bas sim pa 'ba' shig byed kyi gdung min ltar// 'di las 'jigs pa mi 'byung 'di las zhib 'thob//
230a5: de nas bal glang mo de dang byang chub sems dpa' de yang bag tsha ba med par rgyu bar brtsams pa las/ de nas rngon pa des tshang tshing gi nang du zhugs nas mda' dug can gyis gnang du bsnun to// de nas bal glang mo des byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/ lha cing chos gos can
230a6: las bsnyengs pa byung ngam mabyung / byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ snying gi gdug pa ma byed ma byed ci// nyes 'di thub pa'i na bza' 'di'i min gyi// nyes 'di nyon mongs dbang du song ba yi// sems ldan snying rje rnam par spangs pa yin// skye bo ma rmongs sems can rtog pa can//
230a7: su yis gser byas g.yogs pa'i lugs la ni// mi rnams sru bar byed ces bsams nas su// gser de lpags dang 'dra ba nyid dubya// 'di yi mad 'dang ga rlu dang yi gdug pa// gang yin de na gdug pa nyid du shes// ngur sdig mchog tu zhi ba 'di yang ni// rtab tu ni
230a8: ba nyid du blo yog rtogs/ / de nas pal glang mo de mi bzod pa skyes nas kyi mthab la smras pa/ bdag ni tshig 'di dag gis bde bar bskrun pa khyod gsod pa btang snyoms su ba gyid rngom thog pas bdag gis 'di yan lag dang nying lag rnams skrag g.ye dbugag sher
230b1: gzhon par gyi'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpas 'dzum byung nas smras pa/ en nyon mongs pa'i 'byung po gso pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chung ma'i mngon par zhen pa rung ba ma yin no// ci 'di yang mi shes sa ma/ 'byung ba'i gdon gyis thebs pa sems rmongs pa/
230b2: na med pa des sman pa mi bkur te// de la sman pa gnod par mi byed kyi// 'byung po de nyid zil gyis mnan nas 'joms// de bzhin nyon mongs gdon gyis thebs pa yi// skye bo sams rmongs 'di ni sdig rab byed/ de la bdag shes nyon mongs gnod byed kyi// nyon
230b3: mongs pa yis pa la byas rnams la min/ / ldan cig spyod ma bdag gis byang chub thob nas srid gsum 'di// grags pas kun bkang nyon mongs g.yon can dran 'dul brten pa dang // drang po 'joms byed phyer klag bcad dang ga tag tsang bskam pa dang // rab tu
230b4: bskam pas ring po ma thogs shin du tshar ga car bya/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshog/ rnams kyis thal glang mo do snying rtsa bri bar byas pas cad mi smra bar 'dug go// de nas glang po che'i tshigs de byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ong ba dang / byang chub sems dpas bsam
230b5: glang po che 'di dag gis 'di nyid du rngon pa 'di la gnod pa bskyed na mi rung ngo snyam mo/ / 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus kyis log par ltung bar 'gyur gyi sems kyis ni ma yin pas de rngon pa de'i mdun du song nas
230b6: ma'i skad kyis ma 'dzags shig ces smras te dbugs phyung nas brang 'og tu sras te 'dug go/ / glang po che de rnams kyang snyad gcig btags nas phyogs de nas gzhan du btang ngo // glang po che rnams dong pa dang / des rngon pa la smras pa/ kye nang rje shes par gyis shig// blang /
230b7: po che rnams dong gis da ni nga gi dgos pa byos shig/ rngon pas bsams pa/ bdag 'dra ba'i mo ni tha shal yin te/ bdag la dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba 'dis kyang yon tan 'di lta bu dag gis dad pa bskyed do snyam nas des skad phyung ste dus pa dang / de nas byang
230b8: chub sems dpas spras pa/ kye nang rje ci'i phyir du/ rngon pas smras pa/ brgyab bo// byang chub sems dpa' mi dga' nas bsams pa/ ma la bdag gis 'di skyabs byas pa'i tshe gnod par gyur pa 'am/ khal glang mo 'dis bdag gsod pa la mi bzod pa skyes pas
231a1: 'dil mi dga' ba cung zad gcig byas par mgyur tam snyam nas rngon pa de la smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod su zhig gis brgyab/ de nas rngon pa de mig mchi ma'i dbab rlabs kyis gang bzhin du smras pa/ glang chen dbang po khyod kyi ni// lus la bdag gi
231a2: mnga' yis brgyag/ / khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi mangs// bdag gi sems la brgyab par gyur// dug can mnga' yis phog pa yi// lus rnams skye bar 'gyur ba ste// yon tan gyi ni ming sa phog pa'i// ma mkhas rnams ni skye mi 'gyur// gshed na la yang snying rje ba//
231a3: 'dri 'dra gang la yod gyur ba/ yon tan rgya mtsho khyod kyi ni// yon tan deng brjod su yis nus// mdor na bdag ni mi snyam pa'i// blo yang bdag la mi 'byung gi// bdag lus yon tan gyis stong pa// 'dil tshig bzab skyes// maM yi gatshugs yang yang bdag/ dung
231a4: 'gro'i skye gnas song ba yin/ / glang chen mchog khyod du nga 'gro yi// skye gnas sha tshugs 'chang yang mi// sha tshugs tsam gyis dud 'gro 'am// mar yang brtsib ma yin gyi// gang la yon tan nyer dmigs pa// de ni mi zhes bya bar dran// byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
231a5: yon tan gyis bkod par byed pa tshig gas gtam bya bar chad byed bgrong po don can ga gi phyir byod kyis papa mad sa bsnun pa myung du smos shig/ des smras pa/ rgyal po nan tur byis bdag gis byab ma yin pa dbyas te/ khyod las dgos bzhig yod do// byang chub sems
231a6: dpas smras pa/ gal te de lhan dal 'grus thong la/ lag pa gnyis ni spyir rkyod la// ci 'dod pa ni blang bar gyis// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni// mi gtor cung zad med pas long // bdag gi sha 'di bcad nas khyer ba'am// mche ba rnams kyang 'dod par byed la rag/
