249b6: sems te/ re shig bdag gis mthong ba'i chos kyi don gyis thob bapar bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis thob kyis/ mal bdag gis tshe phyi ma'i don las brtsams te bar bya'o snyas nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ blol bsdogs pa'i yid gnyis the tshom dag/ tshangs bkun
249b7: bged gzhon nul 'drib/ / gang du gnas shing gang la bslab byas na// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mi 'chi 'thob par 'gyur// bram ze mo'i ning nga'o snyam spangs shing // gcig pur gyur pa snying rjer mos pa dang // dring med cing 'khrig las chags bral ba// 'di la gnas shing 'di nyid la
249b8: bslabs na/ / mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'chi med 'thob// de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes 'di snyam du sems te/ tshangs pas bshad pa/ bram ze mi'i ni da de'o snyam spangs shing // zhes bya ba 'di'i don yang bdag gis kun shes na tshangs pas bshad pa/ gcig pur gyur pa
250a1: snying rjer mos pa dang / / zhes bya ba 'di 'don yang bdag gis kun shes na/ tshangs pas bshang ga dring med cing 'brig las chags bral ba// zhes bya ba 'di don yang bdag gis mi shes so snyam du bsams nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshangs pa mi'i
250a2: nang dri gang zhag lags/ / 'dzag rten kun na dgos kyis 'bab chu ltar// gang gis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can// tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes pa'o// khro dang brdzun dang khon dang rnam 'tshe dang / 'jungs dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal mi bzod dang // chags dang zhe sdang de
250a3: bzhin gti mug dang / / phrag dog ser sda dag dang 'tshig pa ste// de dag bram zim ning ding yin// 'jig rten kunan dogs kyis 'bab chu ltar// de yis bsgribs na nganas sgrib pa can// tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes so// de nas bras ze chen po gan ga lhas skyes 'di
250a4: snyam du sems te/ ji skad du bdag gis tshangs pas smras pa'i don shes pa ltar na/ khyim pa khyim na gnas pas rnga srid 'tshe'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa/ las kyis dag pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ rnam par byang ba spyad pa 'di ni sleb ma yin pas ma
250a5: la bdag sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos rur smrig bgos nas dang ba yang dag pa kho nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam mo// de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi bsam pa sems kyis shes nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ tshangs
250a6: par skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ / 'di la 'bad pa brtan par gyis// chos 'di dag pa g.yung drung yin// zhes smras nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas dbyar zla ba bzhi po dag 'das nas rgyal po rdul phran bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes gdan bder dong
250a7: ste phyin pa dang / bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / rgyal po rdul phran la bram ze chen pog nag lhas skyes kyis 'di skad ces smras so// sa bdag rgyal chen rdul phran khyod//
250a8: bdag gi tshig ni gsan par mdzod// gnag lhas skyes bdag mi spro yis// rgyal srid nyid kyis bskyad du gsol// de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis 'dod pa mi chog pa// gang yin de yang khyod la bskar// khyod la 'tshe ba de gsad kyis//

251a3: rlig pagos nas dang pa yang dag pa kho nas byam nas kyim med par bcu 'byung na shes ldan dag na byed nge'i bras bdag cag tsunabartsi ba'i dus nan rdzogs lags pas rje sas she m+b+ha spu bregs/ / gos drang smrig bgos nas dang pa nga
251a4: dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ rje'i sras rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// shes ldan dgang de'i dris la bab par shes par gyis shig/ de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyis bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la
251a5: smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni skra dang kha spu brags te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na shes ldan dag ci byed/ mkhan po bdag cag gang cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po las brten te lags kyis/ gal te
251a6: mkhan po sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos dur smrig bgos nas dang ba yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na/ mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o// shes ldan dag nga de'i dus la bab par shes par gyis shig/ 'dul skyong mkhan
251a7: dang / / glang po chel zhon pa dang / rtal zhon pa dang / shing rta ba dang / ral gri'i 'dzin stangs mkhan dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / zha 'breng byed pa dang / gor long byed pa dang / brog len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' brtul phod pa rab gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang / sems srung ba dang /
251a8: skamakhan dang / khrus byed pa du ma la smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag ni zhes bya ba nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung na zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/ mkhan po rab tu 'byung ba'i rjes
251b1: su bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/ / shes ldan dag de'i dus la dbab par shes par gyis shig/ de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // rgyal
251b2: bo rdul phran yang 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma dang sgra dang khaspu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu
251b3: byung ngo / / rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang / rgyal rigs shing sal chen po lta bu bdun dang / bram ze shing sa la chen po lta bu bdun dang / khyim bdag shing sal chen po lta bu bdun dang / thabs ri ri bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu yang sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig
251b4: bgos te/ dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo // bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam yang sgra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab tu byung ba'i rjes su
251b5: rab tu byungango / / glang po che la zhon pa dang / rta la zhon pa dang / shing rta ba dang / ral gri 'dzin stangs pa dang / gzhu 'dzin pa dang / zha'abring byed pa dang / gor long byed pa dang / bro ga len pa dang / rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba tul phod par ba gnon tshan po che dang ldan pa rnams dang /
251b6: sems srung ba dang / sbram 'an nga / khrus byed pa rnams kyang sgra dang laspu bregs nas gos rur smrig bgos te bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes rab byung ba'i rjes su rab tu byung ngo // bram ze chen pogan ga lhas skyes de ltar rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa'i sgring ba
251b7: lnga po sems nye bar nyon mongs par byang ba/ shes rab nyams chung bar byed pa/ gnod par byed pa'i phyogs dang 'thun pa/ mya ngan las ma 'do' bar byed pa rnams spangs nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems khon mod pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/
251b8: rgya chen por byung ba/ chang med pa shin du bsgoms pas phyogs cig tu mos te/ khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi ba dang / bla dang 'og dang / thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig
252a1: rten 'di thams cad byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin du bsgoms pas mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bzhin du snying rje dang /
252a2: dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin du bsgoms pas phyogs cig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de
252a3: bzhin du gsum pa dang / de bzhin du bzhi pa dang / bla dang 'og dang / thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di thams cad btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa shin du bsgoms
252a4: bas phyogs cig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/ / de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes kyi ming bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes/ bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes shes bya ba'i ming gang yin pa de nub par gyur cing / ston pa gnag lhas
252a5: skyes shes bya bar grags so/ / de nas ston pa gnag lhas skyes 'khor brgya phrag du pa dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang 'khor ba cu stong phrag du ma dang / grong rdal nas grong rdal dang / grong khyer nas grong khyer du ljongs rgya zhing dod do// de'i tshe skyes pa'am bud med dag las nyes
252a6: ba 'ga' byung na ston pa gnag lhas kyis phyogs gang na 'dug pa'i phyogs de logs suthal mo sbyar ba btud nas ston pa gnag lhas skyes de la phyag 'tshal lo/ / phyag 'tshal lo// ston pa gnag sgras skyes de bya lag/ sa pa'o ko/ gnag lhas skyes de la phyag
252a7: 'tshal lo/ / phyag 'tshal lo// zhes red du brjod pa lan gsum brjod do// mdun/ non mun DA bgang yin pa ni/ ral gris 'tsho dang tshangs sbyin dang // sna tshogs za dang de bzhinas// rdul can yul 'khor skyong gnyis gnyis// de tshe skye bo de bdun byung // ka ling kan mche ba'i
252a8: khyir/ / rdo mangs na de skem byed de// srung byed na nam he ldan// ang gang tsam pa ris su bcad// lus 'phags na ni mi thil// stad zil can nam rungs pa// bA rA Na sI ka she sta// gnag lhas skyes kyis ris bcad de'o// rgyal po chen pa rdo snyam du sems/ de'i tshe
252b1: de'i dris kyis ston pa gnag lhas skyes gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ / rgyal po chen po ngas sems can la phan pa byas pa des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo snyam na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/ 'on kyang de'i de na bla na med pa yang dag par
252b2: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu tsam dang / rkyen tsam dang / tshogs tsam yin no// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thog mar thugs gang du bskyed lags/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba rgyal po 'od ldan zhes bya ba byung ste/
252b3: de'i yul du gang po rin po che me tog kun mu ti'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ yan lag bdun shin du gnas pa/ gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa zhig byung ngo // de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas pa pho nyas bkug nas 'di skad ces
252b4: smras so/ / mkhas pa des pa khyod kyis glang po che dam pa 'di myur du legs par dul bar byos lang la phul cig/ lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes glang po che 'dul mkhan mkhas pas rgyal po 'od ldan las mnyan nas glang po che dam pa de 'dul bar byed de// de dul bar rig
252b5: nas rgyal po 'od ldan la phul te/ lha'i glang po che dam pa ni dul lags pas lhad de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// de nas rgyal po 'od ldan glang po che dam pa de la zhon te glang po'i 'dul mkhan yang gong du zhon nas ri dgas 'tshor du song ngo // ji tsam
252b6: naglang po che des nags kyi bal glang po'i dri tshir nas des dri rjes bzhin du bcugs so/ / de nas rgyal po glang po che rlu ltar mgyogs pas khyer ba dang / glang po che'i 'dul mkhan la smras pa/ kye glang po 'dul mkhan nam mkha' 'gul ba 'dra zhi daphyogs kun myur du
252b7: 'dra bar 'gro ba 'dra/ / sa ni mtha' dag 'khor mo bzhin 'khor shing rnams mkha' la 'khor ba 'dra// glang po'i dbang po gangs ri 'gro ba lta bu'i'adi rgyug mthong nas ni// ri bo 'di rgyug snyam nas ri rnams gya tsom myur du rgyug pa 'dra// kye glang po che 'dul mkhan glang po
252b8: tshe'i dbang po thul cig thul cig/ glang chen dbang po tshar gcod par// bzang po rab tu 'bad par gyis// glang chen gnye'u re ngas khyer ba yis// kho bo cir 'gyur gtol med khyer// glang po che 'dul bas smras pa/ lha drang srong dam pas smras pa'i gsang sngags
253a1: ba byad/ das sngags pas kyang gcad bad pa yang ra// 'amab rab brnams byam las su // rmang ba 'dan bdag skams thamams pan/ sa ngan/ pa sa bang bzhugs su'al// gags pa'as yang na
253a2: gis kyang / / dod chags pa 'a ngas khyer ba'i sems// char gang rnas pa pa lags so// da chags se bas kyi kA nI// bi nig/ na 'jug// dru 'ga' shig gis rgyas 'gyung la// bag shegags shi ba srung // gang ga gA
253a3: mkha de blang par dam pa de gnas thams cad du zlog par ma nus pa de'i tshe rgyal po la zlas pa/ lha glang po che 'di ni 'khrub gyis shing gi la lags 'dzus mdzad ci// de nas rgyal ba dang 'dul 'an shing ga/ yal gal 'jus te 'dugag// de nas de ga ba las tha
253a4: bde bar gyur nas rgyal pos 'dul mkhan la smras pa/ khyod kyis glang po che dam pa ma dul bar dal phul lo// des smras pa/ lha 'di bdag gis shin du dul bar bgyis te/ 'on kyang nags kyi bal glang mo'i dri tshor nas nyan du ma btub lags so// lha de lta lags mod kyi/ dpyad
253a5: dran nas ring po mi thogs par mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas glang po che de myos pa dang bral bar gyur nas zhag bdun lon pa dang dpyad rjes su dran nas rang nyid gnas su 'ongs te 'dug go/ de nas glang po che 'dul mkhan gyis rings pa rings par rgyal po la smras pa/ lha glang po
253a6: ched namachis lags so/ / rgyal bas smras pa/ khyed kyis ni 'di ma thural to// lha zla la lags so// ci mngon/ lha'i sun sngar bab par bgyil zhes de lhags kyi bu lum so ma du tshos par sregs pa zhig dbyad kyis khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams so//
253a7: dam la ga nga ga pa da / du kyi lnga pa/ sa tshum la sa so// / kyis sa pa ga ga ses pa das ga ya/
253a8: bdag gis sngar lus thul gyi sems ni ma lags so// zhes ma gsol tam/ bdag ni lus 'dul ba lags kyi/ sems 'dul ba ni ma lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ sems 'dul ba 'ga' yod par khyod kyis mthong ngam/ thos sam/ de ltas
253b1: bskul nas smras pa/ / lha lus 'dul ba dang sems 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchis so// 'dod pa'i rgyus byung nyes gzhos phyir// mang po brtson par byed mod ci// mi nus par ni shes nas kyang // brtson 'grus nyams nas ldog
253b2: par byed/ / de dang der ni de lta ba'i// 'bad pa rnam pa mang byas kyang // 'dod pa'i 'dod chags nags tshal gyi// rtsa nas byin par ma 'gyur ro// 'dod pa gzhom par 'dod pa ni// kha cig yul rnams spong bar byed// de gzhom 'dod pa gzhan dag ni/
253b3: dga' bzhin dbang po tshim par byed// lha dang lha mini mi dang seng ge stag dang sbrul dag dang // srin 'bye ba phye ma leb dang 'jig rten 'di dag kun// 'dod pa'i zhags pa shin du phra mo rnams kyis yid bcings nas// srid 'gro tho bas po 'dir ni 'khor sa
253b4: bzhin du shin du 'khor/ / bdag ni sa tshogs thabs kyis 'di lta ba// gzugs pazang phun sum tshogs pa'i mang po 'dras// rgyal po gzugs can ma lags pra sems ni// drang srong cha ba krung 'tshal bas mthul to// glung chen 'dul ba gzugs med
253b5: phra ba'i sems/ / drang srong chu klung zabs mthul na// gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur de// mi yi 'jig rten dag na yod dam kye// gang gi dbang du gzugs med sems 'gyur te// lha cig mi yi 'jig rten na mchis te// rgyal po chen po sa pa
253b6: rgyas mthu bo che/ / nyon mongs spangs pa dpa' bo stobs ldan pa// de dang gang dag de 'drar rjes 'brang ba// de'i dbang 'dir ni gzugs med sems 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi brtson 'grus dang stobs
253b7: thos nas sbyin pa dag byin/ bsod nams dag byas te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa/ sbyin pargya chen gyur pa 'di yas su// 'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba/
253b8: skye bo'i tshogs dag bdag gis bsgral bar bya// bdag gis skye dgu legs bskyangs las byung ba'am// btang ba las byung bsod nams yod pa gang // des ni sangs rgyas nyid thob 'jig rten dag/ 'dod pa'i rims nad las rab thar bar bya/
254a1: rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ des dus kyil pa 'ang ldan par pa gang mni den pa cad 'i san cidang mni/ ngas pags na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems partse dang // btsun pa
254a2: bcom ldan 'das kyis blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu bdun du gtsur ba'i phyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'a brog ma bsod snyoms bral lags/ rgyam po chen po sngon byung ba yangs pa zhes bya ba'i chung
254a3: khyer yo nga/ yangs pa'i gleng khyer du rnam khan yangs pa'i kyis b+ha ba nig byung // de tsho snyan pa / thub pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba nas bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba'i bar gang ma bzhin no// da mtshi
254a4: zung dang bzang po zung ni shA ri'i bu dang maud gal gyi bu zhes bya'o/ / rim gro byed pa ni dge slong kun dga' bo zhes bya'o// de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas ljongs rgyu zhing
254a5: gshegs pa na yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon pa dang / de rlung shas che ba'i snyun gyis thebs nas des tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od las mar dang / ti la mar dang / bu rem chu khyer te/
254a6: shog shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od gang na bder song ste phyin pa dang rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces smras so// yangs pa'i
254a7: 'ad shes par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das rlung shas che ba'i sun gyis thebs te/ de la mar dang / til mar dang / bu ram chu dgos so// de nas rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo las mnyan nas mar dang /
254a8: til mar dang / bu ram chu khyer te bu dang lhan cig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin pa dang / mar dang / til mar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byugs nas chu 'jam pos sku khrus byas te/ bu ram chu'i
254b1: btung pa gsol to/ / des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA thub pa bzod cing 'tsha bar gyur to// de nas rnam khan yangs pa'i 'od kyis de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas smon lam gdub par brtsams pa/ bdag kyang ra
254b2: da sa shA gas kyi na gis dang sa ga nyam pa'i sas rgyas nyi nga/ / dgags tshas par 'jig na // par na chen gas ma snga /
254b3: sh-in ya / ngag di nag gas sadapa'i tshas rnams rtags pa dang / bam ldan kyi ma byed pa gyur ci/ ca sas// nas rgya dus mas/ de du kyi rnam na mdas pa'i 'ag
254b4: yin pa de ni de nyid yin te/ de dngas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAHthub pa la thog mang bsod snyoms thul lo// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bu gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no/
254b5: 'dul bag ni/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa/ btsu pa bcom ldan 'das kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du gnyer ba'i slang du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis lags/
254b6: rgyal po chen po ro shig grangs med pa dang po la/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nas// 'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar// 'dren pa bdun khri lnga stong gi// sangs rgyas rnams ni ngas mchod do// grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi// rgyal ba
254b7: ngas na mchod byas te/ sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod pa'i phyir// ngal skyo ba'i sems mad do// rgyal po chen po grangs med pa gnyis pa la ni/ sangs rgyas mang me mdzad nas ni// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan thub pa'i bar// bdun khri drug stong de dag ni// sangs rgyas
254b8: rnams na nga yis mchod/ / grangs med gnyis po tshang bar ni// rgyal bar yis mchod byas te// skye ba de dang de dag tu// dal skyo ba'i sems med do// grangs med pa gsum pa la yang / sangs rgyas legs mdzad nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas
255a1: 'a byung bar dgraH/ / bdun bdun stong nga y-i.u chod// grangs sa gsus pa lan// rgyal ba san pa dzad byas// byang chub kya sgru ba na// nang sa byasems cad// ngan byang chub sems dpa' na/ sangs
255a2: rgyas mchog ni de ga mchod/ / 'jig rten 'dren pa de kun gyis// nga ni sangs rgyas nyid du bstan// ngas na sngon bsams gang yin pa// ngan smon lam thams cad rdzogs// ngas ni sangs rgyas khur por // / sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung //
255a3: de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rjes su yi rang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo zas phyag byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas sangs rgyas
255a4: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos zhus pa/ 'jig rten gtso bo rnam 'dren pa// thub pa khyod kyi byung chub thugs// thog mar gang du bskyed pa dag/ skal ldan chen po podag la gsungs// khyod sngon byang chub spyod pa na// sangs
255a5: rgyas ji snyed dus gang du/ ji lta bur ni bsnyen bkur mdzad/ mi mchog de ni bdag la gsungs// kun dga' bo yi tshig gsan nas// rkang gnyis dam pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro la thugs rje mdzad nas su/ thub pas byang chub spyod pa
255a6: gsungs/ / sangs rgyas 'dod chags bral thos shing // glang po dregs pa'i shas chen dang // 'jig rten sdug bsngal bur mthong nas// ngas ni byang chub sems bskyed do// mi dbang 'od ldan gyur pa na// ngas ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir// ngas ni brtan
255a7: por dam bcas te/ / spyod med pa yi sbyin pa btang // nga ni rngam khan gyur pa na// sangs rgyas shAkya thub mthong nas// byang chub byir ni thog ma rangs/ mar dang til mar gyis mchod do// sngon gyi lci ba gzhan dag tu// tshong dpon bu mor gyur pa na/
255a8: sangs rgyas kau rgya mthong nas// ngas ni mar po'i sbyin pa byas// sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thul ba'i// nga sngon sde snod gsum pa las// dge slong dge 'dun rtsod pa la/ dge 'dun la ni bud med smras// tshig gnyis byas byung bas na// mod la
255b1: bud med nyid du gyur/ / slar yang sems dang byas pas ni// skyes pa nyid ni thob par gyur// sngon gyi skye ba gzhan dag tu// nga ni rgyal po'i sras gyur tshe// gcen po rin chen gtsug tor la// mar me'i sbyin pas mchod byas shing //
255b2: ngasan zla gsum drug bcu ru// bde badzad kyi ni nam ring byas// ngas ni mya ngan 'das pa de'i// mchod rten lani nor kun pul// nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na// sgra stan dbyangs la zla gsum mchod// de yi mchod rten mthon po ni// dgu bcu rtsagacig rtsig
255b3: tu bcug/ ngan bram zer gyur ba na// sangs rgyas dpal 'byung mthong nas dga'// legs par ngal sbyar de nas yang // mimachog la ni mchod pa byas// nga sngon tham zer gyur pa na// bstan bcos dum 'jigs med che/ sangs rgyas pan par/
255b4: bzhed mdzad pa/ nga yi stan la spyan drangs so// sngon ni dka' thub ldan pa yi// drang srong chos la gnas gyur tshe// sangs rgyas kauN+Di n+ya mthong nas// ngas ni ri bi'i kha nas mchongs// drang srong gyur na'ang yid dga' bas// sangs rgyas blta na sdug
255b5: mthong nas/ / rtsa ba dang ni 'bras bu'i phyir// bsti gnas bzhugs pangs spyan drangs// 'jigs rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la/ drang srong gyur che bkur sti byas// shing shun yid du 'ong ba yis// ngas ni mi yi mchog bkab po// nga ni rgyal por gyur
255b6: ban/ yan lag bzhi pa'i dpungasras nas// byang chub 'dod pa'i ched drungs// yul 'khor byung gyi/ zham 'grod byas// sangs rgyas shAH thub pa nas// 'dren pa yul 'khor skyong gi bar// bdun khri dang ni sde stong gi/ sangs rgyas rnams
255b7: lang yos mchod/ / grangs me gcig ni 'as pa'i// rgyal ba sa nim chon byas te// byang chub phyir ni spyod pan// de tshong la sgra sems med// grangs med pa dang po'o// bram ze khye'u gyur dam che// 'od dang thags par ldan pa yi// sangs rgyas
255b8: mang sa mdzad mthong nas/ / ut+pal sngon po bdun gyis mchod// ngan rgyal por gyur ban// dka' thub spyod ces bya ba yi// sangs rgyas mtshan ma da' mthong nas ni// mi mchog la ni bla res mchod// rgyal por gyur tshe mun 'joms pa'i//
256a1: skal chen lan rin po che// sna tshogs bkraba'i rol ma yi// mchod pa dgags bzhengs gsol to// kun dga' mi dbang gyur pas// sang ga seng ge'i rtsal mnga' la// rin chen yub can gdugs kyis// mi mchog
256a2: pan bachod pa byas/ / rgyal por gyur tshe grong khyer ni// stong phrag drug bcu rnams su yang // ma yi nyim bde mdzad ni// spyan drangs nas ni mchod pa byas// 'jig rten 'dren pa mi dbang la// bsro lang las dang de bzhin du// a gang nag
256a3: po'i ri dag gis/ / bram zer gyur tshe zham 'bring byas// grong khyer rgyal srid 'phel bar ni// bram ze'i sangs rgyas sum btsug// gtsug tor can zhes 'jig rten grags// rgyal por zur tshe mchod pa byas// grong khyer 'bras 'phel dag tsa
256a4: ni/ sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa lnga la// nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa na// tshangs par spyad pas mchod pa byas// grong khyer dga' ba de nyid du// nga ni tshong dpon gyur pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas gtsug tor 'jig rten grags/ gtsug lag khang gis mchod pa byas//
256a5: tshong dpon gyur tshe rgyal ba drug/ mchod phyir glang chen rtag ser dang // bud med rnams dang nor bu yi// rgyan gyis bskyed mos tshal byas so// rgyal por gyur tshe dad pa yis// grong khyer yid 'ong de nyid du// byang chub don du gnyer ba ngas/ gtsug/
256a6: tor can la skra bregs so// kun dga' bram zer gyur pa na// thub chen ma 'gags de la ni// byang chub don du gnyer ba das// 'bras bu mchog gis mchod pa byas// tshong dpon du ni gyu ra ba na// 'jig rten 'dren pa spyan mdzes la// nor bu
256a7: rin chen gyis mchod cing / / gtsug lag khang ni nyams dgas mchod// ded dpon du na gyur pa na// byang chub shing gi drung na na// sangs rgyas legs 'khrungs bzhugs mthong nas// thog mar bsod snyoms la spyan drangs// nga ni ded dpon bu ra pa na//
256a8: byang chub shing drung thub pa ni// 'jig rten dga' mdzad blo bzang mthong // 'o ni stong dang ba byung/ ni da po byung pa// sangs rgyas tsan dan 'od dpag med// chu 'dzam dang ni ti le mar dang // bu ram la ni spyan drangs so// kun dga' rgyal por gyur pa na/
256b1: tshangs sbyin grags pa chen po pa// 'dren pa la ni zhal zas dang // thams cad sbyin pas mchod pa byas// bram zer yang ni gyur pa na// thugs rje chen po 'od zer can// thub pa rkang gnyis mchog mthong nas// smra ba'i rgyal mtshan gyis mchod do//
256b2: rgyal por gyur nas sangs rgyas ni// don dam gzigs pa grong mchog tu// 'jug pa de la ta la yi// lo ma'i bsil yab mchod pa byas// da ni tsheng dpon gyur pa na// 'jig rten gsal mdzad sangs rgyas ni// shAkya thub la me tog gi/ sil ma sna tshogs
256b3: dri sbyar mchod/ / grong khyer mchog tu mthor 'phags pa'i// mi mchog 'jug par mthong nas ni// rol mo rnams kyi sgra dag dang / me tog rnams kyis mchod pa byas// rgyal por gyur tshe dang ba yis// sangs rgyas dam pa zhes bya ba// srid pa'i mtsho las rgal
256b4: ba la/ / thog mar shing rta dag gis bstabs// ngan rgyal por gyur pa na// gtso bo'i ched du lam bstan cing // dpag tshad brgya ni gang bar yang // me tog khang brtsegs mchod pa byas// sangs rgyas dgra zhe mdzad pa ni// grong khyer gshegs
256b5: shes ngas thos nas/ / lam ni rgyal mtshan yongs bkang ste// rgyal po'i 'byor pas bsu ba byas// nga ni mnyan par gyur pa na// shing rta'i yan lag chu 'gram du// byon pa ngas ni mthong nas ni// thub pa chu yi rgyun las bsgral// ded dpon gyur
256b6: tshe dang pa yis/ / shing rtaskal ldan chen po ni// ngas ni gru zam btags nas kyang // mtsho chen las ni bsgral ba byas// da ni rgyal por gyur pa na// rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas ni// tshangs la tsan dan sa mchog gi/ ka bar ldan pa'i
256b7: khang pas mchod/ / rgyal por gyur tshe sangs rgyas ni// bcom ldan tshangs pa'i tshe mchod cing // snam sbyar rgyal mtshan bsgreng nas ni// das ni yams kyi nid zhi byas// tsan dan ldan la tshar med tshe// rgyal po lta bu'i sku khrus byas// de tshe lhas na
256b8: char phab pas/ / skye bo rnams ni skyabs su dong // nga ni rgyas por gyur pa na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan zla ba la// mchod nas dra ni byams bsgoms pas// bdud kyis btang ba'i yams nang ni// mi yi dbang por sngon gyur te// dang ni byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas
257a1: dbang po 'dul ba la/ / cho 'phrul phyir ni gsol ba btab// rgyal po dag tu gyur pa na// rin chen ri bo 'od chen ldan// 'khor ni brgya stong phrag mang po// mthong nas lo lngar mchod pa byas// bram zer gyur tshed dpa yis//
257a2: sangs rgyas dan kun sgrub pa ni// mtshan dang ldan pa mthong nas kyang // ngas ni bstod pa lnga brgya byas// bram zer gyur tshe yid dga' bas// sangs rgyas dbang po rgyal mtshan mthong // ngas ni thal mo legs sbyar te// dam pa stsol ba'i 'os zhes gsol//
257a3: sangs rgyas mar me mdzad pa nas// thub pa dbang po'i rgyal mtshan par// bdun khri dang ni drug stong gi/ sangs rgyas rnams ni da yis mchod// grangs med gnyis pa tshang bar ni// rgyal ba yis mchod byas te// byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na// de tsheng la
257a4: skyo sems med/ / grangs med pa gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas pad mdzad dam pa la/ rgyal por gyur tshe mchod byas te// myang ngan 'das nas mchod rten brtsigs// rgyal srid rab tu zhi bar byas// rgyal por gyur tshe dang pas ni// sangs rgyas gang po ri skong la// tshul
257a5: dang 'dra bar mchod byas te/ / chos kyi rgyal po zhes bsgrags so// sangs rgyas thams cad zil gnan la// tshong dpon gyur tshe legs par ni// rim gro byas shing mi mchog la// de bzhin gser gyi me tog gtor// da ni tshong dpon gyur pa na// sangs
257a6: rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can/ / thub chen grong mchog gshegs de la// gser gyi drabs mchod pa byas// da ni tshong dpon gyur pa na// pad ma dam pa dpa' chen po// rgyal por grags pa'i grong mchog tu// dngul gyi me tog si lams gtor/
257a7: nga ni bram zer gyur pa na// sangs rgyas grags mchog slob ma yi// dge 'dun gyis ni mdun bltas pa// mthong nas mi mchog gnas kyis mchod// nga ni rgyal por gyur pa na// legs gsung byang chub shing drung du// bzhugs pangs mthong glang po
257a8: te/ / shing rtang brang bu chung gis bsrungs// sangs rgyas dri med thub chen la// tshong dpon gyur tshe bsro khang dang // mchod rten las dang mar mes ni// de yi tshan rnam par mchod// sangs rgyas sang mdzad rdol ba steng // snyoms par zhugs pa mthong
257b1: nas ni/ / dad pas rol mo'i sme kun dang // rgyal po'i 'thor bas bzhengs gsol to// tsheng dpon du na gyur ba na// 'jig rten dga' mdzad dgra thul ba// sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pan// lam ni mA tshogs brgyan pas mchod// tshong dpon nur che yang dgapa/
257b2: bas// gnas 'jog gshegs pa thos nas ni// bskyed pos tshal ni brgyan byas nas// ngas ni gtsug lag khang brtsigs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan skar 'od la// byang chub 'dod pas dad pasangs/ rgyal po'i mdzod ni thams cad nas// nor bu rin chen rnams kyis/
257b3: mchod// nga ni rgyal por gyur ba'i tshe// tog gis bdun rnams bcom nas ni// chos kyi rgyal srid bsgrags pa na// ngas ni rgyal mtshan lon btsugs// b+ha ra d+ha dza blo ldan pa// bram ze mya ngan 'das pa la// rgyal po'i nges ni ril ba dang // dbyug gu gtsug la/
257b4: khang chen byas// da ni ded dpon gyur pa na// sangs rgyas 'dren pa don gzigs pa// gser dang nor bu mu tig dang // drin yi snying po rnams kyis mchod// sangs rgyas don kun sgrub pa ni// sangs rgyas spyod pas gshegs pa na// rgyal por gyur tshe dpung
257b5: dag gi/ / tshogs kun gyis ni mchod pa byas// sangs rgyas don dam gzigs pa ni// grong khyer dam par gshegs pa na// rgyal por gyur tshe rol mo dang // me tog kun gyis mchod pa byas// da ni ded dpon gyur pa na// sangs rgyas skar rgyal rkang gnyis mchog/
257b6: dra yi snying po de bzhin du// rtsa ba'i dri rnams rab du gtor// rin chen bkra ba'i phug na yang / sangs rgyas kang rgyal las nings// de tshe tshigs bcad gcig bstod pas// bskal pa dguni phyir bsnyil to// 'bru 'tshong du ni gyur pa na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan rnam/
257b7: gzigs la// de tshe byang chub spyod pa'i phyir// mudag spar gang bul bas mchod// tshong dpon zur tshangs mchod pa// sangs rgyas mchog ni gtsug tor can// thub pa nyan thos tshogs bcas pa// zhal zas kyis ni zla gsum mchod// tsheng dpon du/
257b8: ni gyur pa'i tshe// 'jig rten 'dren pa thams cad skyob// skal chen nyan thos bcas pa la// zhal zas kyis ni gus par mchod// tshong dpon gyur tshe dad pa yis// sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig pa ni// bdog pa kun la spyan drangs nas// tshangs par spyod
258a1: b+h+ya ma zlas gang/ / 'dag na byu na// ya gas sargyasags sa// gdugalag yang nas dadams// byam med pa na pa chung / tham than mams// gas/ can chags nas// 'a
258a2: rkang gnyis mchog las ni/ / btu 'byung ba'i thobaskyed do// byams pa drang srong byur ba na// rgyal por byur nas rim 'grobs// byas pa gzo ba rjes dran nas// des ning la slar mchod de// gang yang sangs rgyas bde mdzad nas// sangs rgyas 'od srung bar
258a3: dra ni/ / ngas ni bdun ze bdan stong ga/ rgyal ba rnams ni mchod pa zlas// thas med gsum po tshang bar ni// rgal ba sa ni mchod byas te// sngon ni byang chub spyod pa na// dal skyo ba'i sems med do// nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i u0f7f// sa a sa
258a4: mchog ni de rnams mchod/ / ni de dag thams cad kyis// 'jig rten bdun du lung bstan to// ngas ni sngon bsams gang yin pa// nga yi smon lam thams cad rdzogs// ngas ni sangs rgyas khur bor te// sems can rnams ni rjes su gzung // shi ba'i
258a5: rgyal por gyur tshe/ / sbyin pa dag ni thams cad btang // nga ni dus dpog gyur ba'i tshe// sbyin pa'i pha rol byin pa rdzogs// rgya mtsho tshod par gyur pa na// tshul khrims pha rol phyin don du// srog chags rnams ni ma btang zhing // ngas ni rang gi srog
258a6: btang ngo / / rnga sngon drang srong gyur pa na// bzod pa'i pha rol rdzogs bya'i phyir// yan lag rnams ni btubs pa yis// nga yis bzod pa yongs su rdzogs// mi ma yin mo'i skye rabs dang // de bzhin gyi mtsho bskems pa dang // de bzhin bdag ni bden dga' ba'i//
258a7: brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa rdzogs// sman chen blon por gyur pa dang // gnag lhas skyes su dgyur tshe// shes rab pha rol phyin rdzogs nas// de bzhin rnga bo che yang bsgrags// bram ze rab 'bar bur ba na// ral bar 'dab chags tshad bcas kyang // bsamagan/
258a8: las ni ma langs par// bsam gtan pha rol byin brtson byas// snying rje yongs su bsgoms byas shing // pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs pas// khur lci ba ni ngas bor te// dam bcas pa yang rdzogs par byas// nga rang sangs rgyas gang 'phrad nas// mchod pa byas pa'i mi
258b1: mnan/ / debran ma ngan gas pa gagags// ngan sa chu la ldan pa// rnal la ldan pa yin sa/ ba dang yo rgyal mtshan / sem can zan ga na// srad pa mthams partul bar byas// 'ad na ma rnams na pa/
258b2: sas rgyas te lha ming bcas// 'dig rten 'di ni bskal ba dang // sgrol ba mdzad pa smos ci gos// ngas ni 'dig rten don gyi phyir// mya ngan 'das nang chos kyi gra// brtan pa dag ni bca' byas te// brgya stong phrag ni bsgral bar bya// mi gang sangs rgyas smrapas
258b3: song ning / / mya ngan 'das kyang sangs rgyas la// zab byed pa'i skyes bu de// 'jig rten dag ni sbrid de ba// gang dag de bzhin gshegs thal la// bya ba cung zad byed na 'dang // mtho ris sna tshogs bgrod nas ni// bdud rtsi'i go 'phang 'thob par gyur// yang dag ni
258b4: bzhin 'di thos nas/ / dge ba bungs ni bskyed de bya// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'og tu// srid pa'i rgya mtshor 'khyams sa re// sangs rgyas mang po'i skabs rdzogs so// sangs rgyas 'od ldan dang / shAkya thub pa dang / kauN+Di n+ya dang / 'jig rten 'dren dang / gzhan gyis
258b5: mi thub dang / rin chen gtsug tor dang / bide mdzad dang / sgra snyan dang / dpal 'byung dang / phan bzhed dang / kauN+Di n+ya dang / blta na sdug dang / spyan mdzes dang / yul 'khor skyong dang / mar me mdzad dang / dka' thub mdzad dang / mun sel dang / bede mdzad
258b6: dang / dbang chen dang / gtsug tor can dang / ma 'gags pa dang / spyan mdzes dang / legs 'thungs dang / yid bzangs dang / tsan ldan dang / tshangs sbyin dang / 'od zer can dang / don dam gzigs dang / shAkya thub pa dang / 'thor 'phags dang /
258b7: dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / dag zhi mdzad dang / shing rta'i yan lag dang / skal ldan shing rta dang / tshangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i tshe dang / tsan dan dang / dbang po dang / dbang po dul dang / rin chen ri bo dang / don thams cad grub pa dang / tha mdabang po'i rgyal mtshan
258b8: dang / bzod pa mdzad dang / rdzogs ldan dang / thams cad zil gnon dang / rin chen gtsug pud dang / pad ma dam pa dang / grags pa dam pa dang / gsung stan dang / dri ma med dang / sad mdzad dang / dgra thul dang / gnas 'jog dang / skar 'od dang / tog dang /
259a1: du so dang / nA nga/ do ga gas dang / do pa gags dang/ do sa sa ga dang / 6 dang / ga la dang / rnam pa ga dang/ gan to na dang / thams cad khyo dang / sog pa da mes dang / se dpa'
259a2: s+yAng dang / shAHu0f89u0fa4 pa dang / tha ma byams pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rnams rdzogs s+ho// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bkur sti byas/ tha ma dbyas shes byu ba god ma bzhin ste/ de nyan thos kyid / 'dun dang mnyan yodan rgyal du rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon ma pa s
259a3: byin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyurab tu mang po rtog lang du lhags shing 'dus bar gyur nas skabs kyi gtam 'di lta bu dge slong bar byed de/ shes ldan dag shes par bgyis shig/ sngon bdag cag la rgyal po dang / blon po dang /
259a4: bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / grong ma dang / yul mi dang / tshor pa dang / tshong dpon dang / ded dpon rnams kyis bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas pas gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyang rnyed pa las/ da ni dge sbyong go/
259a5: ta ma 'jig rten du byung ba la bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed ces bya ba nas sman dang yo byad rnams shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin no// des na da ltar bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad na/ de la nga bdag cag gis ji ltar bya//
259a6: de nab cig gis smras pa/ tshangs par spyod pa la mi tshangs par spyod pa skyon yin pas de la skyon 'di gdags so// kha cig gis smras pa/ ji lta bu zhig bya/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gi nang na kun du rgyu gzugs bzang mo mdzes pa blta na sdug pa gang yin pa de lta sring mo
259a7: dag d+hAr dge sbyong gau tam la skur bathob ceg ces spro bar bya'o/ / bdag cag gi nang na kun du sdu gzugs pazang mo mdzes pa bstan sdug pa gang yin/ bram ze'i bu ma n+ta mo yin no// de la spro ba bskyed do zhes de rnams kyis de po nyas bkug ste smras pa/ sring mo shes par gyis shig/
259a8: sngon ni bdag cag gis bkur sti dang zhes bya ba nas nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams shes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o// nga ni dge sbyong gau ta ma 'jig rten du byung bas/ 'jig rten de la bkur sti byed pas bdag cag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad kyi thams cad du chad par gyur na khyod
259b1: ngas pa yo nan na ma pa/ gas mdas kyi shas/ zas kyangs nyi sa mi du stog/ tupa pa po mo pan pa nga don yod pa pa sa pa sto de/ pa sa /
259b2: da kwa sngon gyi bzhin du 'byungango // dend ces smras pa dang / bla ma ba'i ma gron d+ha ches gzhan gas ca dang / kun du d+ha ba tu mang po la 'di na ces smras so// 'bags pa dag da skyong go tam lda byu pa 'bas par dag mi slo// phreng mo rjod dzim du ge spyong tom/
259b3: khra das 'dra / ga ma u0f7f/ ses pa u0f7f/ ba ra gyi// mabang gi ba tsad pyod na da 'du gamigs / khyod da kyi du san sems na rgya rnas pa skyeb rgyas da g
259b4: nas de yod do/ / bu med ni shes rabachung bayin pas smag nas smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis ji lta buzhig gyi/ sring mo khyod rtul bu rgya byed kyi tshal durkun du song 'dus thag tsom lon nas dge sbyong gau tam la srur batho shig/ de nyimar shing rgyal brgyal byed kyi tsham
259b5: du song ngo / / dziHma na stsol snod cig bcangs nas bcom ldan 'das gangan ba der song ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i gung la chos 'chad cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze'i bu mo kun du hU~M N+De me rgyang ring po lon nas gzigs so// gcigs nas kyang
259b6: 'di snyam du dgongs te/ de nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su sgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba rnams gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i bu mo kun tu d+hu rnam ma
259b7: ldan 'das kyis spyan sngang 'dug nas gsol pa/ bdag ni 'dir skul bgyis nas// chags par 'gyur shing dgi 'gyur la// stan cing 'jebs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis// da lta chos ni gsung mdzad dam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ yang dag min pasmrab dmyal bar 'gro//
259b8: bram ze'i bu mo rtse mos gsol pa/ gang gis byas nas ma byas zhes smra'am// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dman pa'i chos can ma ning gnyis// pha rol dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma'o bram ze'i bu mo d+ha mi 'di ni bcom
260a1: ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la yun ring mo nas tho 'tsham par byed do snyam du bsams nas rdzu 'phrul gyis snod de sa la ltung bar byas so/ / de nas bram ze'i bu mo rtse me skyengs nas rings pa rings par slar song ngo // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams
260a2: kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la chos kyi dbang du bgyi ba'i bka' mchid kyang bka' stsal/ kang du thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs skyed pa yang lung bstan/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
260a3: rgyas ji snyed cig la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa yang bka' stsal lags pas ci nas bdag cag mtsho chen po ma dros par mchis la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la
260a4: cad mi gsung bas gnang ngo / / chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'tsho zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi gdon mi za bar mdzad pa ni bcu ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ ji srid sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa dang / sems can 'gas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
260a5: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gdul bar bya ba thams cad btul ba dang / nyan thos kyi mchog zung gcig tu bstan pa dang / mtshams bcad pa dang / sku tshe'i lngan btang ba dang / mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam
260a6: par bstan pa dang / grong khyer gsal bar lha las gshegs pa bstan pa dang / yab dang yum gnyis bden pa dag la bkod pa dang / mtsho chen po ma dros par nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba bstan pa ma mdzad pa de srid du sangs rgyas bcom
260a7: ldan 'das rnams yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/ / don 'di la ni bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig mtsho chen po ma dros par sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mtsho chen po ma dros pa
260a8: gangan bar 'dod/ der rang rang gi sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bya'o// btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa lnga brgyad gcig gis mtshad pa dang thabs gcig tu
260b1: mnyan yod nas mi snang bar byur te mtsho chen po ma dros pa dgashegs so/ / gnod sbyin gdus pa gnas pa yid 'ong zhing // me ton snga tshogs shing gis rnam par mdzes byas pa// de las rgyam tshodu can dag tu 'grob yi// nu bo ban po 'didag phyogs pa de sa
260b2: gang gA srin du de bzhin pag shu dang / / si ta de la rdzu 'phrul stobs thob pa// ma gtogs mi rnams kyis ni mi bzod pa// deng ni thub pa dge 'dun bcas par bzhugs// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad de/ chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas
260b3: bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad pa de'i tshe srog chags srog srung yan chad kyi sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes par 'gyur bas/ de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyer dga' bo gnyis kyis bsams pa/ ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das
260b4: kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam na/ mtsho chen po ma dros par las kyi chu ba lung bstan par bzhed par mthong ngo // de nas de gnyis kyis mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i nang du pad ma mdab ma stong dang ldan pa zhi 'i sang cos bzang po thams cad gser las byas pa/ sdong po
260b5: nirin po che/ ges ni rdo rje las byas pa/ pad ma stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor bzhig sprul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la pad ma'i snying po de la bzhugs so// dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang pad ma gzhan rnams kyi snying
260b6: pol 'khod do/ / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bya rgod kyi phung po'i di la snam sbyar 'drub po// de na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu song la rab tu byung ba'i zla bo khrid de shog shig/ btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal
260b7: zhes tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po poche chen po madros pa nas mi snang bar gyur cing byanod kyi phung po'i ri la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ston pa dgra bcom pa lnga brgyad gcig gis mtshang ba dang thabs gcig tu mtsho
260b8: chen po ma dros pa na sngon gyi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan par bzhed nas khyod la gzhes kyis tshur shog 'dod/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po re shig snam sbyar drubs la de nas phyis 'gro'o// des smras pa/ grogs bya'o// de bzhin du gyis shig/ de nas
261a1: tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos rdzu 'phral gyis sor mo lnga char gyis dra ba par brtsams pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'o na lta dra ba zin du zad mod/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gal te khyod mi 'gro na mthus
261a2: bkur bar bya'o/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ske rags rgyacang grol nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi bathu can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa yin no/ re shig khyod kyis 'di khyer la de la de nas byis kho bo khyer cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan
261a3: pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'di ni mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin pas gal te 'di khyer bar 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod do snyam nas des de bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri'i spyi la gtags so// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de
261a4: drangs pa dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 'gul bar gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ 'dis bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri yang khyer bar 'gyur gyis/ ma la bdag gis ri'i rgyal po ri rab la gdags so snyam nas/ des de ri'i rgyal po ri rab la btags pa las/ yang
261a5: tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos de drangs pa dang / ri'i rgyal po ri ra ba dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dag kyang g.yos par gyur/ ma dros pa yang kun nas 'khrugs shing dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyang ldeg par gyur nas pad ma'i snying po la 'dug
261a6: bzhin du de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ci'i slad du kwa'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dga' bo dang nye dga' bo gnyis g.yos pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang nyan thos chen po
261a7: gnyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul par byed do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'di yang khyer bar 'gyur gyis/ mal bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi pad ma'i sdong po la gdags so snyam nas/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi pad ma'i
261a8: sdong po la btags pas ma 'gul bar 'dug go/ gang gi tshe de'i rdzu 'phrul la rdzu 'phrul gyis rdugs pa de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse ba byas zin gyis tshur shog 'dod//
261b1: tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po song shig dang kho bo 'ong ngo zhes byas nas je srid tshe dang ldan pa maud dgal gyi bu chen po la byin pa de'i bar du na dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sdang phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyinapas gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te pad ma'i snying po la 'dug
261b2: ba dang / de'i 'og tu cha dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po byin pas pa dang ldan pa shA ri'i bru mthong nas des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri 'bru 'ongs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa kho bo 'angs so// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshomathams cad gcod pa sangs
261b3: rgyamabatsham ldan das 'thus pa/ btsun pabacom ldan das kyis rjodang ldan maud gas man can pa tu phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi la chog tu bstan pa lags na/ ma nga ldan pa shA shru d+hA b+hal tsas pam par c+doMs lag ga/
261b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung du ba gu su ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung ngo // de dgos pa 'ga'
261b5: zhig gis phyir yul dbus nas yul nas can zhes bya bar song ngo / / de de na 'khrul 'khor gyi sgyu rtsal gyi slob dpon zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa las/ des de ngal ba'i rim gro bar 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig byas nas btang ngo // des de'i rkang pa gnyis bkrus
261b6: nas 'dug go/ de nas des song shig ces smras na/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ des bsams pa/ gdon ma zos par 'di bdag dang dga' mgur spyad pa'i phyir btang ngo snyam nas/ des de'i lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pa las ji tsam na zhi gnas shing thul gyi
261b7: phung por gyur to/ / de spangs nas bsams pa/ bdag gcig bu zhig tu skyengs par byas kyis/ mal bdag gis ni 'di rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par bya'o snyam nas/ des sgo'i ngos logs la rang gi gzugs brnyan 'gegs pa zhig bris te/ sgo
261b8: phag tu yib nas 'dug go/ de ldang ba'i dus gang yin pa de las thal ba dang / de nas 'khrul 'khor gi sgra rtsal gyi slob dpon gyis bsams pa/ ring zhig lon na ci'i phyir de sgor ma byung snyam du bsams nas der song ba las ji tsam na 'gegs te shi ba
262a1: mthong ngo / / des bsams pa/ ci'i phyir 'dis bdag nyid srog dang bral bar byas snyam pa las des 'khrul 'khor zhig nas shing thul gyi phung por 'dug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag nyid skyengs pas 'gegs so snyam mo// yul nas
262a2: can gyi kun du spyod pa ni gang su'i khyim yang rung der mi glo bur ba shin ji srid rgyal po la ma mi thol pa de srid du des de la rame gro ma byed do/ / de nas de rgyal po'i drung du song ste bathol ba/ lha yul dbus nas ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon 'ag mchis te de bdag gi
262a3: sdum par gnas pa las/ de la bkur sti bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis 'khrul 'khor las bu mo zhig bgyis te btang ba dang / des de lag pa nas bzung ste drangs pas shing gi phung por mchis pa dang / de skyengs nas bdag nyid 'gegs lags na/ lha de la
262a4: g.yar snga 'drim bzhig gtang du gso'o/ / de nas bdag gis rim bkyi lags so// de nas rgyal pos no shas 'tshe ba rnams la bsgob shes ldan dag deng la g.yar snga rims shig/ de na mas dong nas de mthong ngo // des bsams pa/ bdag gis ji lta bur
262a5: nga las dbab par bya snyam mo/ / gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'geg thag cha nga/ sta re khyer te thag pa gcod par brtsams pa las ji tsam na/ rtsig pa yin par mthong nas/ de nas 'khrul 'khor mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to// de de ltar skyengs
262a6: par gyur ba dang / ri mo mo 'an maso ba dpon de sgo stog nas phyung ste smras pa/ kye nang rje khyod kyis ni kho bo gcig bu zhig tu sbrengs par byas te/ khyod ni rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa'i nang du skyengs par byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus
262a7: kyi ri mo mkhan gyi blo dpon gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas so// da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di bzos pham par byas pa de nyon cig/
262a8: dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri 'ong gzhan zhig na ri mo mkhan ci slob dpon gnyis shig byung ba las rtsod par gyur te// gcig gis smras pa/ nga ni bzo legs par shes so// gcig shos kyis smras pa/ da ni de bas kyang lhag par legs par shes so//
262b1: de gnyis phan tshun 'gran par gyur nas rgyal po'i drung du dong ste de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugasagacig gis smras pa/ lha bdag na bzo legs par 'chal to// gcig shos kyis kyang smras pa/ lha bdag ni debs kyang lhag par
262b2: legs par 'chal to/ / rgyal pos gnyis la sgo khang bstan nas khyed gnyis gang mkhas ni ngas mi shas mod ci/ 'on kyang gcig gis na rtog ngos gcig la bris la/ gcig shos kyis kyang gcig la bris shig dang / de ltan khyed cig gnyis gad ba za legs
262b3: par shes pa das legs par shes par 'gyur ro/ / de gnyis kyi par yol bas bcad nas rim bring brtsams te/ de la gcig gas ni zla ba drug gis ri mo'i las zin to// gcig shos kyis ni zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar to// ri ma'i las zin pa gang yin
262b4: pa de rgyal po'i drung du song ste son pa dang / smras pa/ lha bdag gi ri mo'i las bgyis lags na sbyang brim du gsol/ de nas rgyal po blon po dang lhan cig sgor byung nas mthong ba dang / ri me'i las mkhas so zhes shin du mgu'o// gcig shos kyis kyang rkang pa
262b5: gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ da bdag gi ri me'i las la gzigs su gsol/ des bar chad kyi yol ba bshus pa dang / gcig gis gzugs brnyan de la shar ba rgyal pos mthong nas ri mo'i las la lhag par 'di mkhas so zhes shin du ya mtshan skyes
262b6: so/ / de nas des slar yol bas par bcad nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/ lha 'di na ri me'i las ma lags te/ 'on kyang rtsig ngos bstar pa lags so// de nas rgyal po je ya mtshan skyes nas smras pa/ 'di ni bzol lhag par mkhas pa
262b7: yin no/ / dge slong dag ji sum du sems/ gang gis zla ba drug tu rtsig ngos bstar ba de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no// gang gis zla ba drug tu ri me'i las byas pa de ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di
262b8: bzos zam par byas so/ / da ltar yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis 'di pham par byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bA rA Na sI'i grong khyer du drang srong dung dang / bris pa shes bya ba gnyis shig nye bar rten
263a1: cid gnas so/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na lhas char phab pas rdzab du gyur te/ drang gro dang rdzab du rdeg 'chos nas ril ba chag par gyur to// de nas des dmod pa bor ba// rang bzhin dan pa khyod kyis dpan chad lo bcu gnyis su
263a2: char mi 'bebs par gyur cig ces byas so/ / rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang bArAN swen gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis thos nas/ de nas de rnams de'i drung du songs gsol ba btab pa/ drang srong chen po de ltar ma mdzad cig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis rang bzhin
263a3: ngan pa bzod par mi nus te/ bdag gi sad mod pas bcom pa des lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bebs par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin dang / skye bo'i tshogs des bris pa la gsol ba btab nas des gsol ba byas te lhas char phab po// dge slong
263a4: dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong dung gang yin pa de ni dge slong maud gal gyi bu 'di nyid yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bris pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu yin te/ de na yang 'dis 'di rdzu 'phrul gyis pham par byas so// gzhan yang ji ltar
263a5: 'dis 'di rngu 'phrul gyis bam par byas pa de nyon cig/ bris pas dgos pa 'gal nig gis phyir rung gi rkang pa gnyis la gdugs pa las dung gi rkang pa gnyis kyis ral pa mnan pa dang bris pas smras pa/ nyi ma 'char ka'i dus kyi tsha khyod kyi spyi bogs par
263a6: gyur cig/ dung gis smras pa/ de ltar na nyi ma 'char bar ma gyur cig ces byas pa dang / 'jig rten du dpa thos par gyur to// de nas rgyal po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag gis rung la gsol ba btab pa/ drang srong chen po de lta bu ma mdzad cig/ des smras
263a7: pa/ nyi ma shar bar gyur na gdon mi za bar bdag gi mgo 'gas par 'gyur ro// bris pas de la smras pa/ gal te de ltan 'dzin pa las byas pa'i mgo nig byos shig/ dzi tsam na 'jim palas dung gi mgo zhig byas pa las nyi ma shar ba dang gas par gyur to//
263a8: dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ dung gang yin pa de ni dge slong mod gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin no// brim pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid de yin te/ de na yang 'dis pham par byas so// gzhan yang ji ltar pham par byas pa de nyodan cig/ yul
263b1: dbus su ba somakhan gyi slob dpon zhig byung nas bso 'bras tsam ze'u chung gang khyer nas yul nas can du song ste/ de ri mo mkhan gyi slob dpon zhig gis khyim du zhugs na de yang steng par 'dug nas de'i chung ma la smras pa/ grogs po'i chung ma 'bras
263b2: ze'u chung gang po 'di chos la byin cig ces de bzhag ste song ngo / / des btse bar brtsams pa las shing zad par gyur kyang mchos so// de nas de'i khyim thab 'ongs nas smras pa/ bzang mo 'di ci zhig yin/ des rgyas par smras pa dang / des de brtags pa
263b3: las bso 'bras tsam she dag tu mthong nas des de la tse dri bar smras pa/ bzang mo 'di tshwa chu yin gyis/ chu bzang po gzhan zhig khyer te 'ongs dang / des 'bras 'di tshes par 'gyur ro// des bso mkhan gyi slob dpon la chu bzang po zhig khyer te shog shig
263b4: ces smras so/ / des de la smras nas/ des phyogs gzhan zhig tu rdzing bu zhig bris te/ der khyi ro ba ma pa zhig kyang bris so// de nas ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon de bum pa khyer nas rdzing bu yin no snyam nas phyogs der phyin te/ khyi ro bam pa mthong ba dang / des
263b5: swa bkab nas brtag par brtsams pa las ji tsam na de'i chu snod de chaganas pa so mkhan gyi slob dpon de skyengs par gyur to/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ ba so mkhan gyi slob dpon gang yin pa de ni dge slong maung gal gyi bu 'di nyid de yin no// ri mo mkhan
263b6: gyi slob po gang yin pa de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu'adi nyid de yin no/ / 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas brnyes pa'i bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi shes so// rang
263b7: sangs rgyas rnams kyis thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang dge slong shA ri'i bus mi shes so/ / dge slong shA ri'i bus thob pa gang dag yin pa de dag gi ming yang dge slong mod gal gyi bus mi shes so// dge slong mod gal gyi bus thob pa gang yin pa de dag
263b8: gi ming yang nyan thos gzhan rnams kyis mi shes te/ dge slong mau gal gyi bubs dge slong shA ri'i bu rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che mod kyi// des mang du gnas pa la dgongs nas ngas rdzu 'phrul can rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to// shA ri'i bridang mod dgal gyi bu'i le'u//
264a1: de ma tshe dang ldan pa'od srung chen por ngadagilas kyis lang ston par byed de/ smras pa/ doni dang song sngon nas spyad pa dang / rjes 'thun cig dag gan du spags pan// ga shag byas pas 'bras buche myong pa// chung dragacig bu deni byung ngan nas/
264a2: xxx/ xxx
264a3: sa rnamam sa pa yad ces nas/ / rna mams la yid ci rngon9/ sa sa rgyas pa bdag gas pan // zhen nag dag zu // de' kun byung byung cas// sbe pas sgra sa stan du smras pan// sa dag cag
264a4: kyi tham tha mas/ / mu can dag ga 'di nga ba// ba pa gron da pa pa// sgra ba sbyin ste skyes pa gyur// 'as ga cag pany-id kyi thus tshu mas// ban d+had ma rdzogs sa pa stis te// btag na
264a5: byug pa sna tshogs dang / / mthu chen lus mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur// de nas 'phos bdag sgra mi snyan du skyes// slar yang lha dge dga' bar byed pa dang // sems kyi smon lam dbang gis slar yang bdag/ mi ni dag pa rnams kyi nang du skyes/
264a6: las de gcig pu nyid kyi 'bras bus bdag/ bram zes la chen po'i rigs skyes te// nor mar skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bkur// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga don mi gnyer yang // bdag gis ston pa lan 'ga' nga ma mthong zhing // mtshungs med nyan
264a7: thos bdag gis ma mthong nas/ / bdag gi sed ras tshem gyon 'jig rten na/ dgra bcom rnams la phyag 'tshal rab tu byung // bdag ni de ltar rab tu byung ba dang // rgyal babu ma ngas mchod rten na bzhugs mthong // thub zhabs phyag 'tshal bcom ldan
264a8: bdag gi ston/ / bdag na khyod kyi nyan thos gyur ces gsol// 'od srung ji skad smras pa bzhin byas te/ 'dir khyod stong pa yi nyan thos khyod// gal te sdug bsngal kun las thar 'dod na// khyod kyis snyan par bshad pa'i chos snyan nyon/
264b1: gang yang bdag la skyes mchog skyob pa ni// thugs rje chen po yis ni chos bshad pa// bsam gtan bzhi stobs dbang po byang chub kyi// yan lag lam gyi yan lag rnam par thar// de dag bsgom pa bdag gis dga' mgur thob//
264b2: zag pa zad cing lus kyi tham bzung // lus kyi tham 'di na pa rdul med pa// drang po 'di dag dang ni bdag ga ri phrad/ de bzhin gshegs rgyal phun sum tshogs pa gsung // tshul khrims ldan pa gang 'dod 'grub par 'gyur// bdag gi
264b3: yid la ci dang ci bsams pa/ / thams cad grub ste srid pa'i tha ma 'di// bdag gi skye bzad cing 'chang ba dang / srid pa kun nas langs pa nyid bcad de// bdag ni chos rgyal thugs las skyes pa'i sras// nyon mongs tshogs rnams zad pas
264b4: mya ngan 'da'/ / bdag ni thams cad gzigs pa yis// sbyangs la gnas pa mchog tu bstan// zag pa med cing nyes babs la// go 'phang migayo bdag gis 'thob// gnas brtan 'od srung de lta bur// pa dros pa yi mtsho chen du// dge
264b5: slong dge 'dun mdun duganas/ / rang gi las ni lung bstan to// 'od srung gi le'u ste dang po'o// / 'dul ba gzhi/ bam po lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa/ de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i
264b6: bul 'di skad ces smras so/ / cha dang ldan pa shA 'i mus las myi nig byas nalas de'i rnam par smin pas shes rab chen po dang slobs pa chen po dang ldan par gyur// des smras pa/ bdag gis dgon par rang sangs rgyas// drang srong dge sbyong zhing krung
264b7: ba/ / skam dang ldan pa chos gas ni// de ma snyed bkyon pa mthong // del bdag gi sems dang pas// bar brgyugs nas kyang chos gos na// drubs shing 'askur de bzhin du// de la yang dang yang du gtugs// de nas bdag 'thugs
264b8: brtse'i phyir/ / dan bar snarang la 'phags nas// rang gi gzi brjid kyis 'bar zhing // de nas mkha' la gshegs par gyur// bdag gis thal mo sbyar byas nas// ji ltar bdag ni 'di 'dra bar// dbang rnon shes rab ched
265a1: gogs/ desar ldan sngonamam gtag/ bdagan thug pa'i rigs sa 'am// sa bdag sa byu nga // 'angs gas sa pa 'dra shang// rtag tung ba byung ba bang go// dge ba'abyab des dag
265a2: bdag na tsher bas lnga brgyar yang / / mi yi rnyed pa thob nas na// khyim med par ni rab byung // bdag gi sgri batha pa na// ma la srid tho ba yin te// rdzogs par sazan zad pa yi// ded pon din mnyes par byas// shAkyas dge'i bsna sa
265a3: la/ / bdag gis rabazung tho ba nas ni/ mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur ba'i// dgra bcom pa yang dag gis thob// btsun pa bdag gis zla byed kyis// 'gro ba'i pha rol phyin pa thog/ dge slong dge 'dun srung bzhugs nas// ston pas bdag ni
265a4: mngon sum du/ / chos kyi 'khor lo rjes skor ba// shes rab can gyis gtso bor bstan// shes rab chen po shA ri'i bri// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las na lung bstan to// shA ri'i dri me le'u
265a5: ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus ni rang gi las kyi
265a6: rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da ni khyod kyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag sngon drang srong gyur pa'i tshe/
265a7: nags mtha' dgon par gnas pa na// der ni skyes pa zhig 'ongs nas// bdag la rab byung gsol ba 'debs// bdag gis brgyugs nas de yi sgra// bregs nas kyang ni chos gos dag/ kha dog bsgyur nas de la byin// de yid dga'
265b1: xxx/ xxx
265b2: 'phrul mchog nam pa zhing/ / slo bas gdapa 'byas ni// nga zang tsho' pa 'ang mag// dad gis rda 'phral da'ajug// dge 'acab de yin// gang dang dang skyes pa ni// bsod namam byas par 'dzes pa 'o// da pa
265b3: bdanan zod ya na/ / ma mthod na// rdzogs sa blan pa dpa pa// du ga dan sa pa sa/ pa shi zhan pa// nag she sa pa // myang da pa
265b4: btsam pan bdag gis thob/ / thams cad gzigs pas rdzu 'phrul can// rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to// dge bzung du byas pa ni// bde mang po nyams su myong // mi dge pa yalas gang yin// bdag gis lung bstan panyan par gyis// /
265b5: drong mchog tum po'i thubadu ni// bdag ni tsheng dpon khe'u zung nas// khyim gyi phyi la rtse rtse nas// zan gyi bye par zhugs pa las// de na pa ma gnyis ka ni// dben par 'dug pa bdag gis mthong // de gnyis mthong bas bdag brdegs shing //
265b6: glengs pas kyang ni skyob byas// pa dang ma ni gnyis kal// yid kyinyes pa byas pa ni// gang tshe chen por gyur ba na// 'dam bu bcom pa bzhin gsad snyam// bdag gi yid kyis nyes byas kyi// lus kyis byas pa ma yin na'ang // bdag
265b7: ni pal badzig na naH/ / rdzug bsngalam pa danyams su myong // de sems kyi gagam yiyi// bdag zod pa ma 'ad// ma thegs zhan ga kyang shig// 'das bya mom bzhin dag gtog 'gyur// bdag drug pasngam gyid
265b8: sa/ / shi bar 'bya byed na pa ni// las rnams kyin lhags yang // tham mad par 'gyur ba yin// dbas pa dang mdagapa// sems ning da par bya// sems dad pa ma rgyal ma// / mas can 'gro babang ba gyi// den
266a1: gnas brtan pang nas skyes/ / dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dras pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan te/ yang nas rgyas kyi le'u rtse gsum pa'o// / de nas ngag slong gnas brtan gnas
266a2: brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa mdze ldan la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan tshe dang ldan pa pang nas skyes kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ da ni tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/
266a3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan pa// dge 'dun kun dgar bdag son na// khyams de'i phyag dar mthong nas ni// bdag gis phyags ma blangs nas su// de tshe dga' bas phyag dar
266a4: byas/ de nas bdag gis sems dang bas// khyams de gtsang mar mthong nas ni// ji ltar khyams de gtsang ba ltar// nyon mongs med par gyur cig smras// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yis ni// gang dang gang du skyes par yang // bdag gi gzugs ni bzang ba dang //
266a5: blta na sdug cing mdzes par gyur// de yi las kyi lhag mas ni// bdag gi lus ni tha ma la// bdag gi pa dang ma gnyis kyis// bdag ming mdzes ldan kho nar btags// mdzes ldan bdag ni btsas gyur te// gang tshe gnyen tshogs mdun phyin pa/
266a6: de tshe gnyen ni thams cad kyis// mgu zhing yid dga' bkur sti byas// rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas// mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// bdag gi nyon mongs med gyur
266a7: ces/ smon lam btab pa gang yin pa// bya ba byas te nyon mongs med// dgra bcom zag pa med pa yin// 'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad kyang // ka shi'i gos kyis byugs pa bas// gang gis 'dod chags bral ba yi// drang srong 'chags
266a8: sa gcig phyags pa'o/ / 'dzam bu'i gling na drang srong gi/ 'chags thams cad byags pa bas// gang gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi// re lde tsam dag byugs pa'o// 'dzam bu'i gling na dge 'dun gyi// kun dga' ra ba kun phyags
266b1: pas/ gang gis rgyal ba'i mchod rten ni// khru gang tsam zhig phyags pa'o// bdag nyid kyis ni gang rtogs pa'o// khyad par de dag shes byas nas// bder gshegs mchod rten phyags nas ni// sems kyang rab tu dang bar gyis// de ltas
266b2: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ / yon tan mang po shes pa yas// mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byos// 'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur// btsun pa bdag gis dge ba ni// gang byas dran pa 'di lags te// de yi 'bras bu sdug pa dang //
266b3: 'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myong // de ba rgyal ba'i mchod rten la// mchod pa dag ni bzang po byas// btsun pa 'di ni bsod nams zhing // dam pa bla na med pa yin// rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa 'am// sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan
266b4: thos la/ / sems ni rab tu dang byas pa'i// yon ni chung ngur 'gyur ma yin// de ltar gnas brtan mdzes ldan gyis// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsha chan du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to//
266b5: mdzes ldan gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sna ma'i me tog tshe dang ldan pa mdzes ldan gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba
266b6: lung bstan zin gyis/ da ni tshe dang ldan pas kyang rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ sna ma'i me tog rna rgyan byas// mgo la me tog phreng bcings nas// ne'u zla rnams kyis yongs bskor te// bskyed mos tshal gyis gnas su byung // den
266b7: thub pa chen po pa/ / rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten la// skye bo'i tshigs chen thams cad nas// legs par mchod pa bdag gis mthong // de nas ne'u zla rnams khrid nas// rang rang gi ni phreng ba kun// sems ni dang bar byas nas su//
267a1: mchod rten de la gdags pa byas// de nam bdag gis de dag dang // skye bo mang po gzhan mthong nas// snga ma na ba las krol te// de tshe mchod rten gdags pa byas// dge ba'i rtsa ba des na bdag/ gang dang gang du skyes par yang // bsod/
267a2: nams byas pa mdzes pa yi// lha dang mi ni rnams su gyur// rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yis/ ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas// kya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur ba'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thob// me tog gcig ni btang bas na//
267a3: ni bye ba brgya phrag tu// bdag gis lha yi yongs spyad nas// de yi lhag mas mya ngan 'das// btsun pa gal te sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan pal cher 'tshal gyur na// sems ni shin du dad pa yis// byang zhing bsnyen bkur bgyis pa zhig/ de ltas
267a4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ / yon tan mang po shes pa yi// mchod rten rnams la bkur sti byos// 'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur// rdzogs sangs de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi nyan thos la// sems na rab tu dang /
267a5: byas pa'i// yon ni chung bar 'gyur ma yin// btsun pa bdag gis dge pa ni// gang byas dran pa 'di lags te// de'i 'bras bu sdug pa dang // 'dod pa yid 'ong nyams su myod// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// yang srid skye ba zad pa dang /
267a6: nyon mongs bcom nas bsil gyur pa'i// bdag ni dgra bcom mya ngan 'das// bdag ni yang srid nyal ba dang // 'khor ba gang du'ang nyal ma yin// bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni// 'di yin len pa med par 'gyur// de nyid kyi ni d+hu yis bdag
267a7: snga ma'i me tog ming 'di bdag/ sdug bsngal kun las bdag grol zhing // srid pa'i mtsho las rgal bar gyur// de ltar gnas brtan snu ma ni// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to//
267a8: sna ma'i me tog gi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu pa tshe dang ldan pa rna ma'i me tog gis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung
267b1: bstan zan gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da ni rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ tshe dang ldan pa bye ba nyi shu bas ci zhig byas na lus des bcom ldan 'das kyi brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan// des smras pa/ rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab
267b2: 2/ / rgyal po'i pho zang bshes ldan du/ bdag gis phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi/ gnas khang gcig cig brtsigs nas ni// bdag gis gnas khang de'i gzhing // ras bran rnams kyis sa gzhag yogs// sems dga' ba dang yid bde bas// de
267b3: tshe sngon lam btab pa ni/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas ni mnyes byas te// bsnyen par rdzogs pa thob nas ni// mya ngan 'das pa mchog zhi ba// rga me dgo 'brang reg par shog/ bdag gi bsod nams des ni bdag/ bsod nams byas pas mdzes/
267b4: ba yi/ bskal pa dgu bcur lha dang ni// mi rnams su ni 'khor bar gyur// de nas las kyi lhag mas ni// bdag gi lus ni tha ma la// tsam par tshod dpon mchog gi yang // bu gcig par ni bdag skyes so// bdag ni bcas ma thag tu yang // ba
267b5: yis thos nas 'dun gyur pa/ / gzhon nu la ni bdag gis nor// bye ba nyi shu sbyin par bya// bdag gi rkang mthil gnyi ga'i sku// shin tu phra zhing mnyen pa dang // reg na bde zhing 'jam pa yi// shing bal 'dab lta'i sor bzhi skyes// 'das pa'i bas
267b6: ba dgu bcu dang / / bskal pa gcig 'di lhag par ni// sa gzhi gding bas ma g.yogs par// rkang pa 'jog ni ma myong ngo // rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas// mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i// dgra bcom
267b7: ba yang bdag gis thob/ / thams cad gzigs pas brtson 'grus can// rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to// zag med nyes pa spangs pa yi// go 'phad mi g.yo bdag gis thob// gnas brtan bye ba nyi shu pa// dge slong dge sa dun 'dun
267b8: 'dug nas/ / da ltar ma dros mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// bye ba nye shu ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dag dbang la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
268a1: bdag dbang che dang sman pa byab nyi thabs rang gi las kyai d+hU bsung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang da rang gi las kyi grub lung ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'das pa'i bskal pa dgu bcur ni// bsod nams byas pas
268a2: mdzes pa yis/ / lha rnams dang ni mer skyes te// bdag gis ngan 'gro mi shes so// bdag ni log par ma shes te// phan tshun zla bltas 'ba' shig gis// rnam par gzigs kyi mchod rten ni// mthong nas de tshe bsnyen bkur byas// 'gron
268a3: bu drug bcu rnams kyis ni/ / dri dang phreng ba drug nyos te// mchod rten la ni gdags byas pas// bdag ni log par ltung ma gyur// dge ba chung ngu byas pa ni// bde ba mang po nyams su myong // mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa yang
268a4: bdag gis thog/ / gal te rdzogs sangs shes gyur la// mchod rten de la bdag gis su// bkur sti byas par gyur na ni// legs pa mang byed 'gyur ba zhig/ de ltas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// yon tan mang po shes pa yis// mchod rten
268a5: bkur ste byos shig dang / / 'bras bu chen po dag tu 'gyur// thams cad gzigs pas mang thob dang // sna tshogs gtam dang dge ba yi// spobs ldan tshigs bcad byed pa ni// rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to// de ltar
268a6: gnas brtan dag par ni/ / dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// ga dang gi le'us bdun pa'o// / de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshad
268a7: ldan pathar dwa rdza bsod snyoms ldan pa 'di gad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa ta dA da bsod snyoms len tshe dang ldan pa dag dbang gis rang gi las kyi rtsu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pas kyang dang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston ce// de nas
268a8: cha dang ldan pa b+hair dA nga bsod snyoms len gyis smras pa/ / bdag ni tsheng dpon bur bye nag pa yi khyim na dbang byed tshe// bdag gi pa ni yi bsrungs shing // mal log pa mi mthun byas// pha dang sring mo sun dang ni// dzan dang las byed rnams la
268b1: yang / / zas dang skom gyis tshim byas kyang // ma la skyob byas nas su// bdag ni ser snas zil non pa// ma la zas ni ma byin par// khros pas tshig tu smras pa ni// zas su rdob zo zhig byas// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// rab tu cha dang thig nag gi/ dmyal bar lan/
268b2: mang lgang nas ni// sdug bsngal mi nyung thob par gyur// dmyal ba de nas shi 'phos nas// mi yi srid pa thob pa na// las kyi rnam par smin pa des// bdag ni rdo ba za bar gyur// skye ba de dang de dag tu// bdag gis rdo ba mar zos shing // de bzhin bkres
268b3: sgom sdug bsngal gyis/ / bdag ni 'chi ba'i dus byas so// bdag gi skye ba tha ma ni// mi srid thob pa 'di yin te// rdzogs mangs bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas// shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la// bdag gis rab byung thob nas
268b4: ni/ / mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa'i// dgra bcom pa yang bdag gis thog/ thams cad gzigs pa'i seng ge yi// sgra sgrogs pa yi mchog tu bstan// bdag gis nyon mongs thams cad spangs// nyon mongs bral bas zag pa med//
268b5: darung du yang btsun pa dag/ de ltar rdzu 'phrul thob gyur kyang // phug na bdag gi zas mchis pas// ngo bo nyid du gyur lags so// btsun pa bdag gis sdig pa ni// gang bgyis dran pa 'di lags te// las rnams chud mi za bas na// de yi/
268b6: 'bras bu nyams su myong // b+ha ra dA dza bsod snyoms len// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// de ltar ma dros mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// b+ha ra dA dza bsod snyoms len gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
268b7: de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs tshe dang ldan pa b+ha ra dwA dza bsod snyoms len gyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis// tshe dang ldan
268b8: pa legs 'ongs kyis kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa legs par 'ongs kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ rgyal po'i pho brang bshes ldan du// tshong dpon bu phor gyur nas ni// bdag ni nor dang /
269a1: ya ma shis/ rgyu 'a 'dzugs kyis pa sa// rgyam pa dang grang me dpas tsan rjo nas sa mag spya sa mangs pa dang / ma ga gas gag/ na ga na// rgyur g+sas/ nas ga kyi ma
269a2: na sa mas / ma ga sna // ba yirnas par rtsas pa nga/ y-i ci nas d+ha pa// chos gas na gas pa / byung demakyang bdagags no// mi ng+gA ba rgyas gyu/
269a3: daskyon med kyang mthug nas// smad cing skyob byas bani// bdog da cing 'jigs par snang / ma can lus ni sras su can// sha bre na cing rtsi 'thun pa// rab tu byung 'das la yin/ dag gi nyis pa smad pa dang // las kyi rnam par smin pa des//
269a4: nas 'chi 'bo'i dus byas nas// dmyal baM rnams su skyes par gyur// myal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag/ kha dag ngan cing sdug bsngal ldan// mdza can lus ni lus ma can// sha thaM dan cing rtsa 'thon gyur// lagan gyi mthugs shing rgya// sha na'i ra
269a5: kyi spyad g.yogs mon/ / phyag dang pung ba'i sted naHla// na mgon pa mo / da// nang na du song ni me drug pa can gyis phyir bzlog cing // de dag bdag la spyod par byed// de ltar tsher bas lngang brgyar ni/
269a6: gang dang gang du rjes pa dang/ bapes dang gom pa'i drug bdul gyis/ bdag ni 'che ba dus rgyas kyi// sems can can gyis bdag ga pa // sa sa bzhes smra sa/ gyis ma'i bas// yang pabyed par gyur// bdag
269a7: pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ / dge slong dge 'dun mdun gyis byas// skye bo'i tshogs ni chen po la// dam pa'i gnas ni ston pa mthong // skye bo'i tshogs de mthong nas ni// dzi tsam 'dod pa'i zas dang skom// rnyed par gyur na stes snyam nas// myur du brgyugs te phyin//
269a8: pa dang // skye bo'i tshogs ni chos kyi phyir// 'dug pa de ni mthong nas kyang // zas sbyin pa ni med do zhes// bdag ni re chad slar log go/ de nas thub pa thugs rje can// mgon pos bdag la bka' stsal pa// 'ongs pa legs tshur khyod bde 'am//
269b1: stan 'di ni byeng 'dug shig/ bdag ni dga' ba thob gyur nas// thal mo legs sbyar de'i 'og tu// ston pa'i zhabs la phyag byas nas// phyogs gcig tu ni bdag 'dug go// de nas ston pa thugs rje can// go tam rjes su thugs bcwo
269b2: bas/ / rim pa bzhin gyi gtam gsungs pas// bdag ni bden pa mthong bar bgyis// bden pa mthong nas thub chen la// de nas bdag gis rab 'byung gsol// gau tam thugs rje chen pos bdag/ rjes su brtse bas rab tu phyung// 'jig
269b3: rten gyi ni 'dren pa yis/ / bdag ming legs 'ongs zhes btags shing // me yi khams la snyoms 'dug pa/ rnams kyi mchog tu bdag bstan to// de ltar gnas brtan legs 'ongs kyis// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros//
269b4: ba yi mtsho chen du// rang gi las ni lung bstan to// legs 'ongs kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dga'
269b5: yod tshe dang ldan pa legs 'ongs kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis kyang nga rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de//
269b6: thong mchog rgyal po'i khab tu ni// tshong dpon phyug por gyur pa na// de na mu ge byud gyur nas// drang srong rnams ni gsoskal dgos// de na bdag gi gso skal puskal dang ldan pa'i rang sangs rgyas// zag pa med pa'i bsil gyur pa'i// drang srong
269b7: mdzes pa gcig cig byon/ / sems ni ser sIr sngon can gyis// bdag gis sdig pa bsams pa ni// dalta'i dus su dge sbyong 'di// lo bdun du ni su zhig gso// khyi yi gcin ni bskol ba yis// de nas 'bras kyi chen bcos te// de na drang
269b8: krosro Ta ru bcug/ de tsho de ni 'chi dus byas// sdig pa'i las ni de byas pas// bsdus gzhom dang ni du 'bod dang // de bzhin tshab rab tsha ba'i// dmyal ba rnams su yun ring bcos// dmyal ba nas ni shi 'phos bdag mi yi srid pa thob na yang //
270a1: nang bu can la gzhan dbang dang // sdug bsngal gyis ni bdag dus byas// de ltar tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni// ga pa dang gang du skyes pa na// mi b+hug nad dang mi zad pas// rtag tu bdag ni dus byas so// bdag gi skye ba tha ma ne// mi'i sred thob pa 'de
270a2: yin te/ rdzogs sangs bla na med pa yi// ded dpon 'di ni mnyes par byas// shAkya seng ge'i bstan pa la// bdag gis rab 'byung thob nas ni// mya ngan 'das pa bsil gyur pa// dgra bcom pa yang dag gis thob// btsun pa da ltar na yang bdag/
270a3: rdzu 'phrul ldan 'ang zag med kyang // nar bu can la 'gre ldog pa// de lta bus ni bdag 'tshe'o// de ltar gnas brtan dga' yod kyis// dge slong dge 'dun mdun 'dug nas// ma dros pa yi mtsho chen ru// rang gi las ni lung bstan to//
270a4: 'gags pa'i grogs po dga' yod kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / sdom ni/ 'od srung shA ri'i bu dang ni// migs pa dang mdzes ldan dang // sna ma gro bzhin dag dbang dang // bsod snyoms legs 'ongs dga' yod do// de nas dge slong gnas
270a5: gtan gnas brtan rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pa grags pa tshe dang ldan pa dga' yod kyis rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung bstan zin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa grags pas kyang da rang gi las kyi rgyu
270a6: ba lung ston cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pas de'i tshe rang gi las kyi rgyu ba lung ston par byed de/ bdag sngon dgon pa'i drang srong gyur// grong du bsod snyoms phyir song na// rnam par sngos shing bam pa yi// bud med kyi ni ro zhig
270a7: mthong / / bdag gis tshul bzhin brtag byas te// dkyil mo dkrung bcas 'dug nas ni// rtse gcig shin du mnyam bzhag pas// der ni mi sdug bsgom pa byas// bdag 'dug pa las de'i lho// rdol nas 'jigs skrag sgra byung ba/
270a8: thos par gyur nas bdag kyang ni// ting nge 'dzin las langs par gyur// de yi lhan yod pa 'i/ na phyugs dang ni khrag dang ni// rul pa'i dri dang mi gtsang ba// kun nas rab tu 'dzag pa mthong // d+ha ma gnyem ma'al ma dang // snying de de de zhin
270b1: bgrob la/ / srin bu brgya phrag za byed dpa// slar yang sems ni mnyam par bzhag/ ce 'di 'dra bar 'di de 'dra// 'di ci 'dra bar de de 'drar// byi yi ro ni mthong gyur nas// rang gi lus la gtong bar byed// de nas ting nge 'dzin las langs nas/
270b2: bsti gnas su ni slar log ste// de tshe bsod snyoms ma spyad de// zas kyang bza' ba ma byas so// gang tshe bdag kyang grong khyer du// zas kyi ched du zhugs pa na// yid 'phrog pa yi gzugs mthong nas// de la mi gtsang bsgom byas pa//
